papers.title: PATA: Fuzzing with Path Aware Taint Analysis
papers.authors: Jie Liang, Mingzhe Wang, Chijin Zhou, Zhiyong Wu, Yu Jiang, Jianzhong Liu, Zhe Liu, Jiaguang Sun
papers.abstract: Taint analysis assists fuzzers in solving complex fuzzing constraints by inferring the influencing input bytes. Execution paths in real-world programs often reach loops, where constraints in these loops can be visited and recorded multiple times. Conventional taint analysis techniques experience difficulties when distinguishing between multiple occurrences of the same constraint. In this paper, we propose PATA, a fuzzer that implements path-aware taint analysis, i.e. one that distinguishes between multiple occurrences of the same variable based on the execution path information. PATA does so using the following steps. First, PATA identifies variables used in constraints and constructs the Representative Variable Sequence (RVS), consisting of occurrences of all representative constraint variables and their values. Next, PATA perturbs the input, matches its RVS with that of the original input, and looks for value changes to identify the influencing input bytes for each entry in the RVS. Finally, PATA mutates the corresponding input bytes to solve constraints in the given path. To demonstrate the effectiveness of PATA over conventional taint analysis methods, we evaluated its performance on the benchmarks Google’s fuzzer-test-suite and LAVA-M against AFL, MOPT, TortoriseFuzz, VUzzer, Angora, Redqueen, and Greyone. On Google’s fuzzer-test-suite, PATA outperformed these state-of-the-art fuzzers by 29%–1830% and 7%–87% in the number of unique paths found and basic blocks covered, respectively. More importantly, it found more bugs than the comparison fuzzers, including 17 unlisted ones. On LAVA-M, PATA performed the best out of all evaluated fuzzers and found 2602 bugs. On open-source projects, PATA found 40 previously unknown bugs, with 12 of them confirmed as CVEs.
papers.abstract_zh: 污点分析通过推断有影响的输入字节来帮助模糊化器解决复杂的模糊化约束。现实世界程序中的执行路径经常到达循环，其中这些循环中的约束可以被多次访问和记录。传统的污点分析技术在区分同一约束的多次出现时会遇到困难。在本文中，我们提出了PATA，一个实现路径感知污点分析的模糊器，即一个基于执行路径信息区分同一变量多次出现的模糊器。PATA通过以下步骤做到这一点。首先，PATA识别约束中使用的变量，并构造代表变量序列(RVS)，由所有代表约束变量及其值的出现次数组成。接下来，PATA扰动输入，将其RVS与原始输入的RVS进行匹配，并寻找值的变化，以确定RVS中每个条目的影响输入字节。最后，PATA变异相应的输入字节，以解决给定路径中的约束。为了证明PATA相对于传统污点分析方法的有效性，我们在基准Google的fuzzer-test-suite和LAVA-M上对AFL、MOPT、TortoriseFuzz、VUzzer、安哥拉、Redqueen和Greyone进行了性能评估。在谷歌的fuzzer测试套件上，PATA在找到的唯一路径数量和覆盖的基本块数量上分别比这些最先进的fuzzer高出29%-1830%和7%-87%。更重要的是，它发现了比对比模糊器更多的错误，包括17个未列出的错误。在LAVA-M上，PATA在所有被评估的fuzzers中表现最好，发现了2602个bug。在开源项目中，PATA发现了40个以前未知的漏洞，其中12个被确认为CVEs。
papers.title_zh: PATA:利用路径感知污点分析进行模糊化

papers.title: JIGSAW: Efficient and Scalable Path Constraints Fuzzing
papers.authors: Ju Chen, Jinghan Wang, Chengyu Song, Heng Yin
papers.abstract: Coverage-guided testing has shown to be an effective way to find bugs. If we model coverage-guided testing as a search problem (i.e., finding inputs that can cover more branches), then its efficiency mainly depends on two factors: (1) the accuracy of the searching algorithm and (2) the number of inputs that can be evaluated per unit time. Therefore, improving the search throughput has shown to be an effective way to improve the performance of coverage-guided testing.In this work, we present a novel design to improve the search throughput: by evaluating newly generated inputs with JIT-compiled path constraints. This approach allows us to significantly improve the single thread throughput as well as scaling to multiple cores. We also developed several optimization techniques to eliminate major bottlenecks during this process. Evaluation of our prototype JIGSAW shows that our approach can achieve three orders of magnitude higher search throughput than existing fuzzers and can scale to multiple cores. We also find that with such high throughput, a simple gradient-guided search heuristic can solve path constraints collected from a large set of real-world programs faster than SMT solvers with much more sophisticated search heuristics. Evaluation of end-to-end coverage-guided testing also shows that our JIGSAW-powered hybrid fuzzer can outperform state-of-the-art testing tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 覆盖率导向的测试已经被证明是发现bug的有效方法。如果我们将覆盖引导测试建模为一个搜索问题(即寻找可以覆盖更多分支的输入)，那么它的效率主要取决于两个因素:(1)搜索算法的准确性，(2)单位时间内可以评估的输入数量。因此，提高搜索吞吐量是提高覆盖引导测试性能的有效途径。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种新颖的设计来提高搜索吞吐量:通过使用JIT编译的路径约束来评估新生成的输入。这种方法使我们能够显著提高单线程吞吐量，并扩展到多个内核。我们还开发了几种优化技术来消除这一过程中的主要瓶颈。对我们的原型JIGSAW的评估表明，我们的方法可以实现比现有fuzzers高三个数量级的搜索吞吐量，并且可以扩展到多个内核。我们还发现，在如此高的吞吐量下，简单的梯度引导搜索试探法可以比具有复杂得多的搜索试探法的SMT求解器更快地解决从大量真实世界程序中收集的路径约束。对端到端覆盖引导测试的评估还表明，我们的JIGSAW驱动的混合模糊器可以胜过最先进的测试工具。
papers.title_zh: JIGSAW:高效且可扩展的路径约束模糊化

papers.title: BEACON: Directed Grey-Box Fuzzing with Provable Path Pruning
papers.authors: Heqing Huang, Yiyuan Guo, Qingkai Shi, Peisen Yao, Rongxin Wu, Charles Zhang
papers.abstract: Unlike coverage-based fuzzing that gives equal attention to every part of a code, directed fuzzing aims to direct a fuzzer to a specific target in the code, e.g., the code with potential vulnerabilities. Despite much progress, we observe that existing directed fuzzers are still not efficient as they often symbolically or concretely execute a lot of program paths that cannot reach the target code. They thus waste a lot of computational resources. This paper presents BEACON, which can effectively direct a grey-box fuzzer in the sea of paths in a provable manner. That is, assisted by a lightweight static analysis that computes abstracted preconditions for reaching the target, we can prune 82.94% of the executing paths at runtime with negligible analysis overhead (<5h) but with the guarantee that the pruned paths must be spurious with respect to the target. We have implemented our approach, BEACON, and compared it to five state-of-the-art (directed) fuzzers in the application scenario of vulnerability reproduction. The evaluation results demonstrate that BEACON is 11.50x faster on average than existing directed grey-box fuzzers and it can also improve the speed of the conventional coverage-guided fuzzers, AFL, AFL++, and Mopt, to reproduce specific bugs with 6.31x, 11.86x, and 10.92x speedup, respectively. More interestingly, when used to test the vulnerability patches, BEACON found 14 incomplete fixes of existing CVE-identified vulnerabilities and 8 new bugs while 10 of them are exploitable with new CVE ids assigned.
papers.abstract_zh: 与基于覆盖的模糊化对代码的每个部分给予同等关注不同，定向模糊化旨在将模糊化器指向代码中的特定目标，例如具有潜在漏洞的代码。尽管取得了很大进展，但我们发现现有的定向模糊器仍然效率不高，因为它们经常象征性地或具体地执行许多无法到达目标代码的程序路径。因此，它们浪费了大量的计算资源。本文提出了一种信标，它可以在路径海洋中以可证明的方式有效地引导灰箱引信。也就是说，在计算到达目标的抽象前提条件的轻量级静态分析的帮助下，我们可以在运行时以可忽略的分析开销(< 5h)剪除82.94%的执行路径，但是保证剪除的路径相对于目标必须是虚假的。我们已经实现了我们的方法BEACON，并在漏洞复制的应用场景中将其与五个最先进的(定向)模糊器进行了比较。评估结果表明，BEACON比现有的定向灰箱引信平均快11.50倍，它还可以提高传统覆盖制导引信AFL、AFL++和Mopt的速度，分别以6.31倍、11.86倍和10.92倍的速度再现特定的错误。更有趣的是，当用于测试漏洞补丁时，BEACON发现了14个对现有CVE确定的漏洞的不完整修复和8个新错误，其中10个可以通过分配新的CVE id来利用。
papers.title_zh: 信标:带可证明路径修剪的定向灰盒模糊

papers.title: Automated Attack Synthesis by Extracting Finite State Machines from Protocol Specification Documents
papers.authors: Maria Leonor Pacheco, Max von Hippel, Ben Weintraub, Dan Goldwasser, Cristina Nita-Rotaru
papers.abstract: Automated attack discovery techniques, such as attacker synthesis or model-based fuzzing, provide powerful ways to ensure network protocols operate correctly and securely. Such techniques, in general, require a formal representation of the protocol, often in the form of a finite state machine (FSM). Unfortunately, many protocols are only described in English prose, and implementing even a simple network protocol as an FSM is time-consuming and prone to subtle logical errors. Automatically extracting protocol FSMs from documentation can significantly contribute to increased use of these techniques and result in more robust and secure protocol implementations.In this work we focus on attacker synthesis as a representative technique for protocol security, and on RFCs as a representative format for protocol prose description. Unlike other works that rely on rule-based approaches or use off-the-shelf NLP tools directly, we suggest a data-driven approach for extracting FSMs from RFC documents. Specifically, we use a hybrid approach consisting of three key steps: (1) large-scale word-representation learning for technical language, (2) focused zero-shot learning for mapping protocol text to a protocol-independent information language, and (3) rule-based mapping from protocol-independent information to a specific protocol FSM. We show the generalizability of our FSM extraction by using the RFCs for six different protocols: BGPv4, DCCP, LTP, PPTP, SCTP and TCP. We demonstrate how automated extraction of an FSM from an RFC can be applied to the synthesis of attacks, with TCP and DCCP as case-studies. Our approach shows that it is possible to automate attacker synthesis against protocols by using textual specifications such as RFCs.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动攻击发现技术，如攻击者合成或基于模型的模糊化，提供了确保网络协议正确和安全运行的强大方法。一般来说，这种技术需要协议的正式表示，通常是有限状态机(FSM)的形式。不幸的是，许多协议只能用英文描述，即使是简单的网络协议，作为FSM来实现也是非常耗时的，并且容易出现微妙的逻辑错误。从文档中自动提取协议FSM可以大大有助于增加这些技术的使用，并导致更健壮和安全的协议实现。在这篇文章中，我们把攻击者合成作为协议安全的典型技术，把RFCs作为协议散文描述的典型格式。与其他依赖于基于规则的方法或直接使用现成的NLP工具的工作不同，我们提出了一种数据驱动的方法来从RFC文档中提取FSM。具体来说，我们使用由三个关键步骤组成的混合方法:(1)用于技术语言的大规模单词表示学习，(2)用于将协议文本映射到与协议无关的信息语言的聚焦零触发学习，以及(3)从与协议无关的信息到特定协议FSM的基于规则的映射。我们通过使用六个不同协议的RFC来展示我们的FSM提取的可推广性:BGPv4、DCCP、LTP、PPTP、SCTP和TCP。我们以TCP和DCCP为案例研究，展示了如何将从RFC中自动提取FSM应用于攻击合成。我们的方法表明，通过使用RFC之类的文本规范，针对协议自动合成攻击者是可能的。
papers.title_zh: 从协议规范文档中提取有限状态机的自动攻击合成

papers.title: ProVerif with Lemmas, Induction, Fast Subsumption, and Much More
papers.authors: Bruno Blanchet, Vincent Cheval, Véronique Cortier
papers.abstract: This paper presents a major overhaul of one the most widely used symbolic security protocol verifiers, ProVerif. We provide two main contributions. First, we extend ProVerif with lemmas, axioms, proofs by induction, natural numbers, and temporal queries. These features not only extend the scope of ProVerif, but can also be used to improve its precision (that is, avoid false attacks) and make it terminate more often. Second, we rework and optimize many of the algorithms used in ProVerif (generation of clauses, resolution, subsumption, …), resulting in impressive speed-ups on large examples.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了一个最广泛使用的符号安全协议验证器ProVerif的大修。我们提供两个主要贡献。首先，我们用引理、公理、归纳法证明、自然数和时态查询来扩展ProVerif。这些特性不仅扩展了ProVerif的范围，还可以用来提高它的精度(即避免虚假攻击)，使它更频繁地终止。第二，我们重新设计和优化了ProVerif中使用的许多算法(子句的生成、归结、包含等等)，从而在大型例子上取得了令人印象深刻的速度提升。
papers.title_zh: 带有引理、归纳、快速包含等等的证明

papers.title: Four Attacks and a Proof for Telegram
papers.authors: Martin R. Albrecht, Lenka Mareková, Kenneth G. Paterson, Igors Stepanovs
papers.abstract: We study the use of symmetric cryptography in the MTProto 2.0 protocol, Telegram’s equivalent of the TLS record protocol. We give positive and negative results. On the one hand, we formally and in detail model a slight variant of Telegram’s “record protocol” and prove that it achieves security in a suitable bidirectional secure channel model, albeit under unstudied assumptions; this model itself advances the state-of-the-art for secure channels. On the other hand, we first motivate our modelling deviation from MTProto as deployed by giving two attacks – one of practical, one of theoretical interest – against MTProto without our modifications. We then also give a third attack exploiting timing side channels, of varying strength, in three official Telegram clients. On its own this attack is thwarted by the secrecy of salt and id fields that are established by Telegram’s key exchange protocol. To recover these, we chain the third attack with a fourth one against the implementation of the key exchange protocol on Telegram’s servers. In totality, our results provide the first comprehensive study of MTProto’s use of symmetric cryptography.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究了对称加密在MTProto 2.0协议中的使用，mt proto 2.0协议是Telegram的TLS记录协议的等价物。我们给出积极和消极的结果。一方面，我们对Telegram的“记录协议”的一个微小变体进行了详细的形式化建模，并证明它在一个合适的双向安全信道模型中实现了安全性，尽管是在未经研究的假设下；这种模式本身推进了安全通道的发展。另一方面，我们首先激励我们的建模偏离所部署的MTProto，给出两种攻击——一种是实际的，一种是理论上感兴趣的——针对没有我们的修改的MTProto。然后，我们还在三个官方电报客户端中给出了利用不同强度的定时边信道的第三种攻击。就其本身而言，这种攻击被Telegram的密钥交换协议建立的salt和id字段的保密性所挫败。为了恢复这些攻击，我们将第三次攻击与第四次攻击联系起来，攻击Telegram服务器上密钥交换协议的实现。总的来说，我们的结果提供了对MTProto使用对称加密的第一个全面的研究。
papers.title_zh: 电报的四次攻击和一个证明

papers.title: Noise*: A Library of Verified High-Performance Secure Channel Protocol Implementations
papers.authors: Son Ho, Jonathan Protzenko, Abhishek Bichhawat, Karthikeyan Bhargavan
papers.abstract: The Noise protocol framework defines a succinct notation and execution framework for a large class of 59+ secure channel protocols, some of which are used in popular applications such as WhatsApp and WireGuard. We present a verified implementation of a Noise protocol compiler that takes any Noise protocol, and produces an optimized C implementation with extensive correctness and security guarantees. To this end, we formalize the complete Noise stack in F*, from the low-level cryptographic library to a high-level API. We write our compiler also in F*, prove that it meets our formal specification once and for all, and then specialize it on-demand for any given Noise protocol, relying on a novel technique called hybrid embedding. We thus establish functional correctness, memory safety and a form of side-channel resistance for the generated C code for each Noise protocol. We propagate these guarantees to the high-level API, using defensive dynamic checks to prevent incorrect uses of the protocol. Finally, we formally state and prove the security of our Noise code, by building on a symbolic model of cryptography in F*, and formally link high-level API security goals stated in terms of security levels to low-level cryptographic guarantees. Ours are the first comprehensive verification results for a protocol compiler that targets C code and the first verified implementations of any Noise protocol. We evaluate our framework by generating implementations for all 59 Noise protocols and by comparing the size, performance, and security of our verified code against other (unverified) implementations and prior security analyses of Noise.
papers.abstract_zh: Noise protocol framework为一大类59+安全通道协议定义了简洁的符号和执行框架，其中一些协议在WhatsApp和WireGuard等流行应用程序中使用。我们提出了一个噪声协议编译器的验证实现，它采用任何噪声协议，并产生一个优化的C实现，具有广泛的正确性和安全性保证。为此，我们在F*中形式化了完整的Noise栈，从低级密码库到高级API。我们也用F*编写我们的编译器，证明它一劳永逸地满足我们的形式规范，然后依赖于一种称为混合嵌入的新技术，根据需要将其专用于任何给定的噪声协议。因此，我们为每个噪声协议生成的C代码建立了功能正确性、存储器安全性和一种形式的旁路电阻。我们将这些保证传播给高级API，使用防御性动态检查来防止协议的不正确使用。最后，我们通过构建F*中的密码学符号模型，正式声明并证明我们的噪声代码的安全性，并正式将根据安全级别声明的高级API安全目标链接到低级密码保证。我们的是针对C代码的协议编译器的第一个全面的验证结果，也是任何噪声协议的第一个验证实现。我们通过为所有59个Noise协议生成实现，并通过将我们验证的代码的大小、性能和安全性与其他(未验证的)实现和之前的Noise安全性分析进行比较，来评估我们的框架。
papers.title_zh: Noise*:经过验证的高性能安全通道协议实现库

papers.title: A Logic and an Interactive Prover for the Computational Post-Quantum Security of Protocols
papers.authors: Cas Cremers, Caroline Fontaine, Charlie Jacomme
papers.abstract: We provide the first mechanized post-quantum sound security protocol proofs. We achieve this by developing PQ-BC, a computational first-order logic that is sound with respect to quantum attackers, and corresponding mechanization support in the form of the PQ-SQUIRREL prover. Our work builds on the classical BC logic [7] and its mechanization in the SQUIRREL [5] prover. Our development of PQ-BC requires making the BC logic sound for a single interactive quantum attacker. We implement the PQ-SQuiRREL prover by modifying SQUIRREL, relying on the soundness results of PQ-BC and enforcing a set of syntactic conditions; additionally, we provide new tactics for the logic that extend the tool’s scope. Using PQ-SQUIRREL, we perform several case studies, thereby giving the first mechanical proofs of their computational post-quantum security. These include two generic constructions of KEM based key exchange, two sub-protocols from IKEv1 and IKEv2, and a proposed post-quantum variant of Signal’s X3DH protocol. Additionally, we use PQ-SQuiRREL to prove that several classical SQUIRREL case studies are already post-quantum sound.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提供了第一个机械化的后量子声音安全协议证明。我们通过开发PQ-BC来实现这一点，PQ-BC是一种关于量子攻击者的计算一阶逻辑，并以PQ-SQUIRREL prover的形式提供相应的机械化支持。我们的工作建立在经典的BC逻辑[7]及其在SQUIRREL [5]证明器中的机械化之上。我们对PQ-BC的开发需要使BC逻辑对单个交互式量子攻击者来说是合理的。我们通过修改SQuiRREL来实现PQ-SQuiRREL证明器，依赖于PQ-BC的可靠性结果，并实施一组语法条件；此外，我们为扩展工具范围的逻辑提供了新的策略。利用PQ-SQUIRREL，我们进行了几个案例研究，从而给出了它们的计算后量子安全性的第一个力学证明。其中包括基于KEM的密钥交换的两个通用构造，IKEv1和IKEv2的两个子协议，以及Signal的X3DH协议的后量子变体。此外，我们使用PQ-SQuiRREL来证明几个经典的松鼠案例研究已经是后量子声音。
papers.title_zh: 协议计算后量子安全的逻辑和交互式证明者

papers.title: IronMask: Versatile Verification of Masking Security
papers.authors: Sonia Belaïd, Darius Mercadier, Matthieu Rivain, Abdul Rahman Taleb
papers.abstract: This paper introduces lronMask, a new versatile verification tool for masking security. lronMask is the first to offer the verification of standard simulation-based security notions in the probing model as well as recent composition and expandability notions in the random probing model. It supports any masking gadgets with linear randomness (e.g. addition, copy and refresh gadgets) as well as quadratic gadgets (e.g. multiplication gadgets) that might include non-linear randomness (e.g. by refreshing their inputs), while providing complete verification results for both types of gadgets. We achieve this complete verifiability by introducing a new algebraic characterization for such quadratic gadgets and exhibiting a complete method to determine the sets of input shares which are necessary and sufficient to perform a perfect simulation of any set of probes. We report various benchmarks which show that lronMask is competitive with state-of-the-art verification tools in the probing model (maskVerif, scVerif, SILVEH, matverif). lronMask is also several orders of magnitude faster than VHAPS -the only previous tool verifying random probing composability and expandability- as well as SILVEH -the only previous tool providing complete verification for quadratic gadgets with nonlinear randomness. Thanks to this completeness and increased performance, we obtain better bounds for the tolerated leakage probability of state-of-the-art random probing secure compilers.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了lronMask，一种新的通用的屏蔽安全性验证工具。lronMask是第一个在探测模型中提供标准的基于模拟的安全概念的验证，以及在随机探测模型中提供最新的组合和可扩展性概念的验证。它支持任何具有线性随机性的屏蔽小工具(例如加法、复制和刷新小工具)以及可能包括非线性随机性(例如通过刷新它们的输入)的二次小工具(例如乘法小工具)，同时为两种类型的小工具提供完整的验证结果。我们通过为这种二次小工具引入新的代数特征并展示一种确定输入份额集的完整方法来实现这种完全可验证性，这些输入份额集对于执行任何探针集的完美模拟都是必要且充分的。我们报告了各种基准测试，表明lronMask在探测模型中与最先进的验证工具(maskVerif、scVerif、SILVEH、matverif)具有竞争力。lronMask也比VHAPS快几个数量级，VHAPS是以前唯一验证随机探测可组合性和可扩展性的工具，SILVEH是以前唯一为具有非线性随机性的二次小工具提供完整验证的工具。由于这种完整性和提高的性能，我们获得了最先进的随机探测安全编译器的容许泄漏概率的更好的界限。
papers.title_zh: IronMask:屏蔽安全性的通用验证

papers.title: SAILFISH: Vetting Smart Contract State-Inconsistency Bugs in Seconds
papers.authors: Priyanka Bose, Dipanjan Das, Yanju Chen, Yu Feng, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: This paper presents SAILFISH, a scalable system for automatically finding state-inconsistency bugs in smart contracts. To make the analysis tractable, we introduce a hybrid approach that includes (i) a light-weight exploration phase that dramatically reduces the number of instructions to analyze, and (ii) a precise refinement phase based on symbolic evaluation guided by our novel value-summary analysis, which generates extra constraints to over-approximate the side effects of whole-program execution, thereby ensuring the precision of the symbolic evaluation. We developed a prototype of SAILFISH and evaluated its ability to detect two state-inconsistency flaws, viz., reentrancy and transaction order dependence (TOD) in Ethereum smart contracts. Our experiments demonstrate the efficiency of our hybrid approach as well as the benefit of the value summary analysis. In particular, we show that SAILFISH outperforms five state-of the-art smart contract analyzers (SECURIFY, MYTHRIL, OYENTE, SEREUM and VANDAL) in terms of performance, and precision. In total, SAILFISH discovered 47 previously unknown vulnerable smart contracts out of 89,853 smart contracts from ETHERSCAN.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍SAILFISH，它是一个可伸缩的系统，用于自动发现智能契约中的状态不一致错误。为了使分析易于处理，我们引入了一种混合方法，该方法包括(I)一个轻量级探索阶段，该阶段大大减少了要分析的指令的数量，以及(ii)一个精确的细化阶段，该阶段基于由我们的新颖的值汇总分析指导的符号评估，该分析生成额外的约束，以过度逼近整个程序执行的副作用，从而确保符号评估的精确度。我们开发了一个SAILFISH原型，并评估了它检测两个状态不一致缺陷的能力，即。以太坊智能合约中的可重入性和交易顺序依赖(TOD)。我们的实验证明了我们的混合方法的效率以及价值摘要分析的好处。特别是，我们表明SAILFISH在性能和精度方面优于五个最先进的智能契约分析器(SECURIFY、MYTHRIL、OYENTE、SEREUM和VANDAL)。总之，SAILFISH从ETHERSCAN的89，853个智能合约中发现了47个以前未知的易受攻击的智能合约。
papers.title_zh: SAILFISH:在几秒钟内检查智能合同状态不一致错误

papers.title: ZeeStar: Private Smart Contracts by Homomorphic Encryption and Zero-knowledge Proofs
papers.authors: Samuel Steffen, Benjamin Bichsel, Roger Baumgartner, Martin T. Vechev
papers.abstract: Data privacy is a key concern for smart contracts handling sensitive data. The existing work zkay addresses this concern by allowing developers without cryptographic expertise to enforce data privacy. However, while zkay avoids fundamental limitations of other private smart contract systems, it cannot express key applications that involve operations on foreign data.We present ZeeStar, a language and compiler allowing non-experts to instantiate private smart contracts and supporting operations on foreign data. The ZeeStar language allows developers to ergonomically specify privacy constraints using zkay’s privacy annotations. The ZeeStar compiler then provably realizes these constraints by combining non-interactive zero-knowledge proofs and additively homomorphic encryption.We implemented ZeeStar for the public blockchain Ethereum. We demonstrated its expressiveness by encoding 12 example contracts, including oblivious transfer and a private payment system like Zether. ZeeStar is practical: it prepares transactions for our contracts in at most 54.7s, at an average cost of 339k gas.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据隐私是处理敏感数据的智能合同的一个关键问题。现有的工作zkay通过允许没有加密专业知识的开发人员实施数据隐私来解决这一问题。然而，虽然zkay避免了其他私有智能合约系统的基本限制，但它无法表达涉及对外部数据进行操作的关键应用。我们介绍ZeeStar，它是一种语言和编译器，允许非专家实例化私有智能契约，并支持对外部数据的操作。ZeeStar语言允许开发人员使用zkay的隐私注释从人体工程学角度指定隐私约束。ZeeStar编译器然后通过结合非交互式零知识证明和附加同态加密来可证明地实现这些约束。我们为公共区块链以太坊实现了ZeeStar。我们通过对12个示例契约进行编码展示了它的表达能力，包括不经意转移和一个像Zether这样的私人支付系统。ZeeStar很实用:它为我们的合同准备交易最多只需54.7秒，平均成本为33.9万英镑。
papers.title_zh: ZeeStar:基于同态加密和零知识证明的私有智能合同

papers.title: Quantifying Blockchain Extractable Value: How dark is the forest?
papers.authors: Kaihua Qin, Liyi Zhou, Arthur Gervais
papers.abstract: Permissionless blockchains such as Bitcoin have excelled at financial services. Yet, opportunistic traders extract monetary value from the mesh of decentralized finance (DeFi) smart contracts through so-called blockchain extractable value (BEV). The recent emergence of centralized BEV relayer portrays BEV as a positive additional revenue source. Because BEV was quantitatively shown to deteriorate the blockchain’s consensus security, BEV relayers endanger the ledger security by incentivizing rational miners to fork the chain. For example, a rational miner with a 10% hashrate will fork Ethereum if a BEV opportunity exceeds 4x the block reward.However, related work is currently missing quantitative in-sights on past BEV extraction to assess the practical risks of BEV objectively. In this work, we allow to quantity the BEV danger by deriving the USD extracted from sandwich attacks, liquidations, and decentralized exchange arbitrage. We estimate that over 32 months, BEV yielded 540.54M USD in profit, divided among 11,289 addresses when capturing 49,691 cryptocurrencies and 60, 830 on-chain markets. The highest BEV instance we find amounts to 4.1MUSD, 616.6x the Ethereum block reward.Moreover, while the practitioner’s community has discussed the existence of generalized trading bots, we are, to our knowledge, the first to provide a concrete algorithm. Our algorithm can replace unconfirmed transactions without the need to understand the victim transactions’ underlying logic, which we estimate to have yielded a profit of 57,037.32 ETH (35.37MUSD) over 32 months of past blockchain data.Finally, we formalize and analyze emerging BEV relay systems, where miners accept BEV transactions from a centralized relay server instead of the peer-to-peer (P2P) network. We find that such relay systems aggravate the consensus layer attacks and therefore further endanger blockchain security.
papers.abstract_zh: 比特币等未经许可的区块链在金融服务领域表现出色。然而，机会主义交易者通过所谓的区块链可提取价值(BEV)从分散金融(DeFi)智能合约中提取货币价值。最近出现的集中式BEV继电器将BEV描绘成一个积极的额外收入来源。因为BEV被定量地证明恶化了区块链共识安全，BEV继电器通过激励理性的矿工分叉链条而危及总账安全。例如，一个拥有10% hashrate的rational miner，如果一个BEV机会超过4倍的块奖励，他将分叉以太坊。然而，相关工作目前缺少对过去BEV提取的定量观察，以客观地评估BEV的实际风险。在这项工作中，我们允许通过从三明治攻击、清算和分散外汇套利中提取美元来量化BEV风险。我们估计，在32个月的时间里，BEV产生了5 . 4054亿美元的利润，在11，289个地址中分配，同时占领了49，691个加密货币和60，830个连锁市场。我们发现的最高BEV实例达到410万美元，是以太坊奖励的616.6倍。此外，虽然从业者社区已经讨论了广义交易机器人的存在，但据我们所知，我们是第一个提供具体算法的人。我们的算法可以取代未经确认的交易，而无需理解受害者交易的底层逻辑，我们估计，在过去32个月的区块链数据中，受害者交易已经产生了57，037.32 ETH(35.37百万美元)的利润。最后，我们形式化并分析了新兴的BEV中继系统，其中矿工从中央中继服务器而不是对等(P2P)网络接受BEV交易。我们发现，这种中继系统加剧了共识层攻击，因此进一步危及区块链安全。
papers.title_zh: 量化区块链可提取价值:森林有多黑？

papers.title: A Formal Security Analysis of the W3C Web Payment APIs: Attacks and Verification
papers.authors: Quoc Huy Do, Pedram Hosseyni, Ralf Küsters, Guido Schmitz, Nils Wenzler, Tim Würtele
papers.abstract: Payment is an essential part of e-commerce. Merchants usually rely on third-parties, so-called payment processors, who take care of transferring the payment from the customer to the merchant. How a payment processor interacts with the customer and the merchant varies a lot. Each payment processor typically invents its own protocol that has to be integrated into the merchant’s application and provides the user with a new, potentially unknown and confusing user experience.Pushed by major companies, including Apple, Google, Master-card, and Visa, the W3C is currently developing a new set of standards to unify the online checkout process and “streamline the user’s payment experience”. The main idea is to integrate payment as a native functionality into web browsers, referred to as the Web Payment APIs. While this new checkout process will indeed be simple and convenient from an end-user perspective, the technical realization requires rather significant changes to browsers.Many major browsers, such as Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari, and Opera, already implement these new standards, and many payment processors, such as Google Pay, Apple Pay, or Stripe, support the use of Web Payment APIs for payments. The ecosystem is constantly growing, meaning that the Web Payment APIs will likely be used by millions of people worldwide.So far, there has been no in-depth security analysis of these new standards. In this paper, we present the first such analysis of the Web Payment APIs standards, a rigorous formal analysis. It is based on the Web Infrastructure Model (WIM), the most comprehensive model of the web infrastructure to date, which, among others, we extend to integrate the new payment functionality into the generic browser model.Our analysis reveals two new critical vulnerabilities that allow a malicious merchant to over-charge an unsuspecting customer. We have verified our attacks using the Chrome implementation and reported these problems to the W3C as well as the Chrome developers, who have acknowledged these problems. Moreover, we propose fixes to the standard, which by now have been adopted by the W3C and Chrome, and prove that the fixed Web Payment APIs indeed satisfy strong security properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 支付是电子商务的重要组成部分。商家通常依赖于第三方，即所谓的支付处理者，他们负责将支付从顾客转移到商家。支付处理器如何与客户和商家互动有很大不同。每个支付处理器通常会发明自己的协议，该协议必须集成到商家的应用程序中，并为用户提供新的、潜在未知和混乱的用户体验。在包括苹果、谷歌、万事达卡和Visa在内的大公司的推动下，W3C目前正在开发一套新的标准，以统一在线结账流程并“简化用户的支付体验”。主要想法是将支付作为一种本地功能集成到web浏览器中，称为Web支付API。虽然从最终用户的角度来看，这种新的结帐过程确实简单方便，但技术实现需要对浏览器进行相当大的更改。许多主流浏览器，如Chrome、Firefox、Edge、Safari和Opera，已经实现了这些新标准，许多支付处理器，如Google Pay、Apple Pay或Stripe，都支持使用Web支付API进行支付。生态系统在不断发展，这意味着全球数百万人可能会使用网络支付API。到目前为止，还没有对这些新标准进行深入的安全性分析。在本文中，我们首次对Web支付API标准进行了这样的分析，这是一次严格的形式分析。它基于web基础设施模型(WIM)，这是迄今为止最全面的Web基础设施模型，除其他外，我们还扩展了该模型，将新的支付功能集成到通用浏览器模型中。我们的分析揭示了两个新的关键漏洞，这些漏洞使得恶意商家能够向不知情的客户收取过高的费用。我们已经使用Chrome实现验证了我们的攻击，并向W3C和Chrome开发者报告了这些问题，他们已经承认了这些问题。此外，我们提出了对该标准的修正，该标准现在已经被W3C和Chrome采用，并证明了固定的Web支付API确实满足强大的安全性。
papers.title_zh: W3C网络支付API的形式化安全分析:攻击与验证

papers.title: Cats vs. Spectre: An Axiomatic Approach to Modeling Speculative Execution Attacks
papers.authors: Hernán Ponce de León, Johannes Kinder
papers.abstract: The SPECTRE family of speculative execution attacks has required a rethinking of formal methods for security. Approaches based on operational speculative semantics have made initial inroads towards finding vulnerable code and validating defenses. However, with each new attack grows the amount of microarchitectural detail that has to be integrated into the underlying semantics. We propose an alternative, lightweight and axiomatic approach to specifying speculative semantics that relies on insights from memory models for concurrency. We use the CAT modeling language for memory consistency to specify execution models that capture speculative control flow, store-to-load forwarding, predictive store forwarding, and memory ordering machine clears. We present a bounded model checking framework parameterized by our speculative CAT models and evaluate its implementation against the state of the art. Due to the axiomatic approach, our models can be rapidly extended to allow our framework to detect new types of attacks and validate defenses against them.
papers.abstract_zh: 投机性执行攻击的幽灵家族要求重新思考安全的正式方法。基于操作推测语义的方法已经在寻找易受攻击的代码和验证防御方面取得了初步进展。然而，每一次新的攻击都会增加必须集成到底层语义中的微体系结构细节的数量。我们提出了一种替代的、轻量级的、公理化的方法来指定推测性语义，这种方法依赖于对并发性的内存模型的洞察。我们使用针对内存一致性的CAT建模语言来指定执行模型，这些模型捕获推测性控制流、存储到加载转发、预测性存储转发和内存排序机器清除。我们提出了一个由我们的推测性猫模型参数化的有界模型检测框架，并针对当前技术水平评估了它的实现。由于公理化方法，我们的模型可以快速扩展，以允许我们的框架检测新类型的攻击并验证针对它们的防御。
papers.title_zh: Cats vs. Spectre:投机执行攻击的公理化建模方法

papers.title: TASHAROK: Using Mechanism Design for Enhancing Security Resource Allocation in Interdependent Systems
papers.authors: Mustafa Abdallah, Daniel Woods, Parinaz Naghizadeh, Issa Khalil, Timothy N. Cason, Shreyas Sundaram, Saurabh Bagchi
papers.abstract: We consider interdependent systems managed by multiple defenders that are under the threat of stepping-stone attacks. We model such systems via game-theoretic models and incorporate the effect of behavioral probability weighting that is used to model biases in human decision-making, as descended from the field of behavioral economics. We then incorporate into our framework called TASHAROK, two types of tax-based mechanisms for such interdependent security games where the central regulator incentivizes defenders to invest well in securing their assets so as to achieve the socially optimal outcome. We first show that due to the nature of our interdependent security game, no reliable tax-based mechanism can incentivize the socially optimal investment profile while maintaining a weakly balanced budget. We then show the effect of behavioral probability weighting bias on the amount of taxes paid by defenders, and prove that higher biases make defenders pay more taxes under the two mechanisms. We then explore voluntary participation in tax-based mechanisms. To evaluate our mechanisms, we use four representative real-world interdependent systems where we compare the game-theoretic optimal investments to the socially optimal investments under the two mechanisms. We show that the mechanisms yield higher decrease in the social cost for behavioral decision-makers compared to rational decision-makers.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑由多个防御者管理的相互依赖的系统，这些系统受到踏脚石攻击的威胁。我们通过博弈论模型对这种系统进行建模，并结合了行为概率加权的影响，这种影响用于对人类决策中的偏差进行建模，是行为经济学领域的产物。然后，我们将这种相互依赖的安全博弈的两种基于税收的机制纳入到我们称为TASHAROK的框架中，在这种博弈中，中央监管机构激励捍卫者在保护其资产方面进行良好投资，以实现社会最优结果。我们首先表明，由于我们相互依赖的安全游戏的性质，没有可靠的基于税收的机制可以激励社会最优的投资配置，同时保持弱平衡的预算。然后我们展示了行为概率加权偏差对维权者纳税额的影响，并证明在两种机制下，较高的偏差使维权者缴纳更多的税。然后，我们探讨自愿参与基于税收的机制。为了评估我们的机制，我们使用了四个具有代表性的现实世界中相互依赖的系统，在这些系统中，我们比较了两种机制下的博弈论最优投资和社会最优投资。我们发现，与理性决策者相比，行为决策者的社会成本降低幅度更大。
papers.title_zh: TASHAROK:使用机制设计增强相互依赖系统中的安全资源分配

papers.title: SoK: Authentication in Augmented and Virtual Reality
papers.authors: Sophie Stephenson, Bijeeta Pal, Stephen Fan, Earlence Fernandes, Yuhang Zhao, Rahul Chatterjee
papers.abstract: Augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) devices are emerging as prominent contenders to today’s personal computers. As personal devices, users will use AR and VR to store and access their sensitive data and thus will need secure and usable ways to authenticate. In this paper, we evaluate the state-of-the-art of authentication mechanisms for AR/VR devices by systematizing research efforts and practical deployments. By studying users’ experiences with authentication on AR and VR, we gain insight into the important properties needed for authentication on these devices. We then use these properties to perform a comprehensive evaluation of AR/VR authentication mechanisms both proposed in literature and used in practice. In all, we synthesize a coherent picture of the current state of authentication mechanisms for AR/VR devices. We draw on our findings to provide concrete research directions and advice on implementing and evaluating future authentication methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 增强现实(AR)和虚拟现实(VR)设备正在成为当今个人计算机的突出竞争者。作为个人设备，用户将使用AR和VR来存储和访问他们的敏感数据，因此将需要安全和可用的方法来进行身份验证。在本文中，我们通过系统化的研究工作和实际部署来评估AR/VR设备的身份验证机制的现状。通过研究用户在AR和VR上的身份验证体验，我们深入了解了在这些设备上进行身份验证所需的重要属性。然后，我们使用这些属性对文献中提出的和实践中使用的AR/VR认证机制进行综合评估。总之，我们综合了AR/VR设备的认证机制的当前状态的连贯画面。我们利用我们的发现，为实施和评估未来的身份认证方法提供具体的研究方向和建议。
papers.title_zh: SoK:增强和虚拟现实中的认证

papers.title: Delay Wreaks Havoc on Your Smart Home: Delay-based Automation Interference Attacks
papers.authors: Haotian Chi, Chenglong Fu, Qiang Zeng, Xiaojiang Du
papers.abstract: With the proliferation of Internet of Things (IoT) devices and platforms, it becomes a trend that IoT devices associated with different IoT platforms coexist in a smart home, demonstrating the following characteristics. First, a smart home may use more than one platform to support its devices and automation. Second, IoT devices of a home may transmit messages over different paths. By selectively delaying IoT messages, our study finds that two issues, inconsistency and disorder, can be exacerbated by attackers significantly. We then explore how these issues can be exploited and present seven types of exploitation, collectively referred to as Delay-based Automation Interference (DAI) attacks. DAI attacks cause home automation to yield incorrect interaction results, placing the IoT devices and smart home in insecure, unsafe, or unexpected states. It is worth highlighting that DAI attacks do not depend on any IoT implementation vulnerabilities or leaked keys/tokens, and they do not trigger alarms at any layers of the IoT protocol stack. To demonstrate and evaluate the new attacks, we set up two real-world testbeds, where commercial IoT devices and apps are deployed. The week-long experiments from both testbeds show that an attacker has adequate opportunities to launch DAI attacks that cause security or safety issues.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着物联网(IoT)设备和平台的激增，与不同物联网平台相关联的物联网设备在智能家居中共存成为一种趋势，表现出以下特征。首先，智能家居可能使用不止一个平台来支持其设备和自动化。第二，家庭的物联网设备可以通过不同的路径传输消息。通过选择性地延迟物联网消息，我们的研究发现，攻击者可以显著加剧两个问题，即不一致和无序。然后，我们探讨如何利用这些问题，并提出七种类型的利用，统称为基于延迟的自动化干扰(DAI)攻击。DAI攻击导致家庭自动化产生不正确的交互结果，将物联网设备和智能家庭置于不安全、不安全或意外的状态。值得强调的是，DAI攻击不依赖于任何物联网实现漏洞或泄露的密钥/令牌，也不会在物联网协议栈的任何层触发警报。为了演示和评估新的攻击，我们建立了两个真实世界的测试床，其中部署了商业物联网设备和应用。来自两个测试床的为期一周的实验表明，攻击者有足够的机会发起导致安全问题的DAI攻击。
papers.title_zh: 延迟对你的智能家居造成严重破坏:基于延迟的自动化干扰攻击

papers.title: Peekaboo: A Hub-Based Approach to Enable Transparency in Data Processing within Smart Homes
papers.authors: Haojian Jin, Gram Liu, David Hwang, Swarun Kumar, Yuvraj Agarwal, Jason I. Hong
papers.abstract: We present Peekaboo, a new privacy-sensitive architecture for smart homes that leverages an in-home hub to pre-process and minimize outgoing data in a structured and enforceable manner before sending it to external cloud servers. Peekaboo's key innovations are (1) abstracting common data preprocessing functionality into a small and fixed set of chainable operators, and (2) requiring that developers explicitly declare desired data collection behaviors (e.g., data granularity, destinations, conditions) in an application manifest, which also specifies how the operators are chained together. Given a manifest, Peekaboo assembles and executes a pre-processing pipeline using operators pre-loaded on the hub. In doing so, developers can collect smart home data on a need-to-know basis; third-party auditors can verify data collection behaviors; and the hub itself can offer a number of centralized privacy features to users across apps and devices, without additional effort from app developers. We present the design and implementation of Peekaboo, along with an evaluation of its coverage of smart home scenarios, system performance, data minimization, and example built-in privacy features.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了Peekaboo，这是一种新的智能家居隐私敏感架构，它利用一个家庭中枢以结构化和可执行的方式预处理和最小化传出数据，然后将其发送到外部云服务器。Peekaboo的主要创新是:( 1)将常见的数据预处理功能抽象为一组小型的固定可链接操作符，以及(2)要求开发人员在应用程序清单中明确声明所需的数据收集行为(例如，数据粒度、目的地、条件),该清单还指定了操作符如何链接在一起。给定一个清单，Peekaboo使用预加载在hub上的操作符组装并执行预处理管道。这样做，开发者可以在需要知道的基础上收集智能家居数据；第三方审计师可以核实数据收集行为；此外，hub本身可以跨应用程序和设备向用户提供许多集中的隐私功能，而无需应用程序开发人员付出额外的努力。我们介绍了Peekaboo的设计和实现，以及对其智能家居场景、系统性能、数据最小化和示例内置隐私功能的评估。
papers.title_zh: Peekaboo:一种基于中枢的方法，使智能家居中的数据处理透明

papers.title: vSGX: Virtualizing SGX Enclaves on AMD SEV
papers.authors: Shixuan Zhao, Mengyuan Li, Yinqian Zhang, Zhiqiang Lin
papers.abstract: The growing need of trusted execution environment (TEE) has boomed the development of hardware enclaves. However, current TEEs and their applications are tightly bound to the hardware implementation, hindering their compatibility across different platforms. This paper presents vSGX, a novel system to virtualize the execution of an Intel SGX enclave atop AMD SEV. The key idea is to interpose the execution of enclave instructions transparently to support the SGX ISA extensions, consolidate encrypted virtual memory of separated SEV virtual machines to create a single virtualized SGX-like address space, and provide attestations for the authenticity of the TEE and the integrity of enclave software with a trust chain rooted in the SEV hardware. By design, vSGX achieves a comparable level of security guarantees on SEV as that on Intel SGX. We have implemented vSGX and demonstrated it imposes reasonable performance overhead for SGX enclave execution.
papers.abstract_zh: 对可信执行环境(TEE)日益增长的需求推动了硬件领域的发展。然而，当前的tee及其应用与硬件实现紧密绑定，阻碍了它们跨不同平台的兼容性。本文介绍了vSGX，这是一个在AMD SEV上虚拟化英特尔SGX飞地执行的新型系统。关键思想是透明地干预enclave指令的执行，以支持SGX ISA扩展，整合分离的SEV虚拟机的加密虚拟内存，以创建单个虚拟化的类似SGX的地址空间，并通过植根于SEV硬件的信任链提供TEE真实性和enclave软件完整性的证明。通过设计，vSGX在SEV上实现了与英特尔SGX相当的安全保障水平。我们已经实现了vSGX，并展示了它对SGX飞地执行施加了合理的性能开销。
papers.title_zh: vSGX:在AMD SEV上虚拟化SGX飞地

papers.title: A Systematic Look at Ciphertext Side Channels on AMD SEV-SNP
papers.authors: Mengyuan Li, Luca Wilke, Jan Wichelmann, Thomas Eisenbarth, Radu Teodorescu, Yinqian Zhang
papers.abstract: Hardware-assisted memory encryption offers strong confidentiality guarantees for trusted execution environments like Intel SGX and AMD SEV. However, a recent study by Li et al. presented at USENIX Security 2021 has demonstrated the CipherLeaks attack, which monitors ciphertext changes in the special VMSA page. By leaking register values saved by the VM during context switches, they broke state-of-the-art constant-time cryptographic implementations, including RSA and ECDSA in the OpenSSL. In this paper, we perform a comprehensive study on the ciphertext side channels. Our work suggests that while the CipherLeaks attack targets only the VMSA page, a generic ciphertext side-channel attack may exploit the ciphertext leakage from any memory pages, including those for kernel data structures, stacks and heaps. As such, AMD’s existing countermeasures to the CipherLeaks attack, a firmware patch that introduces randomness into the ciphertext of the VMSA page, is clearly insufficient. The root cause of the leakage in AMD SEV’s memory encryption—the use of a stateless yet unauthenticated encryption mode and the unrestricted read accesses to the ciphertext of the encrypted memory—remains unfixed. Given the challenges faced by AMD to eradicate the vulnerability from the hardware design, we propose a set of software countermeasures to the ciphertext side channels, including patches to the OS kernel and cryptographic libraries. We are working closely with AMD to merge these changes into affected open-source projects.
papers.abstract_zh: 硬件辅助内存加密为英特尔SGX和AMD SEV等可信执行环境提供了强大的保密性保证。然而，李等人最近在安全2021上发表的一项研究证明了CipherLeaks攻击，该攻击监视特殊页面中的密文变化。通过泄漏VM在上下文切换期间保存的寄存器值，他们破坏了最先进的常数时间加密实现，包括OpenSSL中的RSA和ECDSA。本文对密文边信道进行了全面的研究。我们的工作表明，虽然CipherLeaks攻击只针对VMSA页，但一般的密文旁路攻击可以利用来自任何内存页的密文泄漏，包括内核数据结构、堆栈和堆。因此，AMD现有的对CipherLeaks攻击的对策，一个将随机性引入VMSA页面密文的固件补丁，显然是不够的。AMD SEV的内存加密泄露的根本原因——使用无状态但未经认证的加密模式以及对加密内存密文的无限制读取访问——仍未修复。鉴于AMD从硬件设计上根除漏洞所面临的挑战，我们提出了一套针对密文侧信道的软件对策，包括对操作系统内核和密码库的补丁。我们正在与AMD密切合作，将这些变化合并到受影响的开源项目中。
papers.title_zh: AMD SEV-SNP上密文侧信道的系统观察

papers.title: RT-TEE: Real-time System Availability for Cyber-physical Systems using ARM TrustZone
papers.authors: Jinwen Wang, Ao Li, Haoran Li, Chenyang Lu, Ning Zhang
papers.abstract: Embedded devices are becoming increasingly pervasive in safety-critical systems of the emerging cyber-physical world. While trusted execution environments (TEEs), such as ARM TrustZone, have been widely deployed in mobile platforms, little attention has been given to deployment on real-time cyber-physical systems, which present a different set of challenges compared to mobile applications. For safety-critical cyber-physical systems, such as autonomous drones or automobiles, the current TEE deployment paradigm, which focuses only on confidentiality and integrity, is insufficient. Computation in these systems also needs to be completed in a timely manner (e.g., before the car hits a pedestrian), putting a much stronger emphasis on availability.To bridge this gap, we present RT-TEE, a real-time trusted execution environment. There are three key research challenges. First, RT-TEE bootstraps the ability to ensure availability using a minimal set of hardware primitives on commodity embedded platforms. Second, to balance real-time performance and scheduler complexity, we designed a policy-based event-driven hierarchical scheduler. Third, to mitigate the risks of having device drivers in the secure environment, we designed an I/O reference monitor that leverages software sandboxing and driver debloating to provide fine-grained access control on peripherals while minimizing the trusted computing base (TCB).We implemented prototypes on both ARMv8-A and ARMv8-M platforms. The system is tested on both synthetic tasks and real-life CPS applications. We evaluated rover and plane in simulation and quadcopter both in simulation and with a real drone.
papers.abstract_zh: 嵌入式设备在新兴的信息物理世界的安全关键系统中越来越普遍。虽然ARM TrustZone等可信执行环境(tee)已经广泛部署在移动平台上，但很少有人关注实时网络物理系统上的部署，与移动应用相比，实时网络物理系统提出了一系列不同的挑战。对于安全关键的网络物理系统，如自主无人机或汽车，当前只关注机密性和完整性的TEE部署范式是不够的。这些系统中的计算也需要及时完成(例如，在汽车撞到行人之前)，更加强调可用性。为了弥合这一差距，我们提出了实时可信执行环境RT-TEE。有三个关键的研究挑战。首先，RT-TEE能够在商用嵌入式平台上使用最小的硬件原语集来确保可用性。其次，为了平衡实时性能和调度器的复杂性，我们设计了一个基于策略的事件驱动的分层调度器。第三，为了降低在安全环境中使用设备驱动程序的风险，我们设计了一个I/O参考监控器，它利用软件沙箱和驱动程序去屏蔽来提供对外围设备的细粒度访问控制，同时最大限度地减少可信计算基础(TCB)。我们在ARMv8-A和ARMv8-M平台上实现了原型。该系统在合成任务和真实CPS应用程序上进行了测试。我们在模拟中评估了漫游车和飞机，在模拟和真实无人机中评估了四轴飞行器。
papers.title_zh: RT-TEE:使用ARM TrustZone的信息物理系统的实时系统可用性

papers.title: A Secret-Free Hypervisor: Rethinking Isolation in the Age of Speculative Vulnerabilities
papers.authors: Hongyan Xia, David Zhang, Wei Liu, István Haller, Bruce Sherwin, David Chisnall
papers.abstract: In recent years, the epidemic of speculative side channels significantly increases the difficulty in enforcing domain isolation boundaries in a virtualized cloud environment. Although mitigations exist, the approach taken by the industry is neither a long-term nor a scalable solution, as we target each vulnerability with specific mitigations that add up to substantial performance penalties. We propose a different approach to secret isolation: guaranteeing that the hypervisor is Secret-Free (SF). A Secret-Free design partitions memory into secrets and non-secrets and reconstructs hypervisor isolation. It enforces that all domains have a minimal and secret-free view of the address space. In contrast to state-of-the-art, a Secret-Free hypervisor does not identify secrets to be hidden, but instead identifies non-secrets that can be shared, and only grants access necessary for the current operation, an allow-list approach. SF designs function with existing hardware and do not exhibit noticeable performance penalties in production workloads versus the unmitigated baseline, and outperform state-of-the-art techniques by allowing speculative execution where secrets are invisible. We implement SF in Xen (a Type-I hypervisor) to demonstrate that the design applies well to a commercial hypervisor. Evaluation shows performance comparable to baseline and up to 37% improvement in certain hypervisor paths compared with Xen default mitigations. Further, we demonstrate Secret-Free is a generic kernel isolation infrastructure for a variety of systems, not limited to Type-I hypervisors. We apply the same model in Hyper-V (Type-I), bhyve (Type-II) and FreeBSD (UNIX kernel) to evaluate its applicability and effectiveness. The successful implementations on these systems prove the generality of SF, and reveal the specific adaptations and optimizations required for each type of kernel.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，投机性渠道的流行大大增加了在虚拟化云环境中实施域隔离边界的难度。尽管存在缓解措施，但业界采用的方法既不是长期的解决方案，也不是可扩展的解决方案，因为我们针对每个漏洞都采取了特定的缓解措施，这些措施最终会导致严重的性能损失。我们提出了一种不同的秘密隔离方法:保证系统管理程序是无秘密的(SF)。无秘密设计将内存划分为秘密和非秘密，并重新构建管理程序隔离。它强制要求所有域都有一个最小的、无秘密的地址空间视图。与现有技术相比，无秘密的管理程序不识别要隐藏的秘密，而是识别可以共享的非秘密，并且仅授权当前操作所必需的访问，这是一种允许列表方法。SF设计可在现有硬件上运行，与未优化的基线相比，在生产工作负载中不会表现出明显的性能损失，并且通过允许秘密不可见的推测性执行，其性能优于最先进的技术。我们在Xen(一种I型管理程序)中实现了SF，以证明该设计很好地适用于商业管理程序。评估显示性能与基准相当，与Xen默认缓解相比，某些虚拟机管理程序路径的性能提高了37%。此外，我们还证明了Secret-Free是一个通用的内核隔离基础设施，适用于各种系统，而不仅限于I类管理程序。我们在Hyper-V (Type-I)、bhyve (Type-II)和FreeBSD (UNIX内核)中应用了相同的模型来评估其适用性和有效性。在这些系统上的成功实现证明了SF的通用性，并揭示了每种类型的内核所需要的特定适应和优化。
papers.title_zh: 一个无秘密的系统管理程序:反思投机性漏洞时代的隔离

papers.title: Smile: Secure Memory Introspection for Live Enclave
papers.authors: Lei Zhou, Xuhua Ding, Fengwei Zhang
papers.abstract: SGX enclaves prevent external software from accessing their memory. This feature conflicts with legitimate needs for enclave memory introspection, e.g., runtime stack collection on an enclave under a return-oriented-programming attack. We propose SMILE for enclave owners to acquire live enclave contents with the assistance of a semi-trusted agent installed by the host platform’s vendor as a plug-in of the System Management Interrupt handler. SMILE authenticates the enclave under introspection without trusting the kernel nor depending on the SGX attestation facility. SMILE is enclave security preserving as breaking of SMILE does not undermine enclave security. It allows a cloud server to provide the enclave introspection service. We have implemented a SMILE prototype and run various experiments to read enclave code, heap, stack and SSA frames. The total cost for introspecting one page is less than 300 microseconds.
papers.abstract_zh: SGX飞地阻止外部软件访问他们的内存。这个特性与enclave内存自省的合法需求相冲突，例如，在面向返回的编程攻击下enclave上的运行时堆栈收集。我们建议enclave所有者使用SMILE，在主机平台供应商作为系统管理中断处理程序插件安装的半可信代理的帮助下，获取实时enclave内容。SMILE在不信任内核也不依赖SGX认证工具的情况下，在自省中认证enclave。微笑是飞地的安全保护，因为微笑的破坏不会破坏飞地的安全。它允许云服务器提供enclave自检服务。我们实现了一个SMILE原型，并运行了各种实验来读取enclave代码、堆、栈和SSA帧。内省一页的总成本不到300微秒。
papers.title_zh: smile:Live Enclave的安全内存内省

papers.title: Statistical Quantification of Differential Privacy: A Local Approach
papers.authors: Önder Askin, Tim Kutta, Holger Dette
papers.abstract: In this work, we introduce a new approach for statistical quantification of differential privacy in a black box setting. We present estimators and confidence intervals for the optimal privacy parameter of a randomized algorithm A, as well as other key variables (such as the “data-centric privacy level”). Our estimators are based on a local characterization of privacy and in contrast to the related literature avoid the process of “event selection” - a major obstacle to privacy validation. This makes our methods easy to implement and user-friendly. We show fast convergence rates of the estimators and asymptotic validity of the confidence intervals. An experimental study of various algorithms confirms the efficacy of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们介绍了一种新的方法，统计量化的差异隐私在黑盒设置。我们提出了随机算法A的最优隐私参数的估计量和置信区间，以及其他关键变量(如“以数据为中心的隐私级别”)。我们的估计基于隐私的局部特征，与相关文献相比，避免了“事件选择”的过程-隐私验证的主要障碍。这使得我们的方法易于实现和用户友好。我们证明了估计量的快速收敛速度和置信区间的渐近有效性。对各种算法的实验研究证实了我们方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 差异隐私的统计量化:一种局部方法

papers.title: Locally Differentially Private Sparse Vector Aggregation
papers.authors: Mingxun Zhou, Tianhao Wang, T.-H. Hubert Chan, Giulia Fanti, Elaine Shi
papers.abstract: Vector mean estimation is a central primitive in federated analytics. In vector mean estimation, each user $i \in[n]$ holds a real-valued vector $v_{i} \in[-1,1]^{d}$, and a server wants to estimate the mean of all n vectors; we would additionally like to protect each user’s privacy. In this paper, we consider the k-sparse version of the vector mean estimation problem. That is, suppose each user’s vector has at most k non-zero coordinates in its d-dimensional vector, and moreover, $k \ll d$. In practice, since the universe size d can be very large (e.g., the space of all possible URLs), we would like the per-user communication to be succinct, i.e., independent of or (poly-)logarithmic in the universe size.In this paper, we show matching upper- and lower-bounds for the k-sparse vector mean estimation problem under local differential privacy (LDP). Specifically, we construct new mechanisms that achieve asymptotically optimal error as well as succinct communication, either under user-level-LDP or event-level-LDP. We implement our algorithms and evaluate them on synthetic and real-world datasets. Our experiments show that we can often achieve one or two orders of magnitude reduction in error compared with prior work under typical choices of parameters, while incurring insignificant communication cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 向量均值估计是联邦分析中的一个中心原语。在向量均值估计中，每个用户$i \in[n]$持有一个实值向量$v_{i} \in[-1,1]^{d}$，一个服务器要估计所有n个向量的均值；我们还想保护每个用户的隐私。在本文中，我们考虑k-稀疏版本的向量均值估计问题。即假设每个用户的向量在其d维向量中最多有k个非零坐标，而且，$k \ll d$。在实践中，由于宇宙大小d可以非常大(例如，所有可能的URL的空间)，我们希望每个用户的通信简洁，即，独立于宇宙大小或宇宙大小的(多元)对数。在本文中，我们给出了局部差分隐私(LDP)下k-稀疏向量均值估计问题的匹配上界和下界。具体来说，我们构造了新的机制，在用户级LDP或事件级LDP下实现渐近最优的误差以及简洁的通信。我们实现了我们的算法，并在合成和真实数据集上对它们进行了评估。我们的实验表明，在典型的参数选择下，与先前的工作相比，我们通常可以实现一个或两个数量级的误差减少，同时招致不显著的通信成本。
papers.title_zh: 局部差分私有稀疏向量聚合

papers.title: Differentially Private Histograms in the Shuffle Model from Fake Users
papers.authors: Albert Cheu, Maxim Zhilyaev
papers.abstract: There has been much recent work in the shuffle model of differential privacy, particularly for approximate d-bin histograms. While these protocols achieve low error, the number of messages sent by each user—the message complexity—has so far scaled with d or the privacy parameters. The message complexity is an informative predictor of a shuffle protocol’s resource consumption. We present a protocol whose message complexity is two when there are sufficiently many users. The protocol essentially pairs each row in the dataset with a fake row and performs a simple randomization on all rows. We show that the error introduced by the protocol is small, using rigorous analysis as well as experiments on real-world data. We also prove that corrupt users have a relatively low impact on our protocol’s estimates.
papers.abstract_zh: 在差分隐私的洗牌模型中有许多最近的工作，特别是对于近似的d-bin直方图。虽然这些协议实现了低错误，但是每个用户发送的消息数量——消息复杂性——迄今为止与d或隐私参数成比例。消息复杂度是洗牌协议的资源消耗的信息预测器。当有足够多的用户时，我们提出了一个消息复杂度为2的协议。该协议本质上是将数据集中的每一行与一个假行配对，并对所有行执行简单的随机化。我们使用严格的分析以及在真实世界数据上的实验表明，该协议引入的误差很小。我们还证明了腐败用户对我们的协议的估计有相对较低的影响。
papers.title_zh: 来自伪用户的洗牌模型中的差分私有直方图

papers.title: Differential Privacy and Swapping: Examining De-Identification's Impact on Minority Representation and Privacy Preservation in the U.S. Census
papers.authors: Miranda Christ, Sarah Radway, Steven M. Bellovin
papers.abstract: There has been considerable controversy regarding the accuracy and privacy of de-identification mechanisms used in the U.S. Decennial Census. We theoretically and experimentally analyze two such classes of mechanisms, swapping and differential privacy, especially examining their effects on ethnoracial minority groups.We first prove that the expected error of queries made on swapped demographic datasets is greater in sub-populations whose racial distributions differ more from the racial distribution of the global population. We also prove that the probability that m unique entries exist in a sub-population shrinks exponentially as the sub-population size grows. These properties suggest that swapping, which prioritizes unique entries, will produce poor accuracy for minority groups.We then empirically analyze the impact of swapping and differential privacy on the accuracy and privacy of a demographic dataset. We evaluate accuracy in several ways, including methods that stress the effect on minority groups. We evaluate privacy by counting the number of re-identified entries in a simulated linkage attack. Finally, we explore the disproportionate presence of minority groups in identified entries.Our empirical lindings corroborate our theoretical results: for minority representation, the utility of differential privacy is comparable to the utility of swapping, while providing a stronger privacy guarantee. Swapping places a disproportionate privacy burden on minority groups, whereas an ε-differentially private mechanism is ε-differentially private for all subgroups.
papers.abstract_zh: 关于美国十年一次的人口普查中使用的去身份机制的准确性和隐私性，一直存在相当大的争议。我们从理论上和实验上分析了两类这样的机制，交换和差别隐私，特别是检查它们对少数民族的影响。我们首先证明，在种族分布与全球人口的种族分布差异更大的亚人口中，对交换的人口统计数据集进行查询的预期误差更大。我们还证明了随着子群体规模的增长，子群体中存在m个唯一条目的概率呈指数下降。这些特性表明，优先考虑唯一条目的交换对于少数群体来说准确性很差。然后，我们实证分析交换和差异隐私对人口统计数据集的准确性和隐私的影响。我们用几种方法评估准确性，包括强调对少数群体影响的方法。我们通过计算模拟链接攻击中重新识别条目的数量来评估隐私。最后，我们探讨了少数民族群体在确定的条目中不成比例的存在。我们的实证研究证实了我们的理论结果:对于少数代表，差异隐私的效用与交换的效用相当，同时提供了更强的隐私保证。交换给少数群体带来了不成比例的隐私负担，而ε-差分隐私机制对所有子群体都是ε-差分隐私。
papers.title_zh: 不同的隐私和交换:检查美国人口普查中去身份化对少数民族代表和隐私保护的影响

papers.title: Are We There Yet? Timing and Floating-Point Attacks on Differential Privacy Systems
papers.authors: Jiankai Jin, Eleanor McMurtry, Benjamin I. P. Rubinstein, Olga Ohrimenko
papers.abstract: Differential privacy is a de facto privacy framework that has seen adoption in practice via a number of mature software platforms. Implementation of differentially private (DP) mechanisms has to be done carefully to ensure end-to-end security guarantees. In this paper we study two implementation flaws in the noise generation commonly used in DP systems. First we examine the Gaussian mechanism’s susceptibility to a floating-point representation attack. The premise of this first vulnerability is similar to the one carried out by Mironov in 2011 against the Laplace mechanism. Our experiments show the attack’s success against DP algorithms, including deep learning models trained using differentially-private stochastic gradient descent. In the second part of the paper we study discrete counterparts of the Laplace and Gaussian mechanisms that were previously proposed to alleviate the shortcomings of floating-point representation of real numbers. We show that such implementations unfortunately suffer from another side channel: a novel timing attack. An observer that can measure the time to draw (discrete) Laplace or Gaussian noise can predict the noise magnitude, which can then be used to recover sensitive attributes. This attack invalidates differential privacy guarantees of systems implementing such mechanisms. We demonstrate that several commonly used, state-of-the-art implementations of differential privacy are susceptible to these attacks. We report success rates up to 92.56% for floating point attacks on DP-SGD, and up to 99.65% for end-to-end timing attacks on private sum protected with discrete Laplace. Finally, we evaluate and suggest partial mitigations.
papers.abstract_zh: 差分隐私是一种事实上的隐私框架，已经通过许多成熟的软件平台在实践中得到采用。差分私有(DP)机制的实现必须小心谨慎，以确保端到端的安全保证。在本文中，我们研究了DP系统中常用的噪声产生的两个实现缺陷。首先，我们检查高斯机制对浮点表示攻击的敏感性。这第一个漏洞的前提类似于米罗诺夫在2011年针对拉普拉斯机制进行的。我们的实验显示了攻击对DP算法的成功，包括使用差分私有随机梯度下降训练的深度学习模型。在论文的第二部分中，我们研究拉普拉斯和高斯机制的离散对应物，这些机制先前被提出来缓解实数的浮点表示的缺点。我们表明，这种实现不幸遭受另一个侧信道:一个新的定时攻击。可以测量绘制(离散)拉普拉斯或高斯噪声的时间的观测器可以预测噪声幅度，然后可以用于恢复敏感属性。这种攻击使实现这种机制的系统的差分隐私保证无效。我们证明了几种常用的、先进的差分隐私实现容易受到这些攻击。我们报告了对DP-SGD的浮点攻击的成功率高达92.56%，对受离散拉普拉斯保护的私有和的端到端定时攻击的成功率高达99.65%。最后，我们评估并建议部分缓解措施。
papers.title_zh: 我们到了吗？差分隐私系统的计时和浮点攻击

papers.title: SHADEWATCHER: Recommendation-guided Cyber Threat Analysis using System Audit Records
papers.authors: Jun Zeng, Xiang Wang, Jiahao Liu, Yinfang Chen, Zhenkai Liang, Tat-Seng Chua, Zheng Leong Chua
papers.abstract: System auditing provides a low-level view into cyber threats by monitoring system entity interactions. In response to advanced cyber-attacks, one prevalent solution is to apply data provenance analysis on audit records to search for anomalies (anomalous behaviors) or specifications of known attacks. However, existing approaches suffer from several limitations: 1) generating high volumes of false alarms, 2) relying on expert knowledge, or 3) producing coarse-grained detection signals. In this paper, we recognize the structural similarity between threat detection in cybersecurity and recommendation in information retrieval. By mapping security concepts of system entity interactions to recommendation concepts of user-item interactions, we identify cyber threats by predicting the preferences of a system entity on its interactive entities. Furthermore, inspired by the recent advances in modeling high-order connectivity via item side information in the recommendation, we transfer the insight to cyber threat analysis and customize an automated detection system, SHADEWATCHER. It fulfills the potential of high-order information in audit records via graph neural networks to improve detection effectiveness. Besides, we equip SHADEWATCHER with dynamic updates towards better generalization to false alarms. In our evaluation against both real-life and simulated cyber-attack scenarios, SHADEWATCHER shows its advantage in identifying threats with high precision and recall rates. Moreover, SHADEWATCHER is capable of pinpointing threats from nearly a million system entity interactions within seconds.
papers.abstract_zh: 系统审计通过监控系统实体的交互，提供了对网络威胁的低层次观察。为了应对高级网络攻击，一种流行的解决方案是对审计记录应用数据来源分析，以搜索异常(异常行为)或已知攻击的规范。然而，现有的方法受到几个限制:1)产生大量的错误警报，2)依赖专家知识，或3)产生粗粒度的检测信号。在本文中，我们认识到网络安全中的威胁检测和信息检索中的推荐之间的结构相似性。通过将系统实体交互的安全概念映射到用户-项目交互的推荐概念，我们通过预测系统实体对其交互实体的偏好来识别网络威胁。此外，受建议中通过项目边信息建模高阶连通性的最新进展的启发，我们将洞察力转移到网络威胁分析，并定制了一个自动化检测系统SHADEWATCHER。通过图神经网络挖掘审计记录中高阶信息的潜力，提高检测效率。此外，我们还为SHADEWATCHER配备了动态更新功能，以更好地概括错误警报。在我们对真实生活和模拟网络攻击场景的评估中，SHADEWATCHER显示了其在以高精确度和高召回率识别威胁方面的优势。此外，SHADEWATCHER能够在几秒钟内从近百万个系统实体交互中找出威胁。
papers.title_zh: SHADEWATCHER:使用系统审计记录的建议导向的网络威胁分析

papers.title: SIRAJ: A Unified Framework for Aggregation of Malicious Entity Detectors
papers.authors: Saravanan Thirumuruganathan, Mohamed Nabeel, Euijin Choo, Issa Khalil, Ting Yu
papers.abstract: High-quality intelligence of Internet threat (e.g., malware files, malicious domains, phishing URLs and malicious IPs) are important for both security practitioners and the research community. Given the agility of attackers, the scale of the Internet, and the fast-evolving landscape of threats, one could not rely solely on a single source (such as an anti-malware engine or an IP blacklist) for obtaining accurate, up-to-date, and comprehensive threat analysis. Instead, we need to aggregate the analysis from multiple sources. However, it is non-trivial to do such aggregation effectively. A common practice is to label an indicator (malware, domains, URLs, etc.) as malicious if it is marked by a number of sources above an ad-hoc certain threshold. Often, this results in sub-optimal performance as it assumes that all sources are of similar quality/expertise, independent, and temporally stable, which unfortunately are often not true in practice. A natural alternative is to train a supervised machine learning model. However, this approach needs a sufficiently large amount of manually labeled ground truth, which is time-consuming to collect and has to be updated frequently, resulting in substantial recurring costs. In this paper, we propose SIRAJ, a novel framework for aggregating the detection output of various intelligence sources such as anti-malware engines. SIRAJ is based on the pretrain and fine-tune paradigm. Specifically, we use self-supervised learning-based approaches to learn a pre-trained embedding model that converts multi-source inputs into a high-dimensional embedding. The embeddings are learned through three carefully designed pretext tasks that imbue them with knowledge about dependencies between scanners and their temporal dynamics. The learned embeddings could be used for diverse downstream machine learning tasks. SIRAJ is designed to be general and can be used for diverse domains such as URLs, malware, and IPs. Further, SIRAJ works well even when there is limited to no labeled data available. Through extensive experiments, we show that our learned representations can produce results comparable to supervised methods while only requiring as little as 100 labeled samples. Importantly, the results show that SIRAJ accurately detects threat indicators much earlier than the baseline algorithms, a feat that is critical against short-lived indicators like Phishing URLs.
papers.abstract_zh: 高质量的互联网威胁情报(例如，恶意软件文件、恶意域、网络钓鱼URL和恶意IP)对于安全从业者和研究社区都非常重要。考虑到攻击者的敏捷性、互联网的规模和快速发展的威胁形势，人们不能仅仅依靠单一来源(如反恶意软件引擎或IP黑名单)来获得准确、最新和全面的威胁分析。相反，我们需要汇总来自多个来源的分析。然而，有效地进行这种聚合是非常重要的。一个常见的做法是标记一个指标(恶意软件，域名，网址等)。)被标记为恶意的，如果它被超过特定阈值的多个来源标记的话。通常，这导致次优的性能，因为它假设所有的源都具有相似的质量/专业知识、独立且暂时稳定，但不幸的是，在实践中通常不是这样。一个自然的替代方法是训练一个有监督的机器学习模型。然而，这种方法需要足够大量的手动标记的基本事实，收集这些事实非常耗时，并且必须频繁更新，从而导致大量的经常性成本。在本文中，我们提出了SIRAJ，一个新的框架，用于聚合各种情报源(如反恶意软件引擎)的检测输出。SIRAJ基于预训练和微调范式。具体来说，我们使用基于自我监督学习的方法来学习预训练的嵌入模型，该模型将多源输入转换为高维嵌入。嵌入是通过三个精心设计的托词任务来学习的，这些托词任务向它们灌输了关于扫描器之间的依赖性及其时间动态的知识。学习到的嵌入可以用于不同的下游机器学习任务。SIRAJ被设计为通用的，可用于不同的域，如URL、恶意软件和IPs。此外，SIRAJ即使在有限的无标记数据可用的情况下也能很好地工作。通过大量的实验，我们表明，我们的学习表示可以产生与监督方法相当的结果，而只需要少至100个标记样本。重要的是，结果表明SIRAJ比基线算法更早地准确检测到威胁指标，这一壮举对于对抗短期指标(如网络钓鱼URL)至关重要。
papers.title_zh: SIRAJ:恶意实体检测器聚合的统一框架

papers.title: DEEPCASE: Semi-Supervised Contextual Analysis of Security Events
papers.authors: Thijs van Ede, Hojjat Aghakhani, Noah Spahn, Riccardo Bortolameotti, Marco Cova, Andrea Continella, Maarten van Steen, Andreas Peter, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Security monitoring systems detect potentially malicious activities in IT infrastructures, by either looking for known signatures or for anomalous behaviors. Security operators investigate these events to determine whether they pose a threat to their organization. In many cases, a single event may be insufficient to determine whether certain activity is indeed malicious. Therefore, a security operator frequently needs to correlate multiple events to identify if they pose a real threat. Unfortunately, the vast number of events that need to be correlated often overload security operators, forcing them to ignore some events and, thereby, potentially miss attacks. This work studies how to automatically correlate security events and, thus, automate parts of the security operator workload. We design and evaluate DEEPCASE, a system that leverages the context around events to determine which events require further inspection. This approach reduces the number of events that need to be inspected. In addition, the context provides valuable insights into why certain events are classified as malicious. We show that our approach automatically filters 86.72% of the events and reduces the manual workload of security operators by 90.53%, while underestimating the risk of potential threats in less than 0.001% of cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全监控系统通过寻找已知特征或异常行为来检测IT基础设施中潜在的恶意活动。安全操作员调查这些事件，以确定它们是否对其组织构成威胁。在许多情况下，单个事件可能不足以确定某个活动是否确实是恶意的。因此，安全操作员经常需要关联多个事件，以确定它们是否构成真正的威胁。不幸的是，需要关联的大量事件经常使安全操作员超负荷，迫使他们忽略一些事件，从而可能错过攻击。这项工作研究如何自动关联安全事件，从而自动化部分安全操作员工作负载。我们设计并评估了DEEPCASE，这是一个利用事件上下文来确定哪些事件需要进一步检查的系统。这种方法减少了需要检查的事件数量。此外，该上下文提供了关于为什么某些事件被分类为恶意事件的有价值的见解。我们表明，我们的方法可以自动过滤86.72%的事件，并将安全操作员的手动工作量减少90.53%，同时低估潜在威胁的风险不到0.001%。
papers.title_zh: DEEPCASE:安全事件的半监督上下文分析

papers.title: DEPCOMM: Graph Summarization on System Audit Logs for Attack Investigation
papers.authors: Zhiqiang Xu, Pengcheng Fang, Changlin Liu, Xusheng Xiao, Yu Wen, Dan Meng
papers.abstract: Causality analysis generates a dependency graph from system audit logs, which has emerged as an important solution for attack investigation. In the dependency graph, nodes represent system entities (e.g., processes and files) and edges represent dependencies among entities (e.g., a process writing to a file). Despite the promising early results, causality analysis often produces a large graph (> 100,000 edges) and it is a daunting task for security analysts to inspect such a large graph for attack investigation. To address challenges in attack investigation, we propose DEPCOMM, a graph summarization approach that generates a summary graph from a dependency graph by partitioning a large graph into process-centric communities and presenting summaries for each community. Specifically, each community consists of a set of intimate processes that cooperate with each other to accomplish certain system activities (e.g., file compression), and the resources (e.g., files) accessed by these processes. Within a community, DEPCOMM further identifies redundant edges caused by less-important and repetitive system activities, and perform compression on these edges. Finally, DEPCOMM generates the summary for each community using the InfoPaths that represent the information flows across communities. These InfoPaths are more likely to capture a set of attack-related processes that work together to achieve certain malicious goals. Our evaluations on real attacks ($\sim 150$ million events) demonstrate that DEPCOMM generates 18.4 communities on average for a dependency graph, which is $\sim 70 \times$ smaller than the original graph. Our compression further reduces the edges in each community to 32.1 on average. Compared with the 9 state-of-the-art community detection algorithms, on average, DEPCOMM achieves a $2.29\times$ better F1-score than these algorithms in detecting communities. Through cooperating with the automatic techniques HOLMES, DEPCOMM can identify attack-related communities by a recall of 96.2%. Our case studies on the real attacks also demonstrate DEPCOMM’s effectiveness in facilitating attack investigation.
papers.abstract_zh: 因果分析从系统审计日志中生成依赖图，已经成为攻击调查的重要解决方案。在依赖图中，节点表示系统实体(例如，进程和文件)，边表示实体之间的依赖关系(例如，进程写入文件)。尽管早期结果很有希望，但因果分析通常会生成一个大图(> 100，000条边)，对于安全分析师来说，检查这样一个大图来进行攻击调查是一项艰巨的任务。为了解决攻击调查中的挑战，我们提出了DEPCOMM，这是一种图摘要方法，通过将大型图划分为以流程为中心的社区并为每个社区提供摘要，从依赖图生成摘要图。具体来说，每个社区由一组相互协作以完成某些系统活动(例如，文件压缩)的密切进程以及这些进程所访问的资源(例如，文件)组成。在社区内，DEPCOMM进一步识别由不太重要和重复的系统活动引起的冗余边，并对这些边执行压缩。最后，DEPCOMM使用表示跨社区信息流的InfoPaths为每个社区生成摘要。这些InfoPaths更有可能捕获一组与攻击相关的进程，这些进程协同工作以实现某些恶意目标。我们对真实攻击($\sim 150$百万事件)的评估表明，DEPCOMM为依赖图平均生成18.4个社区，比原始图小$\sim 70倍。我们的压缩进一步将每个社区中的边平均减少到32.1。与9种最先进的社区检测算法相比，平均而言，DEPCOMM在检测社区方面比这些算法获得了2.29倍的F1值。通过与自动技术HOLMES合作，DEPCOMM可以以96.2%的召回率识别攻击相关的社区。我们对真实攻击的案例研究也证明了DEPCOMM在促进攻击调查方面的有效性。
papers.title_zh: DEPCOMM:用于攻击调查的系统审计日志图表摘要

papers.title: Measuring and Mitigating the Risk of IP Reuse on Public Clouds
papers.authors: Eric Pauley, Ryan Sheatsley, Blaine Hoak, Quinn Burke, Yohan Beugin, Patrick D. McDaniel
papers.abstract: Public clouds provide scalable and cost-efficient computing through resource sharing. However, moving from traditional on-premises service management to clouds introduces new challenges; failure to correctly provision, maintain, or decommission elastic services can lead to functional failure and vulnerability to attack. In this paper, we explore a broad class of attacks on clouds which we refer to as cloud squatting. In a cloud squatting attack, an adversary allocates resources in the cloud (e.g., IP addresses) and thereafter leverages latent configuration to exploit prior tenants. To measure and categorize cloud squatting we deployed a custom Internet telescope within the Amazon Web Services us-east-1 region. Using this apparatus, we deployed over 3 million servers receiving 1.5 million unique IP addresses ($\approx$ 56% of the available pool) over 101 days beginning in March of 2021. We identified 4 classes of cloud services, 7 classes of third-party services, and DNS as sources of exploitable latent configurations. We discovered that exploitable configurations were both common and in many cases extremely dangerous; we received over 5 million cloud messages, many containing sensitive data such as financial transactions, GPS location, and PII. Within the 7 classes of third-party services, we identified dozens of exploitable software systems spanning hundreds of servers (e.g., databases, caches, mobile applications, and web services). Lastly, we identified 5446 exploitable domains panning 231 eTLDs—including 105 in the top 10000 and 23 in the top 1000 popular domains. Through tenant disclosures we have identified several root causes, including (a) a lack of organizational controls, (b) poor service hygiene, and (c) failure to follow best practices. We conclude with a discussion of the space of possible mitigations and describe the mitigations to be deployed by Amazon in response to this study.
papers.abstract_zh: 公共云通过资源共享提供可扩展且经济高效的计算。但是，从传统的内部服务管理迁移到云会带来新的挑战；未能正确供应、维护或停用弹性服务会导致功能故障和易受攻击性。在本文中，我们探讨了一大类针对云的攻击，我们称之为云占位。在云占用攻击中，对手在云中分配资源(例如，IP地址)，然后利用潜在配置来利用先前的租户。为了对云占用进行测量和分类，我们在Amazon Web Services us-east-1区域部署了一个定制的互联网望远镜。从2021年3月开始，我们使用这种设备在101天内部署了300多万台服务器，接收了150万个唯一的IP地址(约占可用地址池的56%)。我们将4类云服务、7类第三方服务和DNS确定为可利用的潜在配置来源。我们发现，可利用的配置既常见，在许多情况下又极其危险；我们收到了超过500万条云消息，其中许多包含金融交易、GPS定位和PII等敏感数据。在第三方服务的7个类别中，我们确定了跨越数百台服务器的数十个可利用的软件系统(例如，数据库、缓存、移动应用程序和web服务)。最后，我们确定了5446个可利用的域，涉及231个eTLDs，包括前10000个中的105个和前1000个热门域中的23个。通过租户披露，我们发现了几个根本原因，包括(a)缺乏组织控制，(b)服务卫生差，以及(c)未能遵循最佳实践。最后，我们讨论了可能的缓解空间，并描述了Amazon为响应这项研究而部署的缓解措施。
papers.title_zh: 测量和降低公共云上IP重用的风险

papers.title: SecFloat: Accurate Floating-Point meets Secure 2-Party Computation
papers.authors: Deevashwer Rathee, Anwesh Bhattacharya, Rahul Sharma, Divya Gupta, Nishanth Chandran, Aseem Rastogi
papers.abstract: We build a library SecFloat for secure 2-party computation (2PC) of 32-bit single-precision floating-point operations and math functions. The existing functionalities used in cryptographic works are imprecise and the precise functionalities used in standard libraries are not crypto-friendly, i.e., they use operations that are cheap on CPUs but have exorbitant cost in 2PC. SecFloat bridges this gap with its novel crypto-friendly precise functionalities. Compared to the prior cryptographic libraries, SecFloat is up to six orders of magnitude more precise and up to two orders of magnitude more efficient. Furthermore, against a precise 2PC baseline, SecFloat is three orders of magnitude more efficient. The high precision of SecFloat leads to the first accurate implementation of secure inference. All prior works on secure inference of deep neural networks rely on ad hoc float-to-fixed converters. We evaluate a model where the fixed-point approximations used in privacy-preserving machine learning completely fail and floating-point is necessary. Thus, emphasizing the need for libraries like SecFloat.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们为32位单精度浮点运算和数学函数的安全双方计算(2PC)构建了一个库SecFloat。密码作品中使用的现有功能是不精确的，标准库中使用的精确功能不是加密友好的，即，它们使用在CPU上便宜但在2PC上成本过高的操作。SecFloat以其新颖的加密友好的精确功能弥合了这一鸿沟。与以前的加密库相比，SecFloat的精度提高了六个数量级，效率提高了两个数量级。此外，相对于精确的2PC基线，SecFloat的效率高出三个数量级。SecFloat的高精度导致了安全推理的第一次精确实现。所有先前关于深度神经网络的安全推断的工作依赖于特别的浮点到固定转换器。我们评估了一个模型，其中隐私保护机器学习中使用的定点近似完全失败，浮点是必要的。因此，强调需要像SecFloat这样的库。
papers.title_zh: SecFloat:精确浮点运算满足安全的两方计算

papers.title: Multi-Server Verifiable Computation of Low-Degree Polynomials
papers.authors: Liang Feng Zhang, Huaxiong Wang
papers.abstract: The conflicts between input privacy and efficiency in single-server non-interactive verifiable computation (NIVC) makes it interesting to consider the multi-server models of NIVC. Although the existing multi-server NIVC schemes provide meaningful improvements, they either require the servers to communicate or leave the client’s data unprotected. It has been an open problem to design multi-server NIVC with both input privacy and non-communicating servers. In this paper we define a multi-server verifiable computation (MSVC) model where the client secret-shares its input x among non-communicating servers, each server locally computes a function F to get a partial result, and finally the client reconstructs F(x) from all partial results. We construct five MSVC schemes for outsourcing low-degree polynomials and thus answer the open question for such polynomials. Our schemes are t-private such that any t servers learn no information about x. Our schemes are t-secure such that any t servers cannot persuade the client to output wrong results. The privacy and security can be either information-theoretic or computational. Comparing with the existing schemes, our servers can be at least two orders faster.
papers.abstract_zh: 单服务器非交互式可验证计算(NIVC)中输入隐私和效率之间的冲突使得考虑NIVC的多服务器模型变得有趣。尽管现有的多服务器NIVC方案提供了有意义的改进，但它们要么需要服务器进行通信，要么让客户机的数据不受保护。设计具有输入隐私和非通信服务器的多服务器NIVC是一个公开的问题。本文定义了一个多服务器可验证计算(MSVC)模型，其中客户端在不通信的服务器之间秘密共享其输入x，每个服务器本地计算一个函数F以获得部分结果，最后客户端从所有部分结果中重构F(x)。我们构造了五个外包低次多项式的MSVC方案，从而回答了这类多项式的公开问题。我们的方案是t-private的，任何t个服务器都不知道关于x的信息。我们的方案是t-secure的，任何t个服务器都不能说服客户机输出错误的结果。隐私和安全可以是信息论的，也可以是计算的。与现有方案相比，我们的服务器至少可以快两个数量级。
papers.title_zh: 低次多项式的多服务器可验证计算

papers.title: Why Crypto-detectors Fail: A Systematic Evaluation of Cryptographic Misuse Detection Techniques
papers.authors: Amit Seal Ami, Nathan Cooper, Kaushal Kafle, Kevin Moran, Denys Poshyvanyk, Adwait Nadkarni
papers.abstract: The correct use of cryptography is central to ensuring data security in modern software systems. Hence, several academic and commercial static analysis tools have been developed for detecting and mitigating crypto-API misuse. While developers are optimistically adopting these crypto-API misuse detectors (or crypto-detectors) in their software development cycles, this momentum must be accompanied by a rigorous understanding of their effectiveness at finding crypto-API misuse in practice. This paper presents the MASC framework, which enables a systematic and data-driven evaluation of crypto-detectors using mutation testing. We ground MASC in a comprehensive view of the problem space by developing a data-driven taxonomy of existing crypto-API misuse, containing 105 misuse cases organized among nine semantic clusters. We develop 12 generalizable usage-based mutation operators and three mutation scopes that can expressively instantiate thousands of compilable variants of the misuse cases for thoroughly evaluating crypto-detectors. Using MASC, we evaluate nine major crypto-detectors and discover 19 unique, undocumented flaws that severely impact the ability of crypto-detectors to discover misuses in practice. We conclude with a discussion on the diverse perspectives that influence the design of crypto-detectors and future directions towards building security-focused crypto-detectors by design.
papers.abstract_zh: 在现代软件系统中，正确使用加密技术是确保数据安全的关键。因此，已经开发了几种学术和商业静态分析工具来检测和减轻crypto-API误用。虽然开发人员在他们的软件开发周期中乐观地采用这些crypto-API误用检测器(或crypto-detector ),但是这种势头必须伴随着对它们在实践中发现crypto-API误用的有效性的严格理解。本文介绍了MASC框架，该框架能够使用突变测试对密码检测器进行系统的和数据驱动的评估。我们通过开发现有crypto-API滥用的数据驱动分类法，将MASC置于问题空间的全面视图中，包含组织在九个语义群中的105个滥用案例。我们开发了12个可推广的基于使用的变异算子和三个变异范围，它们可以表达性地实例化误用案例的数千个可编译的变体，以彻底评估密码检测器。使用MASC，我们评估了9个主要的密码检测器，发现了19个独特的、未记录的缺陷，这些缺陷严重影响了密码检测器在实践中发现误用的能力。最后，我们讨论了影响密码检测器设计的各种观点，以及通过设计构建安全密码检测器的未来方向。
papers.title_zh: 为什么密码检测器失败:密码误用检测技术的系统评价

papers.title: "They're not that hard to mitigate": What Cryptographic Library Developers Think About Timing Attacks
papers.authors: Jan Jancar, Marcel Fourné, Daniel De Almeida Braga, Mohamed Sabt, Peter Schwabe, Gilles Barthe, Pierre-Alain Fouque, Yasemin Acar
papers.abstract: Timing attacks are among the most devastating side-channel attacks, allowing remote attackers to retrieve secret material, including cryptographic keys, with relative ease. In principle, “these attacks are not that hard to mitigate the basic intuition, captured by the constant-time criterion, is that control-flow and memory accesses should be independent from secrets. Furthermore, there is a broad range of tools for automatically checking adherence to this intuition. Yet, these attacks still plague popular cryptographic libraries twenty-five years after their discovery, reflecting a dangerous gap between academic research and cryptographic engineering. This gap can potentially undermine the emerging shift towards high-assurance, formally verified cryptographic libraries. However, the causes for this gap remain uninvestigated. To understand the causes of this gap, we conducted a survey with 44 developers of 27 prominent open-source cryptographic libraries. The goal of the survey was to analyze if and how the developers ensure that their code executes in constant time. Our main findings are that developers are aware of timing attacks and of their potentially dramatic consequences and yet often prioritize other issues over the perceived huge investment of time and resources currently needed to make their code resistant to timing attacks. Based on the survey, we identify several shortcomings in existing analysis tools for constant-time, and issue recommendations that can make writing constant-time libraries less difficult. Our recommendations can inform future development of analysis tools, security-aware compilers, and cryptographic libraries, not only for constant-timeness, but in the broader context of side-channel attacks, in particular for micro-architectural side-channel attacks, which are a younger topic and too recent as focus for this survey.
papers.abstract_zh: 定时攻击是最具破坏性的旁道攻击之一，它允许远程攻击者相对容易地检索秘密材料，包括密钥。原则上，“这些攻击并不难缓解基本的直觉，即控制流和内存访问应该独立于秘密，这是由恒定时间标准获得的。此外，有很多工具可以自动检查对这种直觉的坚持。然而，这些攻击在被发现25年后仍然困扰着流行的密码库，反映了学术研究和密码工程之间的危险差距。这种差距可能会破坏正在出现的向高保证、正式验证的加密库的转变。然而，这种差距的原因仍然没有调查。为了了解这种差距的原因，我们对27个著名的开源密码库的44名开发人员进行了调查。调查的目标是分析开发人员是否以及如何确保他们的代码在恒定的时间内执行。我们的主要发现是，开发人员意识到了计时攻击及其潜在的严重后果，但他们通常会优先考虑其他问题，而不是当前使他们的代码抵抗计时攻击所需的巨大时间和资源投入。在调查的基础上，我们发现了现有的常量时间分析工具中的几个缺点，并提出了一些建议来降低编写常量时间库的难度。我们的建议可以为分析工具、安全意识编译器和密码库的未来发展提供信息，不仅针对恒定时间，而且针对更广泛的侧信道攻击，特别是微架构侧信道攻击，这是一个较新的主题，作为本次调查的焦点还为时过晚。
papers.title_zh: “它们并不难缓解”:密码库开发人员如何看待计时攻击

papers.title: Annotating, Tracking, and Protecting Cryptographic Secrets with CryptoMPK
papers.authors: Xuancheng Jin, Xuangan Xiao, Songlin Jia, Wang Gao, Dawu Gu, Hang Zhang, Siqi Ma, Zhiyun Qian, Juanru Li
papers.abstract: Protecting confidential data against memory disclosure attacks is crucial to many critical applications, especially those involve cryptographic operations. However, it is neither easy to identify involved cryptographic confidential data in a program nor to implement a fine-grained and yet efficient protection. Existing defensive techniques face many shortcomings such as coarse-grained protection or exorbitant overhead.
