Towards designing this attack, mmSpy solves a number of challenges related to non-availability of large scale radar datasets, systematic correction of various sources of noises, as well as domain adaptation problems in harvesting training data. Extensive measurement-based validation achieves an endto-end accuracy of 83-44% in classifying digits and keywords over a range of 1-6ft, thereby compromising the privacy in applications such as exchange of credit card information. In addition, mmSpy shows the feasibility of reconstruction of the audio signals from the radar data, using which more sensitive information can be potentially leaked.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了一个系统mmSpy，展示了远程窃听电话的可行性。为此，mmSpy使用现成的工作在毫米波频谱(77GHz和60GHz)的雷达设备来检测耳机振动。鉴于毫米波雷达在许多自动驾驶、遥感和其他物联网应用中变得越来越受欢迎，我们认为这是一个关键的隐私问题。与显示检测具有较大振幅的扬声器振动的可行性的先前工作相比，mmSpy利用较小波长的毫米波雷达信号来检测电话呼叫中使用的耳机设备中的细微振动。为了设计这种攻击，mmSpy解决了与大规模雷达数据集的不可用性、各种噪声源的系统校正以及采集训练数据中的域适应问题相关的许多挑战。广泛的基于测量的验证在1-6英尺范围内对数字和关键字进行分类时实现了83-44%的端到端准确性，从而损害了信用卡信息交换等应用中的隐私。此外，mmSpy显示了从雷达数据中重建音频信号的可行性，使用该技术可能会泄露更多敏感信息。
papers.title_zh: mmSpy:使用毫米波雷达来监视电话

papers.title: Attacks on Wireless Coexistence: Exploiting Cross-Technology Performance Features for Inter-Chip Privilege Escalation
papers.authors: Jiska Classen, Francesco Gringoli, Michael Hermann, Matthias Hollick
papers.abstract: Modern mobile devices feature multiple wireless technologies, such as Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and LTE. Each of them is implemented within a separate wireless chip, sometimes packaged as combo chips. However, these chips share components and resources, such as the same antenna or wireless spectrum. Wireless coexistence interfaces enable them to schedule packets without collisions despite shared resources, essential to maximizing networking performance. Today’s hardwired coexistence interfaces hinder clear security boundaries and separation between chips and chip components. This paper shows practical coexistence attacks on Broadcom, Cypress, and Silicon Labs chips deployed in billions of devices. For example, we demonstrate that a Bluetooth chip can directly extract network passwords and manipulate traffic on a Wi-Fi chip. Coexistence attacks enable a novel type of lateral privilege escalation across chip boundaries. We responsibly disclosed the vulnerabilities to the vendors. Yet, only partial fixes were released for existing hardware since wireless chips would need to be redesigned from the ground up to prevent the presented attacks on coexistence.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代移动设备具有多种无线技术，如蓝牙、Wi-Fi和LTE。它们中的每一个都在一个单独的无线芯片中实现，有时被封装成组合芯片。然而，这些芯片共享组件和资源，例如相同的天线或无线频谱。无线共存接口使他们能够在共享资源的情况下无冲突地调度数据包，这对最大限度地提高网络性能至关重要。今天的硬连线共存接口阻碍了芯片和芯片组件之间清晰的安全边界和分离。本文展示了对Broadcom、Cypress和Silicon Labs芯片的实际共存攻击，这些芯片部署在数十亿台设备中。例如，我们证明了蓝牙芯片可以直接提取网络密码，并操纵Wi-Fi芯片上的流量。共存攻击支持一种跨越芯片边界的新型横向权限提升。我们负责任地向供应商披露了漏洞。然而，对现有硬件只发布了部分修复，因为无线芯片需要从头开始重新设计，以防止目前对共存的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 对无线共存的攻击:利用跨技术性能特征进行芯片间特权提升

papers.title: Invisible Finger: Practical Electromagnetic Interference Attack on Touchscreen-based Electronic Devices
papers.authors: Haoqi Shan, Boyi Zhang, Zihao Zhan, Dean Sullivan, Shuo Wang, Yier Jin
papers.abstract: Touchscreen-based electronic devices such as smart phones and smart tablets are widely used in our daily life. While the security of electronic devices have been heavily investigated recently, the resilience of touchscreens against various attacks has yet to be thoroughly investigated. In this paper, for the first time, we show that touchscreen-based electronic devices are vulnerable to intentional electromagnetic interference (IEMI) attacks in a systematic way and how to conduct this attack in a practical way. Our contribution lies in not just demonstrating the attack, but also analyzing and quantifying the underlying mechanism allowing the novel IEMI attack on touchscreens in detail. We show how to calculate both the minimum amount of electric field and signal frequency required to induce touchscreen ghost touches. We further analyze our IEMI attack on real touchscreens with different magnitudes, frequencies, duration, and multitouch patterns. The mechanism of controlling the touchscreen-enabled electronic devices with IEMI signals is also elaborated. We design and evaluate an out-of-sight touchscreen locator and touch injection feedback mechanism to assist a practical IEMI attack. Our attack works directly on the touchscreen circuit regardless of the touchscreen scanning mechanism or operating system. Our attack can inject short-tap, long-press, and omnidirectional gestures on touchscreens from a distance larger than the average thickness of common tabletops. Compared with the state-of-the-art touchscreen attack, ours can accurately inject different types of touch events without the need for sensing signal synchronization, which makes our attack more robust and practical. In addition, rather than showing a simple proof-of-concept attack, we present and demonstrate the first ready-to-use IEMI based touchscreen attack vector with end-to-end attack scenarios
papers.abstract_zh: 基于触摸屏的电子设备，如智能手机和智能平板电脑，在我们的日常生活中广泛使用。虽然近来已经对电子设备的安全性进行了大量调查，但是触摸屏对各种攻击的恢复能力仍有待彻底调查。在本文中，我们首次展示了基于触摸屏的电子设备容易受到系统的故意电磁干扰(IEMI)攻击，以及如何以实用的方式进行这种攻击。我们的贡献不仅仅在于演示攻击，还在于详细分析和量化允许触摸屏上的新型IEMI攻击的潜在机制。我们展示了如何计算诱发触摸屏虚触摸所需的最小电场量和信号频率。我们进一步分析了我们在不同幅度、频率、持续时间和多点触摸模式的真实触摸屏上的IEMI攻击。还阐述了用IEMI信号控制支持触摸屏的电子设备的机制。我们设计并评估了一个看不见的触摸屏定位器和触摸注入反馈机制，以协助实际的IEMI攻击。我们的攻击直接作用于触摸屏电路，而不考虑触摸屏扫描机制或操作系统。我们的攻击可以从比普通桌面的平均厚度更远的距离在触摸屏上注入短击、长按和全向手势。与最先进的触摸屏攻击相比，我们的攻击可以准确地注入不同类型的触摸事件，而无需感测信号同步，这使得我们的攻击更加鲁棒和实用。此外，我们没有展示简单的概念验证攻击，而是展示了第一个现成的基于IEMI的触摸屏攻击向量和端到端攻击场景
papers.title_zh: 看不见的手指:对基于触摸屏的电子设备的实际电磁干扰攻击

papers.title: Using Throughput-Centric Byzantine Broadcast to Tolerate Malicious Majority in Blockchains
papers.authors: Ruomu Hou, Haifeng Yu, Prateek Saxena
papers.abstract: Fault tolerance of a blockchain is often characterized by the fraction f of “adversarial power” that it can tolerate in the system. Despite the fast progress in blockchain designs in recent years, existing blockchain systems can still only tolerate f below 0.5. Can practically usable blockchains tolerate a malicious majority, i.e., f above 0.5? This work presents a positive answer to this question. We first note that the well-known impossibility of byzantine consensus for f above 0.5 does not carry over to blockchains. To tolerate f above 0.5, we use byzantine broadcast, instead of byzantine consensus, as the core of the blockchain. A major obstacle in doing so, however, is that the resulting blockchain may have extremely low throughput. To overcome this central technical challenge, we propose a novel byzantine broadcast protocol OverlayBB, that can tolerate f above 0.5 while achieving good throughput. Using OverlayBB as the core, we present the design, implementation, and evaluation of a novel Proof-of-Stake blockchain called BCube. BCube can tolerate a malicious majority, while achieving practically usable transaction throughput and confirmation latency in our experiments with 10000 nodes and under f=0.7. To our knowledge, BCube is the first blockchain that can achieve such properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 区块链的容错性通常由它在系统中可以容忍的“对抗能力”的分数f来表征。尽管近年来区块链设计取得了快速进展，但现有的区块链系统仍然只能容许f低于0.5。实际可用的区块链能容忍恶意多数吗，即f大于0.5？这项工作为这个问题提供了一个肯定的答案。我们首先注意到，众所周知的f大于0.5的拜占廷共识的不可能性并没有延续到区块链。为了容许f高于0.5，我们使用拜占庭广播，而不是拜占庭共识，作为区块链的核心。然而，这样做的一个主要障碍是所得的区块链可能具有极低的吞吐量。为了克服这一核心技术挑战，我们提出了一种新的拜占庭广播协议OverlayBB，它可以容忍高于0.5的f，同时实现良好的吞吐量。以OverlayBB为核心，我们提出了一个新的利害关系证明区块链BCube的设计、实现和评估。BCube可以容忍恶意多数，同时在我们对10000个节点和f=0.7的实验中实现实际可用的事务吞吐量和确认延迟。据我们所知，BCube是第一个能实现这种性质的区块链。
papers.title_zh: 在区块链使用以吞吐量为中心的拜占庭广播容忍恶意多数

papers.title: MatRiCT+: More Efficient Post-Quantum Private Blockchain Payments
papers.authors: Muhammed F. Esgin, Ron Steinfeld, Raymond K. Zhao
papers.abstract: We introduce MatRiCT+, a practical private blockchain payment protocol based on “post-quantum” lattice assumptions. MatRiCT+ builds on MatRiCT due to Esgin et al. (ACM CCS’19) and, in general, follows the Ring Confidential Transactions (RingCT) approach used in Monero, the largest privacy-preserving cryptocurrency. In terms of the practical aspects, MatRiCT+ has 2-18× shorter proofs (depending on the number of input accounts, M) and runs 3-11× faster (for a typical transaction) in comparison to MatRiCT. A significant advantage of MatRiCT+ is that the proof length’s dependence on M is very minimal (only O(logM)), while MatRiCT has a proof length linear in M. To support its efficiency, we devise several novel techniques in our design of MatRiCT+ to achieve compact lattice-based zeroknowledge proof systems, exploiting the algebraic properties of power-of-2 cyclotomic rings commonly used in practical latticebased cryptography. Along the way, we design a family of “optimal” challenge spaces, using a technique we call partition-and-sample, with minimal $\ell_{1}$-norm and invertible challenge differences (with overwhelming probability), while supporting highly-splitting power-of-2 cyclotomic rings. We believe all these results to be widely applicable and of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了MatRiCT+，一个基于“后量子”格假设的实用的私人区块链支付协议。MatRiCT+建立在Esgin等人(ACM CCS'19)的MatRiCT基础上，总体上遵循Monero(最大的隐私保护加密货币)中使用的环形保密交易(RingCT)方法。在实践方面，与MatRiCT相比，MatRiCT+的证明时间短2-18倍(取决于输入帐户的数量M ),运行速度快3-11倍(对于典型的交易)。MatRiCT+的一个显著优势是证明长度对M的依赖性非常小(只有O(logM))，而MatRiCT的证明长度在M中是线性的。为了支持其效率，我们在MatRiCT+的设计中设计了几种新颖的技术来实现紧凑的基于格的零知识证明系统，利用了实用的基于格的密码学中常用的2的幂分圆环的代数性质。在此过程中，我们设计了一系列“最佳”挑战空间，使用我们称之为分区和采样的技术，具有最小的$ \ ell _ { 1 } $-范数和可逆挑战差异(具有压倒性的概率)，同时支持高度分裂的2次方分圆环。我们相信所有这些结果是广泛适用的和独立的利益。
papers.title_zh: MatRiCT+:更高效的后量子私有区块链支付

papers.title: Universal Atomic Swaps: Secure Exchange of Coins Across All Blockchains
papers.authors: Sri Aravinda Krishnan Thyagarajan, Giulio Malavolta, Pedro Moreno-Sanchez
papers.abstract: Trading goods lies at the backbone of the modern economy and the recent advent of cryptocurrencies has opened the door for trading decentralized (digital) assets: A large fraction of the value of cryptocurrencies comes from the inter-currency exchange and trading, which has been arguably the most successful application of decentralized money. The security issues observed with centralized, custodial cryptocurrency exchanges have motivated the design of atomic swaps, a protocol for coin exchanges between any two users. Yet, somewhat surprisingly, no atomic swap protocol exists that simultaneously satisfies the following simple but desired properties: (i) non-custodial, departing from a third party trusted holding the coins from users during the exchange; (ii) universal that is, compatible with all (current and future) cryptocurrencies; (iii) multi-asset, supporting the exchange of multiple coins in a single atomic swap.From a theoretical standpoint, in this work we show a generic protocol to securely swap n coins from any (possible multiple) currencies for $\tilde{n}$ coins of any other currencies, for any n and $\tilde{n}$. We do not require any custom scripting language supported by the corresponding blockchains, besides the bare minimum ability to verify signatures on transactions. For the special case when the blockchains use ECDSA or Schnorr signatures, we design a practically efficient protocol based on adaptor signatures and time-lock puzzles. As a byproduct of our approach, atomic swaps transactions no longer include custom scripts and are identical to standard one-to-one transactions. We also show that our protocol naturally generalizes to any cycle of users, i.e., atomic swaps with more than two participants. To demonstrate the practicality of our approach, we have evaluated a prototypical implementation of our protocol for Schnorr/ECDSA signatures and observed that an atomic swap requires below one second on commodity machines. Even on blockchains with expressive smart contract support (e.g., Ethereum), our approach reduces the on-chain cost both in terms of transaction size and gas cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 商品交易是现代经济的支柱，最近加密货币的出现为分散(数字)资产的交易打开了大门:加密货币的很大一部分价值来自货币间的交换和交易，这可以说是分散货币最成功的应用。在集中式保管加密货币交换中观察到的安全问题激发了原子互换(atomic swaps)的设计，这是一种用于任意两个用户之间硬币交换的协议。然而，有点令人惊讶的是，不存在同时满足以下简单但期望的特性的原子交换协议:(I)非保管性，在交换期间，离开被信任持有来自用户的硬币的第三方；(ii)通用，即与所有(当前和未来)加密货币兼容；(iii)多资产，支持在单个原子互换中交换多个硬币。从理论的角度来看，在这项工作中，我们展示了一个通用协议，它可以安全地将n个硬币从任何(可能是多个)货币交换成任何其他货币的$\tilde{n}$硬币，对于任何n和$\tilde{n}$。除了验证交易签名的最低能力之外，我们不需要相应区块链支持的任何定制脚本语言。对于区块链使用ECDSA或Schnorr签名的特殊情况，我们基于适配器签名和时间锁难题设计了一个实用有效的协议。作为我们方法的副产品，原子互换交易不再包括定制脚本，并且与标准的一对一交易相同。我们还表明，我们的协议自然地推广到任何用户周期，即，两个以上的参与者的原子交换。为了证明我们方法的实用性，我们评估了Schnorr/ECDSA签名协议的原型实现，并观察到在商用机器上原子交换需要不到一秒钟。即使在具有表达性智能合约支持的区块链上(例如，以太坊)，我们的方法也在交易规模和气体成本方面降低了链上成本。
papers.title_zh: 通用原子互换:全区块链硬币的安全交换

papers.title: Foundations of Dynamic BFT
papers.authors: Sisi Duan, Haibin Zhang
papers.abstract: This paper studies dynamic BFT, where replicas can join and leave the system dynamically, a primitive that is nowadays increasingly needed. We provide a formal treatment for dynamic BFT protocols, endowing them with a flexible syntax and various security definitions.We demonstrate the challenges of extending static BFT to dynamic BFT. Then we design and implement Dyno, a highly efficient dynamic BFT protocol under the partial synchrony model. We show that Dyno can seamlessly handle membership changes without incurring performance degradation.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究动态BFT，其中副本可以动态地加入和离开系统，这是当今日益需要的原语。我们为动态BFT协议提供了一种正式的处理方式，赋予它们灵活的语法和各种安全定义。我们展示了将静态BFT扩展到动态BFT的挑战。然后，我们设计并实现了部分同步模型下的高效动态BFT协议Dyno。我们证明了Dyno可以无缝地处理成员变化，而不会导致性能下降。
papers.title_zh: 动态BFT的基础

papers.title: COBRA: Dynamic Proactive Secret Sharing for Confidential BFT Services
papers.authors: Robin Vassantlal, Eduardo Alchieri, Bernardo Ferreira, Alysson Bessani
papers.abstract: Byzantine Fault-Tolerant (BFT) State Machine Replication (SMR) is a classical paradigm for implementing trustworthy services that has received renewed interest with the emergence of blockchains and decentralized infrastructures. A fundamental limitation of BFT SMR is that it provides integrity and availability despite a fraction of the replicas being controlled by an active adversary, but does not offer any confidentiality protection. Previous works addressed this issue by integrating secret sharing with the consensus-based framework of BFT SMR, but without providing all features required by practical systems, which include replica recovery, group reconfiguration, and acceptable performance when dealing with a large number of secrets. We present COBRA, a new protocol stack for Dynamic Proactive Secret Sharing that allows implementing confidentiality in practical BFT SMR systems. COBRA exhibits the best asymptotic communication complexity and optimal storage overhead, being able to renew 100k shares in a group of ten replicas $5 \times $ faster than the current state of the art.
papers.abstract_zh: 拜占庭容错(BFT)状态机复制(SMR)是实现可信服务的经典范例，随着区块链和分散式基础设施的出现，它重新受到关注。BFT SMR的一个基本限制是，尽管一小部分副本被活跃的对手控制，它仍能提供完整性和可用性，但不提供任何机密性保护。先前的工作通过将秘密共享与BFT SMR的基于共识的框架相集成来解决这个问题，但是没有提供实际系统所需的所有特征，包括副本恢复、组重新配置以及在处理大量秘密时可接受的性能。我们提出了COBRA，一种新的动态主动秘密共享协议栈，它允许在实际的BFT SMR系统中实现机密性。COBRA展示了最佳的渐进通信复杂性和最佳的存储开销，能够在一组10个副本中更新100k个份额，比当前技术水平快5倍。
papers.title_zh: COBRA:用于机密BFT服务的动态主动秘密共享

papers.title: Back to the Drawing Board: A Critical Evaluation of Poisoning Attacks on Production Federated Learning
papers.authors: Virat Shejwalkar, Amir Houmansadr, Peter Kairouz, Daniel Ramage
papers.abstract: While recent works have indicated that federated learning (FL) may be vulnerable to poisoning attacks by compromised clients, their real impact on production FL systems is not fully understood. In this work, we aim to develop a comprehensive systemization for poisoning attacks on FL by enumerating all possible threat models, variations of poisoning, and adversary capabilities. We specifically put our focus on un-targeted poisoning attacks, as we argue that they are significantly relevant to production FL deployments. We present a critical analysis of untargeted poisoning attacks under practical, production FL environments by carefully characterizing the set of realistic threat models and adversarial capabilities. Our findings are rather surprising: contrary to the established belief, we show that FL is highly robust in practice even when using simple, low-cost defenses. We go even further and propose novel, state-of-the-art data and model poisoning attacks, and show via an extensive set of experiments across three benchmark datasets how (in)effective poisoning attacks are in the presence of simple defense mechanisms. We aim to correct previous misconceptions and offer concrete guidelines to conduct more accurate (and more realistic) research on this topic.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然最近的工作表明，联邦学习(FL)可能容易受到受损客户端的中毒攻击，但它们对生产FL系统的真正影响尚未完全了解。在这项工作中，我们的目标是通过列举所有可能的威胁模型、中毒的变化和对手的能力，为FL上的中毒攻击开发一个全面的系统化。我们特别关注无针对性的中毒攻击，因为我们认为它们与生产FL部署密切相关。我们通过仔细描述现实威胁模型和对抗能力，对实际生产环境下的无目标中毒攻击进行了批判性分析。我们的发现相当令人惊讶:与既定的信念相反，我们表明，即使在使用简单、低成本的防御时，FL在实践中也是非常健壮的。我们更进一步，提出了新的、最先进的数据和中毒攻击模型，并通过跨三个基准数据集的大量实验，展示了在存在简单防御机制的情况下，中毒攻击是如何有效的。我们旨在纠正以前的误解，并提供具体的指导方针，以便对这一主题进行更准确(和更现实)的研究。
papers.title_zh: 回到绘图板:对生产联合学习中毒攻击的批判性评估

papers.title: Model Orthogonalization: Class Distance Hardening in Neural Networks for Better Security
papers.authors: Guanhong Tao, Yingqi Liu, Guangyu Shen, Qiuling Xu, Shengwei An, Zhuo Zhang, Xiangyu Zhang
papers.abstract: The distance between two classes for a deep learning classifier can be measured by the level of difficulty in flipping all (or majority of) samples in a class to the other. The class distances of many pre-trained models in the wild are very small and do not align well with humans’ intuition (e.g., classes turtle and bird have smaller distance than classes cat and dog), making the models vulnerable to backdoor attacks, which aim to cause misclassification by stamping a specific pattern to inputs. We propose a novel model hardening technique called model orthogonalization which is an add-on training step to pretrained models, including clean models, poisoned models, and adversarially trained models. It can substantially enlarge class distances with reasonable training cost and without much accuracy degradation. Our evaluation on 5 datasets with 22 model structures show that our technique can enlarge class distances by 177.63% on average with less than 1% accuracy loss, outperforming existing hardening techniques such as adversarial training, universal adversarial perturbation, and directly using generated backdoors. It reduces 80% false positives for a state-of-the-art backdoor scanner as the enlarged class distances allow the scanner to easily distinguish clean and poisoned models, and substantially outperforms three existing techniques in removing injected backdoors.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习分类器的两个类之间的距离可以通过将一个类中的所有(或大部分)样本翻转到另一个类的难度来测量。许多在野外预先训练的模型的类距离非常小，并且不符合人类的直觉(例如，海龟和鸟的类比猫和狗的类具有更小的距离)，这使得模型容易受到后门攻击，后门攻击旨在通过给输入打上特定模式来导致错误分类。我们提出了一种新的模型强化技术，称为模型正交化，这是对预训练模型的附加训练步骤，包括干净模型、中毒模型和对抗训练模型。它能以合理的训练成本和不太大的准确度下降来显著地扩大课堂距离。在具有22个模型结构的5个数据集上的评估表明，我们的技术可以在不超过1%的精度损失的情况下将类距离平均扩大177.63%，优于现有的强化技术，如对抗训练、通用对抗扰动和直接使用生成的后门。它将最先进的后门扫描器的误报率降低了80%，因为扩大的类别距离使扫描器可以轻松区分干净和中毒的模型，并在消除注入的后门方面大大优于三种现有技术。
papers.title_zh: 模型正交化:神经网络中的类距离硬化以获得更好的安全性

papers.title: Universal 3-Dimensional Perturbations for Black-Box Attacks on Video Recognition Systems
papers.authors: Shangyu Xie, Han Wang, Yu Kong, Yuan Hong
papers.abstract: Widely deployed deep neural network (DNN) models have been proven to be vulnerable to adversarial perturbations in many applications (e.g., image, audio and text classifications). To date, there are only a few adversarial perturbations proposed to deviate the DNN models in video recognition systems by simply injecting 2D perturbations into video frames. However, such attacks may overly perturb the videos without learning the spatio-temporal features (across temporal frames), which are commonly extracted by DNN models for video recognition. To our best knowledge, we propose the first black-box attack framework that generates universal 3-dimensional (U3D) perturbations to subvert a variety of video recognition systems. U3D has many advantages, such as (1) as the transfer-based attack, U3D can universally attack multiple DNN models for video recognition without accessing to the target DNN model; (2) the high transferability of U3D makes such universal black-box attack easy-to-launch, which can be further enhanced by integrating queries over the target model when necessary; (3) U3D ensures human-imperceptibility; (4) U3D can bypass the existing state-of-the-art defense schemes; (5) U3D can be efficiently generated with a few pre-learned parameters, and then immediately injected to attack real-time DNN-based video recognition systems. We have conducted extensive experiments to evaluate U3D on multiple DNN models and three large-scale video datasets. The experimental results demonstrate its superiority and practicality.
papers.abstract_zh: 广泛部署的深度神经网络(DNN)模型已被证明在许多应用(例如，图像、音频和文本分类)中容易受到不利干扰。迄今为止，只有少数敌对的扰动被提出来通过简单地将2D扰动注入到视频帧中来偏离视频识别系统中的DNN模型。然而，这种攻击可能会过度干扰视频，而不了解时空特征(跨时间帧)，时空特征通常由用于视频识别的DNN模型提取。据我们所知，我们提出了第一个产生通用三维(U3D)扰动的黑盒攻击框架，以颠覆各种视频识别系统。U3D具有许多优点，例如(1)作为基于转移的攻击，U3D可以通用地攻击用于视频识别的多个DNN模型，而无需访问目标DNN模型；(U3D的高迁移性使得这种通用黑盒攻击易于发起，这可以通过在必要时在目标模型上集成查询来进一步增强；(3) U3D保证了人的不可感知性；(4) U3D可以绕过现有最先进的防御方案；(5) U3D可以用一些预先学习的参数有效地生成，然后立即注入以攻击实时的基于DNN的视频识别系统。我们在多个DNN模型和三个大规模视频数据集上进行了大量实验来评估U3D。实验结果表明了该方法的优越性和实用性。
papers.title_zh: 视频识别系统黑盒攻击的通用三维扰动

papers.title: "Adversarial Examples" for Proof-of-Learning
papers.authors: Rui Zhang, Jian Liu, Yuan Ding, Zhibo Wang, Qingbiao Wu, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: In S&P 21, Jia et al. proposed a new concept/mechanism named proof-of-learning (PoL), which allows a prover to demonstrate ownership of a machine learning model by proving integrity of the training procedure. It guarantees that an adversary cannot construct a valid proof with less cost (in both computation and storage) than that made by the prover in generating the proof. A PoL proof includes a set of intermediate models recorded during training, together with the corresponding data points used to obtain each recorded model. Jia et al. claimed that an adversary merely knowing the final model and training dataset cannot efficiently find a set of intermediate models with correct data points. In this paper, however, we show that PoL is vulnerable to “adversarial examples”! Specifically, in a similar way as optimizing an adversarial example, we could make an arbitrarily-chosen data point “generate” a given model, hence efficiently generating intermediate models with correct data points. We demonstrate, both theoretically and empirically, that we are able to generate a valid proof with significantly less cost than generating a proof by the prover.
papers.abstract_zh: 在21中，贾等人提出了一个新的概念/机制，称为学习证明(PoL)，它允许证明者通过证明训练过程的完整性来证明机器学习模型的所有权。它保证对手不能用比证明者生成证明更少的成本(在计算和存储两方面)来构造有效的证明。PoL证明包括在训练期间记录的一组中间模型，以及用于获得每个记录模型的相应数据点。贾等人声称，仅仅知道最终模型和训练数据集的对手不能有效地找到一组具有正确数据点的中间模型。然而，在本文中，我们表明PoL容易受到“对立例子”的攻击！具体来说，与优化一个对立的例子类似，我们可以让一个任意选择的数据点“生成”一个给定的模型，从而有效地生成具有正确数据点的中间模型。我们从理论上和经验上证明，我们能够以比由证明者生成证明低得多的成本来生成有效的证明。
papers.title_zh: 学习证明的“对立例子”

papers.title: Transfer Attacks Revisited: A Large-Scale Empirical Study in Real Computer Vision Settings
papers.authors: Yuhao Mao, Chong Fu, Saizhuo Wang, Shouling Ji, Xuhong Zhang, Zhenguang Liu, Jun Zhou, Alex X. Liu, Raheem Beyah, Ting Wang
papers.abstract: One intriguing property of adversarial attacks is their “transferability” – an adversarial example crafted with respect to one deep neural network (DNN) model is often found effective against other DNNs as well. Intensive research has been conducted on this phenomenon under simplistic controlled conditions. Yet, thus far there is still a lack of comprehensive understanding about transferability-based attacks (“transfer attacks”) in real-world environments.To bridge this critical gap, we conduct the first large-scale systematic empirical study of transfer attacks against major cloud-based MLaaS platforms, taking the components of a real transfer attack into account. The study leads to a number of interesting findings which are inconsistent to the existing ones, including: (i) Simple surrogates do not necessarily improve real transfer attacks. (ii) No dominant surrogate architecture is found in real transfer attacks. (iii) It is the gap between posterior (output of the softmax layer) rather than the gap between logit (so-called κ value) that increases transferability. Moreover, by comparing with prior works, we demonstrate that transfer attacks possess many previously unknown properties in real-world environments, such as (i) Model similarity is not a well-defined concept. (ii) L2 norm of perturbation can generate high transferability without usage of gradient and is a more powerful source than L∞ norm. We believe this work sheds light on the vulnerabilities of popular MLaaS platforms and points to a few promising research directions.1
papers.abstract_zh: 对抗性攻击的一个有趣的属性是它们的“可转移性”——针对一个深度神经网络(DNN)模型制作的对抗性示例通常也被发现对其他dnn也有效。在简单的控制条件下对这种现象进行了深入的研究。然而，迄今为止，对现实环境中基于可转移性的攻击(“转移攻击”)仍缺乏全面的了解。为了弥补这一关键差距，我们对主要基于云的MLaaS平台的转移攻击进行了首次大规模系统实证研究，将真实转移攻击的组成部分考虑在内。该研究得出了许多有趣的发现，这些发现与现有的发现不一致，包括:(1)简单的代理不一定能改善真正的转移攻击。(ii)在真实传输攻击中没有发现占优势的代理体系结构。(iii)是后验之间的间隙(softmax层的输出)而不是logit之间的间隙(所谓的κ值)增加了可转移性。此外，通过与先前的工作进行比较，我们证明了转移攻击在真实世界环境中具有许多先前未知的性质，例如(I)模型相似性不是一个明确定义的概念。(ii)扰动的L2范数可以在不使用梯度的情况下产生高的传递性，并且是比L∞范数更强的来源。我们相信这项工作揭示了流行的MLaaS平台的漏洞，并指出一些有前途的研究方向。1
papers.title_zh: 转移攻击再探:真实计算机视觉环境下的大规模实证研究

papers.title: Graphics Peeping Unit: Exploiting EM Side-Channel Information of GPUs to Eavesdrop on Your Neighbors
papers.authors: Zihao Zhan, Zhenkai Zhang, Sisheng Liang, Fan Yao, Xenofon D. Koutsoukos
papers.abstract: As the popularity of graphics processing units (GPUs) grows rapidly in recent years, it becomes very critical to study and understand the security implications imposed by them. In this paper, we show that modern GPUs can “broadcast” sensitive information over the air to make a number of attacks practical. Specifically, we present a new electromagnetic (EM) side-channel vulnerability that we have discovered in many GPUs of both NVIDIA and AMD. We show that this vulnerability can be exploited to mount realistic attacks through two case studies, which are website fingerprinting and keystroke timing inference attacks. Our investigation recognizes the commonly used dynamic voltage and frequency scaling (DVFS) feature in GPU as the root cause of this vulnerability. Nevertheless, we also show that simply disabling DVFS may not be an effective countermeasure since it will introduce another highly exploitable EM side-channel vulnerability. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first work that studies realistic physical side-channel attacks on non-shared GPUs at a distance.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着近年来图形处理单元(GPU)的普及，研究和理解它们所带来的安全问题变得非常重要。在本文中，我们展示了现代GPU可以通过空中“广播”敏感信息，使许多攻击成为现实。具体来说，我们提出了一个新的电磁(EM)侧通道漏洞，我们已经在NVIDIA和AMD的许多GPU中发现了该漏洞。我们通过两个案例研究，即网站指纹和击键时间推断攻击，表明该漏洞可以被利用来发起实际攻击。我们的调查认为GPU中常用的动态电压和频率缩放(DVFS)功能是该漏洞的根本原因。然而，我们也表明，简单地禁用DVFS可能不是一个有效的对策，因为它会引入另一个高度可利用的EM侧信道漏洞。据我们所知，这是第一个在非共享GPU上远距离研究现实物理旁道攻击的工作。
papers.title_zh: 图形偷窥单元:利用图形处理器的EM侧信道信息来窃听你的邻居

papers.title: Adversarial Prefetch: New Cross-Core Cache Side Channel Attacks
papers.authors: Yanan Guo, Andrew Zigerelli, Youtao Zhang, Jun Yang
papers.abstract: Modern x86 processors have many prefetch instructions that can be used by programmers to boost performance. However, these instructions may also cause security problems. In particular, we found that on Intel processors, there are two security flaws in the implementation of PREFETCHW, an instruction for accelerating future writes. First, this instruction can execute on data with read-only permission. Second, the execution time of this instruction leaks the current coherence state of the target data. Based on these two design issues, we build two cross-core private cache attacks that work with both inclusive and non-inclusive LLCs, named Prefetch+Reload and Prefetch+Prefetch. We demonstrate the significance of our attacks in different scenarios. First, in the covert channel case, Prefetch+Reload and Prefetch+Prefetch achieve 782 KB/s and 822 KB/s channel capacities, when using only one shared cache line between the sender and receiver, the largest-to-date single-line capacities for CPU cache covert channels. Further, in the side channel case, our attacks can monitor the access pattern of the victim on the same processor, with almost zero error rate. We show that they can be used to leak private information of real-world applications such as cryptographic keys. Finally, our attacks can be used in transient execution attacks in order to leak more secrets within the transient window than prior work. From the experimental results, our attacks allow leaking about 2 times as many secret bytes, compared to Flush+Reload, which is widely used in transient execution attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代x86处理器有许多预取指令，程序员可以使用这些指令来提高性能。但是，这些指令也可能导致安全问题。特别是，我们发现在英特尔处理器上，PREFETCHW(一种用于加速未来写入的指令)的实现中存在两个安全缺陷。首先，这条指令可以在只读权限的数据上执行。第二，这个指令的执行时间泄露了目标数据的当前一致性状态。基于这两个设计问题，我们构建了两个跨核私有缓存攻击，适用于包含和非包含LLC，命名为预取+重载和预取+预取。我们在不同的场景中展示了我们攻击的重要性。首先，在隐蔽通道的情况下，当在发送者和接收者之间仅使用一条共享高速缓存线时，预取+重载和预取+预取实现了782 KB/s和822 KB/s的通道容量，这是迄今为止CPU高速缓存隐蔽通道的最大单线容量。此外，在侧信道的情况下，我们的攻击可以监视同一处理器上的受害者的访问模式，几乎没有错误率。我们证明了它们可以被用来泄露真实世界应用程序的私有信息，比如密钥。最后，我们的攻击可以用于瞬时执行攻击，以便在瞬时窗口内泄漏比先前工作更多的秘密。从实验结果来看，与广泛用于瞬时执行攻击的Flush+Reload相比，我们的攻击允许泄漏大约2倍的秘密字节。
papers.title_zh: 对抗性预取:新的跨核高速缓存旁路攻击

papers.title: Finding and Exploiting CPU Features using MSR Templating
papers.authors: Andreas Kogler, Daniel Weber, Martin Haubenwallner, Moritz Lipp, Daniel Gruss, Michael Schwarz
papers.abstract: To ensure backward compatibility while adding new features to CPUs, CPU vendors enable a limited CPU configuration via so-called model-specific registers (MSRs). These MSRs have been introduced for various features, such as debugging, performance monitoring, or security. While many MSRs are documented, there is still a plethora of undocumented or sparsely documented MSRs in modern CPUs. Furthermore, with multiple hundred MSRs, each providing up to 64 configuration bits, it is tedious to find specific configuration options. In this paper, we show that MSRs and their configuration bits can be detected automatically on Intel and AMD CPUs. We introduce MSRevelio, a framework to automatically detect bits that influence the behavior of instructions and semi-automatically find bits controlled by BIOS settings. We show that previously overlooked bits can harden systems against microarchitectural attacks such as Medusa, CrossTalk, and software-prefetch attacks. Additionally, we show that an undocumented lock bit allows disabling AES-NI at runtime, forcing mbedTLS to fall back to an AES implementation vulnerable to cache attacks. Exploiting this fallback inside an SGX enclave, we fully recover the AES key used by the enclave. With our detection approach, we show that security features retrofitted with microcode updates can be easily detected, even before the public documentation of the underlying vulnerability. In our analysis of the Xen hypervisor, we show that Xen’s handling of MSRs was flawed for a long time, allowing guests to access undocumented and unhandled MSRs and fingerprint specific Xen versions. Using automated correlation analysis between documented and undocumented MSRs, we discover a previously undocumented MSR correlating with the CPU’s timestamp counter. This MSR is also accessible from Xen guests, and we demonstrate a Foreshadow attack when all other timers are unavailable or artificially deteriorated. Our results highlight that transparency is crucial for features interacting closely with CPU internals.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了在向CPU添加新功能的同时确保向后兼容性，CPU供应商通过所谓的特定于模型的寄存器(MSR)来实现有限的CPU配置。引入这些MSR是为了实现各种功能，如调试、性能监控或安全性。虽然许多MSR都有文档记录，但在现代CPU中仍然有大量没有文档记录或文档记录很少的MSR。此外，对于数百个MSR，每个MSR提供多达64个配置位，找到特定的配置选项是很繁琐的。在本文中，我们展示了在Intel和AMD CPUs上可以自动检测MSR及其配置位。我们引入了MSRevelio，这是一个自动检测影响指令行为的位并半自动查找由BIOS设置控制的位的框架。我们表明，以前被忽视的位可以加强系统对微体系结构攻击，如美杜莎，串扰和软件预取攻击。此外，我们还表明，未记录的锁定位允许在运行时禁用AES-NI，迫使mbedTLS退回到易受缓存攻击的AES实现。利用SGX飞地内的这一回退，我们完全恢复了飞地使用的AES密钥。通过我们的检测方法，我们证明了用微码更新改进的安全特性可以被容易地检测到，甚至在潜在漏洞的公开文档之前。在我们对Xen虚拟机管理程序的分析中，我们发现Xen对MSR的处理长期以来一直存在缺陷，允许来宾访问未记录和未处理的MSR以及特定于Xen版本的指纹。使用有文档和无文档MSR之间的自动关联分析，我们发现了一个以前没有文档的MSR与CPU的时间戳计数器相关。Xen来宾也可以访问这个MSR，当所有其他计时器不可用或被人为损坏时，我们演示了一个预示攻击。我们的结果强调了透明性对于与CPU内部紧密交互的特性是至关重要的。
papers.title_zh: 使用MSR模板查找和利用CPU特性

papers.title: Augury: Using Data Memory-Dependent Prefetchers to Leak Data at Rest
papers.authors: Jose Rodrigo Sanchez Vicarte, Michael Flanders, Riccardo Paccagnella, Grant Garrett-Grossman, Adam Morrison, Christopher W. Fletcher, David Kohlbrenner
papers.abstract: Microarchitectural side-channel attacks are enjoying a time of explosive growth, mostly fueled by novel transient execution vulnerabilities. These attacks are capable of leaking arbitrary data, as long as it is possible for the adversary to read that data into the processor core using transient instructions. In this paper, we present the first microarchitectural attack that leaks data at rest in the memory system, i.e., never directly read into the core speculatively or non-speculatively. This technique is enabled by a previously unreported class of prefetcher: a data memory-dependent prefetcher (DMP). These prefetchers are designed to allow prefetching of irregular address patterns such as pointer chases. As such, DMPs examine and use the contents of memory directly to determine which addresses to prefetch. Our experiments demonstrate the existence of a pointer-chasing DMP on recent Apple processors, including the A14 and M1. We then reverse engineer the details of this DMP to determine the opportunities for and restrictions it places on attackers using it. Finally, we demonstrate several basic attack primitives capable of leaking pointer values using the DMP.
papers.abstract_zh: 微体系结构旁道攻击正处于爆炸式增长的时期，主要是由新的瞬时执行漏洞推动的。只要对手能够使用瞬时指令将数据读入处理器内核，这些攻击就能够泄漏任意数据。在本文中，我们提出了第一种微体系结构攻击，这种攻击会泄漏内存系统中的静态数据，即从不直接以推测或非推测方式读入内核。这种技术是由一种以前没有报道过的预取器实现的:一种依赖数据存储器的预取器(DMP)。这些预取器被设计成允许预取不规则的地址模式，例如指针追踪。因此，DMP检查并直接使用内存内容来确定预取哪些地址。我们的实验证明了在最近的苹果处理器上存在指针追踪DMP，包括A14和M1。然后，我们对该DMP的细节进行逆向工程，以确定攻击者使用它的机会和限制。最后，我们演示了几个能够使用DMP泄漏指针值的基本攻击原语。
papers.title_zh: 预兆:使用依赖于数据内存的预取器来泄漏静态数据

papers.title: MeshUp: Stateless Cache Side-channel Attack on CPU Mesh
papers.authors: Junpeng Wan, Yanxiang Bi, Zhe Zhou, Zhou Li
papers.abstract: Cache side-channel attacks lead to severe security threats to the settings where a CPU is shared across users, e.g., in the cloud. The majority of attacks rely on sensing the micro-architectural state changes made by victims, but this assumption can be invalidated by combining spatial (e.g., Intel CAT) and temporal isolation. In this work, we advance the state of cache side-channel attacks by showing stateless cache side-channel attacks on server-grade CPUs, that can bypass both spatial and temporal isolation. Unlike stateful cache side-channel attacks that rely on the timing difference between a cache hit or miss, our attack exploits the timing difference caused by the interconnect congestion. Specifically, to complete cache transactions, for Intel server CPUs, which use non-inclusive and mesh interconnect, cache lines would travel across cores via the CPU mesh and UPI interconnects. Nonetheless, the interconnects are shared by all cores, and cache isolation does not segregate the traffic. An attacker can generate traffic to contend with a victim on a link, measure the extra delay, deduce the memory access pattern of the victim’s program, and infer its sensitive data. Based on this idea, we implement MESHUP, a stateless cache side-channel against mesh interconnect, and test it against the existing RSA implementations of JDK for the cross-core attack and application fingerprinting for the the cross-CPU attack. We found the RSA private key used by a victim process can be partially recovered and the co-running application can be inferred at high accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 缓存旁路攻击会对跨用户共享CPU的设置(例如，在云中)造成严重的安全威胁。大多数攻击依赖于检测受害者所做的微架构状态变化，但是这种假设可以通过结合空间(例如，Intel CAT)和时间隔离而无效。在这项工作中，我们通过展示服务器级CPU上的无状态缓存旁路攻击，推进了缓存旁路攻击的状态，这些攻击可以绕过空间和时间隔离。与依赖于缓存命中或未命中之间的时间差的有状态缓存侧通道攻击不同，我们的攻击利用了互连拥塞导致的时间差。具体来说，为了完成高速缓存事务，对于使用非包含和网状互连的英特尔服务器CPU，高速缓存线将通过CPU网状和UPI互连在内核间传输。尽管如此，所有内核共享互连，高速缓存隔离不会隔离流量。攻击者可以生成流量与链路上的受害者竞争，测量额外的延迟，推断受害者程序的内存访问模式，并推断其敏感数据。基于这一思想，我们实现了MESHUP，一个针对mesh互连的无状态缓存侧通道，并针对JDK的现有RSA实现测试了跨核攻击和跨CPU攻击的应用指纹。我们发现受害者进程使用的RSA私钥可以被部分恢复，并且可以以高精度推断出共同运行的应用程序。
papers.title_zh: MeshUp:对CPU网格的无状态缓存旁路攻击

papers.title: Timing-Based Browsing Privacy Vulnerabilities Via Site Isolation
papers.authors: Zihao Jin, Ziqiao Kong, Shuo Chen, Haixin Duan
papers.abstract: Chromium’s site isolation ensures that different sites are rendered by different processes, which is a vision that academic researchers set forth over a decade ago. The journey from academic prototypes to the commercial availability represents a holistic rethinking about the security architecture for modern browsers. In this paper, we emphasize that the timing issues under site isolation need a thorough study. Specifically, we show that site isolation enables a realistic timing attack, which allows the attacker to identify which websites in a given target-sites set are loaded into the browser, as well as the website the user is currently interacting with. Through these vulnerabilities, the user’s site-visit behavior is leaked to the attacker. Our evaluation using Alexa Top 3000 websites gives very high vulnerability percentages – 99%, 99% and 95% for our three key metrics of vulnerabilities. Moreover, the attack is very robust without any special assumption, so will be effective if deployed in the field. The main challenge revealed by our work is the tension between the scarcity of processes and the obligation to isolate cross-site frames in different processes. We are working with the Google Chrome team and Microsoft Edge team to propose and evaluate mitigation options.
papers.abstract_zh: Chromium的站点隔离确保不同的站点由不同的进程呈现，这是学术研究人员在十多年前提出的愿景。从学术原型到商业可用性的旅程代表了对现代浏览器安全架构的全面反思。在本文中，我们强调，在网站隔离的时间问题需要深入研究。具体来说，我们表明站点隔离支持真实的定时攻击，它允许攻击者识别给定目标站点集中的哪些网站被加载到浏览器中，以及用户当前正在交互的网站。通过这些漏洞，用户的站点访问行为被泄露给了攻击者。我们使用Alexa Top 3000网站进行的评估给出了非常高的漏洞百分比，我们的三个关键漏洞指标分别为99%、99%和95%。此外，该攻击是非常健壮的，没有任何特殊的假设，因此如果部署在现场将是有效的。我们的工作揭示的主要挑战是进程的稀缺性和在不同进程中隔离跨站点框架的义务之间的紧张关系。我们正在与谷歌Chrome团队和微软Edge团队合作，提出并评估缓解方案。
papers.title_zh: 通过站点隔离的基于时间的浏览隐私漏洞

papers.title: WTAGRAPH: Web Tracking and Advertising Detection using Graph Neural Networks
papers.authors: Zhiju Yang, Weiping Pei, Monchu Chen, Chuan Yue
papers.abstract: Web tracking and advertising (WTA) nowadays are ubiquitously performed on the web, continuously compromising users’ privacy. Existing defense solutions, such as widely deployed blocking tools based on filter lists and alternative machine learning based solutions proposed in prior research, have limitations in terms of accuracy and effectiveness. In this work, we propose WTAGRAPH, a web tracking and advertising detection framework based on Graph Neural Networks (GNNs). We first construct an attributed homogenous multi-graph (AHMG) that represents HTTP network traffic, and formulate web tracking and advertising detection as a task of GNN-based edge representation learning and classification in AHMG. We then design four components in WTAGRAPH so that it can (1) collect HTTP network traffic, DOM, and JavaScript data, (2) construct AHMG and extract corresponding edge and node features, (3) build a GNN model for edge representation learning and WTA detection in the transductive learning setting, and (4) use a pre-trained GNN model for WTA detection in the inductive learning setting. We evaluate WTAGRAPH on a dataset collected from Alexa Top 10K websites, and show that WTAGRAPH can effectively detect WTA requests in both transductive and inductive learning settings. Manual verification results indicate that WTAGRAPH can detect new WTA requests that are missed by filter lists and recognize non-WTA requests that are mistakenly labeled by filter lists. Our ablation analysis, evasion evaluation, and real-time evaluation show that WTAGRAPH can have a competitive performance with flexible deployment options in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，网络跟踪和广告(WTA)在网络上无处不在，不断侵犯用户的隐私。现有的防御解决方案，如基于过滤器列表的广泛部署的阻止工具和先前研究中提出的基于机器学习的替代解决方案，在准确性和有效性方面具有局限性。在本文中，我们提出了WTAGRAPH，一个基于图神经网络的网页跟踪和广告检测框架。我们首先构建了一个表示HTTP网络流量的属性同质多图(AHMG ),并将web跟踪和广告检测公式化为AHMG基于GNN的边表示学习和分类的任务。然后，我们在WTAGRAPH中设计了四个组件，以便它可以(1)收集HTTP网络流量、DOM和JavaScript数据，(2)构造AHMG并提取相应的边和节点特征，(3)在直推学习设置中为边表示学习和WTA检测构建GNN模型，以及(4)在归纳学习设置中为WTA检测使用预训练的GNN模型。我们在从Alexa顶级10K网站收集的数据集上评估了WTAGRAPH，并表明WTAGRAPH可以有效地检测直推式和归纳式学习环境中的WTA请求。人工验证结果表明，WTAGRAPH可以检测到过滤器列表遗漏的新WTA请求，并识别出被过滤器列表错误标记的非WTA请求。我们的消融分析、规避评估和实时评估表明，WTAGRAPH在实践中可以通过灵活的部署选项获得有竞争力的性能。
papers.title_zh: 使用图形神经网络的网页跟踪和广告检测

papers.title: Surakav: Generating Realistic Traces for a Strong Website Fingerprinting Defense
papers.authors: Jiajun Gong, Wuqi Zhang, Charles Zhang, Tao Wang
papers.abstract: Website Fingerprinting (WF) attacks utilize size and timing information of encrypted network traffic to infer the user’s browsing activity, posing a great threat to privacy-enhancing technologies like Tor; nevertheless, Tor has not adopted any defense because existing defenses are not convincing enough to show their effectiveness. Some defenses have been overcome by newer attacks; other defenses are never implemented and tested in the real open-world scenario.In this paper, we propose Surakav, a tunable and practical defense that is effective against WF attacks with reasonable overhead. Surakav makes use of a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) to generate realistic sending patterns and regulates buffered data according to the sampled patterns. We implement Surakav and evaluate it on the live Tor network. Experiments show that Surakav is able to reduce the attacker’s true positive rate by 57% with 55% data overhead and 16% time overhead, saving 42% data overhead compared to FRONT. In the heavyweight setting, Surakav outperforms the strongest known defense, Tamaraw, requiring 50% less overhead in data and time to lower the attacker’s true positive rate to only 8%. We also show that two existing defenses, Walkie-Talkie and TrafficSliver, can be fortified with our GAN-based trace generator.
papers.abstract_zh: 网站指纹(WF)攻击利用加密网络流量的大小和时间信息来推断用户的浏览活动，对Tor等隐私增强技术构成巨大威胁；尽管如此，Tor还没有采取任何防御措施，因为现有的防御措施不足以证明其有效性。一些防御已被更新的攻击所克服；其他防御措施从未在真实的开放世界场景中实现和测试过。在这篇文章中，我们提出了Surakav，一个可调和实用的防御，有效地抵御WF攻击，合理的开销。Surakav利用生成式对抗网络(GAN)来生成真实的发送模式，并根据采样模式来调节缓冲数据。我们实现了Surakav，并在现场Tor网络上对其进行了评估。实验表明，Surakav能够以55%的数据开销和16%的时间开销将攻击者的真实阳性率降低57%，相比FRONT节省42%的数据开销。在重量级设置中，Surakav优于已知最强的防御，Tamaraw，需要50%的数据和时间开销，以将攻击者的真实阳性率降至仅8%。我们还展示了两种现有的防御，对讲机和TrafficSliver，可以用我们基于GAN的跟踪生成器来增强。
papers.title_zh: Surakav:为强大的网站指纹防御生成真实的痕迹

papers.title: Wobfuscator: Obfuscating JavaScript Malware via Opportunistic Translation to WebAssembly
papers.authors: Alan Romano, Daniel Lehmann, Michael Pradel, Weihang Wang
papers.abstract: To protect web users from malicious JavaScript code, various malware detectors have been proposed, which analyze and classify code as malicious or benign. State-of-the-art detectors focus on JavaScript as the only target language. However, WebAssembly provides attackers a new and so far unexplored opportunity for evading malware detectors. This paper presents Wobfuscator, the first technique for evading static JavaScript malware detection by moving parts of the computation into WebAssembly. The core of the technique is a set of code transformations that translate carefully selected parts of behavior implemented in JavaScript into WebAssembly. The approach is opportunistic in the sense that it uses WebAssembly where it helps to evade malware detection without compromising the correctness of the code. Evaluating our approach with a dataset of 43,499 malicious and 149,677 benign JavaScript files, as well as six popular JavaScript libraries reveals that our approach is effective at evading state-of-the-art, learning-based static malware detectors; the obfuscation is semantic-preserving; and our approach has small overhead, making it practical for use in real-world programs. By pinpointing limitations of current malware detectors, our work motivates future efforts on detecting multi-language malware in the web.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了保护web用户免受恶意JavaScript代码的攻击，已经提出了各种恶意软件检测器，它们分析代码并将其分类为恶意代码或良性代码。最先进的检测器将JavaScript作为唯一的目标语言。然而，WebAssembly为攻击者提供了一个新的迄今未被探索的机会来躲避恶意软件检测器。本文介绍了Wobfuscator，这是第一种通过将部分计算转移到WebAssembly来规避静态JavaScript恶意软件检测的技术。该技术的核心是一组代码转换，将JavaScript中实现的精心选择的行为部分转换成WebAssembly。这种方法是机会主义的，因为它使用WebAssembly来帮助规避恶意软件检测，而不会损害代码的正确性。使用43，499个恶意和149，677个良性JavaScript文件以及六个流行的JavaScript库的数据集来评估我们的方法，揭示了我们的方法在规避最先进的、基于学习的静态恶意软件检测器方面是有效的；混淆是语义保持的；我们的方法开销很小，这使得它在现实世界的程序中很实用。通过指出当前恶意软件检测器的局限性，我们的工作激发了未来在检测网络中多语言恶意软件方面的努力。
papers.title_zh: Wobfuscator:通过机会主义翻译到WebAssembly混淆JavaScript恶意软件

papers.title: The State of the SameSite: Studying the Usage, Effectiveness, and Adequacy of SameSite Cookies
papers.authors: Soheil Khodayari, Giancarlo Pellegrino
papers.abstract: Chromium-based browsers now restrict cookies’ scope to a same-site context by changing the default policy for cookies, thus requiring developers to adapt their websites. The extent of the adoption and effectiveness of the SameSite policy has not been studied yet, and, in this paper, we undertake one of the first evaluations of the state of the SameSite cookie policy. We conducted a set of large-scale, longitudinal, both automated and manual measurements of the Alexa top 1K, 10K, 100K, and 500K sites across the main rollout dates of the SameSite policies, covering both SameSite usage and cross-site functionality breakage caused by the new default policy. Also, we performed an extensive evaluation of threats against the new Lax-by-default policy’s effectiveness, looking at the adequacy of the coverage provided by the Lax policy and bypass caused by website developers’ mistakes.Our study shows that the growth of sites using a SameSite policy has slowed down considerably after the enforcement dates. Then, the new Lax-by-default policy has affected about 19% of the functionalities implemented via cross-site requests without an explicit SameSite policy, most of which are for online ads. Third, our study observes a significant mismatch between the request contexts covered by Lax and the ones actually used by websites in the wild, making it possible to perform XS attacks also against popular websites such as Tumblr, Twitch, SoundCloud, Mailchimp, and Pixiv. Even when using Lax or Strict policies, much of their effectiveness depends on developers’ awareness of SameSite policies’ implications, who could introduce vulnerabilities or inconsistent policies, leading to SameSite policy bypasses. For example, we identified bypass in IMDB, Paypal, and Meetup. Also, we discovered a widespread SSO IdP abuse that attackers could use to attack target websites even when using stricter SameSite policies. Finally, in this paper, we also look at SameSite implementations in popular browsers and the default configuration in web frameworks.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于Chromium的浏览器现在通过改变cookies的默认策略，将cookies的范围限制在同一个站点的上下文中，因此要求开发人员调整他们的网站。还没有研究SameSite策略的采用程度和有效性，在本文中，我们对SameSite cookie策略的状态进行了第一次评估。我们对Alexa top 1K、10K、100K和500K站点进行了一系列大规模、纵向、自动和手动测量，涵盖了相同站点使用情况和新默认策略导致的跨站点功能破坏。此外，我们针对新的默认宽松政策的有效性执行了广泛的威胁评估，查看宽松政策提供的覆盖范围是否足够，以及网站开发人员的错误导致的绕过。我们的研究表明，在实施日期之后，使用相同站点策略的站点的增长已经大大减缓。然后，新的默认宽松政策影响了大约19%通过跨站点请求实现的功能，而没有明确的SameSite政策，其中大部分是针对在线广告的。第三，我们的研究观察到Lax覆盖的请求上下文与野生网站实际使用的请求上下文之间存在明显的不匹配，这使得对Tumblr、Twitch、SoundCloud、Mailchimp和Pixiv等热门网站进行XS攻击成为可能。即使在使用宽松或严格的策略时，它们的有效性在很大程度上取决于开发人员对相同站点策略含义的认识，他们可能会引入漏洞或不一致的策略，从而导致绕过相同站点策略。例如，我们在IMDB、Paypal和Meetup中发现了bypass。此外，我们还发现了广泛存在的SSO IdP滥用，攻击者甚至可以使用更严格的SameSite策略来攻击目标网站。最后，在本文中，我们还研究了流行浏览器中的SameSite实现和web框架中的默认配置。
papers.title_zh: 相同站点的状态:研究相同站点Cookies的使用、有效性和充分性

papers.title: IRQDebloat: Reducing Driver Attack Surface in Embedded Devices
papers.authors: Zhenghao Hu, Brendan Dolan-Gavitt
papers.abstract: Embedded and IoT devices often come with a wide range of hardware functionality, but any particular end user may only use some small subset of these features. However, even unused hardware features are accompanied by potentially buggy driver code, which increases the attack surface of the device. In this paper, we introduce IRQDebloat, a system for disabling unwanted hardware features through automated firmware rewriting. Building on the insight that external inputs to the system are typically delivered through interrupt requests (IRQs), IRQDebloat systematically explores the interrupt handling code in the target firmware, identifies the handler function for each peripheral, and finally rewrites target firmware to disable the handlers that correspond to undesired hardware features. In our experiments we demonstrate IRQDebloat’s effectiveness and generality by identifying IRQ handlers across four different operating systems (Linux, FreeBSD, VxWorks, and RiscOS) and seven different embedded platforms, and disabling selected peripherals on real-world hardware (a Raspberry Pi and a Valve Steam Link). On the Steam Link, we survey the attack surface and find that disabling selected peripherals could block up to 44 CVEs found in the Linux kernel over the past five years.
papers.abstract_zh: 嵌入式和物联网设备通常具有广泛的硬件功能，但任何特定的最终用户可能只会使用其中的一小部分功能。然而，即使是未使用的硬件功能也伴随着潜在的错误驱动程序代码，这增加了设备的攻击面。在本文中，我们介绍了IRQDebloat，一个通过自动固件重写来禁用不需要的硬件功能的系统。基于对系统外部输入通常通过中断请求(IRQ)传递的认识，IRQDebloat系统地探索目标固件中的中断处理代码，识别每个外设的处理程序功能，并最终重写目标固件以禁用与不需要的硬件特性相对应的处理程序。在我们的实验中，我们通过在四个不同的操作系统(Linux、FreeBSD、VxWorks和RiscOS)和七个不同的嵌入式平台上识别IRQ处理程序，并在现实世界的硬件上禁用选定的外设(一个Raspberry Pi和一个Valve Steam Link)，来展示IRQDebloat的有效性和通用性。在Steam链接上，我们调查了攻击面，发现禁用选定的外设可以阻止过去五年中在Linux内核中发现的多达44个CVE。
papers.title_zh: IRQDebloat:减少嵌入式设备中的驱动攻击面

papers.title: Finding SMM Privilege-Escalation Vulnerabilities in UEFI Firmware with Protocol-Centric Static Analysis
papers.authors: Jiawei Yin, Menghao Li, Wei Wu, Dandan Sun, Jianhua Zhou, Wei Huo, Jingling Xue
papers.abstract: The Unified Extensible Firmware Interface (UEFI) provides a specification of the software interface between an OS and its underlying platform firmware. The runtime services provided are seemingly secure as they reside in System Management Mode (SMM) at ring -2, assuming a higher privilege than the OS kernel at ring 0. However, their software vulnerabilities are known to be exploitable to launch ring 0 to ring -2 privilege escalation, i.e., SMM privilege escalation attacks.In this paper, we introduce an effective static analysis framework for detecting SMM privilege escalation vulnerabilities in UEFI firmware. We present a systematic study of such vulnerabilities and identify their root causes as being two types of references that can escape from the SMRAM, legacy references and unintentional references. Existing static analyses are ineffective in detecting such vulnerabilities in stripped COTS UEFI firmware images, which are developed based on a customized callback mechanism that organizes callable functions into protocols identified by GUIDs. By leveraging such a callback-based programming paradigm, we introduce SPENDER, the first static detection framework, which is founded on a novel protocol-centric analysis, for uncovering the potential SMM privilege escalation vulnerabilities in UEFI firmware efficiently and precisely. For a total of 1148 UEFI binaries collected from eight vendors, SPENDER has successfully found 36 SMM privilege escalation vulnerabilities (two 1-day and 34 0-day vulnerabilities), which can cause arbitrary code execution and arbitrary address write (and can thus enable, e.g., the attackers to install a bootkit into a flash drive). We have reported these 36 vulnerabilities to the vendors, with the two 1-day vulnerabilities confirmed as known previously but the 34 0-day vulnerabilities confirmed as new.
papers.abstract_zh: 统一可扩展固件接口(UEFI)提供了操作系统及其底层平台固件之间的软件接口规范。所提供的运行时服务看起来是安全的，因为它们驻留在环2的系统管理模式(SMM)中，假设比环0的操作系统内核具有更高的特权。然而，已知它们的软件漏洞可被利用来启动环0到环2特权提升，即SMM特权提升攻击。本文介绍了一种有效的静态分析框架，用于检测UEFI固件中的SMM权限提升漏洞。我们对此类漏洞进行了系统研究，并确定其根本原因是两种类型的引用可以从SMRAM中逃逸，即遗留引用和无意引用。现有的静态分析在检测剥离的COTS UEFI固件映像中的这种弱点方面是无效的，剥离的COTS UEFI固件映像是基于定制的回调机制开发的，该回调机制将可调用函数组织成由GUIDs标识的协议。通过利用这种基于回调的编程范式，我们引入了第一个静态检测框架SPENDER，它基于一种新颖的以协议为中心的分析，用于高效而精确地发现UEFI固件中潜在的SMM权限提升漏洞。对于从八个供应商收集的总共1148个UEFI二进制文件，SPENDER已经成功地发现了36个SMM权限提升漏洞(两个1天漏洞和34个0天漏洞)，这些漏洞可以导致任意代码执行和任意地址写入(因此可以使攻击者能够将bootkit安装到闪存驱动器中)。我们已经向供应商报告了这36个漏洞，其中两个1天漏洞被确认为以前已知的，但34个0天漏洞被确认为新的。
papers.title_zh: 以协议为中心的静态分析发现UEFI固件中的SMM权限提升漏洞

papers.title: Mind the Gap: Studying the Insecurity of Provably Secure Embedded Trusted Execution Architectures
papers.authors: Marton Bognar, Jo Van Bulck, Frank Piessens
papers.abstract: The security claims of a system can be supported or refuted by different kinds of evidence. On the one hand, attack research uses empirical, experimental, inductive methods to refute security claims. If motivated and competent attackers do not succeed in breaking a specific security property, this provides some support (but no definite proof) that the system is secure.On the other hand, formal methods use mathematical, deductive methods that can prove the security of a model of the system. The process of constructing a proof can uncover vulnerabilities that can then be fixed. The use of formal methods can be very powerful and is attractive because it seems to provide irrefutable evidence of security. However, that evidence applies only to the mathematical model, not to any actual system, and, hence, it is important to understand the gap between the model and the real-world system.In this paper, we present a case study that examines this gap for two embedded security architectures that use formal methods to prove their security properties. Despite strong formal evidence for security, we discover numerous attacks against the implementations, all of which falsify proven security properties. These attacks range from exploiting simple programming errors to a novel DMA-based side-channel attack. The simple attacks demonstrate that the construction of systems and proofs is error-prone, while some of the more sophisticated attacks serve as examples to show that formal methods alone can never guarantee the security of a real-world system.From our case study, we also distill actionable guidelines on how to provide stronger evidence for the security of a system.
papers.abstract_zh: 不同种类的证据可以支持或反驳系统的安全声明。一方面，攻击研究使用经验的、实验的、归纳的方法来反驳安全声明。如果有动机且有能力的攻击者没有成功破坏特定的安全属性，这提供了一些支持(但没有确切的证据)来证明系统是安全的。另一方面，形式方法使用数学、演绎的方法来证明系统模型的安全性。构建证据的过程可以发现漏洞，然后可以修复这些漏洞。正式方法的使用可能非常强大，而且很有吸引力，因为它似乎提供了无可辩驳的安全证据。然而，这些证据只适用于数学模型，而不适用于任何实际系统，因此，理解模型和现实世界系统之间的差距是很重要的。在本文中，我们给出了一个案例研究，研究了两个嵌入式安全架构的这一差距，这两个架构使用形式化方法来证明它们的安全属性。尽管有强有力的安全证据，我们还是发现了许多针对实现的攻击，所有这些攻击都伪造了已证实的安全属性。这些攻击从利用简单的编程错误到基于DMA的新型旁路攻击不等。简单的攻击表明系统和证明的构造是容易出错的，而一些更复杂的攻击作为例子表明，仅仅形式方法永远不能保证真实世界系统的安全性。从我们的案例研究中，我们还提炼出了关于如何为系统安全性提供更有力证据的可操作指南。
papers.title_zh: 注意差距:研究可证明安全的嵌入式可信执行架构的不安全性

papers.title: How Not to Protect Your IP - An Industry-Wide Break of IEEE 1735 Implementations
papers.authors: Julian Speith, Florian Schweins, Maik Ender, Marc Fyrbiak, Alexander May, Christof Paar
papers.abstract: Modern hardware systems are composed of a variety of third-party Intellectual Property (IP) cores to implement their overall functionality. Since hardware design is a globalized process involving various (untrusted) stakeholders, a secure management of the valuable IP between authors and users is inevitable to protect them from unauthorized access and modification. To this end, the widely adopted IEEE standard 1735-2014 was created to ensure confidentiality and integrity. In this paper, we outline structural weaknesses in IEEE 1735 that cannot be fixed with cryptographic solutions (given the contemporary hardware design process) and thus render the standard inherently insecure. We practically demonstrate the weaknesses by recovering the private keys of IEEE 1735 implementations from major Electronic Design Automation (EDA) tool vendors, namely Intel, Xilinx, Cadence, Siemens, Microsemi, and Lattice, while results on a seventh case study are withheld. As a consequence, we can decrypt, modify, and re-encrypt all allegedly protected IP cores designed for the respective tools, thus leading to an industry-wide break. As part of this analysis, we are the first to publicly disclose three RSA-based white-box schemes that are used in real-world products and present cryptanalytical attacks for all of them, finally resulting in key recovery.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代硬件系统由各种第三方知识产权(IP)内核组成，以实现其整体功能。由于硬件设计是一个全球化的过程，涉及各种(不可信的)利益相关者，因此作者和用户之间有价值的IP的安全管理是不可避免的，以保护他们免受未经授权的访问和修改。为此，创建了广泛采用的IEEE标准1735-2014，以确保机密性和完整性。在本文中，我们概述了IEEE 1735的结构性弱点，这些弱点无法用加密解决方案解决(考虑到当代的硬件设计过程),从而使该标准本身不安全。我们通过从主要的电子设计自动化(EDA)工具供应商，即Intel、Xilinx、Cadence、Siemens、Microsemi和Lattice，恢复IEEE 1735实现的私钥，实际上展示了这些弱点，而第七个案例研究的结果被保留。因此，我们可以解密、修改和重新加密所有据称为相应工具设计的受保护的IP核心，从而导致行业范围的突破。作为这一分析的一部分，我们首次公开披露了三种基于RSA的白盒方案，它们在现实产品中使用，并对所有这些方案进行密码分析攻击，最终导致密钥恢复。
papers.title_zh: 如何不保护您的IP——IEEE 1735实施的行业突破

papers.title: Hardening Circuit-Design IP Against Reverse-Engineering Attacks
papers.authors: Animesh Chhotaray, Thomas Shrimpton
papers.abstract: Design-hiding techniques are a central piece of academic and industrial efforts to protect electronic circuits from being reverse-engineered. However, these techniques have lacked a principled foundation to guide their design and security evaluation, leading to a long line of broken schemes. In this paper, we begin to lay this missing foundation. We establish formal syntax for design-hiding (DH) schemes, a cryptographic primitive that encompasses all known design-stage methods to hide the circuit that is handed to a (potentially adversarial) foundry for fabrication. We give two security notions for this primitive: function recovery (FR) and key recovery (KR). The former is the ostensible goal of design-hiding methods to prevent reverse-engineering the functionality of the circuit, but most prior work has focused on the latter. We then present the first provably (FR,KR)-secure DH scheme, ${OneChaff}_{hd}$. A side-benefit of our security proof is a framework for analyzing a broad class of new DH schemes. We finish by unpacking our main security result, to provide parameter-setting guidance.
papers.abstract_zh: 设计隐藏技术是学术界和工业界努力保护电子电路不被逆向工程的核心部分。然而，这些技术缺乏指导其设计和安全性评估的原则性基础，导致了一长串失败的方案。在本文中，我们开始奠定这个缺失的基础。我们建立了设计隐藏(DH)方案的形式语法，这是一种包含所有已知设计阶段方法的密码原语，用于隐藏交给(潜在敌对)代工厂制造的电路。我们给出了这个原语的两个安全概念:函数恢复(FR)和密钥恢复(KR)。前者是设计隐藏方法的表面目标，以防止对电路的功能进行反向工程，但大多数先前的工作都集中在后者上。然后我们给出了第一个可证明(FR，KR)-安全的DH方案,{ OneChaff } _ { hd }。我们的安全证明的一个附带好处是为分析一大类新的DH方案提供了一个框架。最后，我们打开主要安全结果，以提供参数设置指导。
papers.title_zh: 针对逆向工程攻击强化电路设计IP

papers.title: Evaluating Physical-Layer BLE Location Tracking Attacks on Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Hadi Givehchian, Nishant Bhaskar, Eliana Rodriguez Herrera, Héctor Rodrigo López Soto, Christian Dameff, Dinesh Bharadia, Aaron Schulman
papers.abstract: Mobile devices increasingly function as wireless tracking beacons. Using the Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) protocol, mobile devices such as smartphones and smartwatches continuously transmit beacons to inform passive listeners about device locations for applications such as digital contact tracing for COVID-19, and even finding lost devices. These applications use cryptographic anonymity that limit an adversary’s ability to use these beacons to stalk a user. However, attackers can bypass these defenses by fingerprinting the unique physical-layer imperfections in the transmissions of specific devices.We empirically demonstrate that there are several key challenges that can limit an attacker’s ability to find a stable physical layer identifier to uniquely identify mobile devices using BLE, including variations in the hardware design of BLE chipsets, transmission power levels, differences in thermal conditions, and limitations of inexpensive radios that can be widely deployed to capture raw physical-layer signals. We evaluated how much each of these factors limits accurate fingerprinting in a large-scale field study of hundreds of uncontrolled BLE devices, revealing that physical-layer identification is a viable, although sometimes unreliable, way for an attacker to track mobile devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动设备越来越多地充当无线跟踪信标。使用蓝牙低能耗(BLE)协议，智能手机和智能手表等移动设备不断发送信标，以通知被动收听者设备的位置，用于新冠肺炎的数字联系人追踪等应用，甚至是寻找丢失的设备。这些应用程序使用加密匿名，限制了对手使用这些信标跟踪用户的能力。然而，攻击者可以通过识别特定设备传输中独特的物理层缺陷来绕过这些防御。我们根据经验证明，有几个关键挑战会限制攻击者找到稳定的物理层标识符来唯一识别使用ble的移动设备的能力，包括BLE芯片组的硬件设计变化、传输功率水平、热条件的差异以及可以广泛部署来捕获原始物理层信号的廉价无线电的限制。我们在一项针对数百台不受控制的BLE设备的大规模现场研究中，评估了这些因素在多大程度上限制了准确的指纹识别，揭示了物理层识别是攻击者跟踪移动设备的一种可行方式，尽管有时并不可靠。
papers.title_zh: 评估移动设备上的物理层BLE位置跟踪攻击

papers.title: IRShield: A Countermeasure Against Adversarial Physical-Layer Wireless Sensing
papers.authors: Paul Staat, Simon Mulzer, Stefan Roth, Veelasha Moonsamy, Markus Heinrichs, Rainer Kronberger, Aydin Sezgin, Christof Paar
papers.abstract: Wireless radio channels are known to contain information about the surrounding propagation environment, which can be extracted using established wireless sensing methods. Thus, today’s ubiquitous wireless devices are attractive targets for passive eavesdroppers to launch reconnaissance attacks. In particular, by overhearing standard communication signals, eavesdroppers obtain estimations of wireless channels which can give away sensitive information about indoor environments. For instance, by applying simple statistical methods, adversaries can infer human motion from wireless channel observations, allowing to remotely monitor premises of victims. In this work, building on the advent of intelligent reflecting surfaces (IRSs), we propose IRShield as a novel countermeasure against adversarial wireless sensing. IRShield is designed as a plug-and-play privacy-preserving extension to existing wireless networks. At the core of IRShield, we design an IRS configuration algorithm to obfuscate wireless channels. We validate the effectiveness with extensive experimental evaluations. In a state-of-the-art human motion detection attack using off-the-shelf Wi-Fi devices, IRShield lowered detection rates to 5% or less.
papers.abstract_zh: 已知无线电信道包含关于周围传播环境的信息，该信息可以使用已建立的无线感测方法来提取。因此，今天无处不在的无线设备是被动窃听者发起侦察攻击的有吸引力的目标。特别地，通过偷听标准通信信号，窃听者获得无线信道的估计，这可能泄露关于室内环境的敏感信息。例如，通过应用简单的统计方法，对手可以从无线信道观察中推断人体运动，从而远程监控受害者的住所。在这项工作中，基于智能反射表面(IRSs)的出现，我们提出了IRShield作为对抗敌对无线传感的新对策。IRShield被设计为对现有无线网络的即插即用隐私保护扩展。在IRShield的核心，我们设计了一个IRS配置算法来混淆无线信道。我们通过大量的实验评估验证了该方法的有效性。在一次使用现成Wi-Fi设备的最先进的人体运动检测攻击中，IRShield将检测率降至5%或更低。
papers.title_zh: IRShield:对抗敌对物理层无线传感的对策

papers.title: Anti-Tamper Radio: System-Level Tamper Detection for Computing Systems
papers.authors: Paul Staat, Johannes Tobisch, Christian T. Zenger, Christof Paar
papers.abstract: A whole range of attacks becomes possible when adversaries gain physical access to computing systems that process or contain sensitive data. Examples include side-channel analysis, bus probing, device cloning, or implanting hardware Trojans. Defending against these kinds of attacks is considered a challenging endeavor, requiring anti-tamper solutions to monitor the physical environment of the system. Current solutions range from simple switches, which detect if a case is opened, to meshes of conducting material that provide more fine-grained detection of integrity violations. However, these solutions suffer from an intricate trade-off between physical security on the one side and reliability, cost, and difficulty to manufacture on the other.In this work, we demonstrate that radio wave propagation in an enclosed system of complex geometry is sensitive against adversarial physical manipulation. We present an anti-tamper radio (ATR) solution as a method for tamper detection, which combines high detection sensitivity and reliability with ease-of-use. ATR constantly monitors the wireless signal propagation behavior within the boundaries of a metal case. Tamper attempts such as insertion of foreign objects, will alter the observed radio signal response, subsequently raising an alarm.The ATR principle is applicable in many computing systems that require physical security such as servers, ATMs, and smart meters. As a case study, we use 19” servers and thoroughly investigate capabilities and limits of the ATR. Using a custom-built automated probing station, we simulate probing attacks by inserting needles with high precision into protected environments. Our experimental results show that our ATR implementation can detect 16mm insertions of needles of diameter as low as 0.1mm under ideal conditions. In the more realistic environment of a running 19” server, we demonstrate reliable detection of 40mm insertions of needles of diameter 1mm for a period of 10 days.
papers.abstract_zh: 当对手获得对处理或包含敏感数据的计算系统的物理访问权时，一系列攻击都成为可能。示例包括旁路分析、总线探测、设备克隆或植入硬件特洛伊木马。防御这些类型的攻击被认为是一项具有挑战性的工作，需要防篡改解决方案来监控系统的物理环境。目前的解决方案从检测箱子是否被打开的简单开关，到提供更细粒度的完整性破坏检测的导电材料网格。然而，这些解决方案在一方面的物理安全性和另一方面的可靠性、成本和制造难度之间存在复杂的权衡。在这项工作中，我们证明了无线电波在一个封闭的复杂几何系统中的传播对敌对的物理操作是敏感的。我们提出了一种防篡改无线电(ATR)解决方案作为篡改检测的方法，它结合了高检测灵敏度和可靠性以及易用性。ATR持续监控金属外壳边界内的无线信号传播行为。插入异物等篡改企图会改变观察到的无线电信号响应，随后引发警报。ATR原则适用于许多需要物理安全的计算系统，如服务器、ATM和智能电表。作为案例研究，我们使用了19英寸的服务器，并彻底调查了ATR的能力和局限性。使用定制的自动探测站，我们通过将高精度的探针插入受保护的环境来模拟探测攻击。我们的实验结果表明，在理想条件下，我们的ATR实现可以检测直径低至0.1mm的16mm针的插入。在运行19英寸服务器的更真实的环境中，我们演示了在10天内对直径为1毫米的40毫米针头插入的可靠检测。
papers.title_zh: 防篡改无线电:计算系统的系统级篡改检测

papers.title: Practical EMV Relay Protection
papers.authors: Andreea-Ina Radu, Tom Chothia, Christopher J. P. Newton, Ioana Boureanu, Liqun Chen
papers.abstract: Relay attackers can forward messages between a contactless EMV bank card and a shop reader, making it possible to wirelessly pickpocket money. To protect against this, Apple Pay requires a user’s fingerprint or Face ID to authorise payments, while Mastercard and Visa have proposed protocols to stop such relay attacks. We investigate transport payment modes and find that we can build on relaying to bypass the Apple Pay lock screen, and illicitly pay from a locked iPhone to any EMV reader, for any amount, without user authorisation. We show that Visa’s proposed relay-countermeasure can be bypassed using rooted smart phones. We analyse Mastercard’s relay protection, and show that its timing bounds could be more reliably imposed at the ISO 14443 protocol level, rather than at the EMV protocol level. With these insights, we propose a new relay-resistance protocol (L1RP) for EMV. We use the Tamarin prover to model mobile-phone payments with and without user authentication, and in different payment modes. We formally verify solutions to our attack suggested by Apple and Visa, and used by Samsung, and we verify that our proposed protocol provides protection from relay attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 中继攻击者可以在非接触式EMV银行卡和商店读卡器之间转发消息，这使得无线扒窃资金成为可能。为了防止这种情况，Apple Pay需要用户的指纹或Face ID来授权支付，而万事达卡和Visa已经提出了阻止这种中继攻击的协议。我们调查了交通支付模式，发现我们可以利用中继绕过Apple Pay锁屏，在没有用户授权的情况下，从锁定的iPhone向任何EMV阅读器非法支付任何金额。我们证明了Visa提出的中继对抗措施可以通过根智能手机绕过。我们分析了万事达卡的继电器保护，并表明其时间界限可以更可靠地施加在EMV协议层，而不是ISO 14443协议层。有了这些认识，我们提出了一个新的中继电阻协议(L1RP)的EMV。我们使用Tamarin prover对有用户认证和无用户认证以及不同支付模式下的移动电话支付进行建模。我们正式验证了由Apple和Visa提出并由Samsung使用的针对我们的攻击的解决方案，并且我们验证了我们提出的协议提供了针对中继攻击的保护。
papers.title_zh: 实用EMV继电保护

papers.title: AccEar: Accelerometer Acoustic Eavesdropping with Unconstrained Vocabulary
papers.authors: Pengfei Hu, Hui Zhuang, Panneer Selvam Santhalingam, Riccardo Spolaor, Parth H. Pathak, Guoming Zhang, Xiuzhen Cheng
papers.abstract: With the increasing popularity of voice-based applications, acoustic eavesdropping has become a serious threat to users’ privacy. While on smartphones the access to microphones needs an explicit user permission, acoustic eavesdropping attacks can rely on motion sensors (such as accelerometer and gyroscope), which access is unrestricted. However, previous instances of such attacks can only recognize a limited set of pre-trained words or phrases. In this paper, we present AccEar, an accelerometer-based acoustic eavesdropping attack that can reconstruct any audio played on the smartphone’s loudspeaker with unconstrained vocabulary. We show that an attacker can employ a conditional Generative Adversarial Network (cGAN) to reconstruct high-fidelity audio from low-frequency accelerometer signals. The presented cGAN model learns to recreate high-frequency components of the user’s voice from low-frequency accelerometer signals through spectrogram enhancement. We assess the feasibility and effectiveness of AccEar attack in a thorough set of experiments using audio from 16 public personalities. As shown by the results in both objective and subjective evaluations, AccEar successfully reconstructs user speeches from accelerometer signals in different scenarios including varying sampling rate, audio volume, device model, etc.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着语音应用的日益普及，声音窃听已经成为对用户隐私的严重威胁。虽然在智能手机上访问麦克风需要明确的用户许可，但声学窃听攻击可以依赖于运动传感器(如加速度计和陀螺仪)，这种访问是不受限制的。然而，这种攻击的先前实例只能识别有限的一组预先训练的单词或短语。在本文中，我们提出了AccEar，这是一种基于加速度计的声学窃听攻击，可以用不受限制的词汇重建智能手机扬声器上播放的任何音频。我们证明了攻击者可以利用条件生成对抗网络(cGAN)从低频加速度计信号中重建高保真音频。所提出的cGAN模型通过声谱图增强从低频加速度计信号中学习重建用户语音的高频分量。我们使用来自16位公众人物的音频，在一组完整的实验中评估AccEar攻击的可行性和有效性。如客观和主观评估的结果所示，AccEar在不同的场景下(包括不同的采样率、音量、设备型号等)成功地从加速度计信号重建了用户语音。
papers.title_zh: AccEar:具有无约束词汇的加速度计声学窃听

papers.title: Towards Automated Auditing for Account and Session Management Flaws in Single Sign-On Deployments
papers.authors: Mohammad Ghasemisharif, Chris Kanich, Jason Polakis
papers.abstract: Single Sign-On (SSO) is both a core and critical component of user authentication and authorization on the modern web, as it is often offered by web and mobile applications alongside credential-based authentication to facilitate the account creation and login process. However, the interplay between local account management and SSO functionality in the backend leads to flaws that enable or magnify account hijacking attacks. These flaws are not baked into the actual SSO protocols, but manifest due to the complexity of supporting separate but intermingling authentication paths. As a result, these types of flaws cannot be detected by the SSO protocol or implementation verification tools proposed in prior work. In this paper we introduce SAAT, a fully automated modular framework that assesses whether relying parties (RPs) that use Facebook as the IdP comply with secure practices and guidelines, and uncovers flaws in account and session management that stem from or are affected by the interplay of SSO and local functionality. We conduct a large-scale exploration of authentication and session practices in Facebook’s RPs, revealing a volatile ecosystem where SSO support can be suddenly dropped and 17.6% of the tested RPs exhibit non-functional SSO implementations. This highlights the need for the continuous and systematic testing of the SSO ecosystem made possible by SAAT. More critically, we find that security measures are often missing and official guidelines are routinely overlooked or misconfigured, with only 0.8% of the RPs fully enabling re-authentication which can prevent compromise from hijacked identity provider (IdP) cookies. Our study also shows that less than 2% of RPs correctly react to SSO revocation and 67% continue to allow account access even 10 days after revocation. Overall, we envision our framework as a tool for enabling and guiding widespread remediation efforts by major SSO identity providers, which were previously infeasible due to the sheer scale and inherent mutability of this ecosystem.
papers.abstract_zh: 单点登录(SSO)是现代web上用户身份验证和授权的核心和关键组件，因为它通常由web和移动应用程序与基于凭据的身份验证一起提供，以简化帐户创建和登录过程。但是，后端的本地帐户管理和SSO功能之间的相互作用会导致漏洞，从而导致或扩大帐户劫持攻击。这些缺陷并没有融入到实际的SSO协议中，但是由于支持独立但混合的身份验证路径的复杂性，这些缺陷变得很明显。结果，这些类型的缺陷不能被SSO协议或先前工作中提出的实现验证工具检测到。在本文中，我们介绍了SAAT，这是一个全自动的模块化框架，用于评估使用脸书作为IdP的依赖方(RP)是否符合安全实践和准则，并揭示帐户和会话管理中源于SSO和本地功能的相互作用或受其影响的缺陷。我们对脸书RPs中的身份验证和会话实践进行了大规模探索，揭示了一个不稳定的生态系统，其中SSO支持可能会突然中断，17.6%的测试RPs显示SSO实现不起作用。这突出表明需要对SAAT促成的单点登录生态系统进行持续和系统的测试。更重要的是，我们发现安全措施经常缺失，官方指南经常被忽视或错误配置，只有0.8%的RPs完全支持重新认证，这可以防止被劫持的身份提供商(IdP)cookie的危害。我们的研究还表明，不到2%的RPs对SSO撤销做出正确反应，67%的RPs甚至在撤销后10天还继续允许帐户访问。总的来说，我们将我们的框架设想为一种工具，用于支持和指导主要SSO身份提供者的广泛补救工作，这在以前是不可行的，因为这个生态系统的规模和固有的可变性。
papers.title_zh: 单点登录部署中帐户和会话管理缺陷的自动化审计

papers.title: HARDLOG: Practical Tamper-Proof System Auditing Using a Novel Audit Device
papers.authors: Adil Ahmad, Sangho Lee, Marcus Peinado
papers.abstract: Audit systems maintain detailed logs of security-related events on enterprise machines to forensically analyze potential incidents. In principle, these logs should be safely stored in a secure location (e.g., network storage) as soon as they are produced, but this incurs prohibitive slowdown to a monitored machine. Hence, existing audit systems protect batched logs asynchronously (e.g., after tens of seconds), but this allows attackers to tamper with unprotected logs.This paper presents HARDLOG, a practical and effective system that employs a novel audit device to provide fine-grained log protection with minimal performance slowdown. HARDLOG implements criticality-aware log protection: it ensures that logs are synchronously protected in the audit device before an infrequent security-critical event is allowed to execute, but logs are asynchronously protected on frequent non-critical events to minimize performance overhead. Importantly, even on non-critical events, HARDLOG ensures bounded-asynchronous protection: it sends log entries to the audit device within a tiny, bounded delay from their creation using well-known real-time techniques. To demonstrate HARDLOG’S effectiveness, we prototyped an audit device using commodity components and implemented a reference audit system for Linux. Our prototype achieves a bounded protection delay of 15 milliseconds at non-critical events alongside undelayed protection at critical events. We also show that, for diverse real-world programs, HARDLOG incurs a geometric mean performance slowdown of only 6.3%, hence it is suitable for many real-world deployment scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 审计系统在企业机器上维护与安全相关的事件的详细日志，以对潜在事件进行取证分析。原则上，这些日志一旦产生就应该被安全地存储在安全的位置(例如，网络存储)，但是这导致被监控机器的速度非常慢。因此，现有的审计系统异步地保护批量日志(例如，在几十秒之后)，但是这允许攻击者篡改未受保护的日志。本文介绍了HARDLOG，这是一个实用而有效的系统，它采用了一种新颖的审计设备来提供细粒度的日志保护，而性能下降最小。HARDLOG实现了关键程度感知的日志保护:它确保在允许执行不频繁的安全关键事件之前，在审计设备中同步保护日志，但是在频繁的非关键事件上异步保护日志，以最小化性能开销。重要的是，即使在非关键事件上，HARDLOG也能确保有限的异步保护:它使用众所周知的实时技术，在日志条目创建后的微小有限延迟内，将日志条目发送到审计设备。为了证明HARDLOG的有效性，我们使用商品组件构建了一个审计设备原型，并为Linux实现了一个参考审计系统。我们的原型在非关键事件上实现了15毫秒的有限保护延迟，同时在关键事件上实现了无延迟保护。我们还表明，对于不同的真实世界程序，HARDLOG导致的几何平均性能下降仅为6.3%，因此它适用于许多真实世界的部署场景。
papers.title_zh: HARDLOG:使用新型审计设备的实用防篡改系统审计

papers.title: SWARMFLAWFINDER: Discovering and Exploiting Logic Flaws of Swarm Algorithms
papers.authors: Chijung Jung, Ali Ahad, Yuseok Jeon, Yonghwi Kwon
papers.abstract: Inspired by swarms in nature, swarm robotics have been developed to conduct various challenging tasks such as environmental monitoring, disaster recovery, logistics, and even military operations. Despite the significant potential impact of the swarm on society, relatively little attention is given to adversarial scenarios against swarm robotics. In this paper, we explore a systematic approach to find logical flaws of the swarm robotics algorithms that adversaries can exploit. Specifically, we develop an automated testing system, SWARMFLAWFINDER, for swarm algorithms. We identify and overcome various challenges in understanding and reasoning about the swarm algorithm execution. In particular, we propose a novel abstraction of robotics behavior, which we call the degree of causal contribution (DCC), based on the idea of counterfactual causality. Then, we build a feedback guided greybox fuzz testing system called SWARMFLAWFINDER, leveraging DCC as a feedback metric. We evaluate SWARMFLAWFINDER with four swarm algorithms conducting navigating, searching, and rescuing missions. SWARMFLAWFINDER discovers 42 logic flaws (and all of them have been acknowledged by the developers) in the swarm algorithms. Our analysis of the flaws reveals that the swarm algorithms have critical logic errors/bugs or suffer from incomplete implementations that can be exploited by adversaries.
papers.abstract_zh: 受自然界中群体的启发，群体机器人已经被开发用于执行各种具有挑战性的任务，如环境监测、灾难恢复、物流，甚至军事行动。尽管群体对社会有着巨大的潜在影响，但相对来说，人们很少关注对抗群体机器人的敌对场景。在这篇文章中，我们探索了一种系统的方法来寻找对手可以利用的群体机器人算法的逻辑缺陷。具体来说，我们为群算法开发了一个自动化测试系统SWARMFLAWFINDER。我们发现并克服了理解和推理群体算法执行过程中的各种挑战。特别是，我们基于反事实因果关系的思想，提出了一种新的机器人行为抽象，我们称之为因果贡献度(DCC)。然后，我们构建了一个名为SWARMFLAWFINDER的反馈引导的灰箱模糊测试系统，利用DCC作为反馈度量。我们用四种群算法来评估SWARMFLAWFINDER执行导航、搜索和救援任务。SWARMFLAWFINDER在swarm算法中发现了42个逻辑缺陷(开发者已经承认了所有这些缺陷)。我们对缺陷的分析表明，群算法存在严重的逻辑错误/缺陷，或者存在可能被对手利用的不完整实现。
papers.title_zh: SWARMFLAWFINDER:发现和利用群体算法的逻辑缺陷

papers.title: PGPatch: Policy-Guided Logic Bug Patching for Robotic Vehicles
papers.authors: Hyungsub Kim, Muslum Ozgur Ozmen, Z. Berkay Celik, Antonio Bianchi, Dongyan Xu
papers.abstract: Automated program repair (APR) methods aim to identify patches for a given bug and apply them with minimal human intervention. To date, existing APR approaches focus on repairing software bugs, such as memory safety bugs. However, our analysis of popular robotic vehicle (RV) control software shows that most of their bugs are not memory bugs but rather logic bugs. These bugs, while not causing software crashes, can cause an RV to reach an undesired physical state (e.g., hitting the ground). To fix these logic bugs, we introduce PGPatch, a policy-guided program repair framework for RV control programs, which identifies the correct patch for a given logic bug and applies it without human intervention. PGPatch takes, as input, existing or new logic formulas used to discover logic bugs. It then leverages the formulas using a dedicated dynamic analysis to classify the previously known logic bugs into a patch type. It next uses a customized algorithm, based on the identified patch type and violated formula, to produce a source code patch as output. Lastly, it creates repeatable tests to verify the patch’s completeness, ensuring that the patch is correct and does not degrade the RV’s performance. We evaluate PGPatch on selected bug cases from three popular RV control software and find that it correctly fixes 258 out of 297 logic bugs (86.9%). We additionally recruit 18 experienced RV developers and users and conduct a user study that demonstrates how using PGPatch makes fixing bugs in RV software significantly quicker and less error-prone.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动化程序修复(APR)方法旨在识别给定bug的补丁，并在最少的人工干预下应用它们。迄今为止，现有的APR方法集中于修复软件错误，例如存储器安全错误。然而，我们对流行的机器人车辆(RV)控制软件的分析表明，它们的大多数错误不是内存错误，而是逻辑错误。这些错误虽然不会导致软件崩溃，但会导致RV达到不希望的物理状态(例如，撞到地面)。为了修复这些逻辑错误，我们引入了PGPatch，这是一个用于RV控制程序的策略导向的程序修复框架，它可以识别给定逻辑错误的正确补丁，并在没有人工干预的情况下应用它。PGPatch将用于发现逻辑错误的现有或新的逻辑公式作为输入。然后，它使用专用的动态分析来利用公式，将先前已知的逻辑错误分类到一个补丁类型中。接下来，它使用定制的算法，基于识别的补丁类型和违反的公式，产生源代码补丁作为输出。最后，它创建可重复的测试来验证补丁的完整性，确保补丁是正确的，并且不会降低RV的性能。我们从三个流行的RV控制软件中选择bug案例对PGPatch进行了评估，发现它正确修复了297个逻辑bug中的258个(86.9%)。此外，我们还招募了18名经验丰富的RV开发人员和用户，并开展了一项用户研究，展示了使用PGPatch如何显著加快修复RV软件中的错误，并减少出错几率。
papers.title_zh: PGPatch:用于机器人车辆的策略引导的逻辑错误修补

papers.title: "Flawed, but like democracy we don't have a better system": The Experts' Insights on the Peer Review Process of Evaluating Security Papers
papers.authors: Ananta Soneji, Faris Bugra Kokulu, Carlos E. Rubio-Medrano, Tiffany Bao, Ruoyu Wang, Yan Shoshitaishvili, Adam Doupé
papers.abstract: The academic computer security community has traditionally adopted peer review as an integral part of scientific publishing and dissemination, in a process that grows organically and nourishes itself by internal communications and intuitions, rather than repeatable experiments and investigations. Recently, key community members have shared a series of concerns regarding this process in public. To support or disprove some of these concerns, this paper presents the first qualitative study to examine the peer review process in the computer security field.
