papers.title: Learning from Context: A Multi-View Deep Learning Architecture for Malware Detection
papers.authors: Adarsh Kyadige, Ethan M. Rudd, Konstantin Berlin
papers.abstract: Machine learning (ML) classifiers used for malware detection typically employ numerical representations of the content of each file when making malicious/benign determinations. However, there is also relevant information that can be gleaned from the context in which the file was seen which is often ignored. One source of contextual information is the file's location on disk. For example, a malicious file masquerading as a known benign file (e.g., a Windows system DLL) is more likely to appear suspicious if the detector can intelligibly utilize information about the path at which it resides. Knowledge of the file path information could also make it easier to detect files which try to evade disk scans by placing themselves in specific locations. File paths are also available with little overhead and can seamlessly be integrated into a multi-view static ML detector, potentially yielding higher detection rates at very high throughput and minimal infrastructural changes. In this work, we propose a multi-view deep neural network architecture, which takes feature vectors from the PE file content as well as corresponding file paths as inputs and outputs a detection score. We perform an evaluation on a commercial-scale dataset of approximately 10 million samples - files and file paths from user endpoints serviced by an actual security vendor. We then conduct an interpretability analysis via LIME modeling to ensure that our classifier has learned a sensible representation and examine how the file path contributes to change in the classifier's score in different cases. We find that our model learns useful aspects of the file path for classification, resulting in a 26.6% improvement in the true positive rate at a 0.001 false positive rate (FPR) and a 64.6% improvement at 0.0001 FPR, compared to a model that operates on PE file content only.
papers.abstract_zh: 用于恶意软件检测的机器学习(ML)分类器在进行恶意/良性确定时通常采用每个文件内容的数字表示。然而，也有一些相关信息可以从查看文件的上下文中收集到，但这些信息经常被忽略。上下文信息的一个来源是文件在磁盘上的位置。例如，伪装成已知良性文件(例如，Windows系统DLL)的恶意文件，如果检测器能够智能地利用关于其驻留路径的信息，则更有可能显得可疑。对文件路径信息的了解还可以使检测那些试图通过将自己放在特定位置来逃避磁盘扫描的文件变得更加容易。文件路径的开销也很小，并且可以无缝集成到多视图静态ML检测器中，有可能在非常高的通量和最小的基础设施变化下产生更高的检测率。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种多视图深度神经网络体系结构，它将来自PE文件内容以及相应文件路径的特征向量作为输入，并输出检测分数。我们对一个商业规模的数据集进行了评估，该数据集包含大约1000万个样本文件和文件路径，这些样本文件和文件路径来自由实际安全供应商提供服务的用户终端。然后，我们通过LIME建模进行可解释性分析，以确保我们的分类器已经学会了合理的表示，并检查文件路径在不同情况下如何影响分类器得分的变化。我们发现，与只对PE文件内容进行操作的模型相比，我们的模型学习了用于分类的文件路径的有用方面，在0.001的假阳性率(FPR)下，真阳性率提高了26.6%，在0.0001的FPR下，真阳性率提高了64.6%。
papers.title_zh: 从上下文中学习:用于恶意软件检测的多视图深度学习架构

papers.title: Attributing and Detecting Fake Images Generated by Known GANs
papers.authors: Matthew Joslin, Shuang Hao
papers.abstract: The quality of GAN-generated fake images has improved significantly, and recent GAN approaches, such as StyleGAN, achieve near indistinguishability from real images for the naked eye. As a result, adversaries are attracted to using GAN-generated fake images for disinformation campaigns and fraud on social networks. However, training an image generation network to produce realistic-looking samples remains a time-consuming and difficult problem, so adversaries are more likely to use published GAN models to generate fake images. In this paper, we analyze the frequency domain to attribute and detect fake images generated by a known GAN model. We derive a similarity metric on the frequency domain and develop a new approach for GAN image attribution. We conduct experiments on four trained GAN models and two real image datasets. Our results show high attribution accuracy against real images and those from other GAN models. We further analyze our method under evasion attempts and find the frequency-based approach is comparatively robust. We derive a similarity metric on the frequency domain and develop a new approach for GAN image attribution. We conduct experiments on four trained GAN models and two real image datasets. Our results show high attribution accuracy against real images and those from other GAN models. We further analyze our method under evasion attempts and find the frequency-based approach is comparatively robust.
papers.abstract_zh: GAN生成的伪图像的质量已经显著提高，并且最近的GAN方法(例如StyleGAN)实现了肉眼几乎无法从真实图像中分辨出来。因此，对手被吸引到使用GAN生成的假图像进行虚假信息宣传和社交网络欺诈。然而，训练图像生成网络以产生逼真的样本仍然是一个耗时且困难的问题，因此对手更有可能使用已公布的g an模型来生成假图像。在本文中，我们分析了一个已知的GAN模型产生的伪图像的频域属性和检测。我们推导了一个频域上的相似性度量，并开发了一种新的GAN图像属性的方法。我们在四个训练好的GAN模型和两个真实图像数据集上进行了实验。我们的结果显示了对真实图像和来自其他GAN模型的图像的高属性准确性。我们进一步分析了我们的方法在规避企图下的表现，发现基于频率的方法是相对稳健的。在本文中，我们分析了一个已知的GAN模型产生的伪图像的频域属性和检测。我们推导了一个频域上的相似性度量，并开发了一种新的GAN图像属性的方法。我们在四个训练好的GAN模型和两个真实图像数据集上进行了实验。我们的结果显示了对真实图像和来自其他GAN模型的图像的高属性准确性。我们进一步分析了我们的方法在规避企图下的表现，发现基于频率的方法是相对稳健的。
papers.title_zh: 归因于并检测由已知GANs生成的虚假图像

papers.title: Adversarial Attacks Against LipNet: End-to-End Sentence Level Lipreading
papers.authors: Mahir Jethanandani, Derek Tang
papers.abstract: Visual adversarial attacks inspired by Carlini-Wagner targeted audiovisual attacks can fool the state-of-the-art Google DeepMind LipNet model to subtitle anything with over 99% similarity. We explore several methods of visual adversarial attacks, including the vanilla fast gradient sign method (FGSM), the $L_{\infty}$ iterative fast gradient sign method, and the $L_{2}$ modified Carlini-Wagner attacks. The feasibility of these attacks raise privacy and false information threats, as video transcriptions are used to recommend and inform people worldwide and on social media.
papers.abstract_zh: 受Carlini-Wagner启发的视觉对抗性攻击有针对性的视听攻击可以欺骗最先进的Google DeepMind LipNet模型，为任何相似度超过99%的内容添加字幕。我们探索了几种视觉对抗性攻击的方法，包括普通快速梯度符号方法(FGSM)、＄L _ { \ infty }＄迭代快速梯度符号方法和＄L _ { 2 }＄改进的Carlini-Wagner攻击。这些攻击的可行性增加了隐私和虚假信息威胁，因为视频转录被用于在社交媒体上向世界各地的人们推荐和通知。
papers.title_zh: 针对LipNet的对抗性攻击:端到端句子级唇读

papers.title: Detecting Cyber Threats in Non-English Hacker Forums: An Adversarial Cross-Lingual Knowledge Transfer Approach
papers.authors: Mohammadreza Ebrahimi, Sagar Samtani, Yidong Chai, Hsinchun Chen
papers.abstract: The regularity of devastating cyber-attacks has made cybersecurity a grand societal challenge. Many cybersecurity professionals are closely examining the international Dark Web to proactively pinpoint potential cyber threats. Despite its potential, the Dark Web contains hundreds of thousands of non-English posts. While machine translation is the prevailing approach to process non-English text, applying MT on hacker forum text results in mistranslations. In this study, we draw upon Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM), Cross-Lingual Knowledge Transfer (CLKT), and Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) principles to design a novel Adversarial CLKT (A-CLKT) approach. A-CLKT operates on untranslated text to retain the original semantics of the language and leverages the collective knowledge about cyber threats across languages to create a language invariant representation without any manual feature engineering or external resources. Three experiments demonstrate how A-CLKT outperforms state-of-the-art machine learning, deep learning, and CLKT algorithms in identifying cyber-threats in French and Russian forums.
papers.abstract_zh: 毁灭性网络攻击的频繁发生使网络安全成为一个巨大的社会挑战。许多网络安全专业人士正在密切研究国际暗网，以主动查明潜在的网络威胁。尽管有潜力，黑暗网络包含了成千上万的非英语帖子。虽然机器翻译是处理非英语文本的主流方法，但将机器翻译应用于黑客论坛文本会导致误译。在这项研究中，我们利用长短期记忆(LSTM)、跨语言知识转移(CLKT)和生成对立网络(GANs)的原则来设计一种新的对立CLKT (A-CLKT)方法。A-CLKT对未翻译的文本进行操作以保留语言的原始语义，并利用关于跨语言的网络威胁的集体知识来创建语言不变表示，而无需任何手动特征工程或外部资源。三个实验展示了A-CLKT如何在法国和俄罗斯论坛中识别网络威胁方面优于最先进的机器学习、深度学习和CLKT算法。
papers.title_zh: 检测非英语黑客论坛中的网络威胁:对抗性跨语言知识转移方法

papers.title: RTA3: A Real Time Adversarial Attack on Recurrent Neural Networks
papers.authors: Christopher R. Serrano, Pape M. Sylla, Sicun Gao, Michael A. Warren
papers.abstract: Recurrent neural networks are widely used in machine learning systems that process time series data including health monitoring, object tracking in video, and automatic speech recognition (ASR). While much work has been done demonstrating the vulnerability of deep neural networks to socalled adversarial perturbations, the majority of this work has focused on convolutional neural networks that process non-sequential data for tasks like image recognition. We propose that the unique memory and parameter sharing properties of recurrent neural networks make them susceptible to periodic adversarial perturbations that can exploit these unique features. In this paper, we demonstrate a general application of deep reinforcement learning to the generation of periodic adversarial perturbations in a black-box approach to attack recurrent neural networks processing sequential data. We successfully learn an attack policy to generate adversarial perturbations against the DeepSpeech ASR system and further demonstrate that this attack policy generalizes to a set of unseen examples in real time.
papers.abstract_zh: 递归神经网络广泛用于处理时间序列数据的机器学习系统，包括健康监控、视频中的对象跟踪和自动语音识别(ASR)。虽然已经做了很多工作来证明深度神经网络对于所谓的对抗性扰动的脆弱性，但是这些工作的大部分集中在卷积神经网络上，该卷积神经网络为图像识别等任务处理非顺序数据。我们提出，递归神经网络独特的记忆和参数共享特性使它们容易受到周期性敌对扰动的影响，这些扰动可以利用这些独特的特征。在本文中，我们演示了深度强化学习在黑盒方法中生成周期性对抗性扰动的一般应用，以攻击处理序列数据的递归神经网络。我们成功地学习了一种攻击策略来对DeepSpeech ASR系统产生对抗性扰动，并进一步证明了这种攻击策略可以实时地推广到一组看不见的例子。
papers.title_zh: RTA3:对递归神经网络的实时对抗性攻击

papers.title: Minimum-Norm Adversarial Examples on KNN and KNN based Models
papers.authors: Chawin Sitawarin, David A. Wagner
papers.abstract: We study the robustness against adversarial examples of kNN classifiers and classifiers that combine kNN with neural networks. The main difficulty lies in the fact that finding an optimal attack on kNN is intractable for typical datasets. In this work, we propose a gradient-based attack on kNN and kNN-based defenses, inspired by the previous work by Sitawarin & Wagner [1]. We demonstrate that our attack outperforms their method on all of the models we tested with only a minimal increase in the computation time. The attack also beats the state-of-the-art attack [2] on kNN when $k > 1$ using less than 1% of its running time. We hope that this attack can be used as a new baseline for evaluating the robustness of kNN and its variants.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究了kNN分类器和kNN与神经网络相结合的分类器对对立例子的鲁棒性。主要的困难在于，对于典型的数据集，在kNN上寻找最优攻击是很困难的。在这项工作中，我们提出了对kNN和基于kNN的防御的基于梯度的攻击，这是受Sitawarin & Wagner以前的工作[1]的启发。我们证明，在我们测试的所有模型上，我们的攻击优于他们的方法，而计算时间的增加很少。当$k > 1$使用不到1%的运行时间时，这种攻击也击败了kNN上最先进的攻击[2]。我们希望这种攻击可以用作评估kNN及其变体的鲁棒性的新基线。
papers.title_zh: 基于KNN和KNN模型的最小范数对立示例

papers.title: Backdooring and Poisoning Neural Networks with Image-Scaling Attacks
papers.authors: Erwin Quiring, Konrad Rieck
papers.abstract: Backdoors and poisoning attacks are a major threat to the security of machine-learning and vision systems. Often, however, these attacks leave visible artifacts in the images that can be visually detected and weaken the efficacy of the attacks. In this paper, we propose a novel strategy for hiding backdoor and poisoning attacks. Our approach builds on a recent class of attacks against image scaling. These attacks enable manipulating images such that they change their content when scaled to a specific resolution. By combining poisoning and image-scaling attacks, we can conceal the trigger of backdoors as well as hide the overlays of clean-label poisoning. Furthermore, we consider the detection of image-scaling attacks and derive an adaptive attack. In an empirical evaluation, we demonstrate the effectiveness of our strategy. First, we show that backdoors and poisoning work equally well when combined with image-scaling attacks. Second, we demonstrate that current detection defenses against image-scaling attacks are insufficient to uncover our manipulations. Overall, our work provides a novel means for hiding traces of manipulations, being applicable to different poisoning approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 后门和中毒攻击是机器学习和视觉系统安全的主要威胁。然而，这些攻击通常会在图像中留下可视的伪像，从而削弱攻击的效果。本文提出了一种新颖的隐藏后门和中毒攻击的策略。我们的方法建立在最近一类针对图像缩放的攻击之上。这些攻击能够操纵图像，使它们在缩放到特定分辨率时改变其内容。通过结合中毒和图像缩放攻击，我们可以隐藏后门的触发以及干净标签中毒的覆盖。此外，我们考虑了图像缩放攻击的检测，并提出了一种自适应攻击。在实证评估中，我们证明了我们的策略的有效性。首先，我们证明了当与图像缩放攻击结合时，后门和中毒同样有效。其次，我们证明了当前对图像缩放攻击的检测防御不足以揭露我们的操纵。总的来说，我们的工作提供了一种隐藏操作痕迹的新方法，适用于不同的中毒途径。
papers.title_zh: 利用图像缩放攻击后门和毒害神经网络

papers.title: SentiNet: Detecting Localized Universal Attacks Against Deep Learning Systems
papers.authors: Edward Chou, Florian Tramèr, Giancarlo Pellegrino
papers.abstract: SentiNet is a novel detection framework for localized universal attacks on neural networks. These attacks restrict adversarial noise to contiguous portions of an image and are reusable with different images-constraints that prove useful for generating physically-realizable attacks. Unlike most other works on adversarial detection, SentiNet does not require training a model or preknowledge of an attack prior to detection. Our approach is appealing due to the large number of possible mechanisms and attack-vectors that an attack-specific defense would have to consider. By leveraging the neural network's susceptibility to attacks and by using techniques from model interpretability and object detection as detection mechanisms, SentiNet turns a weakness of a model into a strength. We demonstrate the effectiveness of SentiNet on three different attacks-i.e., data poisoning attacks, trojaned networks, and adversarial patches (including physically realizable attacks)-and show that our defense is able to achieve very competitive performance metrics for all three threats. Finally, we show that SentiNet is robust against strong adaptive adversaries, who build adversarial patches that specifically target the components of SentiNet's architecture.
papers.abstract_zh: SentiNet是一种针对神经网络局部通用攻击的新型检测框架。这些攻击将敌对噪声限制在图像的连续部分，并可在不同的图像中重复使用——这些限制被证明对生成物理上可实现的攻击是有用的。与大多数其他关于敌对检测的工作不同，SentiNet在检测之前不需要训练模型或攻击的先验知识。我们的方法很有吸引力，因为针对特定攻击的防御必须考虑大量可能的机制和攻击媒介。通过利用神经网络对攻击的敏感性，并使用模型可解释性和对象检测技术作为检测机制，SentiNet将模型的弱点转化为优势。我们展示了SentiNet对三种不同攻击的有效性，即数据中毒攻击、特洛伊木马网络和对抗性补丁(包括物理可实现的攻击)，并展示了我们的防御能够针对所有三种威胁实现极具竞争力的性能指标。最后，我们表明SentiNet在强大的适应性对手面前是健壮的，这些对手构建了专门针对SentiNet架构组件的对抗性补丁。
papers.title_zh: SentiNet:检测针对深度学习系统的本地化通用攻击

papers.title: Clipped BagNet: Defending Against Sticker Attacks with Clipped Bag-of-features
papers.authors: Zhanyuan Zhang, Benson Yuan, Michael McCoyd, David A. Wagner
papers.abstract: Many works have demonstrated that neural networks are vulnerable to adversarial examples. We examine the adversarial sticker attack, where the attacker places a sticker somewhere on an image to induce it to be misclassified. We take a first step towards defending against such attacks using clipped BagNet, which bounds the influence that any limited-size sticker can have on the final classification. We evaluate our scheme on ImageNet and show that it provides strong security against targeted PGD attacks and gradient-free attacks, and yields certified security for a 95% of images against a targeted 20 × 20 pixel attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多工作表明，神经网络容易受到对立的例子。我们研究了对抗性贴纸攻击，攻击者在图像上的某个地方放置一个贴纸，以诱导它被错误分类。我们采取了第一步，使用剪贴的BagNet来抵御这种攻击，这限制了任何有限大小的贴纸对最终分类的影响。我们在ImageNet上对我们的方案进行了评估，结果表明，它提供了很强的安全性来抵抗有针对性的PGD攻击和无梯度攻击，并且对95%的图像产生了有针对性的20 × 20像素攻击的认证安全性。
papers.title_zh: 剪贴袋网:用剪贴袋特征抵御标签攻击

papers.title: On the Robustness of Cooperative Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning
papers.authors: Jieyu Lin, Kristina Dzeparoska, Sai Qian Zhang, Alberto Leon-Garcia, Nicolas Papernot
papers.abstract: In cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning (c-MARL), agents learn to cooperatively take actions as a team to maximize a total team reward. We analyze the robustness of c-MARL to adversaries capable of attacking one of the agents on a team. Through the ability to manipulate this agent's observations, the adversary seeks to decrease the total team reward. Attacking c-MARL is challenging for three reasons: first, it is difficult to estimate team rewards or how they are impacted by an agent mispredicting; second, models are non-differentiable; and third, the feature space is low-dimensional. Thus, we introduce a novel attack. The attacker first trains a policy network with reinforcement learning to find a wrong action it should encourage the victim agent to take. Then, the adversary uses targeted adversarial examples to force the victim to take this action. Our results on the StartCraft II multi-agent benchmark demonstrate that c-MARL teams are highly vulnerable to perturbations applied to one of their agent's observations. By attacking a single agent, our attack method has highly negative impact on the overall team reward, reducing it from 20 to 9.4. This results in the team's winning rate to go down from 98.9% to 0%.
papers.abstract_zh: 在协作多智能体强化学习(c-MARL)中，智能体学习作为一个团队协作采取行动，以最大化团队总回报。我们分析了c-MARL对于能够攻击团队中某个代理的对手的鲁棒性。通过操纵这个代理人的观察，对手试图减少总的团队奖励。攻击c-MARL具有挑战性，原因有三:首先，很难估计团队的回报，或者他们如何受到代理人错误预测的影响；第二，模型是不可微的；第三，特征空间是低维的。因此，我们引入一种新的攻击。攻击者首先用强化学习训练一个策略网络，以找到它应该鼓励受害代理采取的错误动作。然后，对手使用有针对性的对抗性例子来迫使受害者采取这一行动。我们在StartCraft II多代理基准测试上的结果表明，c-MARL团队非常容易受到应用于他们的代理之一的观察的干扰。通过攻击单个代理，我们的攻击方法对整体团队奖励有高度负面影响，从20降低到9.4。这导致团队的胜率从98.9%下降到0%。
papers.title_zh: 合作多智能体强化学习的鲁棒性研究

papers.title: Adversarial Machine Learning-Industry Perspectives
papers.authors: Ram Shankar Siva Kumar, Magnus Nyström, John Lambert, Andrew Marshall, Mario Goertzel, Andi Comissoneru, Matt Swann, Sharon Xia
papers.abstract: Based on interviews with 28 organizations, we found that industry practitioners are not equipped with tactical and strategic tools to protect, detect and respond to attacks on their Machine Learning (ML) systems. We leverage the insights from the interviews and we enumerate the gaps in perspective in securing machine learning systems when viewed in the context of traditional software security development. We write this paper from the perspective of two personas: developers/ML engineers and security incident responders who are tasked with securing ML systems as they are designed, developed and deployed ML systems. The goal of this paper is to engage researchers to revise and amend the Security Development Lifecycle for industrial-grade software in the adversarial ML era.
papers.abstract_zh: 根据对28家组织的采访，我们发现行业从业者没有配备战术和战略工具来保护、检测和响应对其机器学习(ML)系统的攻击。我们利用采访中的见解，列举了在传统软件安全开发的背景下保护机器学习系统的差距。我们从两个角色的角度撰写本文:开发人员/ML工程师和安全事故响应人员，他们的任务是在设计、开发和部署ML系统时保护ML系统。本文的目标是让研究人员在竞争激烈的ML时代修订和修正工业级软件的安全开发生命周期。
papers.title_zh: 对抗性机器学习-行业前景

papers.title: A Case Study of the Security Vetting Process of Smart-home Assistant Applications
papers.authors: Hang Hu, Limin Yang, Shihan Lin, Gang Wang
papers.abstract: The popularity of smart-home assistant systems such as Amazon Alexa and Google Home leads to a booming third-party application market (over 70,000 applications across the two stores). While existing works have revealed security issues in these systems, it is not well understood how to help application developers to enforce security requirements. In this paper, we perform a preliminary case study to examine the security vetting mechanisms adopted by Amazon Alexa and Google Home app stores. With a focus on the authentication mechanisms between Alexa/Google cloud and third-party application servers (i.e. endpoints), we show the current security vetting is insufficient as developers' mistakes cannot be effectively detected and notified. A weak authentication would allow attackers to spoof the cloud to insert/retrieve data into/from the application endpoints. We validate the attack through ethical proof-of-concept experiments. To confirm vulnerable applications have indeed passed the security vetting and entered the markets, we develop a heuristic-based searching method. We find 219 real-world Alexa endpoints that carry the vulnerability, many of which are related to critical applications that control smart home devices and electronic cars. We have notified Amazon and Google about our findings and offered our suggestions to mitigate the issue.
papers.abstract_zh: 亚马逊Alexa和谷歌home等智能家居助理系统的流行导致第三方应用市场蓬勃发展(两家商店有超过70，000个应用)。虽然现有的工作已经揭示了这些系统中的安全问题，但是还没有很好地理解如何帮助应用程序开发者实施安全需求。在本文中，我们进行了初步的案例研究，以检查亚马逊Alexa和谷歌Home应用商店采用的安全审查机制。通过关注Alexa/Google云和第三方应用服务器(即端点)之间的认证机制，我们发现当前的安全审查是不够的，因为开发人员的错误不能被有效地检测和通知。弱身份验证将允许攻击者欺骗云向/从应用程序端点插入/检索数据。我们通过伦理概念验证实验来验证攻击。为了确认易受攻击的应用程序确实通过了安全审查并进入市场，我们开发了一种基于启发式的搜索方法。我们发现了219个携带该漏洞的真实世界Alexa端点，其中许多都与控制智能家居设备和电子汽车的关键应用程序有关。我们已经将我们的发现通知了亚马逊和谷歌，并提出了缓解问题的建议。
papers.title_zh: 智能家居助手应用安全审查流程案例研究

papers.title: Privacy-preserving Continuous Tumour Relapse Monitoring Using In-body Radio Signals
papers.authors: Sam Hylamia, Wenqing Yan, André Teixeira, Noor Badariah Asan, Mauricio D. Perez, Robin Augustine, Thiemo Voigt
papers.abstract: Early detection and treatment of cancerous tumours significantly improve the lives of cancer patients, as well as increase their chance of surviving and reduce treatment cost. A novel study has utilised the human adipose (fat) tissue as a propagation channel for radio frequency communication within the human body. A notable application of this technology is the continuous monitoring of the growth of perturbants, such as tumours, in the channel. This paper addresses the privacy issues associated with the deployment of this monitoring technology. Our work departs from previous studies in that we consider the privacy of the sensing process itself, rather than the privacy of sensed data. We study the information leakage associated with the deployment of this technology and propose and evaluate a set of privacy-enhancing techniques that reduces information leakage. Finally, we propose and evaluate an approach that combines these techniques and, thereby, protects patient's privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 癌性肿瘤的早期检测和治疗显著改善了癌症患者的生活，并增加了他们的存活机会和降低了治疗成本。一项新的研究利用人类脂肪组织作为人体内射频通信的传播通道。这种技术的一个显著应用是连续监测通道中诸如肿瘤等干扰物的生长。本文旨在解决与部署这种监控技术相关的隐私问题。我们的工作不同于以往的研究，因为我们考虑的是感知过程本身的隐私，而不是感知数据的隐私。我们研究了与这项技术的部署相关的信息泄漏，并提出和评估了一套减少信息泄漏的隐私增强技术。最后，我们提出并评估了一种结合这些技术的方法，从而保护患者的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 使用体内无线电信号的隐私保护连续肿瘤复发监测

papers.title: On the Feasibility of Acoustic Attacks Using Commodity Smart Devices
papers.authors: Matt Wixey, Emiliano De Cristofaro, Shane D. Johnson
papers.abstract: Sound at frequencies above (ultrasonic) or below (infrasonic) the range of human hearing can, in some settings, cause adverse physiological and psychological effects to individuals. We investigate the feasibility of cyber-attacks that could make smart consumer devices produce possibly imperceptible sound at both high (17-21kHz) and low (60-100Hz) frequencies, at the maximum available volume setting, potentially turning them into acoustic cyber-weapons. To do so, we deploy attacks targeting different smart devices and take sound measurements in an anechoic chamber. For comparison, we also test possible attacks on traditional devices. Overall, we find that some of the devices tested are capable of reproducing frequencies within both high and low ranges, at levels exceeding those recommended in published guidelines. Generally speaking, such attacks are often trivial to develop and in many cases could be added to existing malware payloads, as they may be attractive to adversaries with specific motivations or targets. Finally, we suggest a number of countermeasures for detection and prevention.
papers.abstract_zh: 在某些情况下，频率高于(超声波)或低于(次声)人类听觉范围的声音会对个体造成不利的生理和心理影响。我们调查了网络攻击的可行性，这种攻击可以使智能消费设备在最大可用音量设置下，在高频(17-21kHz)和低频(60-100Hz)下产生可能难以察觉的声音，有可能将它们变成声学网络武器。为此，我们部署了针对不同智能设备的攻击，并在消声室中进行声音测量。为了进行比较，我们还测试了对传统设备可能的攻击。总的来说，我们发现一些被测试的设备能够在高和低范围内再现频率，其水平超过了公布的指南中推荐的水平。一般而言，这种攻击通常开发起来微不足道，并且在许多情况下可以添加到现有的恶意软件有效载荷中，因为它们可能对具有特定动机或目标的对手有吸引力。最后，我们提出了一些检测和预防对策。
papers.title_zh: 利用商用智能设备进行声波攻击的可行性

papers.title: Electromagnetic Sensor and Actuator Attacks on Power Converters for Electric Vehicles
papers.authors: Gökçen Yilmaz Dayanikli, Rees R. Hatch, Ryan M. Gerdes, Hongjie Wang, Regan Zane
papers.abstract: Alleviating range anxiety for electric vehicles (i.e., whether such vehicles can be relied upon to travel long distances in a timely manner) is critical for sustainable transportation. Extremely fast charging (XFC), whereby electric vehicles (EV) can be quickly recharged in the time frame it takes to refuel an internal combustion engine, has been proposed to alleviate this concern. A critical component of these chargers is the efficient and proper operation of power converters that convert AC to DC power and otherwise regulate power delivery to vehicles. These converters rely on the integrity of sensor and actuation signals. In this work the operation of state-of-the art XFC converters is assessed in adversarial conditions, specifically against Intentional Electromagnetic Interference Attacks (IEMI). The targeted system is analyzed with the goal of determining possible weak points for IEMI, viz. voltage and current sensor outputs and gate control signals. This work demonstrates that, with relatively low power levels, an adversary is able to manipulate the voltage and current sensor outputs necessary to ensure the proper operation of the converters. Furthermore, in the first attack of its kind, it is shown that the gate signal that controls the converter switches can be manipulated, to catastrophic effect; i.e., it is possible for an attacker to control the switching state of individual transistors to cause irreparable damage to the converter and associated systems. Finally, a discussion of countermeasures for hardware designers to mitigate IEMI-based attacks is provided.
papers.abstract_zh: 缓解电动汽车的里程焦虑(即，是否可以依靠这种汽车及时行驶长距离)对于可持续交通至关重要。极快速充电(XFC)，即电动汽车(EV)可以在给内燃机加油的时间内快速充电，已经被提出来缓解这种担忧。这些充电器的一个重要组成部分是将交流电转换为DC电能并调节车辆电能传输的电源转换器的有效和正确运行。这些转换器依赖于传感器和驱动信号的完整性。在这项工作中，最先进的XFC转换器的操作是在恶劣的条件下进行评估的，特别是针对故意电磁干扰攻击(IEMI)。分析目标系统的目的是确定IEMI的可能弱点，即电压和电流传感器输出以及门控制信号。这项工作表明，在相对较低的功率水平下，对手能够操纵确保转换器正常工作所需的电压和电流传感器输出。此外，在第一次此类攻击中，表明控制转换器开关的栅极信号可以被操纵，从而产生灾难性的影响；即攻击者有可能控制单个晶体管的开关状态，从而对转换器和相关系统造成不可修复的损害。最后，讨论了硬件设计者减轻基于IEMI的攻击的对策。
papers.title_zh: 电磁传感器和致动器对电动车辆的功率转换器的攻击

papers.title: Never Ending Story: Authentication and Access Control Design Flaws in Shared IoT Devices
papers.authors: Blake Janes, Heather Crawford, T. J. OConnor
papers.abstract: Internet-of-Things (IoT) devices implement weak authentication and access control schemes. The on-demand nature of IoT devices requires a responsive communications channel, which is often at odds with thorough authentication and access control. This paper seeks to better understand IoT device security by examining the design of authentication and access control schemes. In this work, we explore the challenge of propagating credential revocation and access control list modifications in a shared IoT ecosystem. We evaluate the vulnerability of 19 popular security cameras and doorbells against a straightforward user-interface bound adversary attack. Our results demonstrate that 16 of 19 surveyed devices suffer from flaws that enable unauthorized access after credential modification or revocation. We conclude by discussing these findings and propose a means for balancing authentication and access control schemes while still offering responsive communications channels.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)设备实施弱认证和访问控制方案。物联网设备的按需特性需要一个响应迅速的通信渠道，这通常与全面的身份认证和访问控制相矛盾。本文旨在通过研究身份验证和访问控制方案的设计，更好地了解物联网设备的安全性。在这项工作中，我们探索了在共享物联网生态系统中传播凭证撤销和访问控制列表修改的挑战。我们评估了19个流行的安全摄像头和门铃在面对直接的用户界面绑定对手攻击时的脆弱性。我们的结果表明，19个被调查的设备中有16个存在缺陷，在凭证修改或撤销后会导致未经授权的访问。最后，我们讨论了这些发现，并提出了一种平衡认证和访问控制方案的方法，同时还提供了响应的通信通道。
papers.title_zh: 永无止境的故事:共享物联网设备中的认证和访问控制设计缺陷

papers.title: On Using Camera-based Visible Light Communication for Security Protocols
papers.authors: Wen-Yi Chu, Ting-Guang Yu, Yu-Kai Lin, Shao-Chuan Lee, Hsu-Chun Hsiao
papers.abstract: In security protocol design, Visible Light Communication (VLC) has often been abstracted as an ideal channel that is resilient to eavesdropping, manipulation, and jamming. Camera Communication (CamCom), a subcategory of VLC, further strengthens the level of security by providing a visually verifiable association between the transmitter and the extracted information. However, the ideal security guarantees of visible light channels may not hold in practice due to limitations and tradeoffs introduced by hardware, software, configuration, environment, etc. This paper presents our experience and lessons learned from implementing CamCom for security protocols. We highlight CamCom's security-enhancing properties and security applications that it enables. Backed by real implementation and experiments, we also systematize the practical considerations of CamCom-based security protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 在安全协议设计中，可见光通信(VLC)通常被抽象为一种理想的信道，能够抵御窃听、操纵和干扰。摄像机通信(CamCom)是VLC的一个子类别，它通过在发送器和提取的信息之间提供视觉上可验证的关联，进一步加强了安全级别。然而，由于硬件、软件、配置、环境等引入的限制和折衷，可见光通道的理想安全保证在实践中可能不成立。本文介绍了我们实施CamCom安全协议的经验和教训。我们重点介绍CamCom的安全增强特性和安全应用。通过真实的实现和实验，我们还将基于CamCom的安全协议的实际考虑系统化。
papers.title_zh: 基于摄像机的可见光通信在安全协议中的应用

papers.title: Security Analysis of Networked 3D Printers
papers.authors: Matthew McCormack, Sanjay Chandrasekaran, Guyue Liu, Tianlong Yu, Sandra DeVincent Wolf, Vyas Sekar
papers.abstract: Networked 3D printers are an emerging trend in manufacturing. However, many have poor security controls, allowing attackers to cause physical hazards, create defective safety-critical parts, steal proprietary data, and halt costly operations. Prior work has given limited attention to identifying if a network attacker is able to achieve these goals. In this work, we present C3PO, an open-source network security analysis tool that systematically identifies security threats to networked 3D printers. C3PO's design is guided by industry standards and best practices, identifying potential vulnerabilities in data transfer, the printing application, availability, and exposed network services. Furthermore, C3PO analyzes how a network deployment impacts a 3D printer's security, such as an attacker compromising an IoT camera in order to send malicious commands to a networked 3D printer. We use C3PO to analyze 13 networked 3D printers and 5 real-world manufacturing network deployments. We identified 8 types of network security vulnerabilities such as a susceptibility to low-rate denial of service attacks, the transmission of unencrypted data, and publicly accessible network deployments.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络化3D打印机是制造业的新兴趋势。然而，许多公司的安全控制能力很差，使得攻击者能够造成物理危害，制造有缺陷的安全关键部件，窃取专有数据，并停止代价高昂的运营。先前的工作对识别网络攻击者是否能够实现这些目标给予了有限的关注。在这项工作中，我们介绍了C3PO，这是一种开源网络安全分析工具，可以系统地识别联网3D打印机的安全威胁。C3PO的设计遵循行业标准和最佳实践，识别数据传输、打印应用程序、可用性和公开的网络服务中的潜在漏洞。此外，C3PO还分析了网络部署如何影响3D打印机的安全性，例如攻击者为了向联网的3D打印机发送恶意命令而破坏物联网摄像头。我们使用C3PO分析了13台联网的3D打印机和5个现实世界的制造网络部署。我们确定了8种类型的网络安全漏洞，如易受低速率拒绝服务攻击、传输未加密数据和可公开访问的网络部署。
papers.title_zh: 网络化3D打印机的安全性分析

papers.title: ELF Analyzer Demo: Online Identification for IoT Malwares with Multiple Hardware Architectures
papers.authors: Shin-Ming Cheng, Tao Ban, Jr-Wei Huang, Bing-Kai Hong, Daisuke Inoue
papers.abstract: This demonstration presents an automatic IoT runtime platform with a web interface, ELF Analyzer, where suspicious ELF files uploaded by users could be executed and dynamically analyzed for malicious behavior identification. The key component of our platform is a crafted IoT sandbox, where multiple hardware architectures are emulated using QEMU. With the introduction of strace functionality, we demonstrate that system call and traffic logs of an uploaded ELF file with different hardware architectures can be generated successfully. After proper analysis, malicious ELF files can be identified.
papers.abstract_zh: 该演示展示了一个具有web界面的自动物联网运行时平台ELF Analyzer，用户上传的可疑ELF文件可以在该平台上执行并动态分析，以识别恶意行为。我们平台的关键组件是一个精心制作的物联网沙箱，其中使用QEMU模拟了多种硬件架构。随着strace功能的引入，我们证明了可以成功地生成具有不同硬件架构的上传ELF文件的系统调用和流量日志。经过适当的分析，可以识别恶意的ELF文件。
papers.title_zh: ELF分析仪演示:在线识别具有多种硬件架构的物联网恶意软件

papers.title: Poster: Radiometric Signatures for Wireless Device Identification over Dynamic Channels
papers.authors: Wenqing Yan, Thiemo Voigt, Christian Rohner
papers.abstract: Radiometric signatures have been shown effective in identifying wireless devices based on imperfections in their electronics, also known as fingerprinting. Previous work mainly considered static channel conditions. In this work, we experimentally study the impact of movement and dynamic channel conditions on the radiometric signatures. We demonstrate the feasibility of fingerprinting when channels are dynamic.
papers.abstract_zh: 辐射特征已被证明能有效地根据电子设备的缺陷识别无线设备，也称为指纹识别。以前的工作主要考虑静态信道条件。在这项工作中，我们通过实验研究了运动和动态信道条件对辐射特征的影响。我们证明了当信道是动态的时指纹的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 海报:动态信道上无线设备识别的辐射特征

papers.title: Assessment of Cyber Security Implications of New Technology Integrations into Military Supply Chains
papers.authors: Theresa May Sobb, Benjamin P. Turnbull
papers.abstract: Military supply chains play a critical role in the acquisition and movement of goods for defence purposes. The disruption of these supply chain processes can have potentially devastating affects to the operational capability of military forces. The introduction and integration of new technologies into defence supply chains can serve to increase their effectiveness. However, the benefits posed by these technologies may be outweighed by significant consequences to the cyber security of the entire defence supply chain. Supply chains are complex Systems of Systems, and the introduction of an insecure technology into such a complex ecosystem may induce cascading system-wide failure, and have catastrophic consequences to military mission assurance. Subsequently, there is a need for an evaluative process to determine the extent to which a new technology will affect the cyber security of military supply chains. This work proposes a new model, the Military Supply Chain Cyber Implications Model (M-SCCIM), that serves to aid military decision makers in understanding the potential cyber security impact of introducing new technologies to supply chains. M-SCCIM is a multiphase model that enables understanding of cyber security and supply chain implications through the lenses of theoretical examinations, pilot applications and system wide implementations.
papers.abstract_zh: 军事供应链在国防物资的采购和运输中发挥着关键作用。这些供应链流程的中断可能会对军队的作战能力产生潜在的破坏性影响。将新技术引入和融入国防供应链有助于提高其有效性。然而，这些技术带来的好处可能会被整个国防供应链的网络安全带来的重大后果所抵消。供应链是复杂的系统的系统，在这样一个复杂的生态系统中引入不安全的技术可能会导致系统范围内的连锁故障，并对军事任务保障产生灾难性的后果。随后，需要一个评估过程来确定新技术将在多大程度上影响军事供应链的网络安全。这项工作提出了一个新的模型，军事供应链网络影响模型(M-SCCIM)，用于帮助军事决策者了解将新技术引入供应链的潜在网络安全影响。M-SCCIM是一个多阶段模型，通过理论考试、试点应用和系统范围的实施来理解网络安全和供应链的影响。
papers.title_zh: 军事供应链新技术集成的网络安全影响评估

papers.title: Toward a Trustable, Self-Hosting Computer System
papers.authors: Gabriel L. Somlo
papers.abstract: Due to the extremely rapid growth of the computing and IT technology market, commercial hardware made for the civilian, consumer sector is increasingly (and inevitably) deployed in security-sensitive environments. With the growing threat of hardware Trojans and backdoors, an adversary could perpetrate a full system compromise, or privilege escalation attack, even if the software is presumed to be perfectly secure. We propose a method of field stripping a computer system by empirically proving an equivalence between the trustability of the fielded system on one hand, and its comprehensive set of sources (including those of all toolchains used in its construction) on the other. In the long run, we hope to facilitate comprehensive verification and validation of fielded computer systems from fully self-contained hard-ware+software sources, as a way of mitigating against the lack of control over (and visibility into) the hardware supply chain.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于计算和IT技术市场的快速增长，为民用、消费领域制造的商用硬件越来越多地(并且不可避免地)部署在安全敏感的环境中。随着硬件特洛伊木马和后门的威胁不断增加，即使软件被认为是完全安全的，对手也可能实施整个系统的危害或权限提升攻击。我们提出了一种对计算机系统进行现场剥离的方法，一方面通过经验证明现场系统的可信任度，另一方面证明其综合资源集(包括在其构造中使用的所有工具链的资源集)之间的等价性。从长远来看，我们希望通过完全独立的硬件+软件来源，促进对现场计算机系统的全面验证和确认，作为一种缓解对硬件供应链缺乏控制(和可见性)的方式。
papers.title_zh: 走向可信的、自托管的计算机系统

papers.title: EM Fingerprints: Towards Identifying Unauthorized Hardware Substitutions in the Supply Chain Jungle
papers.authors: Constantinos Kolias, Daniel Barbará, Craig Rieger, Jacob Ulrich
papers.abstract: This paper proposes a system capable of branding digital device components based on the EM signals typically emitted during their normal operational cycles. Such signals contain digital artifacts that are unique, which may act as an identifier of a particular device component e.g., its CPU, or the entire device if one chooses to take into account a combination of multiple such components. In real-life scenarios, this “bio-metrical” fingerprinting of hardware has to be conducted only once, possibly as part of an initial device configuration process with minimum additional maintenance time and cost, by the network administrators. At a subsequent stage, devices can get “authenticated” by comparing their newly emitted signals against the preexisting database during routine checks. The experimental results attest that the proposed approach can effectively protect a network against unrecognized potentially rogue devices posing as benign or malicious substitutions of hardware components at the chip level with near-perfect accuracy. One may view the proposed system as a technical solution to verify the trustworthiness of digital parts as well as the actors involved in certain stages of the supply chain.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一种系统，该系统能够根据数字设备正常工作周期中通常发出的电磁信号来标记数字设备组件。这种信号包含独特的数字伪像，其可以充当特定设备组件(例如，其CPU)的标识符，或者如果选择考虑多个这种组件的组合，则充当整个设备的标识符。在现实生活中，这种硬件的“生物计量”指纹识别只需进行一次，可能作为初始设备配置过程的一部分，由网络管理员以最少的额外维护时间和成本进行。在随后的阶段，设备可以通过在例行检查期间将新发射的信号与预先存在的数据库进行比较来获得“认证”。实验结果证明，所提出的方法可以有效地保护网络免受未经识别的潜在流氓设备的攻击，这些设备冒充芯片级硬件组件的良性或恶意替代，具有近乎完美的准确性。人们可以将所提出的系统视为一种技术解决方案，以验证数字部件以及供应链某些阶段所涉及的参与者的可信度。
papers.title_zh: EM指纹:识别供应链丛林中未经授权的硬件替代品

papers.title: Binary Analysis with Architecture and Code Section Detection using Supervised Machine Learning
papers.authors: Bryan Beckman, Jed Haile
papers.abstract: When presented with an unknown binary, which may or may not be complete, having the ability to determine information about it is critical to future reverse engineering, particularly in discovering the binary's intended use and potential malicious nature. This paper details techniques to both identify the machine architecture of the binary, as well as to locate the important code segments within the file. This identification of unknown binaries makes use of a technique called byte histogram in addition to various machine learning (ML) techniques, which we call “What is it Binary” or WiiBin. Benefits of byte histograms reflect the simplicity of calculation and do not rely on file headers or metadata, allowing for acceptable results when only a small portion of the original file is available; e.g., when encrypted and/or compressed sections are present in a binary. Utilizing WiiBin, we were able to accurately (>80%) determine the architecture of test binaries with as little as a 20% contagious portion of the file present. We were also able to determine the location of code sections within a binary by utilizing the WiiBin framework. Ultimately, the more information that can be gleaned from a binary file, the easier it is to successfully reverse engineer.
papers.abstract_zh: 当面对未知的二进制文件(可能是完整的，也可能是不完整的)时，能够确定关于它的信息对于未来的逆向工程是至关重要的，特别是在发现二进制文件的预期用途和潜在的恶意性质方面。本文详细介绍了识别二进制文件的机器架构以及定位文件中重要代码段的技术。除了各种机器学习(ML)技术之外，这种未知二进制文件的识别还利用了一种称为字节直方图的技术，我们称之为“这是什么二进制文件”或WiiBin。字节直方图的优点反映了计算的简单性，并且不依赖于文件头或元数据，当只有原始文件的一小部分可用时，允许可接受的结果；例如，当加密和/或压缩的部分存在于二进制文件中时。利用WiiBin，我们能够准确地(> 80%)确定测试二进制文件的架构，只需文件中存在20%的传染部分。通过利用WiiBin框架，我们还能够确定二进制文件中代码段的位置。最终，从二进制文件中收集的信息越多，逆向工程就越容易成功。
papers.title_zh: 使用监督机器学习的具有架构和代码段检测的二进制分析

papers.title: Identifying Ubiquitious Third-Party Libraries in Compiled Executables Using Annotated and Translated Disassembled Code with Supervised Machine Learning
papers.authors: Jedediah Haile, Sage Havens
papers.abstract: The size and complexity of the software ecosystem is a major challenge for vendors, asset owners and cybersecurity professionals who need to understand the security posture of these systems. Annotated and Translated Disassembled Code is a graph based datastore designed to organize firmware and software analysis data across builds, packages and systems, providing a highly scalable platform enabling automated binary software analysis tasks including corpora construction and storage for machine learning. This paper describes an approach for the identification of ubiquitous third-party libraries in firmware and software using Annotated and Translated Disassembled Code and supervised machine learning. Annotated and Translated Disassembled Code provide matched libraries, function names and addresses of previously unidentified code in software as it is being automatically analyzed. This data can be ingested by other software analysis tools to improve accuracy and save time. Defenders can add the identified libraries to their vulnerability searches and add effective detection and mitigation into their operating environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件生态系统的规模和复杂性对于需要了解这些系统安全状况的供应商、资产所有者和网络安全专业人员来说是一个重大挑战。经过注释和翻译的反汇编代码是一种基于图形的数据存储，旨在跨版本、软件包和系统组织固件和软件分析数据，提供高度可扩展的平台，实现自动化二进制软件分析任务，包括用于机器学习的语料库构建和存储。本文描述了一种使用注释和翻译的反汇编代码以及监督机器学习来识别固件和软件中普遍存在的第三方库的方法。当被自动分析时，注释和翻译的反汇编代码提供了匹配的库、函数名和软件中先前未识别代码的地址。其他软件分析工具可以获取这些数据，以提高准确性并节省时间。防御者可以将识别出的库添加到他们的漏洞搜索中，并将有效的检测和缓解添加到他们的操作环境中。
papers.title_zh: 使用带监督机器学习的注释和翻译反汇编代码识别编译的可执行文件中无处不在的第三方库

papers.title: Modeling and Assessment of IoT Supply Chain Security Risks: The Role of Structural and Parametric Uncertainties
papers.authors: Timothy Kieras, Muhammad Junaid Farooq, Quanyan Zhu
papers.abstract: Supply chain security threats pose new challenges to security risk modeling techniques for complex ICT systems such as the IoT. With established techniques drawn from attack trees and reliability analysis providing needed points of reference, graph-based analysis can provide a framework for considering the role of suppliers in such systems. We present such a framework here while highlighting the need for a component-centered model. Given resource limitations when applying this model to existing systems, we study various classes of uncertainties in model development, including structural uncertainties and uncertainties in the magnitude of estimated event probabilities. Using case studies, we find that structural uncertainties constitute a greater challenge to model utility and as such should receive particular attention. Best practices in the face of these uncertainties are proposed.
papers.abstract_zh: 供应链安全威胁对物联网等复杂ICT系统的安全风险建模技术提出了新的挑战。利用从攻击树和可靠性分析中提取的既定技术提供所需的参考点，基于图的分析可以提供一个框架来考虑供应商在这种系统中的作用。我们在这里提出了这样一个框架，同时强调了对以组件为中心的模型的需求。鉴于将该模型应用于现有系统时的资源限制，我们研究了模型开发中的各种不确定性，包括结构不确定性和估计事件概率大小的不确定性。通过案例研究，我们发现结构不确定性对模型效用构成了更大的挑战，因此应该得到特别关注。提出了面对这些不确定性的最佳实践。
papers.title_zh: 物联网供应链安全风险的建模和评估:结构和参数不确定性的作用

papers.title: On-Chip Randomization for Memory Protection Against Hardware Supply Chain Attacks to DRAM
papers.authors: Brett Meadows, Nathan Edwards, Sang-Yoon Chang
papers.abstract: Dynamic Random Access Memory (DRAM) is widely used for data storage and, when a computer system is in operation, the DRAM can contain sensitive information such as passwords and cryptographic keys. Therefore, the DRAM is a prime target for hardware-based cryptanalytic attacks. These attacks can be performed in the supply chain to capture default key mechanisms enabling a later cyber attack or predisposition the system to remote effects. Two prominent attack classes against memory are the Cold Boot attack which recovers the data from the DRAM even after a supposed power-down and Rowhammer attack which violates memory integrity by influencing the stored bits to flip. In this paper, we propose an on-chip technique that obfuscates the memory addresses and data and provides a fast detect-response to defend against these hardware-based security attacks on DRAM. We advance the prior hardware security research by making two contributions. First, the key material is detected and erased before the Cold Boot attacker can extract the memory data. Second, our solution is on-chip and does not require nor depend on additional hardware or software which are open to additional supply chain attack vectors. We analyze the efficacy of our scheme through circuit simulation and compare the results to the previous mitigation approaches based on DRAM write operations. Our simulation and analysis results show that purging key information used for address and data randomization can be achieved much faster and with lower power than with typical DRAM write techniques used for sanitizing memory content. We demonstrate through circuit simulation of the key register design a technique that clears key information within 2.4ns which is faster by more than two orders magnitude compared to typical DRAM write operations for 180nm technology, and with a power consumption of 0.15 picoWatts.
papers.abstract_zh: 动态随机存取存储器(DRAM)广泛用于数据存储，并且当计算机系统运行时，DRAM可以包含诸如密码和密钥之类的敏感信息。因此，DRAM是基于硬件的密码分析攻击的主要目标。这些攻击可以在供应链中执行，以捕获默认的关键机制，从而实现以后的网络攻击或使系统易受远程影响。针对存储器的两种主要攻击类型是冷启动攻击和行锤攻击，冷启动攻击即使在假定的断电之后也能从DRAM恢复数据，行锤攻击通过影响存储的位翻转来破坏存储器完整性。在本文中，我们提出了一种片上技术，该技术混淆存储器地址和数据，并提供快速检测响应来防御这些基于硬件的对DRAM的安全攻击。我们通过两个贡献推进了先前的硬件安全性研究。首先，在冷启动攻击者能够提取存储器数据之前，检测并擦除密钥材料。第二，我们的解决方案是片上的，不需要也不依赖于额外的硬件或软件，这些硬件或软件容易受到额外的供应链攻击。我们通过电路仿真分析了我们的方案的有效性，并将结果与先前基于DRAM写操作的缓解方法进行了比较。我们的模拟和分析结果表明，与用于净化存储器内容的典型DRAM写入技术相比，清除用于地址和数据随机化的关键信息可以实现得更快，并且功耗更低。我们通过密钥寄存器设计的电路模拟演示了一种在2.4ns内清除密钥信息的技术，与180nm技术的典型DRAM写操作相比，该技术快了两个数量级以上，并且功耗为0.15皮瓦。
papers.title_zh: 针对针对DRAM的硬件供应链攻击的存储器保护的片上随机化

papers.title: Using Taint Analysis and Reinforcement Learning (TARL) to Repair Autonomous Robot Software
papers.authors: Damian M. Lyons, Saba B. Zahra
papers.abstract: It is important to be able to establish formal performance bounds for autonomous systems. However, formal verification techniques require a model of the environment in which the system operates; a challenge for autonomous systems, especially those expected to operate over longer timescales. This paper describes work in progress to automate the monitor and repair of ROS-based autonomous robot software written for an apriori partially known and possibly incorrect environment model. A taint analysis method is used to automatically extract the dataflow sequence from input topic to publish topic, and instrument that code. A unique reinforcement learning approximation of MDP utility is calculated, an empirical and non-invasive characterization of the inherent objectives of the software designers. By comparing design (a-priori) utility with deploy (deployed system) utility, we show, using a small but real ROS example, that it's possible to monitor a performance criterion and relate violations of the criterion to parts of the software. The software is then patched using automated software repair techniques and evaluated against the original off-line utility.
papers.abstract_zh: 能够为自治系统建立正式的性能界限是很重要的。然而，正式的验证技术需要系统运行的环境模型；对自治系统的挑战，尤其是那些期望在较长时间尺度上运行的系统。本文描述了基于ROS的自主机器人软件的自动监控和修复的进展，该软件是为先验的部分已知的和可能不正确的环境模型编写的。污点分析方法用于自动提取从输入主题到发布主题的数据流序列，并对代码进行检测。计算MDP效用的独特的强化学习近似，这是软件设计者的固有目标的经验和非侵入性表征。通过比较design(先验)utility和deploy(已部署系统)utility，我们用一个小而真实的ROS例子来说明，监控性能标准并将违反标准的行为与软件的某些部分联系起来是可能的。然后，使用自动软件修复技术对软件进行修补，并对照原始离线实用程序进行评估。
papers.title_zh: 利用污点分析和强化学习(TARL)修复自主机器人软件

papers.title: Partially Observable Games for Secure Autonomy
papers.authors: Mohamadreza Ahmadi, Arun Viswanathan, Michel D. Ingham, Kymie Tan, Aaron D. Ames
papers.abstract: Technology development efforts in autonomy and cyber-defense have been evolving independently of each other, over the past decade. In this paper, we report our ongoing effort to integrate these two presently distinct areas into a single framework. To this end, we propose the two-player partially observable stochastic game formalism to capture both high-level autonomous mission planning under uncertainty and adversarial decision making subject to imperfect information. We show that synthesizing sub-optimal strategies for such games is possible under finite-memory assumptions for both the autonomous decision maker and the cyber-adversary. We then describe an experimental testbed to evaluate the efficacy of the proposed framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年里，自主性和网络防御领域的技术开发工作一直在相互独立地发展。在本文中，我们报告了我们正在努力将这两个目前截然不同的领域整合成一个单一的框架。为此，我们提出了两人部分可观测随机博弈模型来描述不确定条件下的高级自主任务规划和不完全信息条件下的对抗性决策。我们表明，对于自主决策者和网络对手来说，在有限记忆假设下，合成这类游戏的次优策略是可能的。然后，我们描述了一个实验测试床，以评估所提出的框架的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 安全自治的部分可观察博弈

papers.title: Case Study: Safety Verification of an Unmanned Underwater Vehicle
papers.authors: Diego Manzanas Lopez, Patrick Musau, Nathaniel Hamilton, Hoang-Dung Tran, Taylor T. Johnson
papers.abstract: This manuscript evaluates the safety of a neural network controller that seeks to ensure that an Unmanned Underwater Vehicle (UUV) does not collide with a static object in its path. To achieve this, we utilize methods that can determine the exact output reachable set of all the UUV's components through the use of star-sets. The star-set is a computationally efficient set representation adept at characterizing large input spaces. It supports cheap and efficient computation of affine mapping operations and intersections with half-spaces. The system under consideration in this work represents a more complex system than Neural Network Control Systems (NNCS) previously considered in other works, and consists of a total of four components. Our experimental evaluation uses four different scenarios to show that our star-set based methods are scalable and can be efficiently used to analyze the safety of real-world cyber-physical systems (CPS).
papers.abstract_zh: 这篇手稿评估了神经网络控制器的安全性，该控制器试图确保无人水下航行器(UUV)不会与其路径上的静态物体相撞。为了实现这一点，我们利用的方法可以通过使用星集来确定所有UUV分量的精确输出可达集。星集是一种计算效率高的集合表示，擅长描述大输入空间。它支持仿射映射操作和与半空间相交的廉价和有效的计算。本研究中考虑的系统代表了一个比以前在其他研究中考虑的神经网络控制系统(NNCS)更复杂的系统，总共由四个部件组成。我们的实验评估使用了四种不同的场景，以表明我们的基于星集的方法是可扩展的，可以有效地用于分析真实世界的信息物理系统(CPS)的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 案例研究:无人水下航行器的安全验证

papers.title: Automated Decision Systems for Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security
papers.authors: Luanne Burns Chamberlain, Lauren Eisenberg Davis, Martin Stanley, Brian R. Gattoni
papers.abstract: This paper describes and discusses the impact of using automated decision systems (ADS), or decision automation, on the spectrum from decision support systems (DSS), where a human makes decisions based on analytics generated by the system, to intelligent decision systems based on analytics performed by Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML), and further, to fully autonomous intelligent decision systems, where a machine independently makes decisions based on its AI and ML capabilities. Specifically, we examine the use of decision automation in cybersecurity and infrastructure security and present a methodology for determining which decisions should be automated and at which level of autonomy.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文描述并讨论了使用自动决策系统(ADS)或决策自动化对决策支持系统(DSS)的影响，在决策支持系统(DSS)中，人根据系统生成的分析做出决策，智能决策系统基于人工智能(AI)和机器学习(ML)执行的分析，以及完全自主的智能决策系统，机器根据其AI和ML能力独立做出决策。具体来说，我们研究了决策自动化在网络安全和基础设施安全中的使用，并提出了一种方法来确定哪些决策应该自动化以及在哪个自治级别上自动化。
papers.title_zh: 网络安全和基础设施安全的自动化决策系统

papers.title: A Non-Cooperative Game based Model for the Cybersecurity of Autonomous Systems
papers.authors: Farha Jahan, Weiqing Sun, Quamar Niyaz
papers.abstract: Autonomous systems (AS) would soon revolutionize the way we live and work. The days are not so far when these systems, from delivery drones to driverless cars, would be seen around us. These systems are connected and rely heavily on the communication network for the information exchange, hence prone to several attacks. Human lives will be at risk if these systems are compromised. Cybersecurity modeling and attack analysis of AS needs the utmost attention of the research community. Primarily, a typical AS has three modules - perception, cognition, and control - and each one of them comes with their own vulnerabilities. In this work, we propose a new AS architecture that may prove useful in AS cybersecurity modeling. We also model the attacks on them, and defense mechanisms applied to these modules using a non-cooperative non-zero sum game. Finally, we solve this game to obtain optimal strategies to maintain a secure system state.
papers.abstract_zh: 自治系统(AS)将很快彻底改变我们的生活和工作方式。从送货无人机到无人驾驶汽车，这些系统在我们身边出现的日子并不遥远。这些系统相互连接，并严重依赖通信网络进行信息交换，因此容易受到多种攻击。如果这些系统遭到破坏，人类的生命将受到威胁。AS的网络安全建模和攻击分析需要研究界的高度重视。首先，典型的AS有三个模块——感知、认知和控制——每个模块都有自己的弱点。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个新的AS体系结构，它可能被证明在AS网络安全建模中是有用的。我们还使用非合作非零和博弈对这些模块的攻击和防御机制进行了建模。最后，我们通过求解这个博弈来获得维持安全系统状态的最优策略。
papers.title_zh: 基于非合作博弈的自治系统网络安全模型

papers.title: Detecting Adversarial Examples in Learning-Enabled Cyber-Physical Systems using Variational Autoencoder for Regression
papers.authors: Feiyang Cai, Jiani Li, Xenofon D. Koutsoukos
papers.abstract: Learning-enabled components (LECs) are widely used in cyber-physical systems (CPS) since they can handle the uncertainty and variability of the environment and increase the level of autonomy. However, it has been shown that LECs such as deep neural networks (DNN) are not robust and adversarial examples can cause the model to make a false prediction. The paper considers the problem of efficiently detecting adversarial examples in LECs used for regression in CPS. The proposed approach is based on inductive conformal prediction and uses a regression model based on variational autoencoder. The architecture allows to take into consideration both the input and the neural network prediction for detecting adversarial, and more generally, out-of-distribution examples. We demonstrate the method using an advanced emergency braking system implemented in an open source simulator for self-driving cars where a DNN is used to estimate the distance to an obstacle. The simulation results show that the method can effectively detect adversarial examples with a short detection delay.
papers.abstract_zh: 学习使能组件(LEC)广泛应用于信息物理系统(CPS ),因为它们可以处理环境的不确定性和可变性，并提高自治水平。然而，已经表明，诸如深度神经网络(DNN)之类的LEC不是鲁棒的，并且对立的例子会导致模型做出错误的预测。本文考虑了在用于CPS回归的LECs中有效地检测对立实例的问题。所提出的方法基于归纳保形预测，并使用基于变分自动编码器的回归模型。该体系结构允许考虑输入和神经网络预测两者，用于检测敌对的，更一般地，分布外的例子。我们使用在自动驾驶汽车的开源模拟器中实现的高级紧急制动系统来演示该方法，其中DNN用于估计到障碍物的距离。仿真结果表明，该方法能有效地检测出敌对实例，且检测延迟较短。
papers.title_zh: 使用用于回归的变分自动编码器检测学习使能的信息物理系统中的对立例子

papers.title: A Smart City Internet for Autonomous Systems
papers.authors: Gregory Falco
papers.abstract: A smart city involves critical infrastructure systems that have been digitally enabled. Increasingly, many smart city cyber-physical systems are becoming automated. The extent of automation ranges from basic logic gates to sophisticated, artificial intelligence (AI) that enables fully autonomous systems. Because of modern society's reliance on autonomous systems in smart cities, it is crucial for them to operate in a safe manner; otherwise, it is feasible for these systems to cause considerable physical harm or even death. Because smart cities could involve thousands of autonomous systems operating in concert in densely populated areas, safety assurances are required. Challenges abound to consistently manage the safety of such autonomous systems due to their disparate developers, manufacturers, operators and users. A novel network and a sample of associated network functions for autonomous systems is proposed that aims to provide a baseline of safety for autonomous systems in a smart city ecosystem. A proposed network called the Assured Autonomous Cyber-Physical Ecosystem (AACE) would be separate from the Internet, and enforces certain functions that enable safety through active networking. Each smart city could dictate the functions for their own AACE, providing a means for enforcing safety policies across disparate autonomous systems operating in the city's jurisdiction. Such a network design sits at the margins of the end-to-end principle, which is warranted considering the safety of autonomous systems is at stake as is argued in this paper. Without a scalable safety strategy for autonomous systems as proposed, assured autonomy in smart cities will remain elusive.
papers.abstract_zh: 智慧城市包括已经数字化的关键基础设施系统。越来越多的智能城市信息物理系统正变得自动化。自动化的程度从基本的逻辑门到复杂的人工智能(AI ),实现了完全自主的系统。由于现代社会对智能城市中自治系统的依赖，它们以安全的方式运行至关重要；否则，这些系统可能会造成相当大的身体伤害，甚至死亡。由于智能城市可能涉及数千个在人口稠密地区协同运行的自治系统，因此需要安全保证。由于不同的开发商、制造商、运营商和用户，持续管理此类自治系统的安全性面临诸多挑战。提出了一种用于自治系统的新型网络和相关网络功能样本，旨在为智能城市生态系统中的自治系统提供安全基线。一个名为确保自主网络物理生态系统(AACE)的拟议网络将独立于互联网，并通过主动联网实施某些功能来实现安全。每个智能城市都可以规定自己的AACE的功能，提供一种在城市管辖范围内运行的不同自治系统之间执行安全政策的方法。这种网络设计处于端到端原则的边缘，考虑到自治系统的安全受到威胁，这是有保证的，如本文所述。如果没有所提议的可扩展的自治系统安全策略，智能城市中有保证的自治将仍然难以实现。
papers.title_zh: 面向自治系统的智能城市互联网

papers.title: Fooling A Deep-Learning Based Gait Behavioral Biometric System
papers.authors: Honghao Guo, Zuo Wang, Benfang Wang, Xiangyang Li, Devu M. Shila
papers.abstract: We leverage deep learning algorithms on various user behavioral information gathered from end-user devices to classify a subject of interest. In spite of the ability of these techniques to counter spoofing threats, they are vulnerable to adversarial learning attacks, where an attacker adds adversarial noise to the input samples to fool the classifier into false acceptance. Recently, a handful of mature techniques like Fast Gradient Sign Method (FGSM) have been proposed to aid white-box attacks, where an attacker has a complete knowledge of the machine learning model. On the contrary, we exploit a black-box attack to a behavioral biometric system based on gait patterns, by using FGSM and training a shadow model that mimics the target system. The attacker has limited knowledge on the target model and no knowledge of the real user being authenticated, but induces a false acceptance in authentication. Our goal is to understand the feasibility of a black-box attack and to what extent FGSM on shadow models would contribute to its success. Our results manifest that the performance of FGSM highly depends on the quality of the shadow model, which is in turn impacted by key factors including the number of queries allowed by the target system in order to train the shadow model. Our experimentation results have revealed strong relationships between the shadow model and FGSM performance, as well as the effect of the number of FGSM iterations used to create an attack instance. These insights also shed light on deep-learning algorithms' model shareability that can be exploited to launch a successful attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们利用深度学习算法对从终端用户设备收集的各种用户行为信息进行分类。尽管这些技术具有对抗欺骗威胁的能力，但它们容易受到对抗性学习攻击，攻击者向输入样本添加对抗性噪声，以欺骗分类器进行错误接受。最近，一些成熟的技术，如快速梯度符号方法(FGSM)已经被提出来帮助白盒攻击，其中攻击者具有机器学习模型的完整知识。相反，我们通过使用FGSM和训练模拟目标系统的阴影模型，对基于步态模式的行为生物统计系统进行黑盒攻击。攻击者对目标模型的了解有限，也不知道正在进行身份验证的真实用户，但是会导致错误地接受身份验证。我们的目标是了解黑盒攻击的可行性，以及影子模型上的FGSM在多大程度上有助于其成功。我们的结果表明，FGSM的性能高度依赖于影子模型的质量，而影子模型的质量又受到关键因素的影响，包括目标系统为了训练影子模型而允许的查询数量。我们的实验结果揭示了影子模型和FGSM性能之间的密切关系，以及用于创建攻击实例的FGSM迭代次数的影响。这些见解还揭示了深度学习算法的模型共享性，这可以被用来发起成功的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 愚弄基于深度学习的步态行为生物识别系统

papers.title: Trusted Confidence Bounds for Learning Enabled Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Dimitrios Boursinos, Xenofon D. Koutsoukos
papers.abstract: Cyber-physical systems (CPS) can benefit by the use of learning enabled components (LECs) such as deep neural networks (DNNs) for perception and decision making tasks. However, DNNs are typically non-transparent making reasoning about their predictions very difficult, and hence their application to safety-critical systems is very challenging. LECs could be integrated easier into CPS if their predictions could be complemented with a confidence measure that quantifies how much we trust their output. The paper presents an approach for computing confidence bounds based on Inductive Conformal Prediction (ICP). We train a Triplet Network architecture to learn representations of the input data that can be used to estimate the similarity between test examples and examples in the training data set. Then, these representations are used to estimate the confidence of set predictions from a classifier that is based on the neural network architecture used in the triplet. The approach is evaluated using a robotic navigation benchmark and the results show that we can computed trusted confidence bounds efficiently in real-time.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息物理系统(CPS)可以通过使用学习使能组件(LEC)受益，例如用于感知和决策任务的深度神经网络(DNNs)。然而，dnn通常是不透明的，使得对它们的预测进行推理非常困难，因此它们在安全关键系统中的应用非常具有挑战性。如果他们的预测可以用一个量化我们有多信任他们的输出的置信度来补充，那么他们可以更容易地整合到CPS中。提出了一种基于归纳共形预测(ICP)的置信限计算方法。我们训练一个三元组网络架构来学习输入数据的表示，这些输入数据可用于估计测试示例和训练数据集中的示例之间的相似性。然后，这些表示用于估计来自分类器的集合预测的置信度，该分类器基于三元组中使用的神经网络架构。使用机器人导航基准对该方法进行了评估，结果表明我们可以实时有效地计算可信置信界限。
papers.title_zh: 支持学习的信息物理系统的可信置信界限

papers.title: A Framework for the Analysis of Deep Neural Networks in Autonomous Aerospace Applications using Bayesian Statistics
papers.authors: Yuning He, Johann Schumann
papers.abstract: Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) are considered to be key components in many autonomous systems. Applications range from vision-based obstacle avoidance to intelligent/learning control and planning. Safety-critical applications as found in the aerospace domain require that the behavior of the DNN is validated and tested rigorously for safety of the autonomous system (AUS). In this paper, we present a framework to support testing of DNNs and the analysis of the network structure. Our framework employs techniques from statistical modeling and active learning to effectively generate test cases for DNN safety testing and performance analysis. We will present results of a case study on a physics-based Deep recurrent residual neural network (DR-RNN), which has been trained to emulate the aerodynamics behavior of a fixed-wing aircraft.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络被认为是许多自治系统中的关键组件。应用范围从基于视觉的避障到智能/学习控制和规划。在航空航天领域中发现的安全关键应用要求对自动系统(AUS)的安全性严格验证和测试DNN的行为。在本文中，我们提出了一个框架来支持DNNs的测试和网络结构的分析。我们的框架采用来自统计建模和主动学习的技术来有效地生成用于DNN安全测试和性能分析的测试用例。我们将介绍基于物理学的深度递归残差神经网络(DR-RNN)的案例研究结果，该网络已被训练为模拟固定翼飞机的空气动力学行为。
papers.title_zh: 利用贝叶斯统计分析自主航空航天应用中深度神经网络的框架

papers.title: Towards an AI-Based After-Collision Forensic Analysis Protocol for Autonomous Vehicles
papers.authors: Prinkle Sharma, Umesh Siddanagaiah, Gökhan Kul
papers.abstract: Safety-critical applications in the cooperative vehicular networks are built to improve safety, traffic efficiency and handle emergencies by communicating the road condition captured using data from sensors (camera, LiDAR, RADAR, etc.). These cyber-physical systems maintain records of the data received from its sensors to make decisions while driving on road. Such proliferation of data opens possibilities of scenarios where attackers can forge into the system with unrestricted access to the internal network of the vehicle and perform malicious acts. Due to the possibility of such acts, it is crucial how forensic analysis should be carried out in case of traffic accidents that include autonomous vehicles (AV). In this paper, we propose a forensic investigation protocol on autonomous vehicles, specifically to investigate if there was an attack that targeted the vehicle sensors. The proposed process consists of three main phases: data curation, analysis and decision making. We argue that, by using supervised deep neural network-based architecture YOLO trained in the Darknet framework and tested with SORT, an effective model to detect traffic data can be built to perform forensic investigations.
papers.abstract_zh: 协作式车辆网络中的安全关键型应用旨在通过传达使用传感器(摄像头、激光雷达、雷达等)获取的道路状况来提高安全性、交通效率和处理紧急情况。).这些网络物理系统保存着从传感器接收到的数据记录，以便在道路上行驶时做出决策。数据的这种激增带来了这样的可能性:攻击者可以进入系统，不受限制地访问车辆的内部网络，并执行恶意行为。由于这种行为的可能性，在包括自动驾驶汽车(AV)的交通事故的情况下，如何进行法医分析是至关重要的。在本文中，我们提出了一个关于自动驾驶汽车的取证调查协议，专门调查是否存在针对汽车传感器的攻击。提议的流程包括三个主要阶段:数据监管、分析和决策制定。我们认为，通过使用受监督的基于深度神经网络的架构YOLO，在暗网框架中训练并使用SORT测试，可以建立检测流量数据的有效模型来执行取证调查。
papers.title_zh: 面向自主车辆的基于人工智能的碰撞后取证分析协议

papers.title: Mission Assurance for Autonomous Undersea Vehicles
papers.authors: Karl Siil, Aviel D. Rubin, Matthew Elder, Anton Dahbura, Matthew Green, Lanier A. Watkins
papers.abstract: Autonomous vehicles are all but inevitable, and assurance that they will behave safely with respect to passengers, as well as bystanders incidentally exposed to them, is moving forward, albeit slowly. The state of the art often involves stopping the vehicle, perhaps after diverting it to a nearby safe place. While this is good news, it does not fully realize the benefits of autonomy. Autonomous vehicles are built for a purpose; call it a mission. Being able to perform the mission, or part of it, while experiencing faults (or cyber-attack) should be a factor in determining the vehicle's suitability for the mission. This paper explores the state of the art in achieving autonomous mission assurance in the context of autonomous undersea vehicles (AUVs). It identifies gaps in the literature and proposes a novel plan to address certain gaps.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动驾驶汽车几乎是不可避免的，保证它们对乘客以及偶然接触到它们的旁观者安全的行为正在向前发展，尽管速度缓慢。现有技术通常包括停车，也许是在将车辆转移到附近的安全地点之后。虽然这是好消息，但它并没有完全实现自治的好处。自动驾驶汽车是有目的的；称之为任务。在遇到故障(或网络攻击)时能够执行任务或部分任务应该是决定飞行器是否适合执行任务的一个因素。本文探讨了在自主水下航行器(AUV)环境下实现自主任务保障的最新技术。它确定了文献中的差距，并提出了一个新的计划，以解决某些差距。
papers.title_zh: 自主水下航行器的任务保证

papers.title: Out-of-Distribution Detection in Multi-Label Datasets using Latent Space of β-VAE
papers.authors: Vijaya Kumar Sundar, Shreyas Ramakrishna, Zahra RahimiNasab, Arvind Easwaran, Abhishek Dubey
papers.abstract: Learning Enabled Components (LECs) are widely being used in a variety of perceptions based autonomy tasks like image segmentation, object detection, end-to-end driving, etc. These components are trained with large image datasets with multimodal factors like weather conditions, time-of-day, traffic-density, etc. The LECs learn from these factors during training, and while testing if there is variation in any of these factors, the components get confused resulting in low confidence predictions. Those images with factor values, not seen, during training are commonly referred to as Out-of-Distribution (OOD). For safe autonomy, it is important to identify the OOD images, so that a suitable mitigation strategy can be performed. Classical one-class classifiers like SVM and SVDD are used to perform OOD detection. However, multiple labels attached to images in these datasets restrict the direct application of these techniques. We address this problem using the latent space of the $\beta$ -Variational Autoencoder ($\beta$ -VAE). We use the fact that compact latent space generated by an appropriately selected $\beta$ - VAE will encode the information about these factors in a few latent variables, and that can be used for quick and computationally inexpensive detection. We evaluate our approach on the nuScenes dataset, and our results show the latent space of $\beta$ - VAE is sensitive to encode changes in the values of the generative factor.
papers.abstract_zh: 学习使能部件(LEC)广泛应用于各种基于感知的自主任务，如图像分割、物体检测、端到端驾驶等。这些组件使用大型图像数据集进行训练，这些数据集具有多模态因素，如天气条件、时间、交通密度等。LEC在训练期间从这些因素中学习，并且在测试这些因素中的任何一个是否有变化时，组件变得混乱，导致低置信度预测。那些在训练期间看不到的具有因子值的图像通常被称为超出分布(OOD)。为了安全自主，识别OOD图像很重要，以便可以执行合适的缓解策略。像SVM和SVDD这样的经典单类分类器被用于执行OOD检测。然而，这些数据集中图像的多重标签限制了这些技术的直接应用。我们使用$ \ beta $-变分自动编码器的潜在空间($\beta$ -VAE)来解决这个问题。我们使用由适当选择的＄\β＄- VAE生成的紧凑潜在空间将关于这些因素的信息编码在几个潜在变量中的事实，并且这可以用于快速和计算成本低廉的检测。我们在nuScenes数据集上评估我们的方法，并且我们的结果显示$\beta$ - VAE的潜在空间对生成因子的值的编码变化敏感。
papers.title_zh: 基于β-VAE潜在空间的多标签数据集中的非分布检测

papers.title: A Capability for Autonomous IoT System Security: Pushing IoT Assurance to the Edge
papers.authors: Jeffrey S. Chavis, Anna L. Buczak, Aaron Kunz, Aviel D. Rubin, Lanier A. Watkins
papers.abstract: Complex systems of IoT devices (SIoTD) are systems that have a single purpose but are made up of multiple IoT devices. These systems are becoming ubiquitous, have complex security requirements, and face a diverse and ever-changing array of cyber threats. Issues of privacy and bandwidth will preclude sending all the data from these systems to a central place, and so these systems cannot totally rely on a centralized cloud-based service for their security. The security of these systems must be provided locally and in an autonomous fashion. In this paper, we describe a capability to address this problem, explain specifications for the system, present our work on SIoTD assurance, and show initial results of a novel edge-based application of machine learning to build this capability.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网设备复杂系统(SIoTD)是具有单一用途但由多个物联网设备组成的系统。这些系统正变得无处不在，具有复杂的安全要求，并面临着多样化和不断变化的网络威胁。隐私和带宽问题将阻止将所有数据从这些系统发送到一个中心位置，因此这些系统不能完全依赖基于云的集中式服务来保证其安全性。这些系统的安全性必须在本地以自主的方式提供。在本文中，我们描述了解决这一问题的能力，解释了系统的规范，介绍了我们在SIoTD保证方面的工作，并展示了一种新的基于边缘的机器学习应用程序的初步结果，以建立这种能力。
papers.title_zh: 自主物联网系统安全能力:将物联网保障推向边缘

papers.title: A Privacy Filter Framework for Internet of Robotic Things Applications
papers.authors: Zahir Alsulaimawi
papers.abstract: Traditionally robots have been stand-alone systems. In recent years, however, they have increasingly been connected to external knowledge resources through the Internet of Things (IoT). These robots are thus becoming part of IoT and can realistically allocate Internet of Robotic Things (IoRT) technologies. IoRT can facilitate Human-Robot Interaction (HRI) at functional (commanding and programming) and social levels, as well as a means for remote-interaction. IoRT-HRI can cause privacy issues for humans, in part because robots can collect data using IoT and move in the real world, partly because robots can learn to read human social cues and adapt or correct their behavior accordingly. In this paper, we address the topic of privacy-preserving for IoRT- Hri applications. The objective is to design a data release framework called a Privacy Filter (PF) that can prevent an adversary from private mining information from the released data while keeping utility data. In the experiments, we test our framework on two accessible datasets: MNIST (hand-written digits) and UCI-HAR (activity recognition from motion). Our experimental results on these datasets show that PF is highly effective in removing private information from the dataset while allowing utility data to be mined effectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统上，机器人是独立的系统。然而，近年来，他们越来越多地通过物联网(IoT)连接到外部知识资源。这些机器人因此成为物联网的一部分，可以实际分配机器人物联网(IoRT)技术。IoRT可以在功能(指挥和编程)和社会层面促进人机交互(HRI ),也是一种远程交互的手段。IoRT-HRI可能会给人类带来隐私问题，部分原因是机器人可以使用物联网收集数据，并在现实世界中移动，部分原因是机器人可以学习阅读人类的社交暗示，并相应地适应或纠正他们的行为。在本文中，我们讨论了IoRT- Hri应用中的隐私保护问题。目标是设计一个称为隐私过滤器(PF)的数据发布框架，它可以防止对手从发布的数据中挖掘隐私信息，同时保留公用事业数据。在实验中，我们在两个可访问的数据集上测试了我们的框架:MNIST(手写数字)和UCI-HAR(从运动中识别活动)。我们在这些数据集上的实验结果表明，PF在从数据集中移除私有信息方面非常有效，同时允许有效地挖掘效用数据。
papers.title_zh: 面向物联网应用的隐私过滤框架

papers.title: Language-agnostic Injection Detection
papers.authors: Lars Hermerschmidt, Andreas Straub, Goran Piskachev
papers.abstract: Formal languages are ubiquitous wherever software systems need to exchange or store data. Unparsing into and parsing from such languages is an error-prone process that has spawned an entire class of security vulnerabilities. There has been ample research into finding vulnerabilities on the parser side, but outside of language specific approaches, few techniques targeting unparser vulnerabilities exist. This work presents a language-agnostic approach for spotting injection vulnerabilities in unparsers. It achieves this by mining unparse trees using dynamic taint analysis to extract language keywords, which are leveraged for guided fuzzing. Vulnerabilities can thus be found without requiring prior knowledge about the formal language, and in fact, the approach is even applicable where no specification thereof exists at all. This empowers security researchers and developers alike to gain deeper understanding of unparser implementations through examination of the unparse trees generated by the approach, as well as enabling them to find new vulnerabilities in poorly-understood software.
