In the literature, there are various approaches for detecting masqueraders by modeling legitimate users' behavior during their daily tasks and automatically determine whether they are doing something suspicious. Usually, these techniques model user behavior using features extracted from various sources, such as file system, network activities, system calls, etc. In this work, we propose a one-class anomaly detection approach that measures similarities between a history of a user and events recorded in a timewindow of the user's session which is to be classified. The idea behind our solution is the application of a graph partitioning technique on weighted oriented graphs generated from such event sequences, while considering that strongly connected nodes have to belong into the same cluster. First, a history of vertex clusters is build per each user and then this history is compared to a new input by using a similarity function, which leads either to the acceptance or rejection of a new input. This makes our approach substantially different from existing general graph-based approaches that consider graphs as a single entity. The approach can be applied for different kinds of homogeneous event sequences, however successful application of the approach will be demonstrated on file system access events only. The linear time complexity of the approach was demonstrated in the experiments and the performance evaluation was done using two state-of-the-art datasets - WUIL and TWOS - both of them containing file system access logs of legitimate users and masquerade attackers; for WUIL dataset we achieved an average per-user AUC of 0.94, a TPR over 95%, and a FPR less than 10%, while for TWOS dataset we achieved an average per-user AUC of 0.851, a TPR over 91% and a FPR around 11%.
papers.abstract_zh: 伪装者是控制机器并执行恶意活动的用户，例如代表合法用户进行数据剥落或系统滥用。 在文献中，有多种方法可以通过在日常任务中对合法用户的行为进行建模，并自动确定他们是否在做可疑的事情。 通常，这些技术使用从各种来源提取的功能（例如文件系统，网络活动，系统呼叫等）建模用户行为。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种单级异常检测方法，该方法可以衡量用户历史记录之间的相似之处 事件记录在用户会话的时风中，该事件将被分类。 解决方案背后的想法是将图形分配技术应用于从此类事件序列生成的加权方向图上的应用，同时考虑到牢固连接的节点必须属于同一群集。 首先，每个用户都会构建顶点簇的历史记录，然后通过使用相似性函数将该历史记录与新输入进行比较，这将导致接受或拒绝新输入。 这使我们的方法与将图作为单个实体视为单个实体的现有一般基于图的方法大不相同。 该方法可以应用于不同类型的均质事件序列，但是该方法仅在文件系统访问事件中成功应用该方法。 实验中证明了该方法的线性时间复杂性，并且使用两个最先进的数据集（WUIL和TWO）进行了性能评估 - 它们都包含合法用户和化妆攻击者的文件系统访问日志； 对于WUIL数据集，我们达到的平均每用户AUC为0.94，TPR超过95％，FPR少于10％，而对于TWOS数据集，我们达到的平均每用户AUC为0.851，TPR超过91％，和A FPR约为11％。
papers.title_zh: 基于文件系统访问事件图划分的伪装者检测

papers.title: Simulated User Bots: Real Time Testing of Insider Threat Detection Systems
papers.authors: Preetam Dutta, Gabriel Ryan, Aleksander Zieba, Salvatore J. Stolfo
papers.abstract: The insider threat is one of the most serious security problems faced by modern organizations. High pro?le cases demonstrate the serious consequences of successful attacks. The problem has been studied for many years, leading to a number of technologies and products that have been deployed widely in government and commercial enterprises. A fundamental question is: how well do these systems work? How may they be tested? How expensive are widely deployed monitoring infrastructures in terms of computational cost? Measurement of real systems, which are dynamic in nature, encounter unknown con?guration bugs and have sensitivities to the vagaries of human nature and adversarial behavior, requires a formal means to continuously test and evaluate deployed detection systems. We present a framework to deploy in situ simulated user bots (SUBs) that can emulate the actions of real users. By creating a user account and by running a host in the enterprise network, a SUB can be introduced into an enterprise system that runs at a realistic pace and does not interfere with normal operations. Infusing malicious behavior into the SUB should be detected by the insider threat monitoring infrastructure. The SUB framework can be controlled to explore the limits of deployed systems and to test the effectiveness of insider evasion tactics, especially low and slow behaviors. We demonstrate our framework in a synthetic ecosystem as well as in a live enterprise deployment. We created a synthetic environment of users based on data collected in a West Point cadet study. Various machine learning based intrusion detection algorithms are used to validate the ability of the SUB framework to generate both normal and malicious users. In a live University network, we launched a number of attacks on its intrusion detection system and showcased the ability to devise malicious users. In addition, we further deployed low and slow attacks that perform malicious actions over an extended period of time and demonstrate how even a large enterprise is ill equipped to combat such attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 内部人士威胁是现代组织面临的最严重的安全问题之一。 High Pro？le Case证明了成功攻击的严重后果。 该问题已经研究了多年，导致许多技术和产品已在政府和商业企业中广泛部署。 一个基本问题是：这些系统的工作效果如何？ 如何测试它们？ 从计算成本方面，部署监测基础架构的昂贵有多昂贵？ 自然界动态的真实系统的测量遇到了未知的骗局错误，并且对人性和对抗性行为的变化具有敏感性，需要一种正式手段来连续测试和评估部署的检测系统。 我们提出了一个框架，以部署原位模拟的用户机器人（subs），该框架可以模仿真实用户的动作。 通过创建一个用户帐户并在企业网络中运行主机，可以将SUB引入以现实速度运行的企业系统中，并且不会干扰正常的操作。 内幕威胁监控基础架构应检测到对潜艇中的恶意行为。 可以控制子框架以探索部署系统的限制，并测试内幕逃避策略的有效性，尤其是低和缓慢的行为。 我们在合成生态系统以及实时企业部署中演示了我们的框架。 我们根据西点学员研究中收集的数据创建了用户的合成环境。 各种基于机器学习的入侵检测算法用于验证子框架生成正常用户和恶意用户的能力。 在现场大学网络中，我们对其入侵检测系统发起了许多攻击，并展示了设计恶意用户的能力。 此外，我们进一步部署了较长的攻击，在很长的一段时间内执行恶意行动，并证明即使是大型企业也没有装备来打击此类攻击。
papers.title_zh: 模拟用户机器人:内部威胁检测系统的实时测试

papers.title: Balancing Organizational Incentives to Counter Insider Threat
papers.authors: Andrew P. Moore, Tracy M. Cassidy, Michael C. Theis, Daniel Bauer, Denise M. Rousseau, Susan B. Moore
papers.abstract: Traditional security practices focus on negative incentives that attempt to force compliance through constraints, monitoring, and punishment. This paper describes a missing dimension of most organizations' insider threat defense—one that explicitly considers positive incentives for attracting individuals to act in the interests of the organization. Positive incentives focus on properties of the organizational context of workforce management practices – including those relating to organizational supportiveness, coworker connectedness, and job engagement. Without due attention to the organizational context in which insider threats occur, insider misbehaviors may simply reoccur as a natural response to counterproductive or dysfunctional management practices. A balanced combination of positive and negative incentives can improve employees' relationships with the organization and provide a means for employees to better cope with personal and professional stressors. An insider threat program that balances organizational incentives can become an advocate for the workforce and a means for improving employee work life - a welcome message to employees who feel threatened by programs focused on discovering insider wrongdoing.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的安全实践集中于试图通过约束，监控和惩罚来强迫合规性的负面激励措施。 本文描述了大多数组织内幕威胁辩护的缺失方面，这种辩护明确考虑了吸引个人为组织利益行事的积极激励措施。 积极的激励措施着重于劳动力管理实践的组织环境的财产，包括与组织支持，同事的联系和工作参与有关的实践。 如果没有适当关注内幕威胁发生的组织环境，内部人行为的不端行为可能会重新出现，以此作为对适得其反或功能失调的管理实践的自然反应。 积极和负面激励措施的平衡组合可以改善员工与组织的关系，并为员工提供更好地应对个人和专业压力的手段。 一个内部威胁计划，平衡组织激励措施可以成为劳动力的倡导者，也可以成为改善员工工作生活的手段 - 这是向那些受到专注于发现内部人员不法行为的计划威胁的员工的欢迎信息。
papers.title_zh: 平衡组织激励以应对内部威胁

papers.title: Navigating the Insider Threat Tool Landscape: Low Cost Technical Solutions to Jump Start an Insider Threat Program
papers.authors: Derrick Spooner, George Silowash, Daniel Costa, Michael Albrethsen
papers.abstract: This paper explores low cost technical solutions that can help organizations prevent, detect, and respond to insider incidents. Features and functionality associated with insider risk mitigation are presented. A taxonomy for high-level categories of insider threat tools is presented. A discussion of the relationship between the types of tools points out the nuances of insider threat control deployment, and considerations for selecting, implementing, and operating insider threat tools are provided.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文探讨了低成本的技术解决方案，可以帮助组织预防，检测和应对内幕事件。 提出了与内部风险相关的功能和功能。 提出了针对内幕威胁工具的高级类别的分类学。 对工具类型之间关系的讨论指出了内幕威胁控制部署的细微差别，以及选择，实施和操作内幕威胁工具的考虑。
papers.title_zh: 浏览内部威胁工具前景:启动内部威胁计划的低成本技术解决方案

papers.title: S.P.O.O.F Net: Syntactic Patterns for identification of Ominous Online Factors
papers.authors: Vysakh S. Mohan, R. Vinayakumar, Soman K. P, Prabaharan Poornachandran
papers.abstract: With more emphasis on internet as a primary mechanism for information access and communication, it is highly important that the platform stays safe and secure for anyone who uses it. Online scams and cybercrimes are becoming a common threat to the technology and systems that help mitigate these issues are in high demand. Businesses all over the world invest heavily to stay secure in the cyberspace and rely on security experts in defending their business from online threats. The immense scale of the internet and the dynamicity of the threat it holds forces the adoption of automated threat detection systems. Several cybersecurity use cases exist, but the two use cases discussed here are DGA detection and Malicious URL detection. This paper addresses the drawbacks of previous rulebased and machine learning based detection methods. Here, embedding concepts from NLP is incorporated into cybersecurity use cases to propose a new in house model christened S.P.O.O.F Net, which is a combination of a Convolutional Neural Network and Long Short Term Memory Network. The proposed model is benchmarked with machine learning algorithm incorporating bi-gram feature engineering techniques and also a conventional CNN with character level embedding (same as the one used for S.P.O.O.F Net). It was observed that S.P.O.O.F Net gave better performance over the aforementioned methods with accuracy scores of 98.3% for DGA detections and 99% for malicious URL detection. This work also aims to demonstrate the possibilities of incorporating NLP concepts to cybersecurity use cases and provide future researches a new thinking curve to develop systems in this domain.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于更加重视互联网作为信息访问和通信的主要机制，因此该平台对于使用该平台的任何人都保持安全和安全非常重要。 在线骗局和网络犯罪正在成为对缓解这些问题的技术和系统的普遍威胁。 全世界的企业投入大量投资，以保持在网络空间的安全，并依靠安全专家捍卫其业务免受在线威胁的侵害。 互联网的巨大规模以及其构成的威胁的动态性迫使采用自动威胁检测系统。 存在几种网络安全用例，但是这里讨论的两个用例是DGA检测和恶意URL检测。 本文介绍了以前基于规则和基于机器学习的检测方法的缺点。 在这里，将NLP的概念嵌入到网络安全用例中，以提出一个新的内部模型划分为S.P.O.O.F Net，这是卷积神经网络和长期短期记忆网络的组合。 提出的模型以机器学习算法为基准，这些算法结合了BI-GRAM功能工程技术，以及具有字符级别嵌入的常规CNN（与S.P.O.O.F Net的一种相同）。 据观察，S.P.O.O.F NET在上述方法上提供了更好的性能，而DGA检测的准确得分为98.3％，恶意URL检测结果为99％。 这项工作还旨在证明将NLP概念纳入网络安全用例的可能性，并为未来的研究提供一种新的思维曲线，以在该领域开发系统。
papers.title_zh: 南p . o . o . f . Net:识别不祥在线因素的句法模式

papers.title: WACA: Wearable-Assisted Continuous Authentication
papers.authors: Abbas Acar, Hidayet Aksu, A. Selcuk Uluagac, Kemal Akkaya
papers.abstract: One-time login process in conventional authentication systems does not guarantee that the identified user is the actual user throughout the session. However, it is necessary to re-verify the user identity periodically throughout a login session, which is lacking in existing one-time login systems. In this paper, we introduce a usable and reliable Wearable-Assisted Continuous Authentication (WACA), which relies on the sensor-based keystroke dynamics and the authentication data is acquired through the built-in sensors of a wearable (e.g., smartwatch) while the user is typing. The acquired data is periodically and transparently compared with the registered profile of the initially logged-in user with one-way classifiers. With this, WACA continuously ensures that the current user is the user who logged in initially. We implemented the WACA framework and evaluated its performance on real devices with real users. The empirical evaluation of WACA reveals that WACA is feasible and its error rate is as low as 1% with 30 seconds of processing time and 2 – 3% for 20 seconds. The computational overhead is minimal. Furthermore, WACA is capable of identifying insider threats with very high accuracy (99.2%).
papers.abstract_zh: 常规身份验证系统中的一次性登录过程不能保证已确定的用户是整个会话过程中的实际用户。 但是，有必要在整个登录会话中定期重新验证用户身份，这在现有的一次性登录系统中缺乏。 在本文中，我们引入了可靠且可靠的可穿戴辅助连续身份验证（WACA），该认证依赖于基于传感器的击键动力学，并且通过可穿戴的内置传感器（例如，智能手表）获得了身份验证数据 用户正在键入。 与单向分类器最初登录的用户的注册配置文件进行了定期和透明的数据。 这样，WACA不断确保当前用户是最初登录的用户。 我们实施了WACA框架，并与真实用户一起评估了其在真实设备上的性能。 WACA的经验评估表明，WACA是可行的，其错误率在30秒的处理时间和2-3％的20秒内低至1％。 计算开销很小。 此外，WACA能够以很高的精度识别内幕威胁（99.2％）。
papers.title_zh: WACA:可穿戴辅助连续认证

papers.title: Evaluating Insider Threat Detection Workflow Using Supervised and Unsupervised Learning
papers.authors: Duc C. Le, A. Nur Zincir-Heywood
papers.abstract: Insider threat is a prominent cyber-security danger faced by organizations and companies. In this research, we study and evaluate an insider threat detection workflow using supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms. To this end, we study data exploration and analysis, anomaly detection and malicious behaviour classification on a publicly available data set. We evaluate several supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms - HMM, SOM, and DT - using this workflow.
papers.abstract_zh: 内幕威胁是组织和公司面临的巨大网络安全危险。 在这项研究中，我们使用受监督和无监督的学习算法研究和评估内幕威胁检测工作流程。 为此，我们研究了数据探索和分析，对公开数据集的异常检测和恶意行为分类。 我们使用此工作流程评估了几种受监督和无监督的学习算法-HMM，SOM和DT。
papers.title_zh: 使用监督和非监督学习评估内部威胁检测工作流

papers.title: Towards Human Bio-Inspired Defence Mechanism for Cyber Security
papers.authors: Nanda Kumar Thanigaivelan, Ethiopia Nigussie, Seppo Virtanen, Jouni Isoaho
papers.abstract: We present the conceptual design of bio-inspired security that guarantee minimum security resilience at any time for application areas that employs communicative devices such as mobiles and sensor devices. The security mechanism is modelled after human nervous system to counteract abnormal events through the inclusion of appropriate nervous system functionalities as subsystems in the security system. The establishment of brain and spinal cord (dorsal horn) are achieved through sharing of operations based on complexity and resource availability. The spinal cord operations are responsible for handling two different communication medium, learning and retaliation against incident through receptors and effectors. Brain component handles the self-awareness and overall learning process from multiple spinal cord points to have holistic security requirement against ongoing activities. These operations are ingrained in every end devices, e.g., mobiles and sensors devices, and thus results in the realization of architecturally reactive security mechanism.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了由生物启发的安全性的概念设计，该安全性在任何时候可以保证采用交流设备（例如手机和传感器设备）的应用领域的最低安全弹性。 通过将适当的神经系统功能作为安全系统中的子系统，以人类神经系统为抵消异常事件的安全机制来抵消异常事件。 通过基于复杂性和资源可用性共享操作来实现大脑和脊髓（背喇叭）的建立。 脊髓操作负责处理两种不同的交流媒介，通过受体和效应子进行学习和报复。 大脑成分从多个脊髓点处理自我意识和整体学习过程，以应对正在进行的活动有整体安全要求。 这些操作根深蒂固，例如移动器和传感器设备，因此导致建筑反应性安全机制的实现。
papers.title_zh: 面向网络安全的仿生人类防御机制

papers.title: A Case Study in Tailoring a Bio-Inspired Cyber-Security Algorithm: Designing Anomaly Detection for Multilayer Networks
papers.authors: Gonzalo P. Suárez, Lazaros K. Gallos, Nina H. Fefferman
papers.abstract: Although bio-inspired designs for cybersecurity have yielded many elegant solutions to challenging problems, the vast majority of these efforts have been ad hoc analogies between the natural and human-designed systems. We propose to improve on the current approach of searching through the vast diversity of existing natural algorithms for one most closely resembling each new cybersecurity challenge, and then trying to replicate it in a designed cyber setting. Instead, we suggest that researchers should follow a protocol of functional abstraction, considering which features of the natural algorithm provide the efficiency/effectiveness in the real world, and then use those abstracted features as design components to build purposeful, tailored (perhaps even optimized) solutions. Here, we demonstrate how this can work by considering a case study employing this method. We design an extension of an existing (and ad hoc-created) algorithm, DIAMoND, for application beyond its originally intended solution space (detection of Distributed Denial of Service attacks in simple networks) to function on multilayer networks. We show how this protocol provides insights that might be harder or take longer to discover by direct analogy-building alone; in this case, we see that differential weighting of shared information by the providing network layer is likely to be effective.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管针对网络安全的生物启发的设计为具有挑战性的问题提供了许多优雅的解决方案，但这些努力中的绝大多数是自然和人类设计的系统之间的临时类比。 我们建议改善当前搜索方法，通过现有的自然算法的大量多样性，以与每个新的网络安全挑战相似，然后尝试在设计的网络环境中复制它。 取而代之的是，我们建议研究人员应遵循功能抽象的协议，考虑到自然算法的哪些特征可提供现实世界中的效率/有效性，然后使用这些抽象的功能作为设计组件来构建有目的的，量身定制的（甚至优化）（甚至优化） 解决方案。 在这里，我们通过考虑采用此方法的案例研究来证明这如何起作用。 我们设计了钻石现有（和临时创建的）算法的扩展，以超出其最初目的的解决方案空间（检测到简单网络中的分布式拒绝服务攻击），以在多层网络上运行。 我们展示了该协议如何通过直接类比建设来提供可能更难或更长的时间来提供洞察力； 在这种情况下，我们看到提供网络层的共享信息的差异加权可能有效。
papers.title_zh: 剪裁生物启发的网络安全算法的案例研究:为多层网络设计异常检测

papers.title: Diversity-Based Moving-Target Defense for Secure Wireless Vehicular Communications
papers.authors: Esraa M. Ghourab, Effat Samir, Mohamed Azab, Mohamed Eltoweissy
papers.abstract: Secure and reliable vehicle to vehicle (V2V) communication is a challenging task, particularly due to the wireless medium and the highly dynamic nature of the vehicular environment. There is a need to ensure wireless communication security against eavesdropping and signal jamming in such a highly dynamic environment. This paper proposes a spatiotemporal diversity-based mechanism that employs real time diversity to induce Moving-Target Defense (MTD); a defense mechanism inspired by nature. The mechanism is based on enabling flexible signal manipulation such as runtime diversification to confuse eavesdroppers by transmitting data across dynamic multi-paths relayed through vehicles traveling on a multi-lane road. Simulation results show that it would be very complicated for a malicious user to eavesdrop on a meaningful portion of the signal or jam a targeted data stream.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全可靠的车辆（V2V）通信是一项具有挑战性的任务，尤其是由于无线介质和车辆环境的高度动态性质。 有必要确保在如此高度动态的环境中确保无线通信安全性，以防止窃听并发出信号。 本文提出了一种基于时空多样性的机制，该机制采用实时多样性来诱导运动目标防御（MTD）； 一种受自然启发的防御机制。 该机制基于启用灵活的信号操纵，例如运行时多样化，通过通过在多车道道路上行驶的车辆中传输数据来传输数据来混淆窃听器。 仿真结果表明，恶意用户在信号的有意义的部分或堵塞目标数据流时窃听会非常复杂。
papers.title_zh: 基于分集的安全无线车载通信移动目标防御

papers.title: Biologically Inspired Safety and Security for Smart Built Environments: Position Paper
papers.authors: Denis Gracanin, Adam D'Amico, Mark Manuel, Walter Carson, Mohamed Eltoweissy, Liang Cheng
papers.abstract: In the era of emerging Smart Built Environments (SBEs), a smart house, unlike regular houses with static "components", consists of numerous interconnected and often actuated devices, capable of executing tasks independent of user supervision. Living in such a SBE, where for example, the furniture can rearrange itself, and the doors open and close of their own volition, may be difficult and unpredictable. Furthermore, cyber-security attacks and intrusion could allow attackers to assume control of the SBE, damage its components and to potentially harm its inhabitants. Such novel characteristics of SBEs present developers with several unique challenges with regards to implementing the needed safety and security measures and protocols that go along with them. With such environments, therefore, there is a need for a system that is capable of monitoring user activities in real-time, identifying the safety and security hazards to users in their immediate local context, warning users of these hazards, and perhaps even taking preventative and mitigative action against the hazards that it identified. In this paper, we survey some of these challenges and explore the design and implementation of a system designed around the safety and security of SBE inhabitants. We propose an approach to modeling SBE safety that combines the three laws of robotics and the swarm behavior model. We also present a preliminary prototype and discuss a case study.
papers.abstract_zh: 在新兴的智能构建环境（SBE）的时代，与具有静态“组件”的普通房屋不同，智能房屋由众多互连且经常被驱动的设备组成，能够执行独立于用户监督的任务。 生活在这样的SBE中，例如，家具可以重新排列，门开了，他们自己的意志开了，可能是困难且无法预测的。 此外，网络安全攻击和入侵可以使攻击者能够控制SBE，损坏其组成部分并潜在地损害其居民。 SBE的这种新颖特征向开发人员提出了一些独特的挑战。 因此，在这种环境中，需要一个能够实时监视用户活动的系统，确定对用户直接情况下对用户的安全危害，警告用户这些危害，甚至可能采取预防范围 以及针对其确定的危害的缓解行动。 在本文中，我们调查了其中一些挑战，并探讨了围绕SBE居民安全和保障的系统的设计和实施。 我们提出了一种建模SBE安全性的方法，该方法结合了机器人技术的三种定律和群体行为模型。 我们还提出了一个初步的原型，并讨论了一个案例研究。
papers.title_zh: 智能建筑环境的生物启发安全性:立场文件

papers.title: Redesigning Secure Protocols to Compel Grammatical Compliance Checking
papers.authors: Keith Irwin
papers.abstract: A frequent goal of LangSec research is to demonstrate the benefits of having protocol definitions whose messages can have their grammar checked to ensure that they are well-formed prior to any other processing. It is generally taken as a given that although we can design protocols which enable this checking, we cannot compel implementers of these protocols to actually carry out these checks. In this paper we demonstrate that it is possible to modify the protocols through the use of encryption such that the implementer is essentially required to do the checking if they wish their implementation to interoperate with other implementations without errors. Crucially, this will be the case even when they are only sending and receiving well-formed messages, thus transforming the silent vulnerability of unchecked messages into an obvious error. In specific, we demonstrate how to do this for checking whether or not messages or portions thereof belong to a specified regular language and whether or not they belong to a specified context-free language.
papers.abstract_zh: Langsec研究的经常目标是证明拥有协议定义的好处，该协议定义可以检查其语法以确保在其他处理之前对其进行良好的形式。 通常认为，尽管我们可以设计能够实现此检查的协议，但我们不能强迫这些协议的实施者实际执行这些检查。 在本文中，我们证明，可以通过使用加密来修改协议，以便实现实现者，如果他们希望实现其实现与其他没有错误的实现相互键入，则需要进行检查。 至关重要的是，即使他们仅发送和接收良好的消息，也将是这种情况，从而将未检查消息的无声漏洞转化为明显的错误。 具体而言，我们演示了如何进行检查以检查其消息或其部分是否属于指定的常规语言，以及它们是否属于指定的无上下文语言。
papers.title_zh: 重新设计安全协议以强制语法符合性检查

papers.title: A Binary Analysis Approach to Retrofit Security in Input Parsing Routines
papers.authors: Jayakrishna Menon, Christophe Hauser, Yan Shoshitaishvili, Stephen Schwab
papers.abstract: In spite of numerous attempts to mitigate memory corruption vulnerabilities in low-level code over the years, those remain the most common vector of software exploitation today. A common cause of such vulnerabilities is the presence of errors in string manipulation, which are often found in input parsers, where the format of input data is verified and eventually converted into an internal program representation. This process, if done manually in an ad-hoc manner, is error prone and easily leads to unsafe and potentially exploitable behavior. While principled approaches to input validation exist, such as those based on parser generators (e.g., Lex [20] and Ragel [28]), these require a formalization of the input grammar, which is not always a straightforward process and tends to dissuade programmers. As a result, a large portion of input parsing routines as found in commodity software is still implemented in an ad-hoc way, causing numerous security issues. We propose to address this problem from a post-development perspective, by targeting software presenting security risks in opaque, closed-source environments where software components have already been deployed and integrated, and where re-implementation is not an option (e.g., as part of an embedded device’s proprietary firmware). Our system is able to effectively detect vulnerability patterns in binary software and to retrofit security mechanisms preventing exploitation. In a semi-automated setting, it was able to discover an unknown security bug.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管多年来，这些尝试减轻了低级代码中的记忆损坏漏洞，但这些尝试仍然是当今软件开发的最常见向量。 这种漏洞的一个常见原因是字符串操纵中存在错误，这些错误通常在输入解析器中发现，其中输入数据的格式被验证并最终转换为内部程序表示。 如果以临时方式手动完成此过程，则容易出错，并且很容易导致不安全且可能可利用的行为。 尽管存在原则性的输入验证方法，例如基于解析器发生器的方法（例如Lex [20]和Ragel [28]），这些方法需要对输入语法进行形式化，这并不总是一个直接的过程，并且倾向于劝阻程序员 。 结果，商品软件中发现的大部分输入解析例程仍以临时方式实施，从而导致许多安全问题。 我们建议通过针对不透明的封闭源环境中的安全风险来解决此问题，在这些软件中，软件组件已经部署和集成了，并且不是选择（例如，作为一部分）重新实现。 嵌入式设备的专有固件）。 我们的系统能够有效地检测二进制软件中的脆弱性模式，并改造防止开发的安全机制。 在半自动设置中，它能够发现一个未知的安全错误。
papers.title_zh: 一种改进输入解析例程安全性的二元分析方法

papers.title: A Mathematical Modeling of Exploitations and Mitigation Techniques Using Set Theory
papers.authors: Rodrigo Branco, Kekai Hu, Henrique Kawakami, Ke Sun
papers.abstract: One of the most challenging problems in computer security is formalization of vulnerabilities, exploits, mitigations and their relationship. In spite of various existing researches and theories, a mathematical model that can be used to quantitatively represent and analyze exploit complexity and mitigation effectiveness is still in absence. In this work, we introduce a novel way of modeling exploits and mitigation techniques with mathematical concepts from set theory and big O notation. The proposed model establishes formulaic relationships between exploit primitives and exploit objectives, and enables the quantitative evaluation of vulnerabilities and security features in a system. We demonstrate the application of this model with two real world mitigation techniques. It serves as the first step toward a comprehensive mathematical understanding and modeling of exploitations and mitigations, which will largely benefit and facilitate the practice of system security assessment.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算机安全中最具挑战性的问题之一是对漏洞，漏洞，缓解及其关系的形式化。 尽管有各种现有的研究和理论，但可以用来定量代表和分析利用复杂性和缓解效率的数学模型仍然存在。 在这项工作中，我们介绍了一种新颖的方式，该方法通过设置理论和大o符号的数学概念来建模利用和缓解技术。 所提出的模型建立了利用原语与利用目标之间的公式关系，并可以对系统中的脆弱性和安全特征进行定量评估。 我们通过两种现实世界缓解技术证明了该模型的应用。 它是迈向全面的数学理解和对剥削和缓解的建模的第一步，这将在很大程度上受益并促进系统安全评估的实践。
papers.title_zh: 利用集合论对开发和缓解技术进行数学建模

papers.title: LangSec Revisited: Input Security Flaws of the Second Kind
papers.authors: Erik Poll
papers.abstract: We consider a simple classification of input flaws in two categories: (1) flaws in processing input, with buffer overflows in parsers as the classic example, and (2) flaws in forwarding input to some other system, aka injection flaws, with SQL injection and XSS as classic examples. The LangSec approach identifies common root causes for both categories of flaws, but much of the LangSec literature and efforts focus on the first category of flaws, especially on techniques to eliminate parser bugs. Therefore we take a look at some existing approaches to tackling the second category of flaws, to identify (anti)patterns and place these in the LangSec perspective.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑了两类输入缺陷的简单分类：（1）处理输入中的缺陷，缓冲层中的解析器溢出为经典示例，以及（2）将输入转发给其他系统的缺陷，也就是SQL注入， 和XSS作为经典示例。 Langsec方法确定了两类缺陷的常见根本原因，但是Langsec文献和努力的许多侧重于第一类缺陷，尤其是在消除解析器错误的技术上。 因此，我们看一些现有的方法来解决第二类缺陷，以识别（反）模式并将其放置在Langsec的观点中。
papers.title_zh: LangSec再探:第二类输入安全缺陷

papers.title: AI2: Safety and Robustness Certification of Neural Networks with Abstract Interpretation
papers.authors: Timon Gehr, Matthew Mirman, Dana Drachsler-Cohen, Petar Tsankov, Swarat Chaudhuri, Martin T. Vechev
papers.abstract: We present AI2, the first sound and scalable analyzer for deep neural networks. Based on overapproximation, AI2 can automatically prove safety properties (e.g., robustness) of realistic neural networks (e.g., convolutional neural networks). The key insight behind AI2 is to phrase reasoning about safety and robustness of neural networks in terms of classic abstract interpretation, enabling us to leverage decades of advances in that area. Concretely, we introduce abstract transformers that capture the behavior of fully connected and convolutional neural network layers with rectified linear unit activations (ReLU), as well as max pooling layers. This allows us to handle real-world neural networks, which are often built out of those types of layers. We present a complete implementation of AI2 together with an extensive evaluation on 20 neural networks. Our results demonstrate that: (i) AI2 is precise enough to prove useful specifications (e.g., robustness), (ii) AI2 can be used to certify the effectiveness of state-of-the-art defenses for neural networks, (iii) AI2 is significantly faster than existing analyzers based on symbolic analysis, which often take hours to verify simple fully connected networks, and (iv) AI2 can handle deep convolutional networks, which are beyond the reach of existing methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了AI2，这是深层神经网络的第一个声音和可扩展分析仪。 基于过度应用，AI2可以自动证明现实的神经网络（例如卷积神经网络）的安全性（例如鲁棒性）。 AI2背后的关键见解是用经典的抽象解释来表达关于神经网络安全性和鲁棒性的推理，从而使我们能够利用该领域的数十年进步。 具体而言，我们介绍了抽象变压器，以捕获具有整流线性单位激活（RELU）以及最大池层的完全连接和卷积神经网络层的行为。 这使我们能够处理现实世界中的神经网络，这些神经网络通常是由这些类型的层建立的。 我们提供了AI2的完整实施，以及对20个神经网络的广泛评估。 我们的结果表明：（i）AI2足够精确以证明有用的规格（例如鲁棒性），（ii）AI2可用于证明神经网络最先进的防御能力的有效性，（iii）AI2 基于符号分析通常需要花费数小时来验证简单完全连接的网络，并且（iv）AI2可以处理深度卷积网络，而这些卷积网络超出了现有方法的范围。
papers.title_zh: AI2:使用抽象解释的神经网络的安全性和鲁棒性认证

papers.title: Manipulating Machine Learning: Poisoning Attacks and Countermeasures for Regression Learning
papers.authors: Matthew Jagielski, Alina Oprea, Battista Biggio, Chang Liu, Cristina Nita-Rotaru, Bo Li
papers.abstract: As machine learning becomes widely used for automated decisions, attackers have strong incentives to manipulate the results and models generated by machine learning algorithms. In this paper, we perform the first systematic study of poisoning attacks and their countermeasures for linear regression models. In poisoning attacks, attackers deliberately influence the training data to manipulate the results of a predictive model. We propose a theoretically-grounded optimization framework specifically designed for linear regression and demonstrate its effectiveness on a range of datasets and models. We also introduce a fast statistical attack that requires limited knowledge of the training process. Finally, we design a new principled defense method that is highly resilient against all poisoning attacks. We provide formal guarantees about its convergence and an upper bound on the effect of poisoning attacks when the defense is deployed. We evaluate extensively our attacks and defenses on three realistic datasets from health care, loan assessment, and real estate domains.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着机器学习被广泛用于自动决策，攻击者具有强大的激励措施来操纵机器学习算法生成的结果和模型。 在本文中，我们对中毒攻击及其线性回归模型的对策进行了首次系统研究。 在中毒攻击中，攻击者故意影响训练数据，以操纵预测模型的结果。 我们提出了一个理论上的优化框架，专门为线性回归设计，并在一系列数据集和模型上展示了其有效性。 我们还引入了快速的统计攻击，需要有限的对培训过程的了解。 最后，我们设计了一种新的原则防御方法，该方法对所有中毒攻击具有很高的弹性。 我们提供有关其融合的正式保证，以及在部署辩方时对中毒攻击的影响的上限。 我们对来自医疗保健，贷款评估和房地产领域的三个现实数据集的攻击和防御进行了广泛的评估。
papers.title_zh: 操纵机器学习:回归学习的中毒攻击和对策

papers.title: Stealing Hyperparameters in Machine Learning
papers.authors: Binghui Wang, Neil Zhenqiang Gong
papers.abstract: Hyperparameters are critical in machine learning, as different hyperparameters often result in models with significantly different performance. Hyperparameters may be deemed confidential because of their commercial value and the confidentiality of the proprietary algorithms that the learner uses to learn them. In this work, we propose attacks on stealing the hyperparameters that are learned by a learner. We call our attacks hyperparameter stealing attacks. Our attacks are applicable to a variety of popular machine learning algorithms such as ridge regression, logistic regression, support vector machine, and neural network. We evaluate the effectiveness of our attacks both theoretically and empirically. For instance, we evaluate our attacks on Amazon Machine Learning. Our results demonstrate that our attacks can accurately steal hyperparameters. We also study countermeasures. Our results highlight the need for new defenses against our hyperparameter stealing attacks for certain machine learning algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 超参数对于机器学习至关重要，因为不同的超参数通常会导致具有明显不同的模型。 由于其商业价值和学习者用来学习它们的专有算法的机密性，因此可以将超级参数视为机密。 在这项工作中，我们提出了攻击学习者学到的超参数的攻击。 我们称我们的攻击超参数窃取攻击。 我们的攻击适用于各种流行的机器学习算法，例如脊回归，逻辑回归，支持向量机和神经网络。 我们从理论和经验上评估了攻击的有效性。 例如，我们评估对亚马逊机器学习的攻击。 我们的结果表明，我们的攻击可以准确窃取超参数。 我们还研究对策。 我们的结果强调了针对某些机器学习算法的超参数窃取攻击的新防御措施的需求。
papers.title_zh: 窃取机器学习中的超参数

papers.title: A Machine Learning Approach to Prevent Malicious Calls over Telephony Networks
papers.authors: Huichen Li, Xiaojun Xu, Chang Liu, Teng Ren, Kun Wu, Xuezhi Cao, Weinan Zhang, Yong Yu, Dawn Song
papers.abstract: Malicious calls, i.e., telephony spams and scams, have been a long-standing challenging issue that causes billions of dollars of annual financial loss worldwide. This work presents the first machine learning-based solution without relying on any particular assumptions on the underlying telephony network infrastructures. The main challenge of this decade-long problem is that it is unclear how to construct effective features without the access to the telephony networks' infrastructures. We solve this problem by combining several innovations. We first develop a TouchPal user interface on top of a mobile App to allow users tagging malicious calls. This allows us to maintain a large-scale call log database. We then conduct a measurement study over three months of call logs, including 9 billion records. We design 29 features based on the results, so that machine learning algorithms can be used to predict malicious calls. We extensively evaluate different state-of-the-art machine learning approaches using the proposed features, and the results show that the best approach can reduce up to 90% unblocked malicious calls while maintaining a precision over 99.99% on the benign call traffic. The results also show the models are efficient to implement without incurring a significant latency overhead. We also conduct ablation analysis, which reveals that using 10 out of the 29 features can reach a performance comparable to using all features.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意电话，即电话垃圾邮件和骗局，一直是一个长期以来的挑战性问题，在全球范围内造成数十亿美元的年度财务损失。 这项工作介绍了第一个基于机器学习的解决方案，而无需依靠对基础电话网络基础架构的任何特定假设。 这个长达十年的问题的主要挑战是，尚不清楚如何在不访问电话网络基础架构的情况下构建有效的功能。 我们通过结合几项创新来解决这个问题。 我们首先在移动应用程序的顶部开发触摸板用户界面，以允许用户标记恶意呼叫。 这使我们能够维护一个大规模的呼叫日志数据库。 然后，我们在三个月的呼叫日志中进行了一项测量研究，其中包括90亿个记录。 我们根据结果设计29个功能，以便可以使用机器学习算法来预测恶意调用。 我们使用拟议的功能广泛评估了不同的最新机器学习方法，结果表明，最佳方法可以减少90％的未经阻碍的恶意调用，同时在良性呼叫流量中保持超过99.99％的精度。 结果还表明，模型可以有效实施，而不会产生大量的延迟开销。 我们还进行了消融分析，该分析表明，使用29个功能中的10个可以达到与使用所有功能相当的性能。
papers.title_zh: 一种防止电话网络恶意呼叫的机器学习方法

papers.title: Surveylance: Automatically Detecting Online Survey Scams
papers.authors: Amin Kharraz, William K. Robertson, Engin Kirda
papers.abstract: Online surveys are a popular mechanism for performing market research in exchange for monetary compensation. Unfortunately, fraudulent survey websites are similarly rising in popularity among cyber-criminals as a means for executing social engineering attacks. In addition to the sizable population of users that participate in online surveys as a secondary revenue stream, unsuspecting users who search the web for free content or access codes to commercial software can also be exposed to survey scams. This occurs through redirection to websites that ask the user to complete a survey in order to receive the promised content or a reward. In this paper, we present SURVEYLANCE, the first system that automatically identifies survey scams using machine learning techniques. Our evaluation demonstrates that SURVEYLANCE works well in practice by identifying 8,623 unique websites involved in online survey attacks. We show that SURVEYLANCE is suitable for assisting human analysts in survey scam detection at scale. Our work also provides the first systematic analysis of the survey scam ecosystem by investigating the capabilities of these services, mapping all the parties involved in the ecosystem, and quantifying the consequences to users that are exposed to these services. Our analysis reveals that a large number of survey scams are easily reachable through the Alexa top 30K websites, and expose users to a wide range of security issues including identity fraud, deceptive advertisements, potentially unwanted programs (PUPs), malicious extensions, and malware.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线调查是进行市场研究以换取货币薪酬的流行机制。 不幸的是，欺诈性的调查网站同样在网络犯罪分子中的普及，作为执行社会工程攻击的一种手段。 除了作为次要收入流参与在线调查的大量用户人群外，搜索网络以获取免费内容或商业软件的访问代码的毫无戒心的用户也可以暴露在调查骗局中。 这是通过重定向到要求用户完成调查以收到应许内容或奖励的网站的。 在本文中，我们介绍了SurveyLance，这是第一个使用机器学习技术自动标识调查骗局的系统。 我们的评估表明，通过确定在线调查攻击中涉及的8,623个独特的网站，调查列表在实践中效果很好。 我们表明，调查列表适合协助人类分析师进行大规模调查骗局检测。 我们的工作还通过调查这些服务的功能，绘制与生态系统有关的所有各方的绘制以及对暴露于这些服务的用户的后果来提供对调查骗局生态系统的首次系统分析。 我们的分析表明，通过Alexa Top 30k网站可以轻松地接触大量的调查骗局，并将用户暴露于广泛的安全问题，包括身份欺诈，欺骗性广告，潜在的不必要的程序（PUP），恶意扩展和恶意软件。
papers.title_zh: Surveylance:自动检测在线调查骗局

papers.title: Privacy Risks with Facebook's PII-Based Targeting: Auditing a Data Broker's Advertising Interface
papers.authors: Giridhari Venkatadri, Athanasios Andreou, Yabing Liu, Alan Mislove, Krishna P. Gummadi, Patrick Loiseau, Oana Goga
papers.abstract: Sites like Facebook and Google now serve as de facto data brokers, aggregating data on users for the purpose of implementing powerful advertising platforms. Historically, these services allowed advertisers to select which users see their ads via targeting attributes. Recently, most advertising platforms have begun allowing advertisers to target users directly by uploading the personal information of the users who they wish to advertise to (e.g., their names, email addresses, phone numbers, etc.); these services are often known as custom audiences. Custom audiences effectively represent powerful linking mechanisms, allowing advertisers to leverage any PII (e.g., from customer data, public records, etc.) to target users. In this paper, we focus on Facebook's custom audience implementation and demonstrate attacks that allow an adversary to exploit the interface to infer users' PII as well as to infer their activity. Specifically, we show how the adversary can infer users' full phone numbers knowing just their email address, determine whether a particular user visited a website, and de-anonymize all the visitors to a website by inferring their phone numbers en masse. These attacks can be conducted without any interaction with the victim(s), cannot be detected by the victim(s), and do not require the adversary to spend money or actually place an ad. We propose a simple and effective fix to the attacks based on reworking the way Facebook de-duplicates uploaded information. Facebook's security team acknowledged the vulnerability and has put into place a fix that is a variant of the fix we propose. Overall, our results indicate that advertising platforms need to carefully consider the privacy implications of their interfaces.
papers.abstract_zh: Facebook和Google等网站现在是事实上的数据经纪人，为用户汇总数据，目的是实施强大的广告平台。 从历史上看，这些服务使广告商可以通过定位属性选择哪些用户查看其广告。 最近，大多数广告平台已经开始允许广告客户通过上传他们希望广告宣传的用户的个人信息直接针对用户（例如，他们的姓名，电子邮件地址，电话号码等）； 这些服务通常称为自定义受众。 自定义受众有效地代表了强大的链接机制，使广告客户能够利用任何PII（例如，从客户数据，公共记录等）来实现目标用户。 在本文中，我们专注于Facebook的自定义受众实现，并展示攻击，使对手可以利用界面来推断用户的PII以及推断其活动。 具体来说，我们展示了对手如何仅知道他们的电子邮件地址的完整电话号码，确定特定用户是否访问了网站，并通过推断他们的电话号码来宣传网站的所有访问者。 这些攻击可以在没有与受害者的任何互动的情况下进行，受害者无法检测到，也不需要对手花钱或实际上放置广告。 我们建议基于重新设计Facebook删除上载信息的方式，为攻击提出一个简单有效的修复。 Facebook的安全团队承认了漏洞，并将修复程序设置为我们提出的修复程序的变体。 总体而言，我们的结果表明，广告平台需要仔细考虑其界面的隐私影响。
papers.title_zh: 脸书PII定向的隐私风险:审计数据经纪人的广告界面

papers.title: Anonymity Trilemma: Strong Anonymity, Low Bandwidth Overhead, Low Latency - Choose Two
papers.authors: Debajyoti Das, Sebastian Meiser, Esfandiar Mohammadi, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: This work investigates the fundamental constraints of anonymous communication (AC) protocols. We analyze the relationship between bandwidth overhead, latency overhead, and sender anonymity or recipient anonymity against the global passive (network-level) adversary. We confirm the trilemma that an AC protocol can only achieve two out of the following three properties: strong anonymity (i.e., anonymity up to a negligible chance), low bandwidth overhead, and low latency overhead. We further study anonymity against a stronger global passive adversary that can additionally passively compromise some of the AC protocol nodes. For a given number of compromised nodes, we derive necessary constraints between bandwidth and latency overhead whose violation make it impossible for an AC protocol to achieve strong anonymity. We analyze prominent AC protocols from the literature and depict to which extent those satisfy our necessary constraints. Our fundamental necessary constraints offer a guideline not only for improving existing AC systems but also for designing novel AC protocols with non-traditional bandwidth and latency overhead choices.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作调查了匿名通信（AC）协议的基本限制。 我们分析了带宽开销，延迟开销和发件人匿名或接收者对全球被动（网络级）对手的关系之间的关系。 我们确认三元组只能在以下三个属性中实现两个属性中的两个：强匿名（即匿名性，直到可以忽略不计），低带宽开销和低延迟开销。 我们进一步研究匿名性，以对更强大的全球被动对手进行匿名，该对手可能会被动地损害某些AC协议节点。 对于给定数量的折衷节点，我们得出了带宽和延迟开销之间的必要约束，这些违规行为使AC协议无法实现强大的匿名性。 我们分析了文献中突出的AC协议，并描述了这些协议在多大程度上满足我们必要的约束。 我们的基本必要约束不仅为改善现有的交流系统，而且还为设计具有非传统带宽和延迟间接费用选择的新型AC协议提供了指南。
papers.title_zh: 匿名三难:强匿名，低带宽开销，低延迟-选择两个

papers.title: Locally Differentially Private Frequent Itemset Mining
papers.authors: Tianhao Wang, Ninghui Li, Somesh Jha
papers.abstract: The notion of Local Differential Privacy (LDP) enables users to respond to sensitive questions while preserving their privacy. The basic LDP frequent oracle (FO) protocol enables an aggregator to estimate the frequency of any value. But when each user has a set of values, one needs an additional padding and sampling step to find the frequent values and estimate their frequencies. In this paper, we formally define such padding and sample based frequency oracles (PSFO). We further identify the privacy amplification property in PSFO. As a result, we propose SVIM, a protocol for finding frequent items in the set-valued LDP setting. Experiments show that under the same privacy guarantee and computational cost, SVIM significantly improves over existing methods. With SVIM to find frequent items, we propose SVSM to effectively find frequent itemsets, which to our knowledge has not been done before in the LDP setting.
papers.abstract_zh: 当地差异隐私（LDP）的概念使用户能够在保留其隐私时回答敏感问题。 基本的LDP频繁的Oracle（FO）协议使聚合可以估计任何值的频率。 但是，当每个用户都有一组值时，需要一个额外的填充和采样步骤才能找到频繁的值并估算其频率。 在本文中，我们正式定义了此类填充和基于样品的频率甲壳（PSFO）。 我们进一步确定PSFO中的隐私放大属性。 结果，我们提出了SVIM，该协议是在设定值的LDP设置中找到频繁项目的协议。 实验表明，在相同的隐私保证和计算成本下，SVIM在现有方法上显着改善。 使用SVIM查找频繁的项目，我们建议SVSM有效地找到频繁的项目集，据我们所知，在LDP设置之前尚未完成。
papers.title_zh: 局部差异私有频繁项集挖掘

papers.title: EyeTell: Video-Assisted Touchscreen Keystroke Inference from Eye Movements
papers.authors: Yimin Chen, Tao Li, Rui Zhang, Yanchao Zhang, Terri Hedgpeth
papers.abstract: Keystroke inference attacks pose an increasing threat to ubiquitous mobile devices. This paper presents EyeTell, a novel video-assisted attack that can infer a victim's keystrokes on his touchscreen device from a video capturing his eye movements. EyeTell explores the observation that human eyes naturally focus on and follow the keys they type, so a typing sequence on a soft keyboard results in a unique gaze trace of continuous eye movements. In contrast to prior work, EyeTell requires neither the attacker to visually observe the victim's inputting process nor the victim device to be placed on a static holder. Comprehensive experiments on iOS and Android devices confirm the high efficacy of EyeTell for inferring PINs, lock patterns, and English words under various environmental conditions.
papers.abstract_zh: 击键推理攻击对无处不在的移动设备构成了越来越多的威胁。 本文介绍了Eyetell，这是一种新颖的视频辅助攻击，可以通过视频捕捉他的眼睛动作来推断受害者在触摸屏设备上的击键。 Eyetell探讨了人眼自然关注并遵循其键入的键的观察，因此在软键盘上的打字顺序会导致独特的凝视痕迹连续的眼动。 与先前的工作相反，Eyetell不要求攻击者在视觉上观察受害者的投入过程，也不需要将受害者装置放在静态持有人上。 关于iOS和Android设备的综合实验证实了Eyetell在各种环境条件下推断引脚，锁定图案和英语单词的高效率。
papers.title_zh: EyeTell:通过眼球运动推断视频辅助触摸屏按键

papers.title: Understanding Linux Malware
papers.authors: Emanuele Cozzi, Mariano Graziano, Yanick Fratantonio, Davide Balzarotti
papers.abstract: For the past two decades, the security community has been fighting malicious programs for Windows-based operating systems. However, the recent surge in adoption of embedded devices and the IoT revolution are rapidly changing the malware landscape. Embedded devices are profoundly different than traditional personal computers. In fact, while personal computers run predominantly on x86-flavored architectures, embedded systems rely on a variety of different architectures. In turn, this aspect causes a large number of these systems to run some variants of the Linux operating system, pushing malicious actors to give birth to ""Linux malware."" To the best of our knowledge, there is currently no comprehensive study attempting to characterize, analyze, and understand Linux malware. The majority of resources on the topic are available as sparse reports often published as blog posts, while the few systematic studies focused on the analysis of specific families of malware (e.g., the Mirai botnet) mainly by looking at their network-level behavior, thus leaving the main challenges of analyzing Linux malware unaddressed. This work constitutes the first step towards filling this gap. After a systematic exploration of the challenges involved in the process, we present the design and implementation details of the first malware analysis pipeline specifically tailored for Linux malware. We then present the results of the first large-scale measurement study conducted on 10,548 malware samples (collected over a time frame of one year) documenting detailed statistics and insights that can help directing future work in the area.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的二十年中，安全社区一直在为基于Windows的操作系统的恶意计划作斗争。 但是，最近采用嵌入式设备和物联网革命的激增正在迅速改变恶意软件的景观。 嵌入式设备与传统的个人计算机有很大不同。 实际上，尽管个人计算机主要在X86味体架构上运行，但嵌入式系统依赖于各种不同的体系结构。 反过来，这一方面使大量这些系统运行Linux操作系统的一些变体，推动恶意演员诞生“ Linux Malware”。“据我们所知，目前没有全面的研究尝试 表征，分析和理解Linux恶意软件。 该主题的大多数资源可作为通常以博客文章发表的稀疏报告获得，而少数系统的研究重点是分析特定的恶意软件家族（例如，Mirai Botnet），主要是通过查看其网络级别的行为，因此 离开分析Linux恶意软件的主要挑战。 这项工作构成了填补这一空白的第一步。 在对过程中涉及的挑战进行系统的探索之后，我们介绍了专门针对Linux恶意软件量身定制的第一个恶意软件分析管道的设计和实现细节。 然后，我们介绍了对10,548个恶意软件样本（一年的时间范围内收集）进行的首次大规模测量研究的结果，该研究记录了详细的统计和见解，这些统计数据和见解可以帮助指导该地区未来的工作。
papers.title_zh: 了解Linux恶意软件

papers.title: Racing in Hyperspace: Closing Hyper-Threading Side Channels on SGX with Contrived Data Races
papers.authors: Guoxing Chen, Wenhao Wang, Tianyu Chen, Sanchuan Chen, Yinqian Zhang, XiaoFeng Wang, Ten-Hwang Lai, Dongdai Lin
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present HYPERRACE, an LLVM-based tool for instrumenting SGX enclave programs to eradicate all side-channel threats due to Hyper-Threading. HYPERRACE creates a shadow thread for each enclave thread and asks the underlying untrusted operating system to schedule both threads on the same physical core whenever enclave code is invoked, so that Hyper-Threading side channels are closed completely. Without placing additional trust in the operating system's CPU scheduler, HYPERRACE conducts a physical-core co-location test: it first constructs a communication channel between the threads using a shared variable inside the enclave and then measures the communication speed to verify that the communication indeed takes place in the shared L1 data cache—a strong indicator of physical-core co-location. The key novelty of the work is the measurement of communication speed without a trustworthy clock; instead, relative time measurements are taken via contrived data races on the shared variable. It is worth noting that the emphasis of HYPERRACE's defense against Hyper-Threading side channels is because they are open research problems. In fact, HYPERRACE also detects the occurrence of exception-or interrupt-based side channels, the solutions of which have been studied by several prior works.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了Hyperrace，这是一种基于LLVM的工具，用于启动SGX Enclave程序，以消除由于超线程而引起的所有侧向通道威胁。 HyperRace为每个飞地线程创建一个阴影线程，并要求在调用Enclave代码时，基础不信任的操作系统将两个线程安排在同一物理核心上，以便超线程侧通道完全关闭。 Hyperrace不在操作系统的CPU调度程序中提出额外的信任，而是执行物理核心共处测试：它首先使用飞地内部的共享变量在线程之间构建通信渠道，然后测量通信速度以验证通信的确如此 发生在共享的L1数据缓存中，这是实物核心共同座位的有力指标。 这项工作的主要新颖性是衡量通信速度而没有值得信赖的时钟。 相反，相对时间测量是通过共享变量上的人为数据竞赛进行的。 值得注意的是，Hyperrace对超线程侧渠道的防御的重点是因为它们是开放的研究问题。 实际上，Hyperrace还检测出异常或中断的侧通道的发生，其解决方案已通过几项先前的工作研究。
papers.title_zh: 超空间中的竞赛:用人为的数据竞赛关闭SGX上的超线程侧通道

papers.title: Grand Pwning Unit: Accelerating Microarchitectural Attacks with the GPU
papers.authors: Pietro Frigo, Cristiano Giuffrida, Herbert Bos, Kaveh Razavi
papers.abstract: Dark silicon is pushing processor vendors to add more specialized units such as accelerators to commodity processor chips. Unfortunately this is done without enough care to security. In this paper we look at the security implications of integrated Graphical Processor Units (GPUs) found in almost all mobile processors. We demonstrate that GPUs, already widely employed to accelerate a variety of benign applications such as image rendering, can also be used to "accelerate" microarchitectural attacks (i.e., making them more effective) on commodity platforms. In particular, we show that an attacker can build all the necessary primitives for performing effective GPU-based microarchitectural attacks and that these primitives are all exposed to the web through standardized browser extensions, allowing side-channel and Rowhammer attacks from JavaScript. These attacks bypass state-of-the-art mitigations and advance existing CPU-based attacks: we show the first end-to-end microarchitectural compromise of a browser running on a mobile phone in under two minutes by orchestrating our GPU primitives. While powerful, these GPU primitives are not easy to implement due to undocumented hardware features. We describe novel reverse engineering techniques for peeking into the previously unknown cache architecture and replacement policy of the Adreno 330, an integrated GPU found in many common mobile platforms. This information is necessary when building shader programs implementing our GPU primitives. We conclude by discussing mitigations against GPU-enabled attackers.
papers.abstract_zh: Dark Silicon正在推动处理器供应商在商品处理器芯片中添加更多专业单元，例如加速器。 不幸的是，这是在没有足够护理的情况下完成的。 在本文中，我们研究了几乎所有移动处理器中发现的集成图形处理器单元（GPU）的安全含义。 我们证明，已经广泛用于加速各种良性应用（例如图像渲染）的GPU也可用于“加速”微体系式攻击（即使它们在商品平台上更有效）。 特别是，我们表明攻击者可以构建所有必要的原始图，以执行有效的基于GPU的微体系攻击，并且这些原始图都通过标准化的浏览器扩展名暴露于Web，从而允许JavaScript的侧向通道和RowHammer攻击。 这些攻击绕过了最新的缓解，并推进了现有的基于CPU的攻击：我们显示了第一个端到端的微体系结构折衷方案，即在两分钟内在手机上运行的浏览器通过安排我们的GPU原始人。 虽然功能强大，但由于无证件的硬件功能，这些GPU原始图并不容易实现。 我们描述了用于窥视以前未知的高速缓存体系结构和Adreno 330的替换政策的新颖逆向工程技术，Adreno 330是在许多常见的移动平台中发现的集成GPU。 当构建实施我们的GPU原语的着色器程序时，需要此信息。 我们通过讨论针对支持GPU的攻击者的缓解来结束。
papers.title_zh: GPU加速微体系结构攻击

papers.title: SoK: Keylogging Side Channels
papers.authors: John V. Monaco
papers.abstract: The first keylogging side channel attack was discovered over 50 years ago when Bell Laboratory researchers noticed an electromagnetic spike emanating from a Bell 131-B2 teletype terminal. This spike, emitted upon each key press, enabled up to 75% of plaintext communications to be recovered in field conditions. Since then, keylogging attacks have come to leverage side channels emanating from the user's finger and hand movements, countless keyboard electromagnetic and acoustic emanations, microarchitectural attacks on the host computer, and encrypted network traffic. These attacks can each be characterized by the type of information the side channel leaks: a spatial side channel reveals physical key locations or the similarity between key pairs, and a temporal side channel leverages key press and release timings. We define and evaluate the performance of idealized spatial and temporal keylogging side channels and find that, under the assumption of typing English words, nontrivial information gains can be achieved even in the presence of substantial measurement error. For temporal side channels, we find that the information gained by different temporal features strongly correlates to typing speed and style. Finally, to help drive future research, we review the current state-of-the-art keylogging side channel attacks and discuss some of the mitigation techniques that can be applied.
papers.abstract_zh: 在50年前，当贝尔实验室研究人员注意到贝尔131-B2电视终端发出的电磁尖峰时，首次发现了第一次钥匙扣侧通道攻击。 在每个钥匙按下发出的尖峰，最多可在现场条件下恢复了多达75％的明文通信。 从那时起，键盘攻击就开始利用用户的手指和手动移动，无数键盘电磁和声学发射，对主机计算机上的微体系攻击以及加密网络流量的侧渠道。 这些攻击都可以以信息类型为特征，侧通道泄漏：空间侧通道揭示了物理钥匙位置或密钥对之间的相似性，并且时间侧通道利用了键按键和释放时间。 我们定义和评估理想化的空间和时间键换侧通道的性能，并发现，在键入英语单词的假设下，即使存在实质性测量误差，也可以实现非平凡的信息获得。 对于时间侧渠道，我们发现不同的时间功能获得的信息与打字速度和样式密切相关。 最后，为了帮助推动未来的研究，我们回顾了当前的最新钥匙扣侧渠道攻击，并讨论了可以应用的一些缓解技术。
papers.title_zh: SoK:键盘记录侧通道

papers.title: FPGA-Based Remote Power Side-Channel Attacks
papers.authors: Mark Zhao, G. Edward Suh
papers.abstract: The rapid adoption of heterogeneous computing has driven the integration of Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) into cloud datacenters and flexible System-on-Chips (SoCs). This paper shows that the integrated FPGA introduces a new security vulnerability by enabling software-based power side-channel attacks without physical proximity to a target system. We first demonstrate that an on-chip power monitor can be built on a modern FPGA using ring oscillators (ROs), and characterize its ability to observe the power consumption of other modules on the FPGA or the SoC. Then, we show that the RO-based FPGA power monitor can be used for a successful power analysis attack on an RSA cryptomodule on the same FPGA. Additionally, we show that the FPGA-based power monitor can observe the power consumption of a CPU on the same SoC, and demonstrate that the FPGA-to-CPU power side-channel attack can break timing-channel protection for a RSA program running on a CPU. This work introduces and demonstrates remote power side-channel attacks using an FPGA, showing that the common assumption that power side-channel attacks require specialized equipment and physical access to the victim hardware is not true for systems with an integrated FPGA.
papers.abstract_zh: 异质计算的快速采用使现场可编程栅极阵列（FPGA）的集成到云数据中心和灵活的芯片（SOCS）中。 本文表明，集成的FPGA通过实现基于软件的功率侧通道攻击而无需物理靠近目标系统，从而引入了新的安全漏洞。 我们首先证明，可以使用环振荡器（ROS）在现代FPGA上构建芯片电源监视器，并表征其观察FPGA或SOC上其他模块功耗的能力。 然后，我们表明，基于RO的FPGA电源显示器可用于对同一FPGA上RSA加密模块进行成功的功率分析攻击。 此外，我们表明，基于FPGA的电源监视器可以观察同一SOC上CPU的功耗，并证明FPGA-TO-CPU功率侧渠道攻击可以打破对运行RSA程序的定时通道保护。 CPU。 这项工作介绍并使用FPGA介绍了远程电源侧通道攻击，这表明通用侧通道攻击需要专门的设备和对受害者硬件的物理访问的常见假设对于具有集成FPGA的系统而言是不正确的。
papers.title_zh: 基于FPGA的远程功率旁路攻击

papers.title: Another Flip in the Wall of Rowhammer Defenses
papers.authors: Daniel Gruss, Moritz Lipp, Michael Schwarz, Daniel Genkin, Jonas Juffinger, Sioli O'Connell, Wolfgang Schoechl, Yuval Yarom
papers.abstract: The Rowhammer bug allows unauthorized modification of bits in DRAM cells from unprivileged software, enabling powerful privilege-escalation attacks. Sophisticated Rowhammer countermeasures have been presented, aiming at mitigating the Rowhammer bug or its exploitation. However, the state of the art provides insufficient insight on the completeness of these defenses. In this paper, we present novel Rowhammer attack and exploitation primitives, showing that even a combination of all defenses is ineffective. Our new attack technique, one-location hammering, breaks previous assumptions on requirements for triggering the Rowhammer bug, i.e., we do not hammer multiple DRAM rows but only keep one DRAM row constantly open. Our new exploitation technique, opcode flipping, bypasses recent isolation mechanisms by flipping bits in a predictable and targeted way in userspace binaries. We replace conspicuous and memory-exhausting spraying and grooming techniques with a novel reliable technique called memory waylaying. Memory waylaying exploits system-level optimizations and a side channel to coax the operating system into placing target pages at attacker-chosen physical locations. Finally, we abuse Intel SGX to hide the attack entirely from the user and the operating system, making any inspection or detection of the attack infeasible. Our Rowhammer enclave can be used for coordinated denial-of-service attacks in the cloud and for privilege escalation on personal computers. We demonstrate that our attacks evade all previously proposed countermeasures for commodity systems.
papers.abstract_zh: Rowhammer错误允许未经授权修改来自无特权软件的DRAM单元格中的位，从而实现强大的特权降低攻击。 已经提出了精致的行锤对策，目的是减轻绳锤错误或剥削。 但是，艺术的状态提供了对这些防御能力完整性的足够洞察力。 在本文中，我们提出了新颖的Rowhammer攻击和剥削原语，表明即使所有防御能力的组合也无效。 我们的新攻击技术（一点点锤击）打破了先前对触发Rowhammer错误的要求的假设，即我们不敲打多个DRAM行，而只能保持一个DRAM行不断打开。 我们的新剥削技术OpCode翻转，通过以可预测且有针对性的用户空间二进制文件的方式翻转位来绕过最近的隔离机制。 我们用一种称为Memory Waylaying的新型可靠技术代替了明显和内存的喷涂和修饰技术。 内存Waylay利用系统级优化和辅助操作系统将目标页面放置在攻击者选择的物理位置上的侧通道。 最后，我们滥用Intel SGX，将攻击完全隐藏在用户和操作系统中，从而使攻击的任何检查或检测不可行。 我们的Rowhammer飞地可用于云中的协调拒绝服务攻击，并在个人计算机上升级。 我们证明，我们的攻击逃避了所有先前提出的商品系统的对策。
papers.title_zh: Rowhammer防御墙的又一次翻转

papers.title: EnclaveDB: A Secure Database Using SGX
papers.authors: Christian Priebe, Kapil Vaswani, Manuel Costa
papers.abstract: We propose EnclaveDB, a database engine that guarantees confidentiality, integrity, and freshness for data and queries. EnclaveDB guarantees these properties even when the database administrator is malicious, when an attacker has compromised the operating system or the hypervisor, and when the database runs in an untrusted host in the cloud. EnclaveDB achieves this by placing sensitive data (tables, indexes and other metadata) in enclaves protected by trusted hardware (such as Intel SGX). EnclaveDB has a small trusted computing base, which includes an in-memory storage and query engine, a transaction manager and pre-compiled stored procedures. A key component of EnclaveDB is an efficient protocol for checking integrity and freshness of the database log. The protocol supports concurrent, asynchronous appends and truncation, and requires minimal synchronization between threads. Our experiments using standard database benchmarks and a performance model that simulates large enclaves show that EnclaveDB achieves strong security with low overhead (up to 40% for TPC-C) compared to an industry strength in-memory database engine.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了EnclavedB，这是一种保证数据和查询的机密性，完整性和新鲜度。 即使数据库管理员是恶意的，攻击者损害了操作系统或管理程序，以及数据库在云中的不信任主机中运行时，EnclavedB也可以保证这些属性。 EnclavedB通过将敏感数据（表，索引和其他元数据）放在受信任硬件保护（例如Intel SGX）保护的飞地中来实现这一目标。 EnclavedB具有一个小的值得信赖的计算基础，其中包括内存存储和查询引擎，事务管理器和预编译的存储过程。 EnclavedB的关键组成部分是用于检查数据库日志的完整性和新鲜度的有效协议。 该协议支持并发，异步附加和截断，并且需要在线程之间最小的同步。 我们使用标准数据库基准和模拟大型飞地的性能模型的实验表明，与行业强度内部的数据库引擎相比，EnclavEdB以低开销（TPC-C最高40％）实现了强大的安全性（TPC-C高达40％）。
papers.title_zh: EnclaveDB:使用SGX的安全数据库

papers.title: Oblix: An Efficient Oblivious Search Index
papers.authors: Pratyush Mishra, Rishabh Poddar, Jerry Chen, Alessandro Chiesa, Raluca Ada Popa
papers.abstract: Search indices are fundamental building blocks of many systems, and there is great interest in running them on encrypted data. Unfortunately, many known schemes that enable search queries on encrypted data achieve efficiency at the expense of security, as they reveal access patterns to the encrypted data. In this paper we present Oblix, a search index for encrypted data that is oblivious (provably hides access patterns), is dynamic (supports inserts and deletes), and has good efficiency. Oblix relies on a combination of novel oblivious-access techniques and recent hardware enclave platforms (e.g., Intel SGX). In particular, a key technical contribution is the design and implementation of doubly-oblivious data structures, in which the client's accesses to its internal memory are oblivious, in addition to accesses to its external memory at the server. These algorithms are motivated by hardware enclaves like SGX, which leak access patterns to both internal and external memory. We demonstrate the usefulness of Oblix in several applications: private contact discovery for Signal, private retrieval of public keys for Key Transparency, and searchable encryption that hides access patterns and result sizes.
papers.abstract_zh: 搜索指数是许多系统的基本构建基础，并且有很大的兴趣在加密数据上运行它们。 不幸的是，许多已知的方案启用有关加密数据的搜索查询，以牺牲安全性为代价，因为它们揭示了对加密数据的访问模式。 在本文中，我们介绍Oblix是一个遗忘数据的搜索索引（可证明隐藏访问模式）是动态的（支持插入和删除），并且具有良好的效率。 Oblix依靠新颖的遗忘技术和最近的硬件飞地平台（例如Intel SGX）的结合。 特别是，关键的技术贡献是设计和实现双重脉络性的数据结构，除了访问服务器上的外部内存外，客户对内部内存的访问是忽略的。 这些算法是由诸如SGX之类的硬件飞地激励的，该算法将访问模式泄漏到内部和外部内存。 我们证明了Oblix在几种应用中的实用性：信号的私人联系发现，私人检索以进行关键透明度，以及可搜索的加密，以隐藏访问模式和结果大小。
papers.title_zh: Oblix:一种高效的遗忘搜索索引

papers.title: Improved Reconstruction Attacks on Encrypted Data Using Range Query Leakage
papers.authors: Marie-Sarah Lacharité, Brice Minaud, Kenneth G. Paterson
papers.abstract: We analyse the security of database encryption schemes supporting range queries against persistent adversaries. The bulk of our work applies to a generic setting, where the adversary's view is limited to the set of records matched by each query (known as access pattern leakage). We also consider a more specific setting where rank information is also leaked, which is inherent inherent to multiple recent encryption schemes supporting range queries. We provide three attacks. First, we consider full reconstruction, which aims to recover the value of every record, fully negating encryption. We show that for dense datasets, full reconstruction is possible within an expected number of queries N log N + O(N), where N is the number of distinct plaintext values. This directly improves on a quadratic bound in the same setting by Kellaris et al. (CCS 2016). Second, we present an approximate reconstruction attack recovering all plaintext values in a dense dataset within a constant ratio of error, requiring the access pattern leakage of only O(N) queries. Third, we devise an attack in the common setting where the adversary has access to an auxiliary distribution for the target dataset. This third attack proves highly effective on age data from real-world medical data sets. In our experiments, observing only 25 queries was sufficient to reconstruct a majority of records to within 5 years. In combination, our attacks show that current approaches to enabling range queries offer little security when the threat model goes beyond snapshot attacks to include a persistent server-side adversary.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们分析了针对持久对手的范围查询数据库加密方案的安全性。 我们的大部分工作适用于通用设置，在该设置中，对手的视图仅限于每个查询（称为访问模式泄漏）匹配的一组记录。 我们还考虑了一个更具体的设置，其中还泄漏了等级信息，这是支持范围查询的多个最新加密方案固有的固有的。 我们提供三项攻击。 首先，我们考虑完整的重建，该重建旨在恢复每个记录的价值，从而完全否定加密。 我们表明，对于密集的数据集，在预期数量的查询n log n + o（n）中可以进行完整的重构，其中n是不同的明文值的数量。 这直接改善了Kellaris等人在同一环境中的二次结合。 （CCS 2016）。 其次，我们提出近似重建攻击，以在恒定的误差之比内恢复所有明文值，要求仅O（n）查询的访问模式泄漏。 第三，我们在公共环境中设计了一次攻击，在该环境中，对手可以访问目标数据集的辅助分布。 第三次攻击证明了来自现实世界医学数据集的年龄数据非常有效。 在我们的实验中，只观察25个查询足以在5年内重建大多数记录。 结合起来，我们的攻击表明，当威胁模型超出快照攻击以包括持久的服务器端对手时，当前的范围查询方法几乎没有安全性。
papers.title_zh: 利用范围查询泄漏对加密数据进行改进的重构攻击

papers.title: Bulletproofs: Short Proofs for Confidential Transactions and More
papers.authors: Benedikt Bünz, Jonathan Bootle, Dan Boneh, Andrew Poelstra, Pieter Wuille, Gregory Maxwell
papers.abstract: We propose Bulletproofs, a new non-interactive zero-knowledge proof protocol with very short proofs and without a trusted setup; the proof size is only logarithmic in the witness size. Bulletproofs are especially well suited for efficient range proofs on committed values: they enable proving that a committed value is in a range using only 2 log_2(n)+9 group and field elements, where n is the bit length of the range. Proof generation and verification times are linear in n. Bulletproofs greatly improve on the linear (in n) sized range proofs in existing proposals for confidential transactions in Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Moreover, Bulletproofs supports aggregation of range proofs, so that a party can prove that m commitments lie in a given range by providing only an additive O(log(m)) group elements over the length of a single proof. To aggregate proofs from multiple parties, we enable the parties to generate a single proof without revealing their inputs to each other via a simple multi-party computation (MPC) protocol for constructing Bulletproofs. This MPC protocol uses either a constant number of rounds and linear communication, or a logarithmic number of rounds and logarithmic communication. We show that verification time, while asymptotically linear, is very efficient in practice. The marginal cost of batch verifying 32 aggregated range proofs is less than the cost of verifying 32 ECDSA signatures. Bulletproofs build on the techniques of Bootle et al. (EUROCRYPT 2016). Beyond range proofs, Bulletproofs provide short zero-knowledge proofs for general arithmetic circuits while only relying on the discrete logarithm assumption and without requiring a trusted setup. We discuss many applications that would benefit from Bulletproofs, primarily in the area of cryptocurrencies. The efficiency of Bulletproofs is particularly well suited for the distributed and trustless nature of blockchains. The full version of this article is available on ePrint.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们建议防弹，这是一种新的非交互式零知识证明协议，具有非常短的证明，没有值得信赖的设置； 证明大小仅在见证人的大小中。 防弹尤其非常适合在承诺值上有效的范围证明：它们能够证明，仅使用2个log_2（n）+9组和场元素，其中n是范围的位长度。 证明生成和验证时间在n中是线性的。 在现有的针对比特币和其他加密货币的机密交易的建议中，防弹量大大改善了线性（N）大小的范围证明。 此外，Bulletproofs支持范围证明的汇总，因此一方可以通过仅在单个证明的长度上提供添加剂O（log（log（m））组元素，就可以证明M承诺位于给定范围内。 为了汇总多个政党的证明，我们使各方能够通过简单的多方计算（MPC）协议来生成单个证明，而无需互相揭示其输入，以构建防弹置。 该MPC协议使用恒定数量的回合和线性通信，或对数的回合和对数通信。 我们表明验证时间虽然是渐近线性的，但在实践中效率很高。 批次验证32个汇总范围证明的边际成本小于验证32个ECDSA签名的成本。 Bulletproofs以Bootle等人的技术为基础。 （Eurocrypt 2016）。 除了范围证明之外，防弹量还为一般算术电路提供了短暂的零知识证明，同时仅依靠离散的对数假设，而无需值得信赖的设置。 我们讨论了许多将受益于防弹的应用，主要是在加密货币领域。 防弹的效率特别适合区块链的分布式和无信任的性质。 本文的完整版本可在EPRINT上获得。
papers.title_zh: Bulletproofs:机密交易的简短证明等等

papers.title: FuturesMEX: Secure, Distributed Futures Market Exchange
papers.authors: Fabio Massacci, Chan Nam Ngo, Jing Nie, Daniele Venturi, Julian Williams
papers.abstract: In a Futures-Exchange, such as the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, traders buy and sell contractual promises (futures) to acquire or deliver, at some future pre-specified date, assets ranging from wheat to crude oil and from bacon to cash in a desired currency. The interactions between economic and security properties and the exchange's essentially non-monotonic security behavior; a valid trader's valid action can invalidate other traders' previously valid positions, are a challenge for security research. We show the security properties that guarantee an Exchange's economic viability (availability of trading information, liquidity, confidentiality of positions, absence of price discrimination, risk-management) and an attack when traders' anonymity is broken. We describe all key operations for a secure, fully distributed Futures-Exchange, hereafter referred to as simply the ""Exchange"". Our distributed, asynchronous protocol simulates the centralized functionality under the assumptions of anonymity of the physical layer and availability of a distributed ledger. We consider security with abort (in absence of honest majority) and extend it to penalties. Our proof of concept implementation and its optimization (based on zk-SNARKs and SPDZ) demonstrate that the computation of actual trading days (along Thomson-Reuters Tick History DB) is feasible for low-frequency markets; however, more research is needed for high-frequency ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 在期货交换中，例如芝加哥商业交易所，交易者在未来的预先指定的日期中购买和出售合同承诺（期货），从小麦到原油，从培根到培根到现金，以现金为现金 货币。 经济和安全物业与交易所基本上非单调安全行为之间的相互作用； 有效的交易者的有效行动可以使其他交易者以前的有效职位无效，这是安全研究的挑战。 我们展示了保证交易所经济可行性的安全性（交易信息的可用性，流动性，职位机密性，缺乏价格歧视，风险管理）以及交易者匿名时的攻击。 我们描述了安全，完全分布的期货 - 交换的所有关键操作，以下称为“ Exchange”。 我们的分布式异步协议模拟了物理层的匿名性和分布式分类帐的可用性的假设下的集中式功能。 我们认为流产的安全性（在没有诚实多数的情况下）并将其扩展到处罚。 我们的概念实施证明及其优化（基于ZK-SNARKS和SPDZ）表明，实际交易日（沿Thomson-Reuters Tick历史记录DB）的计算对于低频市场是可行的； 但是，高频需要更多的研究。
papers.title_zh: 期货交易所:安全、分布式的期货市场交易所

papers.title: Implementing Conjunction Obfuscation Under Entropic Ring LWE
papers.authors: David Bruce Cousins, Giovanni Di Crescenzo, Kamil Doruk Gür, Kevin King, Yuriy Polyakov, Kurt Rohloff, Gerard W. Ryan, Erkay Savas
papers.abstract: We address the practicality challenges of secure program obfuscation by implementing, optimizing, and experimentally assessing an approach to securely obfuscate conjunction programs proposed in [1]. Conjunction programs evaluate functions f (x_1,...,x_L) = wedge_i in _I y_i, where y_i is either x_i or -x_i and I subseteq [L], and can be used as classifiers. Our obfuscation approach satisfies distributional Virtual Black Box (VBB) security based on reasonable hardness assumptions, namely an entropic variant of the Ring Learning with Errors (Ring-LWE) assumption. Prior implementations of secure program obfuscation techniques support either trivial programs like point functions, or support the obfuscation of more general but less efficient branching programs to satisfy Indistinguishability Obfuscation (IO), a weaker security model. Further, the more general implemented techniques, rather than relying on standard assumptions, base their security on conjectures that have been shown to be theoretically vulnerable. Our work is the first implementation of non-trivial program obfuscation based on polynomial rings. Our contributions include multiple design and implementation advances resulting in reduced program size, obfuscation runtime, and evaluation runtime by many orders of magnitude. We implement our design in software and experimentally assess performance in a commercially available multi-core computing environment. Our implementation achieves runtimes of 6.7 hours to securely obfuscate a 64-bit conjunction program and 2.5 seconds to evaluate this program over an arbitrary input. We are also able to obfuscate a 32-bit conjunction program with 53 bits of security in 7 minutes and evaluate the obfuscated program in 43 milliseconds on a commodity desktop computer, which implies that 32-bit conjunction obfuscation is already practical. Our graph-induced (directed) encoding implementation runs up to 25 levels, which is higher than previously reported in the literature for this encoding. Our design and implementation advances are applicable to obfuscating more general compute-and-compare programs and can also be used for many cryptographic schemes based on lattice trapdoors.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们通过实施，优化和实验评估[1]中提出的安全混淆连词计划的方法来解决安全计划混淆的实用性挑战。 连词程序评估函数f（x_1，...，x_l）= wedge_i in _i y_i，其中y_i是x_i或-x_i和i subseteq [l]，可以用作分类器。 我们的混淆方法基于合理的硬度假设来满足分布虚拟黑匣子（VBB）的安全性，即带有错误（RING-LWE）假设的环圈学习的熵变体。 安全程序混淆技术的事先实现支持诸如点功能之类的琐碎程序，或者支持更一般但效率较低的分支程序的混淆，以满足不可区分性混淆（IO），这是一个较弱的安全模型。 此外，更通用的实施技术，而不是依靠标准假设，而是基于已经证明是理论上脆弱的猜想的。 我们的工作是基于多项式环的非平凡计划混淆的首次实施。 我们的贡献包括多个设计和实施进步，导致程序规模减小，混淆运行时以及评估运行时的数量级。 我们在软件中实施设计，并在商业上可用的多核计算环境中进行实验评估性能。 我们的实施达到了6.7小时的运行时间，以安全地混淆64位连词计划，并通过任意输入来评估该计划。 我们还能够在7分钟内使用53位安全性的32位连词程序混淆，并在商品台式计算机上评估43毫秒的混淆程序，这意味着32位连词混淆已经实用。 我们的图形诱导（定向）编码实现的运行量高达25个级别，这比该编码的文献中先前报道的要高。 我们的设计和实施进步适用于混淆更通用的计算和能力计划，也可用于基于晶格陷阱的许多加密计划。
papers.title_zh: 在熵环LWE下实现合取混淆

papers.title: Hackers vs. Testers: A Comparison of Software Vulnerability Discovery Processes
papers.authors: Daniel Votipka, Rock Stevens, Elissa M. Redmiles, Jeremy Hu, Michelle L. Mazurek
papers.abstract: Identifying security vulnerabilities in software is a critical task that requires significant human effort. Currently, vulnerability discovery is often the responsibility of software testers before release and white-hat hackers (often within bug bounty programs) afterward. This arrangement can be ad-hoc and far from ideal; for example, if testers could identify more vulnerabilities, software would be more secure at release time. Thus far, however, the processes used by each group — and how they compare to and interact with each other — have not been well studied. This paper takes a first step toward better understanding, and eventually improving, this ecosystem: we report on a semi-structured interview study (n=25) with both testers and hackers, focusing on how each group finds vulnerabilities, how they develop their skills, and the challenges they face. The results suggest that hackers and testers follow similar processes, but get different results due largely to differing experiences and therefore different underlying knowledge of security concepts. Based on these results, we provide recommendations to support improved security training for testers, better communication between hackers and developers, and smarter bug bounty policies to motivate hacker participation.
papers.abstract_zh: 确定软件中的安全漏洞是一项至关重要的任务，需要大量的人为努力。 目前，漏洞发现通常是发布前软件测试人员的责任，此后释放和白帽黑客（通常在Bug Bounty程序中）。 这种安排可以是临时的，远非理想。 例如，如果测试人员可以识别更多的漏洞，则软件在发布时间将更加安全。 然而，到目前为止，每个组所使用的过程以及它们如何将其与彼此进行比较和相互作用 - 尚未得到很好的研究。 本文朝着更好地理解并最终改善这个生态系统迈出了第一步：我们与测试人员和黑客一起报告了一项半结构化访谈研究（n = 25），重点是每个小组如何找到脆弱性，如何发展自己的技能 ，以及他们面临的挑战。 结果表明，黑客和测试人员遵循类似的过程，但是由于经验不同，因此获得了不同的结果，因此对安全概念的潜在知识不同。 基于这些结果，我们提供了建议，以支持改进的测试人员的安全培训，黑客和开发人员之间的更好沟通，以及更智能的漏洞赏金政策，以激发黑客参与。
papers.title_zh: 黑客与测试人员:软件漏洞发现过程的比较

papers.title: Towards Security and Privacy for Multi-user Augmented Reality: Foundations with End Users
papers.authors: Kiron Lebeck, Kimberly Ruth, Tadayoshi Kohno, Franziska Roesner
papers.abstract: Immersive augmented reality (AR) technologies are becoming a reality. Prior works have identified security and privacy risks raised by these technologies, primarily considering individual users or AR devices. However, we make two key observations: (1) users will not always use AR in isolation, but also in ecosystems of other users, and (2) since immersive AR devices have only recently become available, the risks of AR have been largely hypothetical to date. To provide a foundation for understanding and addressing the security and privacy challenges of emerging AR technologies, grounded in the experiences of real users, we conduct a qualitative lab study with an immersive AR headset, the Microsoft HoloLens. We conduct our study in pairs - 22 participants across 11 pairs - wherein participants engage in paired and individual (but physically co-located) HoloLens activities. Through semi-structured interviews, we explore participants' security, privacy, and other concerns, raising key findings. For example, we find that despite the HoloLens's limitations, participants were easily immersed, treating virtual objects as real (e.g., stepping around them for fear of tripping). We also uncover numerous security, privacy, and safety concerns unique to AR (e.g., deceptive virtual objects misleading users about the real world), and a need for access control among users to manage shared physical spaces and virtual content embedded in those spaces. Our findings give us the opportunity to identify broader lessons and key challenges to inform the design of emerging single-and multi-user AR technologies.
papers.abstract_zh: 沉浸式增强现实（AR）技术正在成为现实。 先前的工作已经确定了这些技术提高的安全性和隐私风险，主要考虑个人用户或AR设备。 但是，我们进行了两个关键观察：（1）用户并不总是孤立地使用AR，而是在其他用户的生态系统中使用，并且（2）由于沉浸式AR设备直到最近才可用，因此AR的风险主要是假设的。 迄今为止。 为了理解和应对新兴AR技术的安全性和隐私挑战的基础，以真实用户的经验为基础，我们使用具有沉浸式AR耳机Microsoft Hololens进行了定性的实验室研究。 我们成对进行研究-1对11对的22名参与者 - 参与者从事成对的和个人（但在物理共同的）Hololens活动中。 通过半结构化的访谈，我们探讨了参与者的安全性，隐私和其他问题，从而提出了关键发现。 例如，我们发现，尽管霍洛伦斯有局限性，但参与者很容易浸入，将虚拟物体视为真实的物体（例如，由于担心会绊倒而踏上它们）。 我们还发现了AR所特有的众多安全性，隐私和安全性问题（例如，欺骗性的虚拟对象误导了用户对现实世界的误导），并且需要在用户之间进行访问控制以管理这些空间中嵌入共享的物理空间和虚拟内容。 我们的发现使我们有机会确定更广泛的教训和关键挑战，以告知新兴的单用户AR技术的设计。
papers.title_zh: 面向多用户增强现实的安全和隐私:最终用户基础

papers.title: Computer Security and Privacy for Refugees in the United States
papers.authors: Lucy Simko, Ada Lerner, Samia Ibtasam, Franziska Roesner, Tadayoshi Kohno
papers.abstract: In this work, we consider the computer security and privacy practices and needs of recently resettled refugees in the United States. We ask: How do refugees use and rely on technology as they settle in the US? What computer security and privacy practices do they have, and what barriers do they face that may put them at risk? And how are their computer security mental models and practices shaped by the advice they receive? We study these questions through in-depth qualitative interviews with case managers and teachers who work with refugees at a local NGO, as well as through focus groups with refugees themselves. We find that refugees must rely heavily on technology (e.g., email) as they attempt to establish their lives and find jobs; that they also rely heavily on their case managers and teachers for help with those technologies; and that these pressures can push security practices into the background or make common security "best practices" infeasible. At the same time, we identify fundamental challenges to computer security and privacy for refugees, including barriers due to limited technical expertise, language skills, and cultural knowledge–for example, we find that scams as a threat are a new concept for many of the refugees we studied, and that many common security practices (e.g., password creation techniques and security questions) rely on US cultural knowledge. From these and other findings, we distill recommendations for the computer security community to better serve the computer security and privacy needs and constraints of refugees, a potentially vulnerable population that has not been previously studied in this context.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们考虑了最近在美国重新安置的难民的计算机安全和隐私惯例和需求。 我们问：难民在美国定居时如何使用和依靠技术？ 他们拥有哪些计算机安全和隐私惯例，以及它们可能面临的障碍可能会使它们处于危险之中？ 他们的计算机安全性心理模型和实践如何受到他们收到的建议的影响？ 我们通过与当地非政府组织的难民以及与难民本身的焦点小组一起工作的案例经理和老师的深入定性访谈来研究这些问题。 我们发现，难民在试图建立生活并找到工作时必须严重依靠技术（例如，电子邮件）。 他们也很大程度上依靠案件经理和老师来帮助这些技术。 这些压力可以将安全惯例推向后台，或者使共同的安全“最佳实践”不可行。 同时，我们确定了针对难民的计算机安全和隐私面临的基本挑战，包括由于技术专长，语言技能和文化知识而导致的障碍，例如，我们发现骗局作为威胁是许多人的新概念 我们研究的难民，以及许多常见的安全实践（例如，密码创建技术和安全问题）都依赖于我们的文化知识。 从这些发现和其他发现中，我们将针对计算机安全界的建议提取，以更好地满足计算机安全和隐私需求以及难民的约束，这是一种潜在的脆弱人群，在这种情况下尚未对其进行研究。
papers.title_zh: 美国难民的计算机安全和隐私

papers.title: On Enforcing the Digital Immunity of a Large Humanitarian Organization
papers.authors: Stevens Le Blond, Alejandro Cuevas, Juan Ramón Troncoso-Pastoriza, Philipp Jovanovic, Bryan Ford, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: Humanitarian action, the process of aiding individuals in situations of crises, poses unique information-security challenges due to natural or manmade disasters, the adverse environments in which it takes place, and the scale and multi-disciplinary nature of the problems. Despite these challenges, humanitarian organizations are transitioning towards a strong reliance on the digitization of collected data and digital tools, which improves their effectiveness but also exposes them to computer security threats. In this paper, we conduct a qualitative analysis of the computer-security challenges of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC), a large humanitarian organization with over sixteen thousand employees, an international legal personality, which involves privileges and immunities, and over 150 years of experience with armed conflicts and other situations of violence worldwide. To investigate the computer security needs and practices of the ICRC from an operational, technical, legal, and managerial standpoint by considering individual, organizational, and governmental levels, we interviewed 27 field workers, IT staff, lawyers, and managers. Our results provide a first look at the unique security and privacy challenges that humanitarian organizations face when collecting, processing, transferring, and sharing data to enable humanitarian action for a multitude of sensitive activities. These results highlight, among other challenges, the trade offs between operational security and requirements stemming from all stakeholders, the legal barriers for data sharing among jurisdictions; especially, the need to complement privileges and immunities with robust technological safeguards in order to avoid any leakages that might hinder access and potentially compromise the neutrality, impartiality, and independence of humanitarian action.
papers.abstract_zh: 人道主义行动是帮助个人在危机情况下的过程，构成了由于自然或人为灾难而引起的独特信息安全挑战，发生的不利环境以及问题的规模和多学科性质。 尽管面临这些挑战，但人道主义组织仍在过渡到强烈依赖收集的数据和数字工具的数字化，从而提高了其有效性，但也使他们面临计算机安全威胁。 在本文中，我们对红十字国际委员会（ICRC）的计算机安全挑战进行了定性分析，这是一个大型人道主义组织，拥有16万名员工，一个国际法律人格，涉及特权和免疫力，以及以上 在全球范围内，有150年的武装冲突和其他暴力情况的经验。 为了通过考虑个人，组织和政府级别的运营，技术，法律和管理的角度来调查红十字国际委员会的计算机安全需求和实践，我们采访了27名现场工作人员，IT员工，律师和经理。 我们的结果首先研究了人道主义组织在收集，处理，传输和共享数据时面临的独特安全和隐私挑战，以实现人道主义行动，以实现多种敏感活动。 这些结果还强调了，除其他挑战外，运营安全与所有利益相关者的要求之间的交易，司法管辖区之间数据共享的法律障碍； 尤其是，需要使用强大的技术保护措施来补充特权和免疫力，以避免任何可能阻碍访问权限并可能损害人道主义行动的中立性，公正性和独立性的泄漏。
papers.title_zh: 加强大型人道主义组织的数字免疫

papers.title: The Spyware Used in Intimate Partner Violence
papers.authors: Rahul Chatterjee, Periwinkle Doerfler, Hadas Orgad, Sam Havron, Jackeline Palmer, Diana Freed, Karen Levy, Nicola Dell, Damon McCoy, Thomas Ristenpart
papers.abstract: Survivors of intimate partner violence increasingly report that abusers install spyware on devices to track their location, monitor communications, and cause emotional and physical harm.
