We propose a different approach: we design two conditions on protocols which are sufficient to ensure anonymity and unlinkability, and which can then be effectively checked automatically using ProVerif. Our two conditions correspond to two broad classes of attacks on unlinkability, corresponding to data and control-flow leaks. This theoretical result is general enough to apply to a wide class of protocols. In particular, we apply our techniques to provide the first formal security proof of the BAC protocol (e-passport). Our work has also lead to the discovery of new attacks, including one on the LAK protocol (RFID authentication) which was previously claimed to be unlinkable (in a weak sense) and one on the PACE protocol (e-passport).
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们考虑了在符号模型中验证匿名性和无链性的问题，在符号模型中，协议在私有工具中明显使用的Applied Pi微积分的变体中表示为过程。 现有的工具和技术不允许直接验证这些属性，称为行为等价。 我们提出了一种不同的方法：我们在协议上设计两个条件，足以确保匿名性和无链接性，然后可以使用proverif自动检查它们。 我们的两个条件对应于对不链接性的两种广泛的攻击类别，与数据和控制流泄漏相对应。 这个理论上的结果足以适用于广泛的协议。 特别是，我们应用技术来提供BAC协议（E-Passport）的第一个正式安全证明。 我们的工作还导致了新攻击的发现，其中包括一项在LAK协议上（RFID身份验证），该攻击以前被认为是不可接受的（从弱的意义上）和PACE协议（E-Passport）。
papers.title_zh: 一种验证隐私类型属性的方法:无界情况

papers.title: Distillation as a Defense to Adversarial Perturbations Against Deep Neural Networks
papers.authors: Nicolas Papernot, Patrick D. McDaniel, Xi Wu, Somesh Jha, Ananthram Swami
papers.abstract: Deep learning algorithms have been shown to perform extremely well on many classical machine learning problems. However, recent studies have shown that deep learning, like other machine learning techniques, is vulnerable to adversarial samples: inputs crafted to force a deep neural network (DNN) to provide adversary-selected outputs. Such attacks can seriously undermine the security of the system supported by the DNN, sometimes with devastating consequences. For example, autonomous vehicles can be crashed, illicit or illegal content can bypass content filters, or biometric authentication systems can be manipulated to allow improper access. In this work, we introduce a defensive mechanism called defensive distillation to reduce the effectiveness of adversarial samples on DNNs. We analytically investigate the generalizability and robustness properties granted by the use of defensive distillation when training DNNs. We also empirically study the effectiveness of our defense mechanisms on two DNNs placed in adversarial settings. The study shows that defensive distillation can reduce effectiveness of sample creation from 95% to less than 0.5% on a studied DNN. Such dramatic gains can be explained by the fact that distillation leads gradients used in adversarial sample creation to be reduced by a factor of 1030. We also find that distillation increases the average minimum number of features that need to be modified to create adversarial samples by about 800% on one of the DNNs we tested.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习算法已被证明在许多古典机器学习问题上表现出色。 但是，最近的研究表明，像其他机器学习技术一样，深度学习容易受到对抗样本的影响：为迫使深度神经网络（DNN）提供的输入以提供对手选择的输出。 这种攻击可能会严重破坏DNN支持的系统的安全性，有时会带来毁灭性的后果。 例如，自动驾驶汽车可能会崩溃，非法或非法内容可以绕过内容过滤器，也可以操纵生物识别验证系统以允许访问不当。 在这项工作中，我们引入了一种称为防御性蒸馏的防御机制，以降低对抗样品在DNNS上的有效性。 我们分析研究训练DNN时使用防御性蒸馏所赋予的普遍性和鲁棒性。 我们还从经验上研究了防御机制对在对抗环境中的两个DNN的有效性。 研究表明，在研究的DNN中，防御性蒸馏可以将样品创造的有效性从95％降低到低于0.5％。 这样的巨大收益可以通过以下事实来解释：蒸馏引导梯度在对抗性样本中使用的梯度将减少1030倍。我们还发现，蒸馏增加了需要修改以创建对抗性样品的平均最小功能数量。 我们测试的DNN之一为800％。
papers.title_zh: 蒸馏作为对抗深度神经网络的对抗性扰动的防御

papers.title: Algorithmic Transparency via Quantitative Input Influence: Theory and Experiments with Learning Systems
papers.authors: Anupam Datta, Shayak Sen, Yair Zick
papers.abstract: Algorithmic systems that employ machine learning play an increasing role in making substantive decisions in modern society, ranging from online personalization to insurance and credit decisions to predictive policing. But their decision-making processes are often opaque-it is difficult to explain why a certain decision was made. We develop a formal foundation to improve the transparency of such decision-making systems. Specifically, we introduce a family of Quantitative Input Influence (QII) measures that capture the degree of influence of inputs on outputs of systems. These measures provide a foundation for the design of transparency reports that accompany system decisions (e.g., explaining a specific credit decision) and for testing tools useful for internal and external oversight (e.g., to detect algorithmic discrimination). Distinctively, our causal QII measures carefully account for correlated inputs while measuring influence. They support a general class of transparency queries and can, in particular, explain decisions about individuals (e.g., a loan decision) and groups (e.g., disparate impact based on gender). Finally, since single inputs may not always have high influence, the QII measures also quantify the joint influence of a set of inputs (e.g., age and income) on outcomes (e.g. loan decisions) and the marginal influence of individual inputs within such a set (e.g., income). Since a single input may be part of multiple influential sets, the average marginal influence of the input is computed using principled aggregation measures, such as the Shapley value, previously applied to measure influence in voting. Further, since transparency reports could compromise privacy, we explore the transparency-privacy tradeoff and prove that a number of useful transparency reports can be made differentially private with very little addition of noise. Our empirical validation with standard machine learning algorithms demonstrates that QII measures are a useful transparency mechanism when black box access to the learning system is available. In particular, they provide better explanations than standard associative measures for a host of scenarios that we consider. Further, we show that in the situations we consider, QII is efficiently approximable and can be made differentially private while preserving accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 采用机器学习的算法系统在现代社会做出实质性决策方面起着越来越多的作用，从在线个性化到保险和信用决策再到预测性警务。 但是他们的决策过程通常是不透明的 - 很难解释为什么做出某个决定。 我们为提高这种决策系统的透明度奠定了正式的基础。 具体而言，我们引入了一个定量输入影响（QII）的家族，以捕获输入对系统输出的影响程度。 这些措施为系统决策（例如，解释特定的信用决定）和对内部和外部监督有用的测试工具（例如，检测算法歧视）的测试工具提供了透明度报告的基础。 与众不同的是，我们的因果QII在测量影响时仔细地衡量了相关的输入。 他们支持一般的透明度查询，尤其可以解释有关个人（例如贷款决定）和群体（例如，基于性别的不同影响）的决定。 最后，由于单个输入可能并不总是具有很高的影响力，因此，QII措施还量化了一组投入（例如年龄和收入）对结果（例如贷款决策）的共同影响以及在此类集合中各个投入的边际影响 （例如，收入）。 由于单个输入可能是多个影响力集的一部分，因此输入的平均边际影响是使用原则上的聚合度量（例如Shapley值）计算的，例如先前用于衡量投票影响的影响。 此外，由于透明度报告可能会损害隐私，因此我们探讨了透明性私人关系权衡，并证明可以使许多有用的透明度报告被私密地私有化，而很少添加噪声。 我们对标准机器学习算法的经验验证表明，当黑匣子访问学习系统时，QII措施是一种有用的透明度机制。 特别是，与我们考虑的许多情况相比，它们提供了更好的解释。 此外，我们表明，在我们考虑的情况下，QII有效地近似，可以在保持准确性的同时将私有化。
papers.title_zh: 通过定量输入影响的算法透明度:学习系统的理论和实验

papers.title: Talos: Neutralizing Vulnerabilities with Security Workarounds for Rapid Response
papers.authors: Zhen Huang, Mariana D'Angelo, Dhaval Miyani, David Lie
papers.abstract: There is often a considerable delay between the discovery of a vulnerability and the issue of a patch. One way to mitigate this window of vulnerability is to use a configuration workaround, which prevents the vulnerable code from being executed at the cost of some lost functionality -- but only if one is available. Since application configurations are not specifically designed to mitigate software vulnerabilities, we find that they only cover 25.2% of vulnerabilities. To minimize patch delay vulnerabilities and address the limitations of configuration workarounds, we propose Security Workarounds for Rapid Response (SWRRs), which are designed to neutralize security vulnerabilities in a timely, secure, and unobtrusive manner. Similar to configuration workarounds, SWRRs neutralize vulnerabilities by preventing vulnerable code from being executed at the cost of some lost functionality. However, the key difference is that SWRRs use existing error-handling code within applications, which enables them to be mechanically inserted with minimal knowledge of the application and minimal developer effort. This allows SWRRs to achieve high coverage while still being fast and easy to deploy. We have designed and implemented Talos, a system that mechanically instruments SWRRs into a given application, and evaluate it on five popular Linux server applications. We run exploits against 11 real-world software vulnerabilities and show that SWRRs neutralize the vulnerabilities in all cases. Quantitative measurements on 320 SWRRs indicate that SWRRs instrumented by Talos can neutralize 75.1% of all potential vulnerabilities and incur a loss of functionality similar to configuration workarounds in 71.3% of those cases. Our overall conclusion is that automatically generated SWRRs can safely mitigate 2.1× more vulnerabilities, while only incurring a loss of functionality comparable to that of traditional configuration workarounds.
papers.abstract_zh: 发现脆弱性和补丁问题之间通常会有很大的延迟。 减轻此脆弱性窗口的一种方法是使用配置解决方法，该方法可以防止脆弱的代码以某些丢失的功能为代价执行 - 但前提是当可用时。 由于应用程序配置并非专门设计用于减轻软件漏洞，因此我们发现它们仅覆盖25.2％的漏洞。 为了最大程度地减少补丁延迟漏洞并解决配置解决方法的局限性，我们建议安全解决方案（SWRRS），旨在及时，安全和不受欢迎的方式中和安全漏洞。 与配置解决方法类似，SWRR通过防止脆弱的代码以某些丢失的功能而被执行来中和漏洞。 但是，关键区别在于，SWRR在应用程序中使用现有的错误处理代码，这使它们能够以最少了解应用程序的知识和最小开发人员的努力来机械地插入。 这使SWRR可以在仍然快速易于部署的同时获得高覆盖范围。 我们已经设计和实现了Talos，该系统将机械启动到给定的应用程序中，并在五个流行的Linux服务器应用程序上进行评估。 我们针对11个现实世界软件漏洞运行利用，并表明SWRR在所有情况下都中和漏洞。 320 SWRR上的定量测量表明，Talos仪器的SWRR可以中和75.1％的所有潜在漏洞，并导致71.3％的配置解决方法的功能损失。 我们的总体结论是，自动生成的SWRR可以安全地减轻2.1×更多漏洞，而仅产生与传统配置解决方法相当的功能损失。
papers.title_zh: Talos:利用安全变通办法消除漏洞，实现快速响应

papers.title: Security Analysis of Emerging Smart Home Applications
papers.authors: Earlence Fernandes, Jaeyeon Jung, Atul Prakash
papers.abstract: Recently, several competing smart home programming frameworks that support third party app development have emerged. These frameworks provide tangible benefits to users, but can also expose users to significant security risks. This paper presents the first in-depth empirical security analysis of one such emerging smart home programming platform. We analyzed Samsung-owned SmartThings, which has the largest number of apps among currently available smart home platforms, and supports a broad range of devices including motion sensors, fire alarms, and door locks. SmartThings hosts the application runtime on a proprietary, closed-source cloud backend, making scrutiny challenging. We overcame the challenge with a static source code analysis of 499 SmartThings apps (called SmartApps) and 132 device handlers, and carefully crafted test cases that revealed many undocumented features of the platform. Our key findings are twofold. First, although SmartThings implements a privilege separation model, we discovered two intrinsic design flaws that lead to significant overprivilege in SmartApps. Our analysis reveals that over 55% of SmartApps in the store are overprivileged due to the capabilities being too coarse-grained. Moreover, once installed, a SmartApp is granted full access to a device even if it specifies needing only limited access to the device. Second, the SmartThings event subsystem, which devices use to communicate asynchronously with SmartApps via events, does not sufficiently protect events that carry sensitive information such as lock codes. We exploited framework design flaws to construct four proof-of-concept attacks that: (1) secretly planted door lock codes, (2) stole existing door lock codes, (3) disabled vacation mode of the home, and (4) induced a fake fire alarm. We conclude the paper with security lessons for the design of emerging smart home programming frameworks.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，已经出现了一些支持第三方应用程序开发的智能家庭编程框架。 这些框架为用户提供了切实的好处，但也可以使用户面临重大的安全风险。 本文介绍了一个这样的新兴智能家庭编程平台的第一个深入的经验安全分析。 我们分析了三星拥有的Smartthings，后者在当前可用的智能家庭平台中拥有最多的应用程序，并支持各种设备，包括运动传感器，火警警报和门锁。 SmartThings在专有的，封闭的云后端托管应用程序运行时，使审查具有挑战性。 我们通过对499个SmartThings应用程序（称为SmartApps）和132个设备处理程序的静态源代码分析以及精心制作的测试用例来克服挑战，这些应用程序揭示了平台的许多无证功能。 我们的主要发现是双重的。 首先，尽管SmartThings实现了特权分离模型，但我们发现了两个固有的设计缺陷，这些缺陷导致SmartApps中的重要特权。 我们的分析表明，由于功能过于粗糙，商店中超过55％的SmartApps被过度私有。 此外，一旦安装，即使SmartApp指定仅需要有限访问该设备的设备，也可以完全访问SmartApp。 其次，设备用于通过事件与SmartApps进行异步通信的SmartThings事件子系统并不能充分保护携带诸如锁定代码之类的敏感信息的事件。 我们利用框架设计缺陷来构建四种概念证明攻击：（1）秘密种植的门锁代码，（2）偷走了现有的门锁代码，（3）家庭的残疾人度假模式，（4）诱导了 假火警警报。 我们在本文结束了本文，以设计新兴的智能家庭编程框架设计。
papers.title_zh: 新兴智能家居应用的安全性分析

papers.title: Staying Secure and Unprepared: Understanding and Mitigating the Security Risks of Apple ZeroConf
papers.authors: Xiaolong Bai, Luyi Xing, Nan Zhang, XiaoFeng Wang, Xiaojing Liao, Tongxin Li, Shi-Min Hu
papers.abstract: With the popularity of today's usability-oriented designs, dubbed Zero Configuration or ZeroConf, unclear are the security implications of these automatic service discovery, "plug-and-play" techniques. In this paper, we report the first systematic study on this issue, focusing on the security features of the systems related to Apple, the major proponent of ZeroConf techniques. Our research brings to light a disturbing lack of security consideration in these systems' designs: major ZeroConf frameworks on the Apple platforms, including the Core Bluetooth Framework, Multipeer Connectivity and Bonjour, are mostly unprotected and popular apps and system services, such as Tencent QQ, Apple Handoff, printer discovery and AirDrop, turn out to be completely vulnerable to an impersonation or Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attack, even though attempts have been made to protect them against such threats. The consequences are serious, allowing a malicious device to steal the user's SMS messages, email notifications, documents to be printed out or transferred to another device. Most importantly, our study highlights the fundamental security challenges underlying ZeroConf techniques: in the absence of any pre-configured secret across different devices, authentication has to rely on Apple-issued public-key certificate, which however cannot be properly verified due to the difficulty in finding a unique, nonsensitive and widely known identity of a human user to bind her to her certificate. To address this issue, we developed a suite of new techniques, including a conflict detection approach and a biometric technique that enables the user to speak out her certificate through 6 distinct, rare but pronounceable words to let those who know her voice verify her certificate. We performed a security analysis on the new protection and evaluated its usability and effectiveness using two user studies involving 60 participants. Our research shows that the new protection fits well with the existing ZeroConf systems such as AirDrop. It is well received by users and also providing effective defense even against recently proposed speech synthesis attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于这些自动服务发现的“插件和播放”技术的安全含义尚不清楚，如当今以可用性为导向的设计的普及。 在本文中，我们报告了有关此问题的首次系统研究，重点介绍了与Zeroconf Techniques的主要支持者Apple有关的系统的安全特征。 我们的研究使这些系统的设计令人不安地缺乏安全考虑：Apple平台上的主要Zeroconf框架，包括核心蓝牙框架，多型连接和Bonjour，主要是未受保护的，流行的应用程序和系统服务，例如Tencent QQ等。 ，即使已经尝试保护他们免受此类威胁，即使苹果杂交，打印机发现和空投完全容易受到模仿或中间人（MITM）攻击的影响。 后果是严重的，允许恶意设备窃取用户的SMS消息，电子邮件通知，文档被打印出来或转移到另一个设备上。 最重要的是，我们的研究强调了Zeroconf技术的基本安全挑战：在没有任何不同设备的任何预先配置的秘密的情况下，身份验证必须依赖于苹果发布的公共钥匙证书，但是由于难以正确验证，由于难度 在寻找人类用户的独特，毫无敏感且广为人知的身份以将其绑定到她的证书中。 为了解决这个问题，我们开发了一套新技术，包括一种冲突检测方法和一种生物识别技术，使用户能够通过6个不同但罕见但可说的单词来说明她的证书，以使那些知道她的声音验证她的证书的人。 我们对新保护进行了安全分析，并使用涉及60名参与者的两个用户研究评估了其可用性和有效性。 我们的研究表明，新保护非常符合现有的Zeroconf系统，例如Airdrop。 它受到用户的好评，即使是最近提出的语音综合攻击，也可以提供有效的辩护。
papers.title_zh: 保持安全和毫无准备:了解和减轻苹果ZeroConf的安全风险

papers.title: MitM Attack by Name Collision: Cause Analysis and Vulnerability Assessment in the New gTLD Era
papers.authors: Qi Alfred Chen, Eric Osterweil, Matthew Thomas, Zhuoqing Morley Mao
papers.abstract: Recently, Man in the Middle (MitM) attacks on web browsing have become easier than they have ever been before because of a problem called "Name Collision" and a protocol called the Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD) protocol. This name collision attack can cause all web traffic of an Internet user to be redirected to a MitM proxy automatically right after the launching of a standard browser. The underlying problem of this attack is internal namespace WPAD query leakage, which itself is a known problem for years. However, it remains understudied since it was not easily exploitable before the recent new gTLD (generic Top-Level Domains) delegation. In this paper, we focus on this newly-exposed MitM attack vector and perform the first systematic study of the underlying problem causes and its vulnerability status in the wild. First, we show the severity of the problem by characterizing leaked WPAD query traffic to the DNS root servers, and find that a major cause of the leakage problem is actually a result of settings on the end user devices. More specifically, we find that under common settings, devices can mistakenly generate internal queries when used outside an internal network (e.g., used at home). Second, we define and quantify a candidate measure of attack surface by defining "highly-vulnerable domains", which are domains routinely exposing a large number of potential victims, and use it to perform a systematic assessment of the vulnerability status. We find that almost all leaked queries are for new gTLD domains we define to be highly-vulnerable, indirectly validating our attack surface definition. We further find that 10% of these highly-vulnerable domains have already been registered, making the corresponding users immediately vulnerable to the exploit at any time. Our results provide a strong and urgent message to deploy proactive protection. We discuss promising directions for remediation at the new gTLD registry, Autonomous System (AS), and end user levels, and use empirical data analysis to estimate and compare their effectiveness and deployment difficulties.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，由于一个称为“名称碰撞”的问题和称为Web代理自动发现（WPAD）协议的协议，对Web浏览的中间（MITM）攻击变得比以往任何时候都容易。 此名称碰撞攻击会导致Internet用户的所有网络流量在启动标准浏览器后自动将其重定向到MITM代理。 此攻击的根本问题是内部名称空间WPAD查询泄漏，这本身就是已知的问题多年。 但是，它仍然被忽略了，因为它在最近的新GTLD（通用顶级域）委派之前不容易利用。 在本文中，我们专注于这个新近暴露的MITM攻击载体，并对潜在问题原因及其在野外的脆弱性状态进行首次系统研究。 首先，我们通过将泄漏的WPAD查询流量表征到DNS根服务器，并发现泄漏问题的主要原因实际上是最终用户设备上设置的结果，从而显示了问题的严重性。 更具体地说，我们发现在常见设置下，设备在内部网络外使用时会错误地生成内部查询（例如，在家中使用）。 其次，我们通过定义“高度可变的域”来定义和量化攻击表面的候选度量，这些域通常是域通常暴露了大量潜在的受害者，并使用它来对脆弱性状态进行系统评估。 我们发现，几乎所有泄漏的查询都是针对我们定义的新的GTLD域，是高度可观的，间接验证了我们的攻击表面定义。 我们进一步发现，已经注册了这些高度可变的域中有10％，使相应的用户随时立即容易受到漏洞的影响。 我们的结果为部署主动保护提供了强烈而紧急的信息。 我们讨论了在新的GTLD注册表，自主系统（AS）和最终用户级别上进行补救的有希望的方向，并使用经验数据分析来估计和比较其有效性和部署困难。
papers.title_zh: 名称冲突引发的MitM攻击:新gTLD时代的原因分析和脆弱性评估

papers.title: Domain-Z: 28 Registrations Later Measuring the Exploitation of Residual Trust in Domains
papers.authors: Chaz Lever, Robert J. Walls, Yacin Nadji, David Dagon, Patrick D. McDaniel, Manos Antonakakis
papers.abstract: Any individual that re-registers an expired domain implicitly inherits the residual trust associated with the domain's prior use. We find that adversaries can, and do, use malicious re-registration to exploit domain ownership changes - undermining the security of both users and systems. In fact, we find that many seemingly disparate security problems share a root cause in residual domain trust abuse. With this study we shed light on the seemingly unnoticed problem of residual domain trust by measuring the scope and growth of this abuse over the past six years. During this time, we identified 27,758 domains from public blacklists and 238,279 domains resolved by malware that expired and then were maliciously re-registered. To help address this problem, we propose a technical remedy and discuss several policy remedies. For the former, we develop Alembic, a lightweight algorithm that uses only passive observations from the Domain Name System (DNS) to flag potential domain ownership changes. We identify several instances of residual trust abuse using this algorithm, including an expired APT domain that could be used to revive existing infections.
papers.abstract_zh: 任何重新注册过期域的个人都隐式继承了与该域之前使用的残差信任。 我们发现，对手可以使用恶意重新注册来利用域所有权变化 - 破坏用户和系统的安全性。 实际上，我们发现许多看似不同的安全问题在残留域信任滥用中有根本原因。 通过这项研究，我们通过衡量过去六年来衡量这种虐待的范围和增长，阐明了剩余领域信任的看似未知的问题。 在此期间，我们从公共黑名单和238,279个域中确定了27,758个域名，这些域名通过恶意软件解决，然后被恶意重新注册。 为了帮助解决这个问题，我们提出了一种技术补救措施，并讨论了几种政策补救措施。 对于前者，我们开发了Alembic，这是一种轻巧的算法，仅使用域名系统（DNS）的被动观察来标记潜在的域所有权变化。 我们使用该算法确定了几种残留信任滥用的实例，包括可用于复兴现有感染的过期APT域。
papers.title_zh: Domain-Z: 28个注册，之后衡量域名中剩余信任的利用情况

papers.title: Seeking Nonsense, Looking for Trouble: Efficient Promotional-Infection Detection through Semantic Inconsistency Search
papers.authors: Xiaojing Liao, Kan Yuan, XiaoFeng Wang, Zhongyu Pei, Hao Yang, Jianjun Chen, Hai-Xin Duan, Kun Du, Eihal Alowaisheq, Sumayah A. Alrwais, Luyi Xing, Raheem A. Beyah
papers.abstract: Promotional infection is an attack in which the adversary exploits a website's weakness to inject illicit advertising content. Detection of such an infection is challenging due to its similarity to legitimate advertising activities. An interesting observation we make in our research is that such an attack almost always incurs a great semantic gap between the infected domain (e.g., a university site) and the content it promotes (e.g., selling cheap viagra). Exploiting this gap, we developed a semantic-based technique, called Semantic Inconsistency Search (SEISE), for efficient and accurate detection of the promotional injections on sponsored top-level domains (sTLD) with explicit semantic meanings. Our approach utilizes Natural Language Processing (NLP) to identify the bad terms (those related to illicit activities like fake drug selling, etc.) most irrelevant to an sTLD's semantics. These terms, which we call irrelevant bad terms (IBTs), are used to query search engines under the sTLD for suspicious domains. Through a semantic analysis on the results page returned by the search engines, SEISE is able to detect those truly infected sites and automatically collect new IBTs from the titles/URLs/snippets of their search result items for finding new infections. Running on 403 sTLDs with an initial 30 seed IBTs, SEISE analyzed 100K fully qualified domain names (FQDN), and along the way automatically gathered nearly 600 IBTs. In the end, our approach detected 11K infected FQDN with a false detection rate of 1.5% and over 90% coverage. Our study shows that by effective detection of infected sTLDs, the bar to promotion infections can be substantially raised, since other non-sTLD vulnerable domains typically have much lower Alexa ranks and are therefore much less attractive for underground advertising. Our findings further bring to light the stunning impacts of such promotional attacks, which compromise FQDNs under 3% of .edu, .gov domains and over one thousand gov.cn domains, including those of leading universities such as stanford.edu, mit.edu, princeton.edu, havard.edu and government institutes such as nsf.gov and nih.gov. We further demonstrate the potential to extend our current technique to protect generic domains such as .com and .org.
papers.abstract_zh: 促销感染是一种攻击，在这种攻击中，对手利用网站弱点注入非法广告内容。 由于与合法的广告活动相似，因此发现这种感染是具有挑战性的。 我们在研究中做出的一个有趣的观察结果是，这种攻击几乎总是会在感染领域（例如大学网站）及其促进的内容（例如出售便宜的伟哥）之间存在很大的语义差距。 利用这一差距，我们开发了一种基于语义的技术，称为语义不一致搜索（SEISE），以有效，准确地检测具有明确的语义含义的赞助的顶级域（STLD）上的促销注射。 我们的方法利用自然语言处理（NLP）来识别与STLD语义无关的不良术语（与假毒品销售等非法活动相关的术语）。 这些术语（我们称之为无关的坏术语（IBT））用于查询STLD下的搜索引擎是否可疑域。 通过搜索引擎返回的结果页面的语义分析，Seise能够检测那些真正受感染的站点，并自动从其搜索结果项目的标题/URL/URL/urls/sippets收集新的IBT，以查找新的感染。 Seise在403个STLD上运行403个STLD，分析了100K完全合格的域名（FQDN），并在此过程中自动收集了近600个IBT。 最后，我们的方法检测到11K感染的FQDN，错误检测率为1.5％，覆盖率超过90％。 我们的研究表明，通过有效检测受感染的STLD，可以大大增加促进感染的标准，因为其他非STLD脆弱域通常具有较低的Alexa等级，因此对于地下广告的吸引力要少得多。 我们的发现进一步揭示了此类促销攻击的惊人影响，这些促销攻击损害了3％以下的.edu，.gov域和一千多个政府领域，其中包括Stanford.edu，Mit.edu等领先的大学的领域。 ，Princeton.edu，Havard.edu和政府研究所，例如NSF.GOV和NIH.GOV。 我们进一步证明了扩展当前技术以保护通用域（例如.com和.org）的潜力。
papers.title_zh: 寻找废话，寻找麻烦:通过语义不一致搜索进行有效的推广感染检测

papers.title: The Cracked Cookie Jar: HTTP Cookie Hijacking and the Exposure of Private Information
papers.authors: Suphannee Sivakorn, Iasonas Polakis, Angelos D. Keromytis
papers.abstract: The widespread demand for online privacy, also fueled by widely-publicized demonstrations of session hijacking attacks against popular websites, has spearheaded the increasing deployment of HTTPS. However, many websites still avoid ubiquitous encryption due to performance or compatibility issues. The prevailing approach in these cases is to force critical functionality and sensitive data access over encrypted connections, while allowing more innocuous functionality to be accessed over HTTP. In practice, this approach is prone to flaws that can expose sensitive information or functionality to third parties. In this paper, we conduct an in-depth assessment of a diverse set of major websites and explore what functionality and information is exposed to attackers that have hijacked a user's HTTP cookies. We identify a recurring pattern across websites with partially deployed HTTPS, service personalization inadvertently results in the exposure of private information. The separation of functionality across multiple cookies with different scopes and inter-dependencies further complicates matters, as imprecise access control renders restricted account functionality accessible to non-session cookies. Our cookie hijacking study reveals a number of severe flaws, attackers can obtain the user's home and work address and visited websites from Google, Bing and Baidu expose the user's complete search history, and Yahoo allows attackers to extract the contact list and send emails from the user's account. Furthermore, e-commerce vendors such as Amazon and Ebay expose the user's purchase history (partial and full respectively), and almost every website exposes the user's name and email address. Ad networks like Doubleclick can also reveal pages the user has visited. To fully evaluate the practicality and extent of cookie hijacking, we explore multiple aspects of the online ecosystem, including mobile apps, browser security mechanisms, extensions and search bars. To estimate the extent of the threat, we run IRB-approved measurements on a subset of our university's public wireless network for 30 days, and detect over 282K accounts exposing the cookies required for our hijacking attacks. We also explore how users can protect themselves and find that, while mechanisms such as the EFF's HTTPS Everywhere extension can reduce the attack surface, HTTP cookies are still regularly exposed. The privacy implications of these attacks become even more alarming when considering how they can be used to deanonymize Tor users. Our measurements suggest that a significant portion of Tor users may currently be vulnerable to cookie hijacking.
papers.abstract_zh: 对在线隐私的广泛需求，这也引起了人们对流行网站的劫持攻击的广泛宣传，这使HTTPS的部署不断增加。 但是，由于性能或兼容性问题，许多网站仍然避免无处不在加密。 在这些情况下，普遍的方法是强迫关键功能和敏感的数据访问在加密的连接上，同时允许通过HTTP访问更无害的功能。 在实践中，这种方法容易出现可能向第三方暴露敏感信息或功能的缺陷。 在本文中，我们对各种主要网站进行了深入的评估，并探讨了哪些功能和信息暴露于劫持用户HTTP Cookies的攻击者。 我们确定跨网站的重复模式，其中部分部署了HTTP，服务个性化无意间导致私人信息的暴露。 多个cookie的功能分离具有不同的范围和相互依存关系，使事情变得更加复杂，因为不精确的访问控制渲染范围限制了非课程cookie访问的帐户功能。 我们的Cookie劫持研究显示了许多严重缺陷，攻击者可以获取用户的房屋和工作地址，并从Google，Bing和Baidu访问了用户的完整搜索历史记录，Yahoo允许攻击者从 用户帐户。 此外，诸如Amazon和eBay之类的电子商务供应商揭露了用户的购买历史记录（分别部分和完整），几乎每个网站都公开了用户的姓名和电子邮件地址。 像DoubleClick这样的广告网络还可以揭示用户访问的页面。 为了充分评估cookie劫持的实用性和范围，我们探索了在线生态系统的多个方面，包括移动应用程序，浏览器安全机制，扩展和搜索栏。 为了估计威胁的程度，我们在大学公共无线网络的一部分上进行了30天的IRB批准测量，并检测到超过282K帐户，揭示了我们劫持攻击所需的饼干。 我们还探讨了用户如何保护自己并发现，尽管EFF的HTTPS等机制范围无处不在，但扩展可以减少攻击表面，但HTTP Cookie仍会定期暴露。 当考虑如何将它们用于脱离tor用户时，这些攻击的隐私影响变得更加令人震惊。 我们的测量结果表明，目前很大一部分TOR用户可能容易受到Cookie劫持的影响。
papers.title_zh: 被破解的Cookie Jar: HTTP Cookie劫持和隐私信息的暴露

papers.title: Cloak of Visibility: Detecting When Machines Browse a Different Web
papers.authors: Luca Invernizzi, Kurt Thomas, Alexandros Kapravelos, Oxana Comanescu, Jean Michel Picod, Elie Bursztein
papers.abstract: The contentious battle between web services and miscreants involved in blackhat search engine optimization and malicious advertisements has driven the underground to develop increasingly sophisticated techniques that hide the true nature of malicious sites. These web cloaking techniques hinder the effectiveness of security crawlers and potentially expose Internet users to harmful content. In this work, we study the spectrum of blackhat cloaking techniques that target browser, network, or contextual cues to detect organic visitors. As a starting point, we investigate the capabilities of ten prominent cloaking services marketed within the underground. This includes a first look at multiple IP blacklists that contain over 50 million addresses tied to the top five search engines and tens of anti-virus and security crawlers. We use our findings to develop an anti-cloaking system that detects split-view content returned to two or more distinct browsing profiles with an accuracy of 95.5% and a false positive rate of 0.9% when tested on a labeled dataset of 94,946 URLs. We apply our system to an unlabeled set of 135,577 search and advertisement URLs keyed on high-risk terms (e.g., luxury products, weight loss supplements) to characterize the prevalence of threats in the wild and expose variations in cloaking techniques across traffic sources. Our study provides the first broad perspective of cloaking as it affects Google Search and Google Ads and underscores the minimum capabilities necessary of security crawlers to bypass the state of the art in mobile, rDNS, and IP cloaking.
papers.abstract_zh: Web服务与黑人搜索引擎优化和恶意广告中涉及的不法行为之间的争议之战驱使地下开发了越来越复杂的技术，这些技术隐藏了恶意网站的真实本质。 这些网络盖技术阻碍了安全爬行者的有效性，并可能使互联网用户接触有害内容。 在这项工作中，我们研究了针对浏览器，网络或上下文提示以检测有机访问者的Blackhat披风技术的范围。 作为起点，我们调查了地下销售的十项著名的隐身服务的能力。 这包括对多个IP黑名单的首次查看，这些黑名单包含超过5000万个地址，这些地址与前五个搜索引擎以及数十次反病毒和安全爬行者有关。 我们使用我们的发现来开发一种防lo裂系统，该系统检测到返回的拆分视图，返回到两个或更多不同的浏览概况，准确度为95.5％，在94,946个URL的标记数据集上进行测试时，返回的浏览率为95.5％，假正率为0.9％。 我们将系统应用于一组未标记的搜索和广告URL，以高风险的术语（例如，奢侈品，减肥补充剂）键入，以表征野外威胁的普遍性，并在交通源跨流量中揭示了可掩盖技术的变化。 我们的研究提供了掩饰的第一视角，因为它影响了Google搜索和Google广告，并强调了安全爬行者在移动，RDN和IP掩盖中绕过最新技术所必需的最低功能。
papers.title_zh: 可视性斗篷:检测机器何时浏览不同的网站

papers.title: Verifiable ASICs
papers.authors: Riad S. Wahby, Max Howald, Siddharth Garg, Abhi Shelat, Michael Walfish
papers.abstract: A manufacturer of custom hardware (ASICs) can undermine the intended execution of that hardware, high-assurance execution thus requires controlling the manufacturing chain. However, a trusted platform might be orders of magnitude worse in performance or price than an advanced, untrusted platform. This paper initiates exploration of an alternative: using verifiable computation (VC), an untrusted ASIC computes proofs of correct execution, which are verified by a trusted processor or ASIC. In contrast to the usual VC setup, here the prover and verifier together must impose less overhead than the alternative of executing directly on the trusted platform. We instantiate this approach by designing and implementing physically realizable, area-efficient, high throughput ASICs (for a prover and verifier), in fully synthesizable Verilog. The system, called Zebra, is based on the CMT and Allspice interactive proof protocols, and required new observations about CMT, careful hardware design, and attention to architectural challenges. For a class of real computations, Zebra meets or exceeds the performance of executing directly on the trusted platform.
papers.abstract_zh: 自定义硬件（ASIC）的制造商可能会破坏该硬件的预期执行，因此需要控制制造链。 但是，值得信赖的平台可能比高级，不信任的平台的性能或价格差。 本文启动了对替代方案的探索：使用可验证的计算（VC），一个不信任的ASIC计算正确执行的证明，由受信任的处理器或ASIC验证。 与通常的VC设置相反，在这里，供奉献者和验证者必须比直接在受信任平台上执行的替代方案施加的开销要少。 我们通过在可完全合成的Verilog中设计和实现这种方法来实例化这种方法（对于供体和验证者）。 该系统称为Zebra，基于CMT和AllSpice交互式证明协议，需要有关CMT，仔细的硬件设计以及对建筑挑战的关注的新观察。 对于一类实际计算，斑马会达到或超过直接在受信任平台上执行的性能。
papers.title_zh: 可验证专用集成电路

papers.title: SoK: Verifiability Notions for E-Voting Protocols
papers.authors: Véronique Cortier, David Galindo, Ralf Küsters, Johannes Müller, Tomasz Truderung
papers.abstract: There have been intensive research efforts in the last two decades or so to design and deploy electronic voting (e-voting) protocols/systems which allow voters and/or external auditors to check that the votes were counted correctly. This security property, which not least was motivated by numerous problems in even national elections, is called verifiability. It is meant to defend against voting devices and servers that have programming errors or are outright malicious. In order to properly evaluate and analyze e-voting protocols w.r.t.~verifiability, one fundamental challenge has been to formally capture the meaning of this security property. While the first formal definitions of verifiability were devised in the late 1980s already, new verifiability definitions are still being proposed. The definitions differ in various aspects, including the classes of protocols they capture and even their formulations of the very core of the meaning of verifiability. This is an unsatisfying state of affairs, leaving the research on the verifiability of e-voting protocols in a fuzzy state. In this paper, we review all formal definitions of verifiability proposed in the literature and cast them in a framework proposed by Kuesters, Truderung, and Vogt (the KTV framework), yielding a uniform treatment of verifiability. This enables us to provide a detailed comparison of the various definitions of verifiability from the literature. We thoroughly discuss advantages and disadvantages, and point to limitations and problems. Finally, from these discussions and based on the KTV framework, we distill a general definition of verifiability, which can be instantiated in various ways, and provide precise guidelines for its instantiation. The concepts for verifiability we develop should be widely applicable also beyond the framework used here. Altogether, our work offers a well-founded reference point for future research on the verifiability of e-voting systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的二十年左右的时间里，已经进行了深入的研究工作，以设计和部署电子投票（电子投票）协议/系统，这些协议允许选民和/或外部审计师检查是否正确计算了投票。 这一安全财产甚至是在全国选举中受到许多问题的动机，被称为可验证性。 它的目的是防御具有编程错误或完全恶意的投票设备和服务器。 为了正确评估和分析e-voting协议W.R.T. 尽管已经在1980年代后期设计了第一个正式的验证性定义，但仍在提出新的可验证性定义。 这些定义在各个方面有所不同，包括它们捕获的协议类别，甚至是它们对可验证性含义的核心的表述。 这是一种不满意的状态，在模糊状态下，研究了有关电子投票协议的可验证性的研究。 在本文中，我们回顾了文献中提出的所有正式定义，并将其施加在Kuesters，Truderung和Vogt（KTV框架）提出的框架中，从而产生了对可验证性的统一处理。 这使我们能够对文献可验证性的各种定义进行详细的比较。 我们彻底讨论了优势和缺点，并指出了局限性和问题。 最后，从这些讨论和基于KTV框架的基础上，我们提炼出可验证性的一般定义，可以通过各种方式实例化，并为其实例化提供精确的准则。 我们开发的可验证性概念也应广泛适用于此处使用的框架。 总的来说，我们的工作为未来的电子投票系统的验证性研究提供了一个有充分的参考点。
papers.title_zh: SoK:电子投票协议的可验证性概念

papers.title: pASSWORD tYPOS and How to Correct Them Securely
papers.authors: Rahul Chatterjee, Anish Athayle, Devdatta Akhawe, Ari Juels, Thomas Ristenpart
papers.abstract: We provide the first treatment of typo-tolerant password authentication for arbitrary user-selected passwords. Such a system, rather than simply rejecting a login attempt with an incorrect password, tries to correct common typographical errors on behalf of the user. Limited forms of typo-tolerance have been used in some industry settings, but to date there has been no analysis of the utility and security of such schemes. We quantify the kinds and rates of typos made by users via studies conducted on Amazon Mechanical Turk and via instrumentation of the production login infrastructure at Dropbox. The instrumentation at Dropbox did not record user passwords or otherwise change authentication policy, but recorded only the frequency of observed typos. Our experiments reveal that almost 10% of login attempts fail due to a handful of simple, easily correctable typos, such as capitalization errors. We show that correcting just a few of these typos would reduce login delays for a significant fraction of users as well as enable an additional 3% of users to achieve successful login. We introduce a framework for reasoning about typo-tolerance, and investigate the seemingly inherent tension here between security and usability of passwords. We use our framework to show that there exist typo-tolerant authentication schemes that can get corrections for "free": we prove they are as secure as schemes that always reject mistyped passwords. Building off this theory, we detail a variety of practical strategies for securely implementing typo-tolerance.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们为任意用户选择的密码提供了易耐耐受性密码身份验证的首次处理。 这样的系统，而不是简单地使用不正确的密码拒绝登录尝试，而是试图代表用户纠正常见的印刷错误。 在某些行业环境中使用了有限的错字耐受性，但是迄今为止还没有对此类计划的实用性和安全性进行分析。 我们通过对亚马逊机械土耳其人进行的研究和Dropbox的生产登录基础设施进行仪器来量化用户通过研究进行的错别字的种类和率。 Dropbox的仪器未记录用户密码或以其他方式更改身份验证策略，而仅记录观察到的错别字的频率。 我们的实验表明，几乎10％的登录尝试失败了，这是由于少数简单，易于纠正的错别字，例如大写错误。 我们表明，仅纠正其中一些错别字将减少大部分用户的登录延迟，并允许另外3％的用户获得成功的登录。 我们介绍了一个框架，以推理有关错别字的推理，并在此处调查密码的安全性和可用性之间看似固有的张力。 我们使用我们的框架来证明存在耐耐受性的身份验证方案，可以对“免费”进行更正：我们证明它们与始终拒绝错误的密码的方案一样安全。 在这一理论的基础上，我们详细介绍了安全实施错别字的各种实用策略。
papers.title_zh: 密码输入错误以及如何安全地纠正它们

papers.title: On the Practicality of Cryptographically Enforcing Dynamic Access Control Policies in the Cloud
papers.authors: William C. Garrison III, Adam Shull, Steven A. Myers, Adam J. Lee
papers.abstract: The ability to enforce robust and dynamic access controls on cloud-hosted data while simultaneously ensuring confidentiality with respect to the cloud itself is a clear goal for many users and organizations. To this end, there has been much cryptographic research proposing the use of (hierarchical) identity-based encryption, attribute-based encryption, predicate encryption, functional encryption, and related technologies to perform robust and private access control on untrusted cloud providers. However, the vast majority of this work studies static models in which the access control policies being enforced do not change over time. This is contrary to the needs of most practical applications, which leverage dynamic data and/or policies. In this paper, we show that the cryptographic enforcement of dynamic access controls on untrusted platforms incurs computational costs that are likely prohibitive in practice. Specifically, we develop lightweight constructions for enforcing role-based access controls (i.e., RBAC0) over cloud-hosted files using identity-based and traditional public-key cryptography. This is done under a threat model as close as possible to the one assumed in the cryptographic literature. We prove the correctness of these constructions, and leverage real-world RBAC datasets and recent techniques developed by the access control community to experimentally analyze, via simulation, their associated computational costs. This analysis shows that supporting revocation, file updates, and other state change functionality is likely to incur prohibitive overheads in even minimally-dynamic, realistic scenarios. We identify a number of bottlenecks in such systems, and fruitful areas for future work that will lead to more natural and efficient constructions for the cryptographic enforcement of dynamic access controls. Our findings naturally extend to the use of more expressive cryptographic primitives (e.g., HIBE or ABE) and richer access control models (e.g., RBAC1 or ABAC).
papers.abstract_zh: 在云托管数据上执行强大而动态的访问控制的能力，同时确保对云本身的机密性是许多用户和组织的明确目标。 为此，已经有很多加密研究提出了基于（层次）身份的加密，基于属性的加密，谓词加密，功能加密以及相关技术来对不信任的云提供者执行可靠和私人访问控制的使用。 但是，这项工作的绝大多数研究静态模型，其中执行的访问控制政策不会随着时间而变化。 这与大多数实用应用的需求相反，这些应用利用动态数据和/或策略。 在本文中，我们表明，在不信任平台上对动态访问控件的加密执行会导致在实践中可能会过高的计算成本。 具体而言，我们开发了使用基于身份的和传统的公共密钥密码学上云托管文件的基于角色的访问控件（即RBAC0）的轻量级构造（即RBAC0）。 这是在威胁模型下与密码文献中假定的模型尽可能近的。 我们证明了这些结构的正确性，并利用了现实世界中的RBAC数据集以及访问控制社区开发的最新技术，通过模拟进行实验分析其相关的计算成本。 该分析表明，支持吊销，文件更新和其他状态变化功能可能会在甚至最小动态的现实情况下产生高度的开销。 我们在此类系统中确定了许多瓶颈，以及未来工作的富有成果的领域，这将为动态访问控制的加密执行提供更自然，有效的结构。 我们的发现自然扩展到使用更具表现力的加密原语（例如Hibe或Abe）和更丰富的访问控制模型（例如RBAC1或ABAC）。
papers.title_zh: 在云中加密实施动态访问控制策略的可行性

papers.title: Hawk: The Blockchain Model of Cryptography and Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts
papers.authors: Ahmed E. Kosba, Andrew Miller, Elaine Shi, Zikai Wen, Charalampos Papamanthou
papers.abstract: Emerging smart contract systems over decentralized cryptocurrencies allow mutually distrustful parties to transact safely without trusted third parties. In the event of contractual breaches or aborts, the decentralized blockchain ensures that honest parties obtain commensurate compensation. Existing systems, however, lack transactional privacy. All transactions, including flow of money between pseudonyms and amount transacted, are exposed on the blockchain. We present Hawk, a decentralized smart contract system that does not store financial transactions in the clear on the blockchain, thus retaining transactional privacy from the public's view. A Hawk programmer can write a private smart contract in an intuitive manner without having to implement cryptography, and our compiler automatically generates an efficient cryptographic protocol where contractual parties interact with the blockchain, using cryptographic primitives such as zero-knowledge proofs. To formally define and reason about the security of our protocols, we are the first to formalize the blockchain model of cryptography. The formal modeling is of independent interest. We advocate the community to adopt such a formal model when designing applications atop decentralized blockchains.
papers.abstract_zh: 在分散的加密货币上出现的新兴智能合同系统允许相互不信任的当事方安全地交易而没有受信任的第三方。 如果违反合同违规或中止，分散的区块链可确保诚实的当事方获得相应的赔偿。 但是，现有系统缺乏交易隐私。 所有交易，包括假名和交易金额之间的货币流，都暴露在区块链上。 我们提出了霍克（Hawk），这是一种分散的智能合同系统，在区块链上没有存储金融交易，从而从公众的角度保留了交易隐私。 鹰队程序员可以直观地编写私人智能合约而无需实施密码学，而我们的编译器会自动生成有效的加密协议，其中合同方与区块链相互作用，使用诸如零知识证明的密码原始人。 为了正式定义和理由，我们是第一个正式化密码学区块链模型的人。 正式的建模具有独立的兴趣。 我们主张社区在分散的区块链上设计应用程序时采用这种正式模型。
papers.title_zh: Hawk:加密和隐私保护智能合约的区块链模型

papers.title: High-Speed Inter-Domain Fault Localization
papers.authors: Cristina Basescu, Yue-Hsun Lin, Haoming Zhang, Adrian Perrig
papers.abstract: Data-plane fault localization enhances network availability and reliability by enabling localization and circumvention of malicious entities on a network path. Algorithms for data-plane fault localization exist for intra-domain settings, however, the per-flow or per-source state required at intermediate routers makes them prohibitively expensive in inter-domain settings. We present Faultprints, the first secure data-plane fault localization protocol that is practical for inter-domain settings. Faultprints enables a source to precisely localize malicious network links that drop, delay, or modify packets. We implemented an efficient version of Faultprints on a software router by taking advantage of the parallelism in the AES-NI module of Intel CPUs. Our evaluation on real-world traffic shows fast forwarding on a commodity server at 116.95 Gbps out of 120 Gbps capacity, and a goodput of 94 Gbps. Additionally, Faultprints achieves a high failure localization rate, while incurring a low communication overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据平面故障本地化通过在网络路径上启用恶意实体的定位和规定来增强网络可用性和可靠性。 对于域内设置存在数据平面故障定位的算法，但是，中间路由器所需的每流或每一源状态使它们在域间设置中的昂贵。 我们提出故障标记，这是第一个安全数据平面故障定位协议，可用于域间设置。 故障标记使一个源可以精确定位掉落，延迟或修改数据包的恶意网络链接。 我们通过利用Intel CPU的AES-NI模块中的并行性，在软件路由器上实现了有效的故障印刷。 我们对现实世界流量的评估显示，在120 Gbps容量中，商品服务器上的快速转发为116.95 Gbps，而94 Gbps的好处。 此外，故障印记达到了很高的故障定位率，同时又产生了低沟通开销。
papers.title_zh: 高速域间故障定位

papers.title: Beauty and the Beast: Diverting Modern Web Browsers to Build Unique Browser Fingerprints
papers.authors: Pierre Laperdrix, Walter Rudametkin, Benoit Baudry
papers.abstract: Worldwide, the number of people and the time spent browsing the web keeps increasing. Accordingly, the technologies to enrich the user experience are evolving at an amazing pace. Many of these evolutions provide for a more interactive web (e.g., boom of JavaScript libraries, weekly innovations in HTML5), a more available web (e.g., explosion of mobile devices), a more secure web (e.g., Flash is disappearing, NPAPI plugins are being deprecated), and a more private web (e.g., increased legislation against cookies, huge success of extensions such as Ghostery and AdBlock). Nevertheless, modern browser technologies, which provide the beauty and power of the web, also provide a darker side, a rich ecosystem of exploitable data that can be used to build unique browser fingerprints. Our work explores the validity of browser fingerprinting in today's environment. Over the past year, we have collected 118,934 fingerprints composed of 17 attributes gathered thanks to the most recent web technologies. We show that innovations in HTML5 provide access to highly discriminating attributes, notably with the use of the Canvas API which relies on multiple layers of the user's system. In addition, we show that browser fingerprinting is as effective on mobile devices as it is on desktops and laptops, albeit for radically different reasons due to their more constrained hardware and software environments. We also evaluate how browser fingerprinting could stop being a threat to user privacy if some technological evolutions continue (e.g., disappearance of plugins) or are embraced by browser vendors (e.g., standard HTTP headers).
papers.abstract_zh: 在全球范围内，人数和浏览网络花费的时间不断增加。 因此，丰富用户体验的技术正在以惊人的速度发展。 这些演变中有许多提供了更具交互性的网络（例如，JavaScript库的繁荣，HTML5中的每周创新），更可用的网络（例如，移动设备的爆炸），更安全的网络（例如，Flash消失了，NPAPI插件消失，NPAPI插件 正在弃用）和一个更私人的网络（例如，针对饼干的立法增加，诸如Ghostery和Adblock等扩展的巨大成功）。 然而，提供网络的美感和力量的现代浏览器技术也提供了更黑暗的一面，这是一个丰富的可利用数据生态系统，可用于构建独特的浏览器指纹。 我们的工作探讨了浏览器指纹在当今环境中的有效性。 在过去的一年中，我们收集了118,934个指纹，该指纹由最新的Web技术收集的17个属性组成。 我们表明，HTML5中的创新提供了对高度区分属性的访问，特别是使用canvas API依赖于用户系统的多层。 此外，我们还表明，浏览器指纹在移动设备上与台式机和笔记本电脑上一样有效，尽管由于其更具限制的硬件和软件环境而出于根本不同的原因。 我们还评估了如果某些技术发展（例如，插件的消失）或浏览器供应商（例如标准的HTTP标头）所接受的，浏览器指纹如何停止对用户隐私构成威胁。
papers.title_zh: 美女与野兽:转移现代网络浏览器以构建独特的浏览器指纹

papers.title: Verena: End-to-End Integrity Protection for Web Applications
papers.authors: Nikolaos Karapanos, Alexandros Filios, Raluca Ada Popa, Srdjan Capkun
papers.abstract: Web applications rely on web servers to protect the integrity of sensitive information. However, an attacker gaining access to web servers can tamper with the data and query computation results, and thus serve corrupted web pages to the user. Violating the integrity of the web page can have serious consequences, affecting application functionality and decision-making processes. Worse yet, data integrity violation may affect physical safety, as in the case of medical web applications which enable physicians to assign treatment to patients based on diagnostic information stored at the web server. This paper presents Verena, a web application platform that provides end-to-end integrity guarantees against attackers that have full access to the web and database servers. In Verena, a client's browser can verify the integrity of a web page by verifying the results of queries on data stored at the server. Verena provides strong integrity properties such as freshness, completeness, and correctness for a common set of database queries, by relying on a small trusted computing base. In a setting where there can be many users with different write permissions, Verena allows a developer to specify an integrity policy for query results based on our notion of trust contexts, and then enforces this policy efficiently. We implemented and evaluated Verena on top of the Meteor framework. Our results show that Verena can support real applications with modest overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: Web应用程序依靠Web服务器来保护敏感信息的完整性。 但是，攻击者获得对Web服务器的访问可以篡改数据和查询计算结果，从而为用户提供损坏的网页。 违反网页的完整性可能会产生严重的后果，从而影响应用程序功能和决策过程。 更糟糕的是，违反数据完整性可能会影响物理安全，例如对于医学网络应用程序，这使医生能够根据存储在Web服务器上的诊断信息为患者分配治疗。 本文介绍了Verena，Verena是一种Web应用程序平台，可为可以完全访问Web和数据库服务器的攻击者提供端到端完整性。 在Verena中，客户端的浏览器可以通过验证存储在服务器上的数据的查询结果来验证网页的完整性。 Verena通过依靠一个小的值得信赖的计算基础，为一组数据库查询提供了强大的完整性属性，例如新鲜度，完整性和正确性。 在有许多具有不同写入权限的用户的环境中，Verena允许开发人员根据我们的信任上下文概念为查询结果指定完整性策略，然后有效地执行此策略。 我们在流星框架之上实施并评估了Verena。 我们的结果表明，Verena可以支持带有适度开销的真实应用程序。
papers.title_zh: Verena:网络应用的端到端完整性保护

papers.title: SoK: Towards Grounding Censorship Circumvention in Empiricism
papers.authors: Michael Carl Tschantz, Sadia Afroz, anonymous, Vern Paxson
papers.abstract: Effective evaluations of approaches to circumventing government Internet censorship require incorporating perspectives of how censors operate in practice. We undertake an extensive examination of real censors by surveying prior measurement studies and analyzing field reports and bug tickets from practitioners. We assess both deployed circumvention approaches and research proposals to consider the criteria employed in their evaluations and compare these to the observed behaviors of real censors, identifying areas where evaluations could more faithfully and effectively incorporate the practices of modern censors. These observations lead to an agenda realigning research with the predominant problems of today.
papers.abstract_zh: 对规避政府互联网审查制度的方法的有效评估需要纳入对审查员在实践中的运作的看法。 我们通过调查先前的测量研究并分析从业者的现场报告和错误票，对实际审查员进行广泛的检查。 我们评估了部署的规避方法和研究建议，以考虑其评估中采用的标准，并将其与实际审查员的观察到的行为进行比较，从而确定评估可以更忠实有效地纳入现代审查员实践的领域。 这些观察结果导致议程重新调整研究，并在当今的主要问题中进行了重新调整。
papers.title_zh: 索克:以经验主义为基础的审查规避

papers.title: A Tough Call: Mitigating Advanced Code-Reuse Attacks at the Binary Level
papers.authors: Victor van der Veen, Enes Göktas, Moritz Contag, Andre Pawlowski, Xi Chen, Sanjay Rawat, Herbert Bos, Thorsten Holz, Elias Athanasopoulos, Cristiano Giuffrida
papers.abstract: Current binary-level Control-Flow Integrity (CFI) techniques are weak in determining the set of valid targets for indirect control flow transfers on the forward edge. In particular, the lack of source code forces existing techniques to resort to a conservative address-taken policy that overapproximates this set. In contrast, source-level solutions can accurately infer the targets of indirect calls and thus detect malicious control-flow transfers more precisely. Given that source code is not always available, however, offering similar quality of protection at the binary level is important, but, unquestionably, more challenging than ever: recent work demonstrates powerful attacks such as Counterfeit Object-oriented Programming (COOP), which made the community believe that protecting software against control-flow diversion attacks at the binary level is rather impossible. In this paper, we propose binary-level analysis techniques to significantly reduce the number of possible targets for indirect branches. More specifically, we reconstruct a conservative approximation of target function prototypes by means of use-def analysis at possible callees. We then couple this with liveness analysis at each indirect callsite to derive a many-to-many relationship between callsites and target callees with a much higher precision compared to prior binary-level solutions. Experimental results on popular server programs and on SPEC CPU2006 show that TypeArmor, a prototype implementation of our approach, is efficient - with a runtime overhead of less than 3%. Furthermore, we evaluate to what extent TypeArmor can mitigate COOP and other advanced attacks and show that our approach can significantly reduce the number of targets on the forward edge. Moreover, we show that TypeArmor breaks published COOP exploits, providing concrete evidence that strict binary-level CFI can still mitigate advanced attacks, despite the absence of source information or C++ semantics.
papers.abstract_zh: 当前的二进制级控制流完整性（CFI）技术在确定向前边缘上间接控制流动传输的有效目标集合集合。 特别是，缺乏源代码迫使现有技术诉诸于保守的地址策略，该政策过度贴上了这一集合。 相反，源级别的解决方案可以准确地推断间接呼叫的目标，从而更精确地检测恶意控制流传输。 但是，鉴于源代码并不总是可用，但是，在二进制级别提供类似的保护质量很重要，但是，毫无疑问，比以往任何时候都更具挑战性：最近的工作表现出强大的攻击，例如伪造的面向对象的编程（COP），这使得该攻击是如此。 社区认为，保护软件免受二进制级别的控制流动转移攻击是不可能的。 在本文中，我们提出了二元级分析技术，以显着减少间接分支的可能目标数量。 更具体地说，我们通过在可能的callees处使用DEF分析来重建目标函数原型的保守近似。 然后，我们将其与每个间接呼唤的livesice分析相结合，以与先前的二进制级别解决方案相比，具有更高精度的呼叫者和目标级别之间的多对多关系。 在流行的服务器程序和Spec CPU2006上的实验结果表明，TypeArmor是我们方法的原型实现，这是有效的 - 运行时开销小于3％。 此外，我们评估了TypeArmor在多大程度上可以减轻Coop和其他先进的攻击，并表明我们的方法可以大大减少前部边缘的目标数量。 此外，我们表明Typearmor断裂已发布的Coop漏洞，提供具体的证据表明，尽管没有源信息或C ++语义，但严格的二进制级别CFI仍可以减轻高级攻击。
papers.title_zh: 艰难的抉择:在二进制级别减轻高级代码重用攻击

papers.title: Return to the Zombie Gadgets: Undermining Destructive Code Reads via Code Inference Attacks
papers.authors: Kevin Z. Snow, Roman Rogowski, Jan Werner, Hyungjoon Koo, Fabian Monrose, Michalis Polychronakis
papers.abstract: The concept of destructive code reads is a new defensive strategy that prevents code reuse attacks by coupling fine-grained address space layout randomization with a mitigation for online knowledge gathering that destroys potentially useful gadgets as they are disclosed by an adversary. The intuition is that by destroying code as it is read, an adversary is left with no usable gadgets to reuse in a control-flow hijacking attack. In this paper, we examine the security of this new mitigation. We show that while the concept initially appeared promising, there are several unforeseen attack tactics that render destructive code reads ineffective in practice. Specifically, we introduce techniques for leveraging constructive reloads, wherein multiple copies of native code are loaded into a process' address space (either side-by-side or one-after-another). Constructive reloads allow the adversary to disclose one code copy, destroying it in the process, then use another code copy for their code reuse payload. For situations where constructive reloads are not viable, we show that an alternative, and equally powerful, strategy exists: leveraging code association via implicit reads, which allows an adversary to undo in-place code randomization by inferring the layout of code that follows already disclosed bytes. As a result, the implicitly learned code is not destroyed, and can be used in the adversary's code reuse attack. We demonstrate the effectiveness of our techniques with concrete instantiations of these attacks against popular applications. In light of our successes, we argue that the code inference strategies presented herein paint a cautionary tale for defensive approaches whose security blindly rests on the perceived inability to undo the application of in-place randomization.
papers.abstract_zh: 破坏性代码读取的概念是一种新的防御性策略，可以通过将细粒度的地址空间布局随机化和缓解在线知识收集的缓解措施来防止代码重复使用攻击，从而破坏了潜在有用的小工具，因为它们会被对手披露。 直觉是，通过销毁读取的代码，对手没有可用的小工具可以在控制流劫持攻击中重复使用。 在本文中，我们研究了这种新的缓解的安全性。 我们表明，虽然该概念最初显得很有希望，但有几种无法预料的攻击策略使破坏性的代码在实践中读取无效。 具体而言，我们介绍了利用建设性重新加载的技术，其中将本机代码的多个副本加载到过程的地址空间（并非一侧或单个之后）中。 建设性重新加载允许对手披露一个代码副本，在过程中销毁它，然后使用另一个代码副本进行代码重复使用有效载荷。 对于建设性重新加载不可行的情况，我们表明存在一种替代方案，同样强大的策略：通过隐式读取来利用代码关联，这使对手可以通过推断已经公开已披露的代码的布局来撤消现场代码随机化 字节。 结果，隐式学习的代码不会被破坏，可以在对手的代码重复使用攻击中使用。 我们通过对流行应用的具体实例化来证明我们的技术的有效性。 鉴于我们的成功，我们认为，此处介绍的代码推理策略为防御方法描绘了一个警示性的故事，其安全性基于所感知的无法撤销现场随机化的应用。
papers.title_zh: 回到僵尸小工具:通过代码推理攻击破坏破坏性代码读取

papers.title: Data-Oriented Programming: On the Expressiveness of Non-control Data Attacks
papers.authors: Hong Hu, Shweta Shinde, Sendroiu Adrian, Zheng Leong Chua, Prateek Saxena, Zhenkai Liang
papers.abstract: As control-flow hijacking defenses gain adoption, it is important to understand the remaining capabilities of adversaries via memory exploits. Non-control data exploits are used to mount information leakage attacks or privilege escalation attacks program memory. Compared to control-flow hijacking attacks, such non-control data exploits have limited expressiveness, however, the question is: what is the real expressive power of non-control data attacks? In this paper we show that such attacks are Turing-complete. We present a systematic technique called data-oriented programming (DOP) to construct expressive non-control data exploits for arbitrary x86 programs. In the experimental evaluation using 9 programs, we identified 7518 data-oriented x86 gadgets and 5052 gadget dispatchers, which are the building blocks for DOP. 8 out of 9 real-world programs have gadgets to simulate arbitrary computations and 2 of them are confirmed to be able to build Turing-complete attacks. We build 3 end-to-end attacks to bypass randomization defenses without leaking addresses, to run a network bot which takes commands from the attacker, and to alter the memory permissions. All the attacks work in the presence of ASLR and DEP, demonstrating how the expressiveness offered by DOP significantly empowers the attacker.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着控制流劫持的防御能力获得采用，重要的是要通过内存利用来了解对手的剩余功能。 非控制数据利用用于安装信息泄漏攻击或特权升级攻击程序记忆。 与控制流劫持攻击相比，这种非控制数据利用的表现力有限，但是，问题是：非控制数据攻击的真正表达能力是什么？ 在本文中，我们表明这种攻击是图灵完整的。 我们提出了一种名为“面向数据的编程”（DOP）的系统技术，以构建用于任意X86程序的表达性非控制数据利用。 在使用9个程序的实验评估中，我们确定了7518个面向数据的X86小工具和5052个小工具调度员，这是DOP的构建块。 在9个现实世界中，有8个具有用于模拟任意计算的小工具，其中2个被确认能够构建Turing-Complete-Complete攻击。 我们构建了3次端到端攻击，以绕过随机防御，而无需泄漏地址，运行一个网络机器人，该机器人从攻击者中获取命令并更改内存权限。 在ASLR和DEP的存在下，所有攻击都起作用，表明DOP提供的表现力如何显着赋予攻击者。
papers.title_zh: 面向数据编程:论非控制数据攻击的表现性

papers.title: Dedup Est Machina: Memory Deduplication as an Advanced Exploitation Vector
papers.authors: Erik Bosman, Kaveh Razavi, Herbert Bos, Cristiano Giuffrida
papers.abstract: Memory deduplication, a well-known technique to reduce the memory footprint across virtual machines, is now also a default-on feature inside the Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 operating systems. Deduplication maps multiple identical copies of a physical page onto a single shared copy with copy-on-write semantics. As a result, a write to such a shared page triggers a page fault and is thus measurably slower than a write to a normal page. Prior work has shown that an attacker able to craft pages on the target system can use this timing difference as a simple single-bit side channel to discover that certain pages exist in the system. In this paper, we demonstrate that the deduplication side channel is much more powerful than previously assumed, potentially providing an attacker with a weird machine to read arbitrary data in the system. We first show that an attacker controlling the alignment and reuse of data in memory is able to perform byte-by-byte disclosure of sensitive data (such as randomized 64 bit pointers). Next, even without control over data alignment or reuse, we show that an attacker can still disclose high-entropy randomized pointers using a birthday attack. To show these primitives are practical, we present an end-to-end JavaScript-based attack against the new Microsoft Edge browser, in absence of software bugs and with all defenses turned on. Our attack combines our deduplication-based primitives with a reliable Rowhammer exploit to gain arbitrary memory read and write access in the browser. We conclude by extending our JavaScript-based attack to cross-process system-wide exploitation (using the popular nginx web server as an example) and discussing mitigation strategies.
papers.abstract_zh: 内存重复数据删除是一种众所周知的技术，可减少虚拟机上的内存足迹，现在也是Windows 8.1和Windows 10操作系统内的默认功能。 重复数据删除将一个物理页面的多个相同的副本映射到带有复制在写入语义的单个共享副本上。 结果，写入这样的共享页面会触发页面故障，因此比写入普通页面要慢得多。 先前的工作表明，能够在目标系统上制作页面的攻击者可以将此时间差作为简单的单位侧通道，以发现系统中存在某些页面。 在本文中，我们证明了重复数据删除侧通道比以前假设的功能强大得多，这可能会为攻击者提供怪异的机器，以读取系统中的任意数据。 我们首先表明，控制记忆中数据对齐和重复使用的攻击者能够执行敏感数据的字节披露（例如随机64位指针）。 接下来，即使没有控制数据对准或重复使用，我们也表明，攻击者仍然可以使用生日攻击披露高渗透随机指针。 为了证明这些原语是实用的，我们在没有软件错误的情况下，对新的Microsoft Edge浏览器进行了基于端到端的JavaScript攻击，并且所有防御都打开了。 我们的攻击将基于重复数据删除的原语与可靠的Rowhammer漏洞相结合，以在浏览器中获得任意内存读取访问权限。 最后，我们将基于JavaScript的攻击扩展到跨系统范围内的开发（以流行的NGINX Web服务器为例）并讨论缓解策略。
papers.title_zh: 重复数据删除Est玛奇纳:内存重复数据删除作为一种高级开发手段

2016.conf_title: 37th S&P 2016: San Jose, CA, USA - Workshops

papers.title: DataTags, Data Handling Policy Spaces and the Tags Language
papers.authors: Michael Bar-Sinai, Latanya Sweeney, Mercè Crosas
papers.abstract: Widespread sharing of scientific datasets holds great promise for new scientific discoveries and great risks for personal privacy. Dataset handling policies play the critical role of balancing privacy risks and scientific value. We propose an extensible, formal, theoretical model for dataset handling policies. We define binary operators for policy composition and for comparing policy strictness, such that propositions like "this policy is stricter than that policy" can be formally phrased. Using this model, The policies are described in a machine-executable and human-readable way. We further present the Tags programming language and toolset, created especially for working with the proposed model. Tags allows composing interactive, friendly questionnaires which, when given a dataset, can suggest a data handling policy that follows legal and technical guidelines. Currently, creating such a policy is a manual process requiring access to legal and technical experts, which are not always available. We present some of Tags' tools, such as interview systems, visualizers, development environment, and questionnaire inspectors. Finally, we discuss methodologies for questionnaire development. Data for this paper include a questionnaire for suggesting a HIPAA compliant data handling policy, and formal description of the set of data tags proposed by the authors in a recent paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 科学数据集的广泛共享对新的科学发现和个人隐私风险具有很大的希望。 数据集处理策略起着平衡隐私风险和科学价值的关键作用。 我们提出了一个可扩展的，正式的理论模型，用于处理策略。 我们为策略组成定义了二进制操作员，并比较了政策严格性，以便可以正式地措辞诸如“此政策要比该政策更重要”之类的命题。 使用此模型，策略是以机器可读和可读的方式描述的。 我们进一步介绍了标签编程语言和工具集，这些语言和工具集是专为使用所提出的模型而创建的。 标签允许编写交互式，友好的问卷，当给出数据集时，可以提出遵循法律和技术指南的数据处理策略。 目前，制定这样的政策是需要访问法律和技术专家的手动过程，这些过程并非总是可用的。 我们介绍了一些标签的工具，例如访谈系统，可视化器，开发环境和问卷检查员。 最后，我们讨论问卷开发的方法论。 本文的数据包括一份问卷，用于提出符合HIPAA的数据处理策略，以及对作者在最近的论文中提出的一组数据标签的正式描述。
papers.title_zh: 数据标签、数据处理策略空间和标签语言

papers.title: Compliance Monitoring of Third-Party Applications in Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Florian Kelbert, Alexander Fromm
papers.abstract: With the widespread adoption of Online Social Networks (OSNs), users increasingly also use corresponding third-party applications (TPAs), such as social games and applications for collaboration. To improve their social experience, TPAs access users' personal data via an API provided by the OSN. Applications are then expected to comply with certain security and privacy policies when handling the users' data. However, in practice, they might store, use, and distribute that data in all kinds of unapproved ways. We present an approach that transparently enforces security and privacy policies on TPAs that integrate with OSNs. To this end, we integrate concepts and implementations from the research areas of data usage control and information flow control. We instantiate these results in the context of TPAs in OSNs in order to enforce compliance with security and privacy policies that are provided by the OSN operator. We perform a preliminary evaluation of our approach on the basis of a TPA that integrates with the Facebook API.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着在线社交网络（OSN）的广泛采用，用户越来越多地使用相应的第三方应用程序（TPA），例如社交游戏和应用程序进行协作。 为了改善他们的社交经验，TPA通过OSN提供的API访问用户的个人数据。 然后，在处理用户数据时，期望应用程序遵守某些安全性和隐私政策。 但是，实际上，他们可能会以各种未经批准的方式存储，使用和分发数据。 我们提出了一种在与OSN集成的TPA上透明地执行安全和隐私政策的方法。 为此，我们整合了数据使用控制和信息流控制的研究领域的概念和实现。 我们将这些结果实例化在OSN中的TPA的背景下，以便遵守OSN操作员提供的安全性和隐私政策。 我们根据与Facebook API集成的TPA对我们的方法进行初步评估。
papers.title_zh: 在线社交网络中第三方应用的合规性监控

papers.title: Privacy Risk Analysis Based on System Control Structures: Adapting System-Theoretic Process Analysis for Privacy Engineering
papers.authors: Stuart S. Shapiro
papers.abstract: To date, top-down efforts to evolve and structure privacy engineering knowledge have tended to reflect common systems engineering/development life cycle activities. A different approach suggests a particular need for technical analytical methods. To help address this need, this paper proposes to adapt for privacy engineering an existing technique, System-Theoretic Process Analysis (STPA), developed for safety engineering. The foundations of STPA are discussed, its security extension, STPA-Sec, is described, and modifications to STPA-Sec are proposed to produce STPA-Priv. STPA-Priv is then applied to a simple illustrative example.
papers.abstract_zh: 迄今为止，开发和构建隐私工程知识的自上而下的努力倾向于反映共同的系统工程/开发生命周期活动。 一种不同的方法表明对技术分析方法的特殊需求。 为了帮助满足这一需求，本文建议适应用于安全工程的现有技术，系统理论过程分析（STPA）。 讨论了STPA的基础，其安全性扩展为STPA-SEC，并提出对STPA-SEC的修改来产生STPA-PRIV。 然后将STPA-PRIV应用于一个简单的说明性示例。
papers.title_zh: 基于系统控制结构的隐私风险分析:适应隐私工程的系统理论过程分析

papers.title: A Semi-Automated Methodology for Extracting Access Control Rules from the European Data Protection Directive
papers.authors: Kaniz Fatema, Christophe Debruyne, Dave Lewis, Declan O'Sullivan, John P. Morrison, Abdullah-Al Mazed
papers.abstract: Handling personal data in a legally compliant way is an important factor for ensuring the trustworthiness of a service provider. The EU data protection directive (EU DPD) is built in such a way that the outcomes of rules are subject to explanations, contexts with dependencies, and human interpretation. Therefore, the process of obtaining deterministic and formal rules in policy languages from the EU DPD is difficult to fully automate. To tackle this problem, we demonstrate in this paper the use of a Controlled Natural Language (CNL) to encode the rules of the EU DPD, in a manner that can be automatically converted into the policy languages XACML and PERMIS. We also show that forming machine executable rules automatically from the controlled natural language grammar not only has the benefit of ensuring the correctness of those rules but also has potential of making the overall process more efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 以法律规定的方式处理个人数据是确保服务提供商可信度的重要因素。 欧盟数据保护指令（EU DPD）的构建方式是规则的结果受到解释，具有依赖性的上下文和人类解释的约束。 因此，从欧盟DPD中获取政策语言中确定性和形式规则的过程很难完全自动化。 为了解决这个问题，我们在本文中证明了使用受控的自然语言（CNL）来编码欧盟DPD规则，以一种可以自动转换为策略语言xacml和permis的方式。 我们还表明，从受控的自然语言语法自动制定机器可执行规则不仅具有确保这些规则正确性的好处，而且还具有使整体过程更有效的潜力。
papers.title_zh: 从欧洲数据保护指令中提取访问控制规则的半自动方法

papers.title: A Critical Analysis of Privacy Design Strategies
papers.authors: Michael Colesky, Jaap-Henk Hoepman, Christiaan Hillen
papers.abstract: The upcoming General Data Protection Regulation is quickly becoming of great concern to organizations which process personal data of European citizens. It is however nontrivial to translate these legal requirements into privacy friendly designs. One recently proposed approach to make 'privacy by design' more practical is privacy design strategies. This paper improves the strategy definitions and suggests an additional level of abstraction between strategies and privacy patterns: 'tactics'. We have identified a collection of such tactics based on an extensive literature review, in particular a catalogue of surveyed privacy patterns. We explore the relationships between the concepts we introduce and similar concepts used in software engineering. This paper helps bridge the gap between data protection requirements set out in law, and system development practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 即将到来的一般数据保护法规迅速成为处理欧洲公民个人数据的组织。 但是，将这些法律要求转化为隐私友好的设计是不平凡的。 最近提出的一种使“通过设计隐私”更实用的方法是隐私设计策略。 本文改善了策略定义，并提出了策略和隐私模式之间的额外抽象水平：“战术”。 我们已经根据广泛的文献综述确定了一系列此类策略，尤其是被调查的隐私模式的目录。 我们探讨了我们介绍的概念与软件工程中使用的类似概念之间的关系。 本文有助于弥合法律规定的数据保护要求与系统开发实践之间的差距。
papers.title_zh: 隐私设计策略的批判性分析

papers.title: Oblivious Mechanisms in Differential Privacy: Experiments, Conjectures, and Open Questions
papers.authors: Chien-Lun Chen, Ranjan Pal, Leana Golubchik
papers.abstract: Differential privacy (DP) is a framework to quantify to what extent individual privacy in a statistical database is preserved while releasing useful aggregate information about the database. In this work, we aim an exploratory study to understand questions related to the optimality of noise generation mechanisms (NGMs) in differential privacy by taking into consideration the (i) query sensitivity, (ii) query side information, and (iii) the presence of longitudinal and collusion attacks. The results/observations from our study serve three important purposes: (i) provide us with conjectures on appropriate (in the sense of privacy-utility tradeoffs) oblivious NGM selection for scalar queries in both non-Bayesian as well as Bayesian user settings, (ii) provide supporting evidence and counterexamples to existing theory results on the optimality of NGMs when they are tested on a relaxed assumption set, and (ii) lead to a string of interesting open questions for the theory community in relation to the design and analysis of provably optimal oblivious differential privacy mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 差异隐私（DP）是一个框架，可以在统计数据库中保留统计数据库中的个人隐私在多大程度上保留有关数据库的有用的汇总信息。 在这项工作中，我们旨在通过考虑（i）查询敏感性，（ii）查询侧面信息，以及（iii）存在，了解与差异隐私中噪声机制（NGM）最佳（NGM）相关的问题，以及（iii） 纵向和串通攻击。 我们研究的结果/观察结果具有三个重要目的：（i）为我们提供有关适当的猜想（从隐私性 - 实用性权衡的意义上），在非bayesian以及贝叶斯用户设置中都忽略了NGM的标量查询（（ ii）为现有理论的结果提供支持和反示例，以根据NGM在轻松的假设集进行测试时的最佳性结果，并且（ii）与理论社区有关的一系列有趣的开放问题，就其设计和分析而言。 证明是最佳的遗忘差异隐私机制。
papers.title_zh: 差分隐私中的遗忘机制:实验、猜想和开放问题

papers.title: Obstacles to Transparency in Privacy Engineering
papers.authors: Kiel Brennan-Marquez, Daniel Susser
papers.abstract: Transparency is widely recognized as indispensable to privacy protection. However, producing transparency for end-users is often antithetical to a variety of other technical, business, and regulatory interests. These conflicts create obstacles which stand in the way of developing tools which provide meaningful privacy protections or from having such tools adopted in widespread fashion. In this paper, we develop a "map" of these common obstacles to transparency, in order to assist privacy engineers in successfully navigating them. Furthermore, we argue that some of these obstacles can be successfully avoided by distinguishing between two different nonceptions of transparency and considering which is at stake in a given case -- transparency as providing users with insight into what information about them is collected and how it is processed (what we call transparency as a "view under-the-hood") and transparency as providing users with facility in navigating the risks and benefits of using particular technologies.
papers.abstract_zh: 透明度被广泛认为是隐私保护必不可少的。 但是，为最终用户产生透明度通常与其他各种技术，业务和法规利益相反。 这些冲突造成了障碍，这些障碍阻碍了开发工具，从而提供有意义的隐私保护或以广泛的方式采用此类工具。 在本文中，我们为透明度的这些常见障碍开发了一个“地图”，以帮助隐私工程师成功浏览它们。 此外，我们认为，可以通过区分两种不同的透明度和考虑在给定情况下危害的两种不同的透明度和考虑到透明度，可以成功地避免这些障碍 - 使用户洞悉收集的信息以及如何收集到的信息 经过处理（我们称之为透明度为“视图下的视图”），并为用户提供了使用特定技术的风险和好处的设施。
papers.title_zh: 隐私工程透明度的障碍

papers.title: From Privacy Impact Assessment to Social Impact Assessment
papers.authors: Lilian Edwards, Derek McAuley, Laurence Diver
papers.abstract: In order to address the continued decline in consumer trust in all things digital, and specifically the Internet of Things (IoT), we propose a radical overhaul of IoT design processes. Privacy by Design has been proposed as a suitable framework, but we argue the current approach has two failings: it presents too abstract a framework to inform design, and it is often applied after many critical design decisions have been made in defining the business opportunity. To rebuild trust we need the philosophy of Privacy by Design to be transformed into a wider Social Impact Assessment and delivered with practical guidance to be applied at product/service concept stage as well as throughout the system's engineering.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了解决数字化的所有数字，尤其是物联网（IoT）的消费者信任的持续下降，我们提出了对物联网设计过程的彻底大修。 设计的隐私已被认为是一个合适的框架，但我们认为当前的方法有两个失败：它提出了一个框架，无法为设计提供信息，并且在定义商机的许多关键设计决策后，经常应用它。 为了重建信任，我们需要通过设计将隐私哲学转变为更广泛的社会影响评估，并在产品/服务概念阶段以及整个系统的工程中应用实用的指导。
papers.title_zh: 从隐私影响评估到社会影响评估

papers.title: Privacy Harm Analysis: A Case Study on Smart Grids
papers.authors: Sourya Joyee De, Daniel Le Métayer
papers.abstract: To carry out a true privacy risk analysis and go beyond a traditional security analysis, it is essential to distinguish the notions of feared events and their impacts, called "privacy harms" here, and to establish a link between them. In this paper, we provide a clear relationship among harms, feared events, privacy weaknesses and risk sources and describe their use in the analysis of smart grid systems. This work also lays the foundation for a more systematic and rigorous approach to privacy risk assessment.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了进行真正的隐私风险分析并超越了传统的安全分析，必须在这里区分恐惧事件及其影响的概念，在这里称为“隐私危害”，并在它们之间建立联系。 在本文中，我们在危害，恐惧事件，隐私弱点和风险来源之间提供了明确的关系，并描述了它们在智能电网系统分析中的使用。 这项工作还为更系统，更严格的隐私风险评估方法奠定了基础。
papers.title_zh: 隐私危害分析:智能电网案例研究

papers.title: Improving Performance and Usability in Mobile Keystroke Dynamic Biometric Authentication
papers.authors: Faisal Alshanketi, Issa Traoré, Ahmed Awad E. Ahmed
papers.abstract: In the last few years, the number of mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets, in circulation, has increased dramatically. The primary and often only protection mechanism in these devices is authentication using a password or a Personal Identification Number (PIN). Passwords are notoriously known to be a weak authentication mechanism, no matter how complex the underlying format is. A more secure alternative option which has gained interest recently is extracting keystroke dynamic biometrics from supplied passwords for mobile authentication. In this paper, we show that using random forests classifier, improved accuracy performance can be achieved for mobile keystroke dynamic biometric authentication. We also propose a new algorithm for handling typos, which is an essential step in improving usability. We study both timing features and pressure-based features. Experimental evaluation is based on two public datasets and a third dataset collected in our lab. The best performance, obtained by combining timing and pressure features, is an Equal Error Rate (EER) of 2.3% for a population of 42 users.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几年中，流通的智能手机和平板电脑等移动设备的数量急剧增加。 这些设备中的主要且通常唯一的保护机制是使用密码或个人身份码（PIN）进行身份验证。 众所周知，密码是一种薄弱的身份验证机制，无论其基础格式多么复杂。 最近引起的更安全的替代选项是从提供的密码中提取击键动态生物识别技术以进行移动身份验证。 在本文中，我们表明，使用随机森林分类器，可以为移动击键动态生物识别验证而实现改进的精度性能。 我们还提出了一种用于处理错别字的新算法，这是提高可用性的重要一步。 我们研究正时特征和基于压力的特征。 实验评估基于我们实验室中收集的两个公共数据集和第三个数据集。 通过将计时和压力特征结合起来获得的最佳性能是42位用户的人群相等的错误率（EER）为2.3％。
papers.title_zh: 提高移动按键动态生物认证的性能和可用性

papers.title: Detection of Mobile Malware: An Artificial Immunity Approach
papers.authors: James Brown, Mohd Anwar, Gerry V. Dozier
papers.abstract: Inspired by the human immune system, we explore the development of a new multiple detector set artificial immune system (mAIS) for the detection of mobile malware based on the information flows in Android apps. mAISs differ from conventional AISs in that multiple detector sets are evolved concurrently via negative selection. Typically, the first detector set is composed of detectors that match information flows associated with malicious apps while the second detector set is composed of detectors that match the information flows associated with benign apps. The mAIS presented in this paper incorporates feature selection along with a negative selection technique known as the split detector method (SDM). This new mAIS has been compared with a variety of conventional AISs and mAISs using a dataset of information flows captured from malicious and benign Android applications. Our preliminary results show that the newly designed mAIS outperforms the conventional AISs and mAISs in terms of accuracy and false positive rate of malware detection. This paper ends with a discussion of how mAISs can be used to solve dynamic cybersecurity problems as well as a discussion of our future research. This approach achieved 93.33% accuracy with a 0.00% false positive rate.
papers.abstract_zh: 受人免疫系统的启发，我们探索了新的多重检测器集人工免疫系统（MAI）的开发，用于根据Android应用中的信息流检测移动恶意软件。 MAISS与常规AISS不同，因为多个检测器集是通过负选择同时进化的。 通常，第一个检测器集由与恶意应用程序相关的信息流匹配的检测器组成，而第二个检测器集由与良性应用相关的信息流匹配的检测器组成。 本文介绍的MAI结合了特征选择以及一种称为拆分检测器方法（SDM）的负选择技术。 使用了来自恶意和良性Android应用程序捕获的信息流的数据集，将此新的MAI与各种常规的AISS和MAISS进行了比较。 我们的初步结果表明，新设计的MAI在准确性和虚假的恶意软件检测率方面优于常规的AISS和MAISS。 本文以讨论如何使用MAIS来解决动态网络安全问题以及对我们未来研究的讨论结束。 该方法以0.00％的假阳性率达到93.33％的精度。
papers.title_zh: 移动恶意软件检测:一种人工免疫方法

papers.title: Polymorphic Malware Detection Using Sequence Classification Methods
papers.authors: Jake Drew, Tyler Moore, Michael Hahsler
papers.abstract: Polymorphic malware detection is challenging due to the continual mutations miscreants introduce to successive instances of a particular virus. Such changes are akin to mutations in biological sequences. Recently, high-throughput methods for gene sequence classification have been developed by the bioinformatics and computational biology communities. In this paper, we argue that these methods can be usefully applied to malware detection. Unfortunately, gene classification tools are usually optimized for and restricted to an alphabet of four letters (nucleic acids). Consequently, we have selected the Strand gene sequence classifier, which offers a robust classification strategy that can easily accommodate unstructured data with any alphabet including source code or compiled machine code. To demonstrate Stand's suitability for classifying malware, we execute it on approximately 500GB of malware data provided by the Kaggle Microsoft Malware Classification Challenge (BIG 2015) used for predicting 9 classes of polymorphic malware. Experiments show that, with minimal adaptation, the method achieves accuracy levels well above 95% requiring only a fraction of the training times used by the winning team's method.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于连续的突变不断引入特定病毒的连续实例，因此多态性恶意软件检测是具有挑战性的。 这种变化类似于生物序列中的突变。 最近，生物信息学和计算生物学群落已经开发了用于基因序列分类的高通量方法。 在本文中，我们认为这些方法可以有效地应用于恶意软件检测。 不幸的是，基因分类工具通常被优化为四个字母的字母（核酸）。 因此，我们选择了Strand Gene序列分类器，该分类器提供了强大的分类策略，可以轻松使用任何字母（包括源代码或计算机代码）来容纳非结构化数据。 为了展示Stand对恶意软件分类的适用性，我们在大约500GB的恶意软件数据上执行了该赛车，该数据由Kaggle Microsoft Microsoft恶意软件挑战（Big 2015）提供，用于预测9类多态性恶意软件。 实验表明，随着最少的适应性，该方法达到的准确性水平远高于95％，只需要获胜团队方法使用的训练时间的一小部分。
papers.title_zh: 使用序列分类方法的多态恶意软件检测

papers.title: LINEBACKER: LINE-Speed Bio-Inspired Analysis and Characterization for Event Recognition
papers.authors: Christopher S. Oehmen, Paul J. Bruillard, Brett D. Matzke, Aaron R. Phillips, Keith T. Star, Jeffrey L. Jensen, Doug Nordwall, Seth R. Thompson, Elena S. Peterson
papers.abstract: The cyber world is a complex domain, with digital systems mediating a wide spectrum of human and machine behaviors. While this is enabling a revolution in the way humans interact with each other and data, it also is exposing previously unreachable infrastructure to a worldwide set of actors. Existing solutions for intrusion detection and prevention that are signature-focused typically seek to detect anomalous and/or malicious activity for the sake of preventing or mitigating negative impacts. But a growing interest in behavior-based detection is driving new forms of analysis that move the emphasis from static indicators (e.g. rule-based alarms or tripwires) to behavioral indicators that accommodate a wider contextual perspective. Similar to cyber systems, biosystems have always existed in resource-constrained hostile environments where behaviors are tuned by context. So we look to biosystems as an inspiration for addressing behavior-based cyber challenges. In this paper, we introduce LINEBACKER, a behavior-model based approach to recognizing anomalous events in network traffic and present the design of this approach of bio-inspired and statistical models working in tandem to produce individualized alerting for a collection of systems. Preliminary results of these models operating on historic data are presented along with a plugin to support real-world cyber operations.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络世界是一个复杂的领域，数字系统介导了广泛的人类和机器行为。 尽管这使人可以互相互动和数据进行革命，但它也将以前无法达到的基础设施暴露于全球范围内的演员。 以签名为中心的入侵检测和预防解决方案通常寻求检测异常和/或恶意活动，以防止或减轻负面影响。 但是，对基于行为的检测的兴趣日益增加，正在推动新的分析形式，这些分析将重点从静态指标（例如基于规则的警报或TripWires）转移到适应更广泛的上下文观点的行为指标。 与网络系统类似，在资源受限的敌对环境中，生物系统始终存在，在这些环境中，行为是通过上下文调整的。 因此，我们将生物系统视为解决基于行为的网络挑战的灵感。 在本文中，我们介绍了Linebacker，这是一种基于行为模型的方法，用于识别网络流量中的异常事件，并介绍了在串联生物启发和统计模型的方法的设计，以制作系统收集的个性化警报。 这些模型在历史数据上运行的初步结果与插件一起介绍，以支持现实世界的网络操作。
papers.title_zh: LINEBACKER:用于事件识别的线速生物启发分析和表征

papers.title: MIGRATE: Towards a Lightweight Moving-Target Defense Against Cloud Side-Channels
papers.authors: Mohamed Azab, Mohamed Eltoweissy
papers.abstract: Recent research has demonstrated the severity of co-residency side-channel attacks on computing clouds. These attacks have been successfully employed by malicious tenants to extract sensitive private information from selected neighboring tenants. Solutions towards addressing such attacks have presented customized solutions for specific variants of these attacks that often require significant modifications to the hardware, client virtual machines (VM), or hypervisors. These solutions are not generic and will not succeed with mutating versions of these attacks. Except for the impractical, resource inefficient, and costly single tenant solutions, co-residency will always be an issue to cloud service providers. In this paper, inspired from the camouflaging process of the sea chameleons evading predators, we present MIGRATE. MIGRATE is a container management framework that employs resource-efficient, scalable, real-time moving target defense to obfuscate the container execution behavior complicating the attacker's task to locate their targets.
